items.title: ISLANDER
items.description: ISLANDER is a Minecraft-style crafting game with various goals to complete.

items.title: Isometric Escape
items.description: Isometric is an escape game where you solve a series of puzzles to escape from isometric rooms. Find all the useful objects and use your logic and memory to solve the riddles.

items.title: Isometric Escapes
items.description: Isometric Escapes is a 3D adventure escape game where you must search for useful items in the rooms to help you escape. Look carefully around the rooms, and use your logic to solve the riddles. Find your way to escape!

items.title: Johnny Rocketfingers
items.description: Johnny Rocketfingers is a point and click adventure game that gives you control over Johnny Rocketfingers, the most "suppish" guy around. In this game, you help out a mom trying to find her daughter. Use anything around you that you deem necessary to finish your objective in each area you're thrown in.

items.title: Kitchen Escape
items.description: Kitchen Escape is an adventure escape game where you must use your logic to find the key and escape from the kitchen. Find tools to help you out, solve puzzles, and crack the passwords!

items.title: Knight Hero 2 Revenge Idle RPG
items.description: Knight Hero 2 Revenge Idle RPG is an exciting RPG platformer where you play as an undead hero seeking revenge. After being awakened from a centuries-old slumber, you must battle enemies and defeat powerful bosses. Upgrade your abilities, collect epic gear, and progress through unique worlds. With easy controls and rapid leveling, you’re always in for an adventure.

items.title: Knight Hero Adventure Idle RPG
items.description: Knight Hero Adventure Idle RPG is a fantasy adventure where the radiant princess, the rightful heir to the throne, has been abducted by malevolent creatures from the magical realm. As the appointed assassin, your mission is clear – rescue the princess and secure the fate of the kingdom. Equip yourself with a razor-sharp sword, a sturdy shield, and a trusty

items.title: Laqueus Escape: Chapter I
items.description: Laqueus Escape is a 3D room escape game. You have to figure out how to escape the mysterious place. Try thechapter 2!

items.title: Laqueus Escape: Chapter V
items.description: Laqueus Escape: Chapter V is the fifth episode of an escape game Laques Escape. Use your logic to solve all of the difficult riddles to finish the game.

items.title: Laqueus Escape 2: Chapter I
items.description: Laqueus Escape 2: Chapter I is an adventure escape game where you need to use your logic to escape from the room. You don't know how or when you've got into this strange facility. The time behaves strangely, and the place is ruined. Find your way out by solving all the puzzles and challenges!

items.title: Laqueus Escape 2: Chapter II
items.description: Laqueus Escape 2: Chapter II is a continuous series from the Laqueus Escape 2 adventure escape game. You are still trying to get out of this strange facility. Try to find all the clues that will help you solve all the riddles and successfully open the locked door. Things are getting more complicated, so prepare yourself to use your logic.

items.title: Laqueus Escape 2 - Chapter III
items.description: Laqueus Escape 2: Chapter III is an adventure escape game where you navigate a mysterious facility, unlocking doors by deciphering clues. Sharpen your vision and math skills to solve riddles and progress through this gripping escape experience. Uncover hidden secrets and overcome obstacles as you strive to break free from the enigmatic surroundings.

items.title: Laqueus Escape: Chapter II
items.description: This is the second episode ofLaqueus Escape: Chapter 1, a 3D thrilling room escape game!

items.title: Laqueus Escape: Chapter III
items.description: Laqueus Escape: Chapter III is the next episode of Laqueus Escape, a mysterious room escape game. Escaping was never this hard. Use your head and carry on!

items.title: Laqueus Escape: Chapter IV
items.description: Laqueus Escape - Chapter IV is a new chapter and new challenges of the Laqueus Escape series, a 3D room escape game. Look around, find clues, and use objects and solve puzzles to win this escape room game.

items.title: Laqueus Escape: Chapter VI
items.description: Laqueus Escape: Chapter VI is an episode of Laqueus Escape with a bigger and trickier 3D escape game than ever!

items.title: LinQuest
items.description: LinQuest is a 2D platformer game with a mission to help adventurer Lin to search for a mysterious treasure in 3 different dangerous zones.

items.title: Lost Adventure
items.description: Lost Adventure is a survival puzzle game where you guide a determined pilot through a strange, untamed land after a mid-air crash. Craft tools, mine resources, and solve clever challenges as you race to rescue scattered passengers. Your choices shape their fate: will you lead them to safety before the wilderness claims them for good?

items.title: Machine Room Escape
items.description: Machine Room Escape is a room escape game with various machines to interact with.

items.title: Magic World
items.description: Magic World is an adventure puzzle game where you engage in unique battles with mythical creatures and fierce enemies by defeating them via gem matching. The gameplay is strategic, as this is not your ordinary battle. Your enemies will use cover and battlefield advantages against you. You'll need a well-thought-out strategy and smart leveling up of all heroes to achieve victory!

items.title: Medieval Escape
items.description: Medieval Escape is a puzzle adventure game where you find yourself trapped in a room, it's up to you to uncover hidden clues, solve intricate puzzles, and locate essential items that will pave your path to freedom. Can you secure your freedom?

items.title: MIDNIGHT Remastered
items.description: This is the remastered edition of MIDNIGHT. Help the character to collect all the seven letters that are scattered in a dark and mysterious mansion.

items.title: Mini Mine
items.description: Mini Mine is a thrilling adventure arcade game where you dig deep, fight fierce monsters, and trade smartly to save Noob’s kidnapped girlfriend. Mine resources to upgrade weapons and tools, build a thriving village, and uncover hidden treasures. Unlock unique characters, set up automated production, and take down Cheater in an epic showdown!

items.title: Mirrorland
items.description: Mirrorland is a turn-based strategy set in a fantastical realm teeming with heroes and monsters. Embark on an epic journey through this magical world, brimming with perilous encounters and thrilling adventures at every turn. Traverse through the looking glass into a realm of enigmatic puzzles and terrifying foes. Unravel the mysteries, aid mythical beings, vanquish villains, and safeguard the universe of Mirrorland. With stunning visuals, an immersive storyline, diverse hero selection, and engaging multiplayer features, prepare for an unforgettable quest where bravery and cunning are your greatest weapons.

items.title: Monster Mash: Pet Trainer
items.description: Monster Mash: Pet Trainer is a captivating Monster Tamer adventure game where you train, fight, and explore a world teeming with incredible creatures. Engage in epic battles, face powerful bosses, and build your dream team with a variety of monsters. Immerse yourself in hyper-casual gameplay, surrounded by stunning visuals and captivating soundscapes. Unleash the power within as you become the ultimate monster trainer in this exhilarating quest of growth and discovery.

items.title: My Dweller Gang
items.description: My Dweller Gang is an adventure RPG game where you can gather resources, build the island, and the most important thing is to save the island from the evil magician. There's a big danger on the island because an evil magician from the Dark Lands is kidnapping dwellers! You are drawn into a fight with evil against your will, but you are ready to fight for your friends!

items.title: Mystic Escape
items.description: Mystic Escape is an escape game to reveal your lost memories that took place on the island. Enjoy this escape game experience by solving these challenging Japanese-style puzzles surrounded by beautiful scenery. Find mysterious artifacts and clues on the island that will lead you to the solution.

items.title: Nightfall: Survival Siege
items.description: Nightfall: Survival Siege is a strategic survival game where your planning skills are tested by day and your courage by night. You gather resources, build strongholds, and prepare your defenses while the sun shines. When darkness falls, hordes of the undead attack, forcing you to rely on light, quick thinking, and your fortified base to endure the siege.

items.title: No Crossroads
items.description: No Crossroads is a turn-based strategy game focused on resource management and small scale turn-based combat game.

items.title: Noob Digger: Pro Drill Miner
items.description: Noob Digger: Pro Drill Miner is a thrilling mining adventure where you pilot a powerful drill deep into the earth in search of treasures and secrets. Unearth valuable resources, trade for upgrades, and uncover mysterious bunkers to assemble the legendary Super Drill. Dig not just for riches—but to rebuild your dream home and win back your lost love.

items.title: Noob: Island Escape
items.description: Noob: Island Escape is a casual adventure game where you help Noob build a new ship and escape from the island! Collect resources and build the means required to escape the island. How long can you survive?

items.title: Noob Miner 2: Escape From Prison
items.description: Noob Miner 2: Escape From Prison is an adventure arcade mining game where your survival depends on your skills and strategy! You control your noob miner to dig, fly, eat, purchase goods, and pretty much do everything possible to not only survive but escape from confinement.

items.title: Noob: Space Escape!
items.description: Noob: Space Escape! is a survival crafting adventure where you guide Noob through a mysterious floating world filled with danger. Gather resources, upgrade your gear, and battle monsters as you work to repair your rocket. Explore hidden islands packed with traps, secrets, and fierce enemies, digging, building, and fighting your way toward freedom before time runs out.

items.title: Noob vs Pro: Challenge
items.description: Noob vs Pro Challenge is a thrilling adventure where you decide between playing as Noob or Pro. Face 1000 zombies in an apocalypse, rescue a princess, outsmart the evil Herobrine, and navigate through dungeons to discover a secret portal. Upgrade your character, craft traps, and battle unique bosses to complete your epic journey.

items.title: Nuclear Day
items.description: Nuclear Day is a survival adventure game where a nuclear explosion has turned the world into a wasteland of radiation, hunger, disease, and suffering. As a lone survivor, your goal is to escape the dying city and reunite with the love of your youth. Will you help others survive, or will you leave them behind to save yourself? The choice is yours.

items.title: Obby: +1 to Spaceflight Altitude
items.description: Obby: +1 to Spaceflight Altitude is an adventure simulation space flight game that takes your cosmic adventures to new heights, literally as your protagonist aims to fly. Step into the shoes of your customizable Obb character, upgrade your abilities, and fuel your rockets so you can soar across the galaxy.

items.title: Obby & Dead River
items.description: Obby & Dead River is an action-packed first-person 3D adventure inspired by the style of Roblox. Your mission is to survive the treacherous “River of Death,” a legendary path connecting mighty castles. Playing as a fearless warrior, you’ll travel across thousands of kilometers, facing monsters, pirates, and even dragons, before finally reaching the ultimate boss. Along the way, explore villages, collect treasures, trade goods, and upgrade your weapons. Each castle presents more formidable enemies but greater rewards. Load your loot onto the ship, capture criminals to deliver to the sheriff, and remember to refuel before embarking on your next perilous journey. The goal is to journey along the river, battling enemies, collecting loot, and upgrading your hero as you advance toward the final castle, where the ultimate boss awaits.

items.title: Obby: Dumb or Genius IQ Test
items.description: Obby: Dumb or Genius IQ Test is a game where intelligence is everything! Boost your IQ by completing mini-games, taking on challenges, and battling in PvP duels. Collect IQ points from the map, win games for extra rewards, and try your luck on the wheel of fortune for bonus IQ! Compete against other players, earn cups, and exchange them for pets. The higher your IQ, the better your status. Climb the leaderboard and prove you’re the smartest player in the game!

items.title: Obby: Legendary Dragon
items.description: Obby: Legendary Dragon is a thrilling adventure battle game where you are on an epic quest to capture extraordinary creatures across fantastical worlds. Run through from enchanted forests to mystical mountains, each brimming with hundreds of stunning animals just waiting to be discovered. Get ready to hone your skills and grow your creatures through countless levels. With each step, you’ll forge friendships with fellow adventurers and uncover delightful surprises.

items.title: Obby: The Royal Race
items.description: Obby: The Royal Race is an adventure game where players can spend hours customizing and upgrading their Obby character, collecting cool cars, and tackling challenging parkour courses. The game offers an exciting mix of racing, platforming, and character progression, making it a thrilling experience for players who enjoy both speed and skill-based challenges. So get ready to rev your engines, upgrade your character, and take on the parkour challenges in this action-packed game!

items.title: OneBit Adventure
items.description: OneBit Adventure is an adventure game where turn-based roguelike RPG journey. Face off against ever-tougher rogue monsters as you venture deeper into the unknown. Customize your character with various classes and uncover the mysteries of this perilous world. Explore dungeons for valuable loot and level up to survive even longer. Dive into this offline adventure where danger and rewards await at every turn.

items.title: Overtitans: Destroyers of Worlds
items.description: Overtitans: Destroyers of Worlds is an experimental action game where you craft powerful spells by fusing runes into unpredictable combinations. With no cooldowns and no safety nets, you’ll wield raw, unstable magic to reshape the battlefield and confront colossal Titans. Push your limits, embrace chaos, and uncover secrets buried beneath a world that trembles with every spell you cast.

items.title: Panda Simulator 3D
items.description: Live the life of a panda in 3D Panda Simulator! Make a family, grow cubs, complete tasks, and improve your panda home.

items.title: Phoenix Contract
items.description: Phoenix Contract is an action-packed MMORPG where you craft your hero’s legacy through epic quests, fierce battles, and rich customization. Master powerful skills, take on towering bosses, and uncover mystical heirlooms. Whether clashing in intense PvP or uniting with allies to conquer vast realms, every choice shapes your destiny in this ever-evolving fantasy world.

items.title: Pirate Island
items.description: Pirate Island is a thrilling survival adventure set on a lawless island teeming with danger. Gather resources, craft tools, and uncover hidden treasures while navigating the treacherous jungle. Face off against merciless pirates in intense battles as you fight to escape this perilous paradise. Will you outwit your enemies or succumb to the island's grip?

items.title: Planet Life
items.description: Planet Life is a fun and exciting adventure game in which you must manage resources and build new things. You take control of a planet - this planet is lonely and its wish to meet other planets and explore the universe - you must help it grow so that it can do this!

items.title: Planetarium 2
items.description: Planetarium is an awesome game of adventure and exploration in which you can watch our solar system in action and see how the different planets and stars interact with each other and around our galaxy - this is an epic planet simulation game! Use your mouse to move around the universe and check out how our solar system works.

items.title: Pocket Zone
items.description: Pocket Zone is a gripping simulation game that challenges you to survive in a post-apocalyptic world. Venture to the Chernobyl nuclear power plant and fulfill your deepest desires with the legendary Performer of Dreams. If you're looking to escape the monotony of city life, prepare to journey through desolate lands where survival against a hostile environment is your primary goal.

items.title: Puzzle Room Escape
items.description: Puzzle Room Escape is a escape game that offers only one exit route. Solve puzzles to break free from a locked room. Your task is to escape the room through ingenuity and quick thinking.

items.title: Python Snake Simulator
items.description: Python Snake Simulator is a simulation game in which you take on the role of a phyton. Hunt the bunnies and rats. Eat all the eggs, fish, and meats. Be careful of the wolf, bear, and armed humans. Find your way to escape from the construction site. Solve the puzzles, obstacles, and hurdles of the task. And last but not least, kill the Eagle boss! Enjoy and feel the experience of becoming a phyton!

items.title: Raid Heroes: Dragon Age
items.description: Raid Heroes: Dragon Age is a strategic battle game where you face a new era of danger. After defeating the Dark Lord, the kingdom must now stand against the ancient dragons that awaken once a century. Lead your heroes, uncover the mystery of their arrival, and defend the land from the chaos they bring.

items.title: Raid Heroes: Total War
items.description: Raid Heroes: Total War is a thrilling blend of RPG, strategy, and tactical battles where you lead a squad of heroes to protect your kingdom from the Dark Lord’s forces. Strengthen your castle, forge powerful artifacts, and face off against rivals in intense PvP clashes. Unleash your tactical skills and become a legendary leader!

items.title: Ray Part 1
items.description: Ray Part 1 is the first game in the Ray series of games. Get involved in the criminal underworld in this violent point-and click interactive movie with great visuals that are inspired by South Park.

items.title: Red Escape
items.description: Red Escape is a captivating adventure puzzle game that puts your wits and problem-solving skills to the test! Trapped in a series of three rooms, your goal is to use logic, gather tools, uncover hidden clues, and solve intricate puzzles to make your escape. Do you have the skills to solve every puzzle and escape all three rooms?

items.title: Riddle School
items.description: Riddle School is a fun game of mystery and puzzle solving and the first title in the Riddle School series. You are stuck in school in a boring class and you want to escape! You must interact with various objects in the classrooms and hallway and try to deceive and confuse the teachers and try to leave the school and your boring class! This game has a simple click interface, fun gameplay and challenging puzzles.

items.title: Riddle School 2
items.description: Help Phil to escape the school in this sequel of Riddle School!

items.title: Rise Hero
items.description: Rise Hero is an adventure game where you play as a hero who prepares to fight the demon king. Through repeated deaths and rebirths, strengthen yourself until you can rid the world of dark forces and save the world. Get ready for endless battles to defeat the monsters. Obtain and utilize more powerful equipment, level up your character, prepare yourself to conquer bosses in various regions, and ultimately meet the Demon King!

items.title: Rooms Home Escape
items.description: Rooms Home escape is a puzzleescape gamewhere you suddenly find yourself locked inside a house. Collect tools and find relevant clues. Solve compelling puzzles and find your way out!

items.title: Sausage Dog
items.description: Sausage Dog is an adventure game to make the sausage dog go back home safely where its puppy is waiting. Explore the world and pass through each level by overcoming the obstacles. Collect the food and items along the way.

items.title: Scary Horror Escape Room
items.description: Scary Horror Escape Room is a creepyescape room gameset in a mysterious place. Solve tricky puzzles and escape the place alive!

items.title: Schoolboy Escape: Runaway
items.description: Schoolboy Escape: Runaway is an adventure puzzle escape game where you're a determined kid with pretty strict parents who wants to break free from being grounded in your room. Tiptoe across quiet hallways, avoid being seen, and use clever tricks to carry out your great escape. Your friends are waiting for you on the outside. Do you have what it takes to join them?

items.title: Shadow President: Illuminati
items.description: Shadow President: Illuminati is a story game in which you chat with Trump and rule the world! How would it feel to  be the man/woman behind the power of the presidency? The person pulling the string behind the scenes. Now you can find out how it is to be one of the most powerful people in the world.

items.title: Skillfite.io
items.description: Skillfite.io is an MMORPG adventure battle game set in a large open-world environment with up to 100 players. Prepare yourself for the ultimate survival experience! Gather materials, craft powerful gear, and sharpen your skills to dominate in these intense PvP battles. Explore a vast, open world brimming with surprises, hidden treasures, and challenges at every turn. Whether you prefer teaming up with a guild to conquer foes or going solo to prove your mettle, the choice is yours. As you advance, you will build up your abilities, craft deadly weapons, and become a formidable fighter ready to take on anything the world throws!

items.title: Skinwalker
items.description: Skinwalker is an adventure puzzle escape game where you are trapped in the heart of a frozen wilderness. Your goal is to survive a winter forest while escaping from a relentless, terrifying creature. Your survival hinges on your ability to gather essential items and stay one step ahead of a relentless and terrifying creature

items.title: Skyblock Survive With Noob!
items.description: Skyblock Survive With Noob! is an adventure game where you control Noob, who finds himself marooned on the floating island of Skyblock. You will need to collect resources like food and water, build shelter, and explore Skyblock and all the challenges and surprises it brings.

items.title: Space Heroes
items.description: Space Heroes is an epic RPG adventure that takes you across a richly detailed galaxy filled with mystery and danger. Assemble a team of legendary heroes, each with unique skills and backstories, and lead them through thrilling quests and strategic battles. Level up, unlock powerful gear, and explore hidden treasures across vast landscapes. Join alliances, conquer dungeons, and face off in multiplayer challenges to prove your strength in this immersive interstellar journey.

items.title: Space Museum Escape
items.description: Space Museum Escape is a room escape game to exit the space museum successfully by getting hints and solving different puzzles.

items.title: SpellWheel
items.description: SpellWheel blends strategy and puzzle-solving in a magical combat experience. Use creativity and careful planning as you explore spell combinations, counter unique enemies, and immerse yourself in a world of mystical runes and powerful magic. Are you ready to master the SpellWheel and become the ultimate sorcerer?

items.title: Stealing the Diamond
items.description: Stealing The Diamond is another in a series of amazing stick figure adventure games. In Stealing The Diamond, you guessed it; you try to steal a diamond! An extremely large diamond at that! You have choices to make in your quest for theft! Will you rush in and risk everything or try to sneak your way to your prize? Whatever you decide, be careful as one wrong move will leave you without a diamond and maybe even less! Do you have what it takes to pull off the diamond heist and make it out alive? If you like this game, make sure to also try outFleeing the Complex, the last game in the Henry Stickmin series!

items.title: Stellar Mines: Space Miner
items.description: Stellar Mines: Space Miner is a space mining game where you must collect resources from asteroids and sell them to get money. Buy various spaceships with different capabilities and features. Upgrade drilling equipment, extraction tools, and storage facilities to increase efficiency and increase the amount of resources you can gather from each asteroid. Build a team of skilled crew members to provide various advantages. Confront greedy pirates and bosses. Be the most powerful spaceship in the outer space.

items.title: Stick Fighter vs Zombies
items.description: Stick Fighter vs Zombies is an action-packed 2D platformer where you control a red stickman battling endless waves of zombies in a blocky world reminiscent of Minecraft. Get ready for epic fights as you face off against zombies, skeleton archers, withers, and even Noob in this thrilling survival game! This fast-paced combat will keep you on your toes as you protect your stickman friends from the zombie apocalypse.

items.title: Stickman Escape School
items.description: Stickman Escape School is a fun adventure game where you need to find a way to escape from school. You are a student who doesn't exactly like to study and decides to cut class and ditch your boring teacher's class. There are a lot of different items you could use to escape from school, but if you choose the wrong one, you can be caught and forced to study for pretty much your entire life. The risks are steep, but the rewards are plenty—you get to skip school! Try to choose the right items so you can escape successfully!

items.title: Stickman vs Villager: Save the Girl
items.description: Stickman vs Villager: Save the Girl is an exhilarating adventure game set in a captivating cube world. Take on the role of Stickman as you embark on a perilous journey to rescue a girl from the clutches of an evil villager.

items.title: Stronghold Dude
items.description: Stronghold Dude is a strategy game where you build your medieval city and shape your empire's destiny. Face thrilling battles, weave through tales of knights and princesses, and conquer legendary dragons. With survival, tactics, and planning at its core, this adventure invites you to master the art of conquest in a world of magic and epic challenges.

items.title: Survival Craft Adventure
items.description: Survival Craft Adventure is a 2D-pixel game where you must gather resources, craft, and build in order to survive. Create your weapon, such as a sword and a bow with its arrows. Find a treasure chest and complete quests to receive the awesome reward. Build a house to keep you safe from the night. There are many things you can do in this game! Mine the dungeons, fight monsters, raise pets, defeat bosses, etc.

items.title: SYNTAXIA
items.description: SYNTAXIA is an adventure story game where you awaken in a decaying complex, confused and alone. A nearby laptop flickers to life, granting you a mysterious power. Whatever you write becomes a reality. Use this unique ability to navigate the enigmatic Sensoria Komplex, solve puzzles, and uncover hidden secrets as you search for a way out. Can you rewrite your fate and escape?

items.title: The Dawn of Slenderman
items.description: The Dawn of Slenderman a first-person horror survival game to find the required pages and to either avoid and kill Slenderman.

items.title: The Final Earth 2
items.description: The Final Earth 2 is a vertical city building game. Starting on a small rock in outer-space, you have to build your city and population from the ground up – literally. Resource management and a happy workforce is the key to building a thriving metropolis.

items.title: The Island
items.description: The Island is an arcade game where something strange is happening in the world, people disappear, and then bloodthirsty zombies return. Your task is to find out what is going on and who is behind it all. You go to the island that is the source of the infection and find out what is really going on.

items.title: The Quest
items.description: The Quest is a story-driven adventure where you guide a courageous young boy who wields his father’s sword in search of truth. As you journey across a troubled kingdom, you’ll uncover secrets, face challenges, and confront the source of its sorrow. Your bravery shapes the fate of a land longing for hope.

items.title: The White Room
items.description: The White Room is an escape room game with a relaxed pace. You are locked in a room and you have to leave it using logic and the objects around you. There is no timer, so you have time to think a bit more clearly!

items.title: The White Room 2
items.description: The White Room 2 is a quick escape game of logic with a cartoon art style. You are locked in a room and you have to leave it using logic and objects around you, can you make it?

items.title: The White Room 3
items.description: The White Room 3 is an escape game where you must use your logic and objects around you to escape from the locked room.

items.title: The White Room 4
items.description: The White Room 4 is an immersive escape game that challenges your logic and problem-solving skills. Find yourself trapped in a hotel room and embark on a thrilling adventure to escape. Utilize the tools at your disposal, solve intricate puzzles, uncover hidden clues, and crack passwords to unlock your path to freedom. Will you be able to conquer the puzzles and break free from this challenging escape experience?

items.title: The White Room 5
items.description: The White Room 5 is the fifth sequel of an adventure escape game with a cartoon art style. Find objects that can help you escape the room and use your logic to solve the puzzles. Good luck!

items.title: Think to Escape
items.description: Think To Escape is an escape game to save yourself from the hotel that is on fire, you have to use your logic and tools around you to escape before the fire reaches you. Solve puzzles, open safes, collect objects, and use them to survive!

items.title: Think to Escape: School
items.description: Think to Escape: School is a challenging escape game where you must find clues and prove your puzzle-solving skills. Escape from the library and classroom by finding the key. There are some useful objects that you can use to help solve the riddles. Use your logic and memory skills to escape!

items.title: Think to Escape 2
items.description: Think to Escape 2 is a challenging escape game that puts your puzzle-solving skills to the test. Escape from common rooms by finding useful objects and solving riddles with logic and memory. Think you're smart? Try Think to Escape 2 and prove it!

items.title: Truck Hit Hero: Isekai Arena
items.description: Truck-Hit Hero: Isekai Arena is a 2D RPG platformer inspired by classic isekai tales, where an ordinary guy wakes up in a new world as a hero. Battle through 12+ unique arenas filled with traps and enemies, mastering 30+ abilities with swords, spears, crossbows, and magic. Collect loot, upgrade gear, and craft powerful builds to survive challenging waves of monsters and become the ultimate arena champion.

items.title: Underwater Survival: Deep Dive
items.description: Underwater Survival: Deep Dive is an intense adventure simulation game that thrusts players into the perilous depths of an alien ocean planet, challenging their survival instincts and skills in an unforgiving underwater world. From resource management to facing off against terrifying underwater creatures, every aspect of this immersive survival simulator tests your ability to think on your feet and adapt to the ever-present dangers.

items.title: Video Studio Escape
items.description: Video Studio Escape is anescape gamewhere your objective is to escape from a video studio room. Solve all the complicated puzzles to open the door and get out from there. Hope you can do it, good luck!

items.title: Vintage Escape
items.description: Vintage Escape is a puzzle escape game where in this game, your father was an inventor and left a special tool for you as a gift and a test. You have to solve puzzles and use objects and passwords to leave this classic victorian room. Good luck!

items.title: Wolf Family Simulator
items.description: Wolf Family Simulator is an adventure simulation game where you play as a wolf. Hunt and fight with wild animals for survival. Explore the open world, find your soulmate at level 10, and have a cub at level 20. Try to survive in a dangerous forest by increasing your health, energy, and damage to each family member. Try different breeds such as gray wolf, Indian wolf, and others. Fight with forest bosses like bears, tigers, boars, and many other animals. Complete quests and receive daily gifts to help you on your survival journey! Become the strongest in this autumn forest!

items.title: Woods of Nevia: Forest Survival
items.description: Woods of Nevia: Forest Survival is a one-tap action adventure where you battle, scavenge, and survive in the wild. Wield your axe to fend off wolves, chop wood, and build shelter as you explore for resources and hidden chests. Level up, choose upgrades, and outlast growing dangers while managing hunger and health in this engaging forest challenge.

items.title: Basket-Ball
items.description: Basket-Ball is a 2D arcade basketball game where you must throw the ball in one shot and be able to catch the star and put the ball into the basket. Avoid obstacles that get in the way and use the portal to teleport the ball. Proof your skill and challenge yourself by beating all the levels available. This game is designed for your fun!

items.title: Basket Battle
items.description: Basket Battle is a dynamic sports basketball game where you aim to outscore your opponent by skillfully throwing the ball into the basket. Challenge your reflexes as you intercept your rival's shots and maintain control over the game: master timing and precision to dominate the court and secure victory in intense matches.

items.title: Basket Champs
items.description: Basket Champs is a fun basketball game! Pick your favorite team and compete in the tournament by scoring more points than your opponents.

items.title: Basket Monsterz
items.description: Basket Monsterz is an awesome basketball shooting game with fun cartoon monster characters! You can play as a wide range of monsters including Satan and Bigfoot. Get in the game and see if you can win.

items.title: Basket Random
items.description: Basket Random is a chaotic 2-player arcade sports game with unpredictable physics. Bounce and battle for the ball across wild courts, with each dunk launching you to the next level!

items.title: Basket Slam Dunk 2
items.description: Just likeTap Tap Shots, in Basket Slam Dunk 2, you need to successfully dunk the basketball into the ring. The physics element makes the game more challenging!

items.title: Basket Swooshes Plus
items.description: Basket Swooshes Plus is a sports basketball game where you must be the first to score 11 points to win. Get ready to step onto the virtual court and shoot some hoops in the competitive basketball match. Test your shooting skills and win the competition!

items.title: Basketball Clash
items.description: Basketball Clash is the ultimate basketball game that brings together players from around the globe, providing endless entertainment. Showcase your talent and rise among the top 100 basketball shooters worldwide. Prepare for exhilarating competitions where your agility, logic, and strategic thinking will determine your triumph. Prove your skills and dominate the court!

items.title: Basketball FRVR
items.description: Basketball FRVR is a great new basketball game that you can play on any device. This Basketball Hoop Shooter is simple to learn but a lot of fun. There is no time limit in the game, but the moving basket is a challenge even for experienced players! This means that you can play Basketball FRVR for as long as you want. There are bonus points if you don't hit the rim. The game is made by Chris Benjaminsen. Have fun!

items.title: Basketball League
items.description: Basketball League is an arcade basketball sports game where you must aim and shoot to score. If you want relaxing gameplay, you can try the Free Throw mode. If you want to challenge yourself, you can play the Timed Practice mode. If you want to show your skill and prove yourself to others, play the Online mode so everybody will know how talented you are!

items.title: Basketball Legends 2020
items.description: Basketball Legends 2020 is the popular sequel toBasketball Stars 2019. This two-player basketball game lets you play as iconic basketball players like Luka Doncic, James Harden, and LeBron James in bobblehead form!

items.title: Basketball Orbit
items.description: Basketball Orbit is an exhilarating sports basketball simulation game in our sports category, where you aim to launch basketballs to unbelievable heights, even beyond Earth’s atmosphere! Take on thrilling one-shot basketball challenges, conquer tricky levels, and perfect your shooting technique. Compete to become the ultimate basketball legend in this fun and unique basketball adventure!

items.title: Basketball Serial Shooter
items.description: Basketball Serial Shooter is an arcade basketball game where you must throw the ball into the basket before the time runs out. Try to make as many points as you can on each play. Good luck!

items.title: Basketball Skills
items.description: Basketball Skills is the basketball arcade game in which you must try to score baskets in all the different game modes available. You can play either arcade, time attack, and distance mode. Arcade mode gives you 10 balls to use; you must continue to score baskets although it becomes harder each time you score.

items.title: Basketball Stars
items.description: Basketball Stars is a 2-player basketball game by Madpuffers where you hit the court as legends like LeBron James, Stephen Curry, and James Harden. Play solo, team up with a friend or challenge them in fast-paced hoops action!

items.title: Basketball Superstars
items.description: Basketball Superstars is a dynamic basketball experience where you create and train your ultimate player. Customize your gear, enhance your skills, and face intense rivals in fast-paced matches. Whether you are outsmarting opponents or perfecting your strategy, each game delivers action and excitement as you strive to dominate the court and showcase your prowess.

items.title: BasketBros
items.description: BasketBros is a fast-paced basketball game that offers both online and offline gameplay. Choose a player, customize your style, and compete in single-player and multiplayer games.

items.title: Bouncy Dunk
items.description: Bouncy Dunk is the arcade basketball game in which you must try to score as many baskets as possible. The ball will come from different directions, use the clicker on your mouse to make the ball bounce and score into the basket. Your timing as key as you must work out the protectory of the ball as it approaches the rim.

items.title: Epic Basketball
items.description: Epic Basketball is an entertaining arcade-style basketball game with crazy characters.

items.title: Flappy Dunk
items.description: Flappy Dunk is a casual basketball game where you tap to propel the ball through hoops, earning points and unlocking new balls along the way. The game seamlessly blends simple one-touch controls with a challenging gameplay that's easy to grasp but hard to master. Perfect for basketball enthusiasts of all ages, Flappy Dunk keeps the excitement alive with its unique theme and a continuous stream of fresh challenges as you progress.

items.title: Flipper Dunk 3D
items.description: Flipper Dunk 3D is a challenging single-tap pinball-basketball game. You'll need the patience of a monk and the precision of a master to dunk. See if you have what it takes to be a master dunker. The game is simple to learn but difficult to master, but it will be highly satisfying when you finally dunk that ball! Check outTap Tap Shotsfor a similar game.

items.title: Hoop World 3D
items.description: Hoop World 3D is a flip-and-dunk game that brings basketball to a whole new dimension! Get your timing right or you'll fall short of the net and fall flat on your face.

items.title: Jump Up 3D
items.description: Jump Up 3D is a sports basketball game where you shoot to get that slam dunk, but the one hitch is you're doing it by jumping on a trampoline. Not your ordinary basketball game, this one promises and delivers the excitement! Take aim, bounce on the trampoline, and score baskets before your opponent. With intuitive controls and addictive gameplay, it tests your precision and unleashes your inner dunk master. Be the court champion in this fast-paced! How far can you go in this unlimited playground of basketball action?

items.title: Jump Up 3D: Mini Basketball
items.description: Jump Up 3D: Mini Basketball is a trampoline basketball game where you control the action. With simple controls, anyone can enjoy aiming for that perfect shot. The vibrant graphics and lively animations make each game session a blast. Challenge yourself to beat your high score or compete with friends for bragging rights. It's time to bounce, shoot, and score big in Jump Up 3D: Mini Basketball!

items.title: Noob Basketball Clicker
items.description: Noob Basketball Clicker is a fun and addicting clicker game that combines with unique basketball elements. Your goal is to manage the basketball court and earn money by shooting the ball into the basket. Just click your mouse to send the ball flying toward the hoop. Each hit will bring you profit, which you can use to improve your gaming experience. Develop your skills, acquire new balls, and expand your support team to increase your income. This game offers addictive gameplay that will keep you busy for hours. Immerse yourself in a competitive atmosphere and test your business management skills. Become a real basketball tycoon and conquer this virtual sport!

items.title: Puzzle Survivor
items.description: Puzzle Survivor is a competitive puzzle game that puts your logic and strategy to the test. Solve word and number challenges across multiple game modes, compete in real-time or turn-based battles, and climb the leaderboards. Take on daily challenges, unlock achievements, and sharpen your mind in fast-paced, brain-training duels!

items.title: Ragdoll Throw Challenge
items.description: Ragdoll Throw Challenge is a physics-based casual game where you control a wobbly character, help them grab weapons, and fling them at your enemies for ultimate chaos and fun! The gameplay is simple, but movements can be complex and challenging to master.

items.title: Rogue Dunk
items.description: Rogue Dunk is a thrilling 2D basketball game that combines fast-paced action with rogue-like strategy. Each game offers new skills to unlock and challenges to face, making every match feel fresh and exciting. Test your skills, adapt your strategy, and push your score higher as you take on this unique blend of sports and adventure.

items.title: Sports Minibattles
items.description: Sports Mini Battles is a brilliant collection of sports-based games. You can either play against an AI computer opponent or your friend using split controls. There are four different sports games to play. During each game, you must try and beat your opponent in an intense sports match.

items.title: Street Ball Jam
items.description: Street Ball Jam is an entertaining one-touch basketball game to score as many balls as you can.

items.title: Tap-Tap Shots
items.description: Tap-Tap Shots is an addictive sports game in which you continuously tap to make your basketball jump. It is an endless basketball practice where you aim to get your ball in the net in one shot. The goal is to keep playing until you can't anymore, so you may want to cancel all plans for the evening. Perfectly time your taps to score before the clock runs out, and keep going as long as you can!

items.title: 100% Love Tester
items.description: 100% Love Tester is a fun casual game that lets you gauge your compatibility and chemistry with your partner or crush. Enjoy love stories and animations as you explore your romantic connections. Find out if love is in the air with this entertaining love tester!

items.title: Animal Shopping Supermarket
items.description: Animal Shopping Supermarket is a casual simulation game where you must help this cute little red panda to go grocery shopping. Explore colorful aisles, pick out fun items, and pay them to the cashier. Collect special gacha and unlock various mini-games. Enjoy a playful shopping experience, join the fun, and let the shopping adventure begin!

items.title: Anime Boy
items.description: Anime Boy is a dress-up game perfect for anime fans. Create stylish outfits for a high school boy using a wide range of T-shirts, jackets, pants, and hairstyles. Customize his look to resemble someone you know, or design your ideal boyfriend. With countless clothing options, experiment and create handsome anime characters.

items.title: Anime Couple: Avatar Maker
items.description: Anime Couple: Avatar Maker is your ultimate creative escape into the world of anime character design. Craft stunning anime couples with romantic flair, dress up stylish girl avatars, and mix and match accessories, hairstyles, and outfits. With relaxing ASMR touches and a vibrant anime art style, this avatar creator lets your imagination shine in every love-filled duo you design.

items.title: Anime Couple Dress Up
items.description: Anime Couple Dress Up is a stylish game to dress up your favorite anime characters in the way you like!

items.title: Anime Girls Dress Up Games
items.description: Anime Girls Dress Up Games is a beauty game that vibrant fusion of fashion and Japanese pop culture. Immerse yourself in manga-inspired beauty, crafting outfits for charming animatronic characters. Whether it's the classic schoolgirl look or trendy attire, the options are vast. From high heels to adorable pets, explore endless possibilities. Hone your outfit designing skills in this delightful beauty salon experience.

items.title: Anime Kawaii Dress Up
items.description: Anime Kawaii Dress Up is a beauty game that offers the chance to style 6 cute dolls with a blend of Japanese fashion, mixing styles like cute, daily European, fairy tales, and more. You can create a variety of outfits using categories such as skirts, dresses, hairstyles, tops, accessories, and jewelry. The game captures different Tokyo styles, including Gyaru, Lolita, Kogal, and more, appealing to modern Asian youth. With a variety of characters and backgrounds, you can showcase your fashionista talent and create countless cute outfit combinations. Enjoy the world of kawaii fashion with this offline anime dress-up game!

items.title: Anime Princess Dress Up
items.description: Anime Princess Dress Up is a beauty game where you create your own kawaii princess character with a range of costumes and hairstyles. The game offers numerous items like dresses, tops, skirts, shoes, bags, and accessories to mix and match for endless combinations. You can customize your anime princess's face, skin color, hairstyle, and makeup, then add glitter wings, face masks, and even cute baby pets. With various backgrounds to choose from, including magic castles and princess rooms, this dress-up game is perfect for creating your ideal anime fashion princess. Share your creations with friends and enjoy the magic of princess dress-up and makeover games!

items.title: Anna's Story: Dress Up DIY
items.description: Anna’s Story: Dress Up DIY is a whimsical paper doll adventure where you style Anna for every chapter of her fairy tale journey. Choose from dazzling wardrobes filled with costumes, festive outfits, and chic accessories to fit each occasion, from magical dates to seasonal celebrations. With charming art and fairy tale vibes every look you create brings Anna’s story to life.

items.title: ASMR Beauty Care
items.description: ASMR Beauty Care is a soothing simulation game from the ASMR Treatment series, where you become a beauty care specialist. Carefully perform relaxing treatments for clients, then unleash your creativity with stylish makeovers and fashionable dress-ups. Blending care, fashion, and calming gameplay, it offers a satisfying, feel-good experience for anyone who loves beauty and relaxation.

items.title: ASMR Beauty Homeless
items.description: ASMR Beauty Homeless is a beauty dress-up game in which you take on the role of a compassionate doctor helping your homeless friend Anna regain her dignity. Begin by providing her with essential hygiene care—clean her body, brush her teeth, and carefully treat the area around her piercing to restore her health and comfort. Once she's all freshened up, show off your fashion expertise by choosing the perfect outfit that transforms her appearance and lifts her spirits.

items.title: ASMR Beauty Japanese Spa
items.description: ASMR Beauty Japanese Spa is a relaxing style game where you guide a charming girl through a soothing Japanese hair spa filled with calming treatments and revitalizing masks. Once refreshed, dress her in elegant kimonos, choose delicate accessories, and personalize her look with stunning hairstyles, makeup, and shoes. It's your peaceful retreat into beauty, fashion, and creative expression.

items.title: ASMR Beauty Treatment
items.description: ASMR Beauty Treatment is a game where you take on the role of esthetician at the ASMR clinic to help meet your client’s beauty needs. Get ready to scrape plaque, pop pimples and top off the beauty treatment with a head-to-toe outfit makeover. The game is fully guided so you can sit back, relax and enjoy the subtle sounds of transformation.

items.title: ASMR Nail Treatment
items.description: ASMR Nail Treatment is a beauty game where a patient is dealing with the thickening of the fingernails. Help her maintain good nail hygiene by providing proper nail care. Showcase your medical skills by performing this ASMR Nail Treatment game. Once the treatment is done, dress her in a fashionable outfit and create captivating nail art using various styles and accessories.

items.title: ASMR Stye Treatment
items.description: ASMR Stye Treatment is a beauty game where you must treat your patient's dirty pimply face to make it healthy again. Be the pimple popper doctor and help her to take care of her face problem. Go live and show this satisfying pimple pooping to the world. After finishing the face treatment, style our patient with the best outfit and makeup from our collections to create the perfect look!

items.title: Autumn Glam Gala
items.description: Get ready to light up the season with Autumn Glam Gala, a beauty makeup game, the ultimate fashion and makeup experience! Transform three besties into autumn-style icons for the gala of the year. Immerse yourself in a world of beauty, where every choice—whether it’s soft, earthy tones or bold, golden sparkles—captures the magic of fall. Mix and match an array of luxurious makeup shades, chic hairstyles, and dazzling outfits to craft show-stopping looks. Embrace the season’s hottest trends, flex your makeup artist skills, and watch your creations shine under the gala lights.

items.title: Avatar Make Up
items.description: Avatar Make Up is a beauty game where you must help Olivia, Rose, and Ashley to do their make-up to attend the premiere of Avatar's new movie tonight. They want to get their make-up look inspired by this film's vibe. Come and help them with their stunning make-up!

items.title: Baby Adopter
items.description: Baby Adopter is a game where you dive into an exciting adventure of taking care of a baby. This is perfect for anyone who loves the sweet moments of parenting little ones.

items.title: Baby Adopter: Dress Up
items.description: Baby Adopter: Dress Up is an extended episode of Baby Adopter which has clothing, wardrobe, and dress-up features.

items.title: Baby Dress Up
items.description: Baby Dress Up is a fun game to experience the joy of caring for a cute baby. Show off your sense of fashion by dressing up adorable baby dolls. With a wide variety of baby doll clothes and accessories, you'll have full control over the baby's appearance. Change diapers, select costumes, and play with toys to keep the bundle of joy happy. Capture fashionable moments with screenshots and share them with friends.

items.title: Back 2 School Makeover
items.description: Back 2 School Makeover is a fashionable game journey with Amelia. Watch as she transforms from an edgy e-girl into a stylish, school-ready fashionista. Start with a haircare routine and fresh haircut, then choose skincare and makeup. Explore her chic wardrobe for the perfect outfit, and relive the nostalgia of school days with flair!

items.title: Back To School: Uniforms Edition
items.description: Back to School: Uniforms Edition is a fun beauty dress-up game that lets you dress for school success. Spin a wheel to unlock school uniforms from all around the world, like Japan, the U.S., the U.K., India, France, and South Korea. Dress up your character with just the right outfits and dazzle them up with accessories and hairstyles inspired by each culture. Discover the unique styles of school uniforms worldwide and express your fashion creativity.

items.title: Ellie Fashion Police
items.description: Ellie Fashion Police is a cool game featuring your favorite doll - Ellie! In this title, Ellie has become part of the fashion police, and she must make sure that all the girls are following the latest fashion trends!

items.title: Barbiecore
items.description: Barbiecore is a beauty game that comes with many hot pink and bubblegum-colored items! Make this sweet girl Ellie beautiful! Pink is her favorite color, and Barbiecore is her favorite aesthetics. Create cute casual and sporty chic looks for her. Have fun!

items.title: Barbiecore Aesthetics
items.description: Barbiecore Aesthetics is a dress-up game that immerses you in a whimsical realm of pastel dreams and retro vibes. Unleash your inner fashionista by creating stunning Barbie outfits with vibrant colors, fluffy textures, and vintage patterns. From quirky accessories to flouncy dresses, you have endless possibilities to express your style. Embrace the Barbiecore trend, let your creativity shine, and curate the perfect wardrobe for this fashion icon. Step into a world of enchanting fashion adventures with the Barbiecore Aesthetics dress-up game!

items.title: Barbiemania
items.description: Barbiemania is a captivating beauty game that takes you on the ultimate makeup adventure! Accompany the iconic doll, Ellie, and showcase your styling skills by creating stunning looks for three different occasions. Step into the enchanting world of Barbiemania and let your inner stylist shine!

items.title: Beauty Princess Makeup
items.description: Beauty Princess Makeup is a fashion game where you embark on a magical journey into a world of endless possibilities! In this enchanting beauty game, you have the power to glam up princesses with your magical touch and transform them into radiant visions of royalty. Dive into the magical world of makeup and nail art, and let your creativity shine as you transform princesses into dazzling icons of royalty!

items.title: Become a Nurse
items.description: Become a Nurse is a game in which you become a nurse to treat various conditions of your patients.

items.title: BFF Math Class
items.description: BFF Math Class is a dress-up game, your task is to assist the girl in getting ready for her math class. You'll need to prepare her bag and create the perfect look. There's a wide selection of hairstyles, outfits, and accessories to choose from, allowing you to create a fashionable and stylish appearance for her. Your goal is to make sure she looks cool at school by selecting the trendiest outfits available. Additionally, you'll need to help her complete all her math exercises, combining your fashion stylist skills with some math problem-solving to ensure she's fully prepared for class. Enjoy the game and have fun dressing up the character while sharpening your math skills!

items.title: BFFs Black Friday Shopping
items.description: BFFs Black Friday Shopping is a dress-up game to help five friends enjoy the festivities of the Black Friday sale.

items.title: BFFs Golden Hour
items.description: BFFs Golden Hour is a dress-up game where you choose the perfect outfits, accessories, and make-up to make the most instagrammable pictures of Elsa, Ellie, Kiki, and Regina. Come and join them in their BFFs Golden Hour dress up game for girls!

items.title: BFFs K-Pop Fangirls
items.description: BFFs K-pop Fangirls is a casual dress-up game where you can be the ultimate fangirl and flaunt your styling skills! You get to dress four fabulous and fashionable women ready to start their evening of K-pop fun. You can decide what they wear, from head to toe to accessories.

items.title: BFFs Luxury Loungewear
items.description: BFFs Luxury Loungewear is a free dress up game where you help four BFFs get ready for a cosy night in! Mix & match hairstyles with comfy loungewear looks to prepare for a much-needed get-together with the girls!

items.title: BFFs Winter Holidays
items.description: BFFs Winter Holidays is a dress-up game with a joyful winter holidays' theme!

items.title: BFFs Y2K Fashion
items.description: BFFs Y2K Fashion is a dress-up game where you dive into the fashion realm of the iconic era and unleash your inner fashionista. With an extensive array of styles straight from the millennium, curate the perfect ensemble that showcases your unique fashion sense. From trendy skater girl skirts to edgy ripped jeans and tees, or even the timeless Y2K look featuring vibrant low-waisted jeans and stylish crop tops, the possibilities are endless. Express your creativity, become the ultimate fashion designer, and create a remarkable fashion statement. Embark on this nostalgic fashion journey now and let your personal style radiate!

items.title: Billionaire Wife Dress Up
items.description: Billionaire Wife Dress Up is a fun and stylish dress-up game where you can live the life of a fashion stylist for a passionate socialite. Use your creativity and fashion sense to dress up the billionaire's wife with the latest trendy outfits, hairstyles, and accessories. With hundreds of unique clothing items and accessories, you can make the wife stand out from the crowd and become the superstar she wants to be. You can even change the background and take screenshots to share with your friends. Enjoy this fashionista dress-up game and make your doll beautiful without spending a dime!

items.title: Black Friday Mystery Sale
items.description: Black Friday Mystery Sale is a fashion dress-up game where shopping meets surprises! Step into the thrill of Black Friday as you help the girls discover stunning outfits hidden inside mysterious boxes. Unlock glamorous clothing, accessories, and more as you create fabulous looks for each girl.

items.title: Bone Doctor Shoulder Case
items.description: Bone Doctor Shoulder Case is a fun and interactive simulation game where you become the doctor on call for a spirited cheerleader who’s taken a tumble. Patch up her injured shoulder with a playful step-by-step surgery, then celebrate her recovery with a fabulous makeover! Dress her up with trendy outfits and accessories so she’s ready to dazzle the squad again!

items.title: Brat Girl Summer
items.description: Brat Girl Summer is the ultimate dress-up game where style meets attitude! Join four besties as you style them in trendy outfits inspired by K-pop and VSCO aesthetics. Mix and match tops, skirts, dresses, shoes, and accessories to create bold, eye-catching looks. Whether you're designing a fierce K-pop stage outfit or a laid-back VSCO vibe, endless fashion possibilities await. Get ready to slay the summer with your unique style creations!

items.title: Bridezilla Ellie
items.description: Ellie is getting married! You must help her and her 2 best friends to dress up beautifully to make this special occasion memorable.

items.title: Butterfly Ear Cuff Jewelry
items.description: Butterfly Ear Cuff Jewelry is a captivating game for jewelry enthusiasts that takes you into a virtual designer's studio. Create stunning butterfly earcuffs with customizable shapes, metal colors, and gemstones. Add unique touches like painted wings, face makeup, and nail designs. Choose hairstyles to complete the look and let your imagination soar in designing personalized accessories.

items.title: Candy Doll Hair Salon
items.description: Candy Doll Hair Salon is a dress-up game where you can meet adorable dolls with stunning hairstyles. These popular surprise toys are ready for a fabulous makeover, and it's up to you to create their perfect look. Choose from a wide range of backgrounds, dresses, shoes, and accessories to complete their picture-perfect appearance. Customize their lips, eyes, and eyebrows to make them truly unique. With animated features and high-quality items, this dress-up game offers a one-of-a-kind experience. Create dolls that resemble you or your friends and explore the fashion clothes and hair salon at your disposal. Get ready to immerse yourself in this adorable dolls makeover game and surprise your friends with your styling skills. With intuitive controls and bright graphics, it's the ultimate dolls dress-up experience. If you're a fan of cute dolls games, this one is a must-try!

items.title: Chibi Boy Doll Maker
items.description: Chibi Doll Maker: Step into the world of adorable chibi characters with our captivating beauty game! Get ready for an exciting experience as we introduce the brand-new Chibi Doll Maker. With a plethora of new clothes, accessories, colors, and game options, this is the ultimate chibi character creation game you've been waiting for. Let your imagination run wild and create your very own pastel chibi boy dolls in our charming doll game. Use the high-quality dress-up features to design attractive pastel boy avatars that can be used as social media avatars or beautiful pastel wallpapers. Customize every detail, from skin color to hairstyle, clothing, wings, accessories, facial features, and even background wallpapers. With endless possibilities, unleash your creativity and create your dream chibi doll.

items.title: Chibi Doll - Avatar Creator
items.description: Chibi Doll—Avatar Creator is a beauty dress-up game where you create your own avatar. You can create and customize your own chibi characters, dressing them up with over 5,000 items. There are plenty of scenarios for endless hours of creativity and fun.

items.title: Chibi Doll Dress Up & Coloring
items.description: Chibi Doll Dress Up & Coloring is a beauty game where you need to create and paint your doll in a new anime character. Become a real doll designer, create and makeover adorable anime characters with a baby doll!

items.title: Cinderella Dress Up Girl
items.description: Cinderella Dress Up Girl is a stunning makeover game fit for a princess. As she prepares to attend the grand ball and meet Prince Charming, it's up to you to unleash your fashionista talent and create a stylish and glamorous outfit for her. Explore a beauty salon filled with a wide selection of clothing items, hairstyles, and accessories. With your creativity, transform Cinderella into a true fashion icon. Play this delightful dress-up game and join the world of princesses, fairies, and beautiful models. With countless outfit combinations and offline gameplay, the fun never ends. Get ready to become a fashion designer and enjoy the enchanting world of Cinderella!

items.title: College Girl & Boy Makeover
items.description: College Girl & Boy Makeover is a teen fashion game where you style high school students as either a couple or best friends. Create unique looks, from uniforms to first-date outfits, and experiment with hairstyles, accessories, tattoos, and piercings. Share your stylish creations and strive to make this duo the most fashionable at school. Get ready to unleash your inner fashionista in this offline high school dress-up adventure!

items.title: College Girl Coloring Dress Up
items.description: College Girl Coloring Dress Up is a fun beauty game where you unleash your inner fashion designer to dress up college girls, customize their looks, and paint them in vibrant colors. Design outfits with hairstyles, accessories, and dresses. Create stunning coloring pages with glitter and patterns, then share your masterpieces with friends. Dive into the world of fashion and creativity with this ultimate makeover experience!

items.title: College Girls Team Makeover
items.description: College Girls Team Makeover is a beauty game where you, as the stylist for five high school BFFs, you have full control over their appearance, from skin tone to wardrobe. With over 1000 clothing and accessory options, you can create diverse looks for each girl, whether it's a geeky chic or party-ready ensemble. Show off your styling skills and compete with friends to see who reigns supreme in dressing these fashionable teens!

items.title: College Sport Team Makeover
items.description: College Sport Team Makeover is a dress-up game that lets you dress four stylish students in a new college team makeover adventure! This game offers a variety of clothing items to create fashionable outfits for two girls and two boys who are the best athletes in high school. Whether you prefer sporty or casual styles, you can customize their looks individually or as a team. With options for skin color, hairstyles, accessories, and backgrounds, this game provides a unique opportunity to showcase your fashion sense and style skills. Dress up the whole squad and capture your creations with the "Camera" button to share with friends. Explore this rich girl and boy squad's wardrobe and enjoy hours of fashion fun!

items.title: Cool Girl Aesthetics
items.description: Cool Girl Aesthetics is a fun and creative beauty dress up game where you help Mia design her ultimate trendy look! Unleash your style sense and customize every detail to make her stand out with unforgettable vibes.

items.title: Creative Coloring
items.description: Creative Coloring is an entertaining coloring game that is filled with fun, colorful, and creative drawings that help kids of all ages enjoy creating art.

items.title: Crypto Gals Fashion
items.description: Crypto Gals Fashion is a beauty game to makeover two girls who love to dress up and impress on their TikTok account. Help them look pretty and chic, but not too much. There are many varieties of clothes that you can mix and match. Have fun!

items.title: Cute Mermaid Dress Up
items.description: Cute Mermaid Dress Up is a beauty game where you help dress up cute mermaid princesses in these fun kids' games. Explore an underwater world where sea princesses have beautiful hair, stylish bathing suits, and unique tails. With a wide selection of clothing items, hairstyles, and accessories, create stunning outfits for the mermaid princesses. Choose from various backgrounds, add adorable pets, and perfect their looks with tiaras and tridents. Over 200 items are available, from different mermaid styles to diverse hairstyles and accessories. Let your creativity shine in these dress-up and makeover games for girls and kids!

items.title: Cyberpunk City Fashion
items.description: Cyberpunk City Fashion is a dress-up game with an interesting futuristic Cyberpunk theme.

items.title: Cyberpunk City Hairstyles
items.description: Cyberpunk City Hairstyles is a beauty game where you can take hairstyling to a whole new level! Practice your professional haircare routine to transform Emma's frizzy hair into vibrant, edgy masterpieces. Style her hair into asymmetric shaded looks, cyberpunk buns, and classic dreadlocks. Express your creativity and show your trendy Cyberpunk City spirit. Complete the transformation with modern metallic or even neon outfits. Let your cyber imagination run wild to make Emma look dazzling!

items.title: Dazzling Divas Makeup
items.description: Dazzling Divas Makeup is a magical dress-up game inspired by My Little Pony, where you style Lila, Mimi, and Roxy with dreamy makeup and outfits. Channel the vibes of iconic ponies like Pinkie Pie and Rainbow Dash, then mix and match tops, accessories, hairstyles, and more to create show-stopping looks. Sparkle, color and creativity come together in this enchanting glam experience.

items.title: DIY Makeup Salon: SPA Makeover
items.description: DIY Makeup Salon: SPA Makeover is a beauty game where you become a make-up stylist. Showcase your skill and do makeovers for these pretty girls! Select the model and pick her stunning color combinations for her. Use various tools and facial cleansers to give your model refreshing and healthy skin. Apply flawless makeup look and hair-do for them! Stay up-to-date with the latest trends in fashion. This game is perfect for you who desire to create the most fashionable looks.

items.title: DIY Ugly Christmas Sweater
items.description: DIY Ugly Christmas Sweater is a festive dress-up game where creativity takes center stage. Team up with three BFFs as they prepare for a holiday party by designing their own unique, cozy, ugly Christmas sweaters. Choose from a variety of sweater colors, then unleash your imagination with decorations like reindeer, Christmas trees, snowmen, lights, and bows. Complete their holiday looks with festive hairstyles and accessories to capture the perfect seasonal vibe. This lighthearted game blends creative design with holiday cheer,. It'sa fun way to celebrate the season and showcase your unique style!, perfectfor anyone looking to immerse themselves in the magic of Christmas.

items.title: Doc Darling: Bone Surgery
items.description: Doc Darling Bone Surgery is a beauty game where you help a girl who just fell off her scooter and she needs Doc Darling to take care of her injuries. Play as a doctor who cures the injuries and fixes all of the broken bones to get the girl back on her feet. Complete all of the stages to unlock dress-up mode and give her a cute makeover.

items.title: Doc Darling: Santa Surgery
items.description: Doc Darling Santa Surgery is a Christmas-themed game where you must help Santa, that had an accident on his way! He needs your help to fix Santa's sleight and find his deer. Also, bring him to Doc Darling to take care of all injuries and prepare for emergency surgery. Complete all treatments and dress him up till he gets ready to deliver the gifts for Christmas night!

items.title: Doc HoneyBerry Kitty Surgery
items.description: Doc HoneyBerry Kitty Surgery is a simulation game where you play as Doc HoneyBerry to help this cute little kitty from the crash. Take care of the injuries and heal the broken bones. After recovery, dress up the kitty with many styles and colors of clothes, pants, shoes, hats, and different pattern skins. Give the kitty a cute makeover!

items.title: Doc HoneyBerry Puppy Surgery
items.description: Doc HoneyBerry Puppy Surgery is a simulation game that lets you become the best veterinarian by taking care of an adorable puppy. Cure their sickness, treat their injuries, and solve all their problems. Clean them up and dress them up to make them look perfect again. With your care and expertise, you can help the puppy feel happy and healthy once more.

items.title: Donut Maker
items.description: Donut Maker is a simulation cooking game where you make delicious donuts with many different kinds of glaze. Experiment with various ingredients to create unique flavors, from classic chocolate to exotic fruits. Add a touch of cute toppings to make your donut even more beautiful! Who wants some donuts?

items.title: Princess Dress Up
items.description: Dress Up - Games for Girls is a beauty game where you can dress up 12 princesses in fancy outfits. These gorgeous princesses are waiting for amazing makeovers and new fabulous dress up. Use your fashion sense and your internal fashionista talent to create the best outfit for each princess girl. Choose a hairstyle, dress, gloves, shoes, wings, and other accessories for your princess girls. This game lets young fashionistas develop their taste and fashion designer skills.

items.title: Dress Up Games & Coloring Book
items.description: Dress Up Games & Coloring Book is a fusion of creativity and fashion. Design your own doll, select outfits, hairstyles, and backgrounds, then transform your creation into coloring pages. Use glitter, gradients, and patterns to bring your pictures to life. Relax and learn color combinations while enjoying dress-up and coloring offline. Unleash your inner designer with this unique coloring experience, perfect for those who adore fashion and art. Share your stylish masterpieces with friends and explore the world of fashion coloring!

items.title: Eliza Mall Mania
items.description: Eliza Mall Mania is a dress-up game to mix-and-match outfits style in a shopping mall.

items.title: Ellie Christmas Makeup
items.description: Ellie Christmas Makeup is a beauty game that offers a joyful experience in the world of holiday makeovers. Dive into the seasonal spirit as you guide Ellie through three enchanting Christmas-themed looks: Candy Cane Queen, Christmas Queen, and iconic character-inspired. Unleash your creativity with an array of eyeshadows, lipsticks, blushes, accessories, and more. Get ready for a holly jolly transformation filled with color, cheer, and the magic of the holiday season!

items.title: Elsa and Anna Sent to Fairyland
items.description: After reading a mysterious book, Elsa and Anna are suddenly taken to a fairyland. They now must attend the fairy ball in a magical land. You need to apply makeup and choose the most beautiful dresses for both of them. Use your best fashion sense and let the others see how magical their fashion is. Have fun!

items.title: Elsa & Anna's Icy Dress Up
items.description: Elsa & Anna's Icy Dress Up is a beauty game where you become the fashion stylist for the ice princess sisters. Customize their looks with clothes, hairstyles, and makeup in the princess fashion salon. Choose between classic princess attire or modern outfits. Accessorize with capes, necklaces, bracelets, and hair decorations. Enjoy the fun of dressing up Elsa and Anna in this icy dress-up game for girls!

items.title: Elsa Breakup Game
items.description: Elsa is breaking up with her cheating boyfriend! She needs to move on, so you should help her to look fabulous and make her ex-boyfriend regret his decision. Have fun!

items.title: Emergency Surgery
items.description: Emergency Surgery is the surgery game in which you are needed as a specialized doctor to help patients in critical need. Use your expert training to fix all of the patient up ready to get back into the big wide world. There are different cases that all need different treatments, they are all unique.

items.title: Extreme Makeover
items.description: Extreme Makeover is a beauty game in which you need to help the beautiful woman get over her blemishes and faults through a deep facial make over. You need to star by applying creams and serums to her spots to help them disappear. You can then apply a face mask and scrub to bring the glow back to her face.

items.title: Extreme Makeover: Harley Edition
items.description: Extreme Makeover: Harley Edition is a beauty game to help Harley complete a makeover for her new date. Can you give her a fresh new look?

items.title: Fairy’s Magical Makeover
items.description: Fairy’s Magical Makeover is a fantasy-themed game to help take care of the injured fairy and give her a magical makeover.

items.title: Fall Aesthetics
items.description: Fall Aesthetics is a beauty game where you need to prepare your fashion for the fall season. Unlock your inner fashionista to style the crew around the globe. Create unique outfits inspired by the dynamic streets of New York, the warm, golden sunsets of Tuscany, the captivating festivities, the timeless elegance of Japan, and the enchanting allure of Scotland! Get ready for the fall fashion!

items.title: Fantasy Avatar Anime Dress Up
items.description: Fantasy Avatar Anime Dress Up is a dress-up game where you can style adorable anime characters in stunning outfits. Immerse yourself in the world of manga and anime as you create your own unique character and become a master doll designer. With over 300 items inspired by RPG cosplay styles, including warriors, knights, archers, and more, the possibilities are endless. Dress up your cute girl, customize her features, and choose from various backgrounds to complete the perfect look. Share your creations with friends and indulge in the ultimate fashion experience!

items.title: Fashion Battle
items.description: Fashion Battle is a beauty fashion showdown where you compete to own the runway. Dress your model to match the theme, nailing every detail for the ultimate catwalk moment. Impress the judges with your flair and creativity as you aim to outshine the competition and claim the title of the most stylish contender!

items.title: Fashion Box: Christmas Diva
items.description: Fashion Box: Christmas Diva is a dress-up game where you help Bonnie find new ways to express her love for the winter holidays.

items.title: Fashion Box: Glam Diva
items.description: Fashion Box: Glam Diva is a beauty and fashion game to help Bonnie, who is one of the first influencers, to make her look stunning. Let's see what chic look you can put together for our beautiful fashionista.

items.title: Fashion Challenge: Catwalk Run
items.description: Fashion Challenge: Catwalk Run is a beauty game where you style the stars! Become the most sought-after fashion stylist in Hollywood. There’s a plethora of outfits so you never run out of new fashion to try on and customize!

items.title: Fashion Dress Up Challenge
items.description: Fashion Dress Up Challenge is a beauty game where you can unleash your styling skills and create cool outfits for girls. Step into the world of fashion competitions and showcase your talent on the runway and in beauty pageants. Are you ready to become a renowned stylist? Compete against others and strive for world recognition in the fashion industry!

items.title: Fashion Famous
items.description: Fashion Famous is a beauty game venturing into the high-stakes world of fashion modeling. Strut your style on the runway, competing against others to prove your fashion prowess. With each round presenting a new theme, you must curate the perfect ensemble to captivate the audience and secure the coveted title of Fashion Famous. Will you rise to the occasion and dominate the runway?

items.title: Fashion Repair
items.description: Fashion Repair is a creative game where you restore and revamp girls' belongings. Remove dirt from their phones, clean up their bags, and skillfully mend rips in their caps.
