items.description: Car Crash Simulator Royale is a 3D car crash derby game. This game is a mix between a crash simulator style engine, fast-paced action, demolition derby, and car war games

items.title: Car Drawing Game
items.description: Car Drawing is a casual game where you are tasked to draw a one-line car and successfully reach the finish line. The Car Drawing Game is all about drawing a car to overcome the obstacles on each level. Draw your goofiest car and see if it passes the test!

items.title: Car Eats Car: Arctic Adventure
items.description: Car Eats Car: Arctic Adventure is a car driving game with to survive and fight against rivals in a dynamic race. Overtake enemies, upgrade your monster car, and create your own car in the incubator. Good driving skills and turbo speed come in handy in this crazy driving simulator.

items.title: Car Eats Car: Underwater Adventure
items.description: Car Eats Car: Underwater Adventure is a survival car driving game with an underwater theme. Your friends are put to prison, do everything you can to free the evil cars. Become a car tycoon, upgrade cars, and fight the boss to survive in these ultimate crazy underwater races!

items.title: Car Eats Car: Volcanic Adventure
items.description: Car Eats Car: Volcanic Adventure is a survival driving game set in the pit of a fiery volcano. Blast through 2D levels in your mobile fossil, evading enemies and traps. Collect rubies to spend on upgrades for your vehicle to make it stronger for the next level!

items.title: Car Flip!
items.description: Car Flip is a casual driving game that takes you on a wild joy ride with friends with one simple mission -- flip your car as much as possible before heading to the parking lot. Launch your car into the air by picking the perfect jump angle, then go for epic flips to snag coins mid-flight. Rack up your loot to unlock awesome new cars and quirky drivers. Put your driving skills to the test across all the levels and show everyone your flipping finesse!

items.title: Car Games: Car Racing Game
items.description: Car Games: Car Racing Game is a thrilling car racing game set in a vibrant urban landscape. Speed through the city streets, mastering various racing modes to showcase your skills. Compete in intense, night-time races, and enjoy the excitement of turbo driving games with stunning 3D graphics. Perfect for fans of fast-paced car challenges.

items.title: Car Sky Survival
items.description: Car Sky Survival is a thrilling multiplayer survival race where sharp reflexes and clever tactics decide who rules the arena. Pilot your custom-tuned cars through a dynamic two-level battleground—fight for dominance on the top platform, but if you drop, battle back from below for a dramatic comeback. Drift, dodge traps, and outlast rivals to claim ultimate victory.

items.title: Car Speed Racing Tycoon
items.description: Car Speed Racing Tycoon is a casual tycoon game that takes you on a high-octane journey into the world of high-speed racing. Customize your racing tracks for heart-pounding thrills and manage crashes with precision to keep your racers on the fast track to victory. Get ready for the adrenaline rush of a lifetime!

items.title: CarBall.io
items.description: CarBall.io is an adrenaline-packed fusion of soccer and high-speed sports driving game reminiscent of Rocket League. Rev up your engines and dive into intense matches to dominate the leagues. Unlock, purchase, and upgrade your cars to reign supreme in this thrilling automotive showdown. Gear up and become the ultimate champion of CarBall.io!

items.title: Carnage Battle Arena
items.description: Carnage Battle Arena is a sports car game where speed is just the beginning. With an extensive destruction model, you'll wreak havoc on the streets, transforming the environment as you race. Choose from 82 awesome cars across multiple game modes, including Battle Arena and Survival. Blocky, retro-styled graphics and game-changing power-ups add to the excitement as you race through dozens of unique maps.

items.title: Cars vs Skibidi Toilet
items.description: Cars vs Skibidi Toilet is an action-packed game where you engage in a thrilling battle against a monstrous Skibidi Toilet. Drive powerful cars armed with guns and unleash havoc on these invading creatures. Protect the city from their terror as you upgrade your vehicles, acquire new weapons, and become an unstoppable force against the toilet invasion. Explore the expansive city, encounter various types of Skibidi toilets, and save the residents from this unusual threat. Get ready for a wild mix of racing and shooting in this unique action game!

items.title: City Car Driving Simulator 2
items.description: City Car Driving Simulator 2 is the second instalment of this fantastic 3D driving game. If you love racing and unlimited driving, you will surely enjoy this title! Before you start racing you can choose your vehicle – choose from a range of different super cars and sports cars – all with powerful engines and awesome controls.

items.title: City Car Driving Simulator: Online
items.description: City Car Driving Simulator: Online is a multiplayer driving game set in dynamic urban landscapes. Customize your ride both visually and mechanically, then hit the streets to earn cash by pushing your skills to the limit. Engage in heart-pounding pursuits with law enforcement, outmaneuvering relentless cops to prove you're the ultimate outlaw. Unleash your creativity by designing your own stunt-filled playgrounds throughout the city. Team up with friends or challenge rivals in intense online multiplayer action, racing, drifting, and competing in real-time with players from around the world.

items.title: City Car Driving Simulator: Stunt Master
items.description: City Car Driving Simulator: Stunt Master is the fifth episode in the awesomeCity Car Driving Simulatorseries. Customize and drive your favorite car around the neon-lit city streets, building up notoriety and points for cars and upgrades.

items.title: City Car Driving Simulator: Ultimate 2
items.description: City Car Driving Simulator: Ultimate 2 is an exhilarating driving game that puts you in control of high-speed stunts and thrilling pursuits against a relentless police force. Earn cash by performing daring feats and escaping the law, unlocking a wide range of vehicles, and upgrading their parts along the way. Navigate treacherous city streets, outmaneuvering the police through intricate traffic, narrow alleys, and busy highways. Stay ahead of the game with lightning-fast reflexes, strategic thinking, and exceptional driving skills. Customize and upgrade your vehicles to build the ultimate ride for an unforgettable driving experience.

items.title: City Classic Car Driving: 131
items.description: City Classic Car Driving: 131 is a car driving game to test your driving skills. Take your ride, reach high speeds, drive through traffic, and lose the cops. Customize your car in the garage and show it off on the roads of the city. Complete missions like races, pursuits, drift events, and earn more cash. Prepare yourself to be the drift and racing king!

items.title: Construct a Bridge
items.description: Construct a Bridge is a cool physics-based game in which you can put your engineering brain to the test. In each level, you will be required to build a bridge capable of withstanding the weight of a heavy truck passing across it. How you build your bridge is entirely up to you.

items.title: Construction Ramp Jumping
items.description: Construction Ramp Jumping is a stunt car game that defies the laws of gravity. Experience the thrill as you launch 12 tons of metal into buildings, creating a breathtaking spectacle of destruction. With a variety of exciting locations and heavy vehicles at your disposal, indulge in the art of chaos and unleash your inner daredevil. Get ready for heart-pounding action and mind-blowing jumps!

items.title: Crash & Stunt
items.description: Experience the thrill of realistic car crashes in Crash & Stunt! This dynamic crash sim is packed with cars, tuning options, and exhilarating ragdoll jumps. Explore a range of tracks and complete missions for extra rewards!

items.title: Crash Test Idle
items.description: Crash Test Idle is an incrementalidle gamewhere your task is to crash cars for destruction tests. The faster the car moves before the collision, the more money you get. Improve cars and buy new ones to increase your income!

items.title: Crazy Motorcycle
items.description: Crazy Motorcycle is a driving game where you guide a noob rider on a high-speed motorcycle to the finish line. Navigate through thrilling levels, jumping over gaps and dodging obstacles. Get ready for an adrenaline rush as you tackle exciting challenges on your way to victory!

items.title: Create-A-Ride
items.description: Create-a-Ride is just like a dress up game, but this time, its for your car - and there's nothing more awesome that that! Give your car your dream paint job, add decals, soup it up with different parts, you can even make custom plates! When you're done, take it out in different scenarios to see your creation in action. This ride is yours to customize, so let your creativity run wild in Create-a-Ride.

items.title: Cyber Cars Punk Racing
items.description: Cyber Cars Punk Racing is a 3D car driving game with futuristic cars and theme. There are super vehicles, neon city, and many game modes. 16 supercars, 60 racetracks, 2 players, 1 free ride area, Hot Pursuit area, and a battlefield are waiting for you. This game has a vehicle purchase and development system, and you can race against artificial intelligence or drive freely.

items.title: Cyber Cars Punk Racing 2
items.description: Cyber Cars Punk Racing 2 is the second installment of theCyber Cars Punk Racingseries with newer cars, more engaging graphics, easier gameplay, and new maps. This series has a leaderboard, missions, and a great free driving range.

items.title: Deadly Descent
items.description: Deadly Descent is a thrilling driving simulator that challenges you to make it down a treacherous mountain road. Your goal is to reach the finish line, but the path is filled with dangerous obstacles—any collision will destroy your car. Careful, precise driving is key to survival, making this game perfect for players who enjoy realistic car destruction and high-stakes simulation.

items.title: Death Chase
items.description: Death Chase is a battle-driving game featuring races on tracks filled with traps and obstacles. Buy upgrades and weapons for your vehicle and target other racers in the explosively chaotic Death Chase.

items.title: Demolition Derby 2
items.description: Demolition Derby 2 is an adrenaline-fueled driving game that puts you behind the wheel in a high-stakes battle for survival. Inspired by the chaotic excitement of demolition derbies across the globe, this game challenges you to smash, crash, and obliterate your rivals’ cars in a brutal quest for victory. Each match is a no-holds-barred competition where strategy meets sheer mayhem. Whether you’re slamming into opponents at full speed or maneuvering through wreckage to deliver the final blow, the intense action and bone-crushing collisions keep you on the edge of your seat. The goal is to outlast your competitors and reign supreme.

items.title: Demolition Derby 3
items.description: Demolition Derby 3 is a thrilling car game offering open-world driving and multiplayer modes. Choose from 100 vehicles, upgrade performance, and customize your ride. Enjoy 20+ tracks and demolition arenas, daily rewards, and first-person driving!

items.title: Desert Riders: Car Battle Game
items.description: Desert Riders: Car Battle Game is a casual destroy game where you fight intense battles from a weapon-fitted vehicle. Fight various enemies with an array of weapons, cars, and upgrades. Tear other cars to shreds and battle tricky bosses. Dive into the desert and start shooting!

items.title: Doodle Road
items.description: Doodle Road is an imaginative and captivating 2D casual game that combines creativity with problem-solving. In this fun browser game, your primary objective is to draw a path that will successfully guide a car from the starting point to the finish line. With a multitude of levels to explore, each one introduces new challenges and exciting obstacles that test your creativity and strategic thinking. Draw your way to victory and see how far your creativity can take you!

items.title: Draw Bridge
items.description: Draw Bridge is a brain-teasing adventure where you design creative pathways to guide a car through obstacles to safety. With each level presenting new challenges, your goal is to draw safe bridges and roads to rescue the stranded vehicle. Sharpen your problem-solving skills and unleash your creativity in this engaging puzzle journey!

items.title: Draw Crash Race
items.description: Draw Crash Race is a casual art game where you not only get to race a car in 3D, but you get to design it beforehand! Show off your drawing skills to build a fast vehicle with a sturdy body to withstand even the most challenging tracks. The races are filled with all kinds of obstacles to avoid, so the drawing challenge is on!

items.title: Drift Arena
items.description: Drift Arena is a driving drift simulator game in which you prove your driving skills and become the champion drift king once you master your balance, speed, and direction on the road.

items.title: Drift Boss
items.description: Drift Boss is a casual one-click driving game where you drive your car around very tricky corners and over bumps, aiming to reach what seems like an infinite end! The race track has no guardrails, so you will fall off the platform and into an abyss if you make one false move. Keep playing to earn rewards and unlock better cars!

items.title: Drift Escape
items.description: Drift Escape is an adrenaline-fueled game that pits you as a skilled driver evading police and military chases in a bustling city. Showcase your drifting talents while dodging obstacles and causing pursuers to crash. With realistic graphics and intuitive controls, it offers an immersive urban escape. Master the art of drifting, prove your driving skills, and become the ultimate evasive driver.

items.title: Drift Hunters
items.description: Drift Hunters is a free-to-play car 3D game that lets you experience the art of drifting with an impressive range of tuned-up cars and dynamic tracks.

items.title: Drift.io
items.description: Drift.io is a thrilling online racing game where you take on high-speed drift challenges across dynamic tracks. With realistic physics, stunning visuals, and customizable cars, you’ll immerse yourself in intense races. Compete in single-player or multiplayer modes, earn coins, and unlock exclusive cars and upgrades as you rise to the top.

items.title: Drift King
items.description: Drift King is a fast-paced car chase game where you outmaneuver pursuing cops, capture flags, and dodge obstacles for as long as possible. With simple two-button controls and instant restarts, the action never slows down. Choose your car, master tight drifts, and push your skills to survive the relentless, adrenaline-fueled pursuit.

items.title: Eggy Car
items.description: Eggy Car is a casual game where you drive a car containing a loose egg over hilly roads. When the egg falls out of your vehicle, it breaks and the game ends. RIP! Collect power-ups to help you get further. Good luck and godspeed egg soldier.

items.title: Endless Hot Pursuit
items.description: Drive your car and survive as long as possible from the police chase! Make use of the weapons and obstacles around the maps to help your escape.

items.title: Epic Racing - Descent on Cars
items.description: Epic Racing - Descent on Cars is a high-speed demolition showdown where racing isn’t just about speed—it’s about survival. Crash, clash, and careen down wild tracks packed with brutal obstacles. Choose your car, master the chaos, and brace for bone-rattling impacts as you race to victory in a metal-twisting frenzy.

items.title: Field Master
items.description: Field Master is a casual farming simulator that puts you behind the wheel of powerful agricultural machines. Experience the full farming cycle as you plow vast fields with your tractor, sow seeds with precision seeders, and carefully nurture your crops as they grow. When harvest season arrives, take control of massive combines to reap the rewards of your hard work. From soil preparation to harvest, every step is in your hands, making Field Master the perfect blend of relaxation and realism for farming enthusiasts and casual players alike.

items.title: Flying Road
items.description: Flying Road is a thrilling driving challenge where you draw the road to deliver packages without losing any. With simple controls, impressive graphics, and hundreds of unique levels, your mission is to navigate through increasingly difficult obstacles. Stay focused, think fast, and enjoy the satisfaction of completing each delivery perfectly.

items.title: Go Kart Racing 3D
items.description: Go Kart Racing 3D is an exhilarating kart racing game featuring over 15 thrilling tracks. Challenge AI opponents, customize your cars, and upgrade your character's abilities. Earn rewards, unlock new levels, and get ready for an adrenaline-fueled ride!

items.title: GoKarts.io
items.description: GoKarts.io is a wild 3D multiplayer kart combat game where speed and strategy collide in explosive arenas. You’ll race, battle, and outmaneuver rivals using an arsenal of crazy weapons and power-ups. Level up to unlock bold characters, flashy karts, and fresh gear. Dive into seasonal events, collect epic loot, and leave your mark in this nonstop racing brawl.

items.title: Gun Racing
items.description: Gun Racing is a driving racing game where speed meets firepower. Blaze through intense tracks as you race against rivals armed with powerful weapons designed to destroy the competition. Upgrade your cars, fine-tune your driving skills, and unleash devastating attacks to dominate every race. Gun Racing features fierce, high-octane tournaments straight to the finish line.

items.title: Healing Driver
items.description: Healing Driver is a hospital simulator where you must drive the ambulance, take the patients to the hospital, and be their doctor. Place patients on the bed and give them care based on their symptoms. Get money after the patient is healed and use the money to upgrade your hospital, staff, and yourself.

items.title: Heavy Duty: Vehicle Zone
items.description: Heavy Duty: Vehicle Zone is an action-packed simulation where you lead a fearless team of workers through high-stakes missions. Whether it’s building on rocky terrain, hauling cargo across choppy seas, or tearing down obstacles in the sky, your crew never backs down. Suit up, tackle every task head-on, and prove you’ve got what it takes to lead the ultimate workforce.

items.title: Highway Racer
items.description: Highway Racer is a 3D racing game where you speed down a highway dodging cars. Build up your speed and avoid hitting traffic while taking risks like near misses and driving on the wrong side for bonus points.

items.title: Highway Racer 2
items.description: Highway Racer 2 is a high-speedracing gamethat puts your driving skills to the test. Dodge the traffic and obstacles while collecting power-ups to boost your speed. Customize your car to your heart's content to reflect your style. Race against other players online in multiplayer mode! Are you ready to take on the highway?

items.title: Hill Masters
items.description: Hill Masters is a thrilling simulator where you test your driving skills across diverse vehicles, including trucks, buses, and police cars. Navigate rugged terrains and realistic traffic systems while mastering smooth controls and advanced braking techniques. Customize your interiors and adapt to challenging road conditions in this immersive driving experience designed to sharpen your abilities and precision.

items.title: Hill Racing
items.description: Hill Racing is a driving game where you get ready to tackle the thrilling challenges of hill climb racing as you navigate your way through treacherous terrain with cars of your choice. Collect stars to increase your score count and maximize your chances of winning, while ensuring you don't run out of fuel by collecting fuel bottles along the way. Immerse yourself in the captivating background themes as you embark on this exhilarating journey. Are you ready to conquer the hills, collect stars, and fuel your way to victory in this exciting driving adventure?

items.title: Hot Road Infinite
items.description: Hot Road Infinite is an idle clicker game where you grow a collection of cars and watch them race along dynamic tracks. Upgrade vehicles, optimize your setup, and maximize earnings as your cars speed through loops and turns. Strategically manage your track to boost performance and unlock even more powerful rides.

items.title: Hotgear
items.description: Hotgear is an ultimate racing game that challenges you to outpace rivals with sharp reflexes and bold decisions. You’ll customize powerful rides, navigate intense chases, and push your limits in daring escapes. Every pursuit tests your skill and strategy, keeping you on edge as you race toward ultimate dominance on the streets.

items.title: Idle Treadmill
items.description: Idle Treadmill is a clicker game where you manage a treadmill packed with cars. Your task? Fit as many cars as possible while tapping to push them off. As you progress, earn coins to upgrade your fleet for even more chaos! Will you prove yourself as the ultimate treadmill boss?

items.title: Inferno Drift
items.description: Inferno Drift is an arcade game where you have to drive and stay on the track as long as possible. Collect coins along the way to gain special abilities. Destroy your opponents to earn extra scores. Stay on the path and don't fall off the cliff, or you will sink into the lava abyss. This is a battle for survival. Can you survive and achieve the highest score?

items.title: Jump Into The Plane
items.description: Jump Into The Plane is a casual game that lets you perform mind-blowing stunts as you jump from a car into a plane, channeling your inner super agent. Who needs conventional parking when you can drive straight into a cargo hold? Brace yourself for an insanely fun experience that defies logic. With a wide array of cars, planes, and thrilling locations, prepare for heart-pounding excitement. But remember, timing is everything. Don't miss your chance to catch that plane!

items.title: Junkyard Sim
items.description: Junkyard Sim is a hands-on simulator where you develop a junkyard using powerful machinery. Drive garbage trucks, operate shredders, and smashers to transform the junkyard. Each job brings new challenges and excitement as you expand and upgrade your equipment. Dive into the world of heavy machinery and junkyard management!

items.title: Krash Karts
items.description: Krash Karts is a high-speed, bumper-car brawl where every turn could spell victory or destruction. Race head-to-head, unleash wild power-ups, and send opponents flying in a chaos-fueled quest for glory. Dodge, drift, and demolish in this turbo-charged showdown that blends kart-racing thrills with demolition derby intensity! Are you ready to rule the road?

items.title: Mad Truck Challenge Special
items.description: Mad Truck Challenge Special is an action-paced monster truck racing game. Upgrade your truck to maximize its performance and do whatever it takes to be a winner! Love this kind of game? Then you should also checkMonsters' Wheels SpecialandDeath Chase!

items.title: Madness Cars Destroy
items.description: Madness Cars Destroy is a high-octane car driving game packed with six thrilling modes. Push rivals off narrowing paths in Funnel, survive the spinning Rotating Cube, or dodge bombs in Deadly Arena. Outsmart opponents in Right Color, evade traps in Deadly Bouncers, and pass the explosive Hot Potato. Choose your ride and jump into intense, fast-paced action!

items.title: Mega Ramp Car Game: Car Stunts
items.description: Mega Ramp Car Game is a thrilling driving game where you race on wild tracks and perform incredible stunts in a 3D world. Choose from various cool cars, unlock exciting features, and push your limits. Get ready, rev your engine, and dive into the non-stop fun and excitement of Mega Ramp Car Game!

items.title: Mega Ramp Car Stunt
items.description: Mega Ramp Car Stunt is an adrenaline-pumping driving race game that challenges players to embark on an exhilarating journey through an array of mega ramps and stunt-filled tracks. With a selection of unique cars and an endless array of ramps and springboards, players are thrust into a world of high-speed racing, daring jumps, and spectacular stunts.

items.title: Merge Battle Car
items.description: Merge Battle Car is an exciting casual merge game where you can create mighty war machines by merging battle cars and robots. Engage in intense battles against enemy teams in a futuristic arena, using your tactical skills to defeat steel robots and earn money for army upgrades. With stunning 3D graphics and addictive gameplay, unlock the ultimate max-level cars and robots as you strive to become the ultimate merge master. Enjoy easy and intuitive gameplay, merge units to strengthen your forces, and unlock super-powerful robots and battle cars!

items.title: Merge & Construct
items.description: Merge & Construct is an arcade game where you can be creative to build the ultimate vehicle for driving, flying, and smashing! Show off your imagination as you construct a vehicle capable of crossing the finish line in action-packed car trials. Put your skills to the test in thrilling obstacle races and ensure your car passes the crash test with flying colors. Unleash your creativity and prepare for an exhilarating gaming experience!

items.title: Merge Racers
items.description: Merge Racers is an idle game in which you have to cover the entire planet with expensive cars. Buy and merge identical cars to create better ones. Bring your cars to the race track and earn idle money every time they cross the finish line!

items.title: Mike And Mia Beach Day
items.description: Mike And Mia Beach Day is an exciting game filled with a variety of beach activities. Dress up in trendy beachwear and join Mike and Mia in playing volleyball, fishing, surfing, and riding the waves. Create the ultimate beach picnic with them while having a blast in the sun. Get ready to experience the joy of a day at the beach with this amazing game.

items.title: Mini Car Ball
items.description: Mini Car Ball is a high-energy 2D top-down sports car soccer game where agility and strategy collide in thrilling 1v1 matches. Command a nimble vehicle, using precise driving and clever maneuvers to outplay your rival and score spectacular goals. You can play by yourself or with your friend locally. Mini Car Ball delivers intense soccer action with a unique twist, perfect for solo challenges and exciting 2-players fun!

items.title: Modern Car Racing 2
items.description: Do you like classic and new race cars and high speeds? Modern Car Racing 2 is just for you! Do not forget to take your daily bonus. Enjoy this great 3D car driving game or try one of our many other car gameshere.

items.title: Monster Truck Arena
items.description: Monster Truck Arena is a stunt-driving game where you must drive a massive monster truck, do some tricks in the arena, and reach the finish line. Do some huge air jumps and mega stunts! Enter the Monster Truck Arena and drive the biggest, meanest, and most exciting monster trucks. Use the ramps as an excuse for amazing jumps. Drive your monster truck across cars that look like toys compared to you, and do loop-the-loops. Most importantly, do all of it with style. Complete all 50 different missions to test your driving skills, and show off your skill!

items.title: Monster Truck Rampage
items.description: Monster Truck Rampage is a driving game that lets you crush any cars and earn rewards. Use your money to build your garage and upgrade your monster truck. Unleash chaos as you go on a rampage, destroy any cars in your path and become the ultimate monster truck driver!

items.title: Mr. Racer - Car Racing
items.description: Mr Racer - Car Racing is a fast-paced driving game where you speed through traffic-packed streets in sleek supercars, taking on challenges to prove you're the ultimate racer.

items.title: MR RACER Stunt Mania
items.description: MR RACER Stunt Mania is a thrilling 3D arcade racer that blends high-speed action with jaw-dropping stunts. Tackle challenging tracks filled with ramps, obstacles, and fierce AI rivals as you unlock cars, upgrade performance, and master unique environments. With smooth controls, vibrant visuals, and endless level-based challenges, it delivers a racing experience that’s both casual and competitive.

items.title: Neon Rider
items.description: Neon Rider is an electrifying 2D game where you navigate a bike through a neon obstacle course full of twists, turns, and surprises. Neon Rider retro graphics and simple gameplay will take you back to when arcade games ruled the world.

items.title: Nitro Burnout
items.description: Nitro Burnout is a realistic car simulator that puts you in control of precision drifting, blazing speed runs, and deep vehicle customization. You’ll master lifelike physics, swap engines, fine-tune performance, and leave your mark on every track. Every turn sharpens your skills—and every race brings you closer to ultimate driving mastery.

items.title: No Limits: Drag Racing
items.description: No Limits: Drag Racing is the ultimate car racing experience, designed to push your driving skills to the limit! Compete in fast-paced, adrenaline-pumping street races against fierce opponents. Customize your ride with upgrades, fine-tune engine performance, and dominate the track. With realistic physics, stunning graphics, and a variety of tracks, every race is an intense battle for victory. Can you rise to the top and become the drag racing champion?

items.title: Noob vs Pro: Zombie Apocalypse
items.description: Noob vs Pro: Zombie Apocalypse is an exciting zombie game with a fun storyline that awaits you. Go through level after level. Noob lives quietly in his small house in the forest, suddenly zombies attacked the world of blocks! Whole hordes of zombies want to destroy everything in their path. Help Noob and Pro to end them. Kill zombies, and destroy everything in your path. Survive in this challenging zombie!

items.title: Obby: The Royal Race
items.description: Obby: The Royal Race is an adventure game where players can spend hours customizing and upgrading their Obby character, collecting cool cars, and tackling challenging parkour courses. The game offers an exciting mix of racing, platforming, and character progression, making it a thrilling experience for players who enjoy both speed and skill-based challenges. So get ready to rev your engines, upgrade your character, and take on the parkour challenges in this action-packed game!

items.title: Obstacle Race: Destroying Simulator!
items.description: Obstacle Race: Destroying Simulator is a casual game where precision is key. Maneuver through a maze of obstacles while rival racers unleash chaos to impede your progress. The twist? Collide with obstacles, and your car shatters into fragments. Your mission: navigate the wreckage and skillfully reach the dealership. Outsmart competitors, dodge obstacles, and prove you're the ultimate racer in this intense, debris-strewn challenge.

items.title: Offroad Climb 4x4
items.description: Offroad Climb 4x4 is a driving off-road adventure where you'll conquer rugged terrains and daunting obstacles. Choose from a lineup of powerful off-road vehicles and navigate through challenging landscapes, earning coins to upgrade your ride. Whether you're a seasoned off-road enthusiast or just seeking thrilling hill-climbing action, this game offers endless excitement and challenges for every player. Gear up and embark on your off-road journey today!

items.title: Crazy Hills
items.description: Crazy Hills is an arcade racing game where you face intense challenges and push your car to its limits. Navigate through treacherous obstacles, destroy everything in your way, and avoid wrecking your vehicle. Each level tests your driving skills and reflexes as you strive to survive the chaos on the road.

items.title: OK Parking
items.description: Drive the cool-looking red car into the marked parking locations without hitting any obstacle.

items.title: Parking Fury 3D: Side Hustle
items.description: Parking Fury 3D: Side Hustle is a high-speed driving mission game where you take on various roles, from taxi driver to ambulance hero, navigating busy city streets. You'll master parking, traffic dodging, and even pull off daring car heists while evading the law. Every mission challenges your timing, precision, and driving skills.

items.title: Parking Jam
items.description: Parking Jam is a challenging puzzle game where you untangle a crowded parking lot one car at a time. Use your logic and problem-solving skills to move vehicles in the correct order, clearing the way without causing chaos. With each level, tackle increasingly complex puzzles filled with more cars and tricky obstacles.

items.title: Parking Jam Escape
items.description: Parking Jam Escape is a puzzle game where you park each car correctly to make space for the main car to escape from the parking lot. Collect coins and unlock different cars!

items.title: Parking Line
items.description: Parking Line is a casual puzzle game that puts your driving skills to the test. Your task is to draw the perfect line and park the car in the designated spot. With various levels offering unique parking setups, each challenge will demand precision and strategy. Sharpen your parking prowess as you progress through the game, conquering one parking spot after another. Can you master the art of precise parking? Take on the challenge and find out!

items.title: Parking Panic
items.description: Parking Panic is a puzzle game to unblock the crowded parked car and make a way for the red car to escape.

items.title: Parking Space
items.description: In Parking Space, you have to skillfully drive cars and park them perfectly at the designated locations.

items.title: Perfect Drive
items.description: Perfect Drive is a fast-paced driving game that puts your skills to the test. Whether you're a seasoned driver or just starting out, buckle up and prove your abilities on the road. With every challenge, you'll need quick reflexes and precision to show you're the ultimate driver.

items.title: Decorate My BMW M5
items.description: Decorate the BMW to look as cool and pimped out as possible.

items.title: Pizza Car
items.description: Pizza Car is a simulation game where you do what it takes to be the city’s ultimate pizza chef on wheels! Get behind the wheel of your pizza car and bring hot, fresh pizzas to hungry customers! From busy city streets to quiet suburban neighborhoods, every order is a chance to prove your skills as both a chef and a driver. Take orders, prepare delicious pizzas, and keep customers happy to grow your business!

items.title: Plane Chase
items.description: Plane Chase is a driving game where you chase planes in your souped-up ride, aiming to leap into them mid-flight! Maneuver through absurd obstacles, make daring jumps, and customize your car for the ultimate getaway. With split-second decisions and strategic boosts, can you master the craziest chase ever? Fasten your seatbelt and rev your engine – it's time for takeoff!

items.title: PolyTrack
items.description: Polytrack is a classic car racing game with a slight twist. You race a car you've customized, on a track you might have designed yourself. This is a fast-paced, low-poly driving game featuring thrilling loops, jumps, and high-speed action where every millisecond counts.

items.title: Race Clicker: Drift Max
items.description: Race Clicker: DRIFT MAX is an action-packed clicker game that puts you in the driver’s seat of intense drift races. Get ready to tap your way to victory in this fast-paced game where every split-second decision counts. Are you ready to drift your way to the top?

items.title: Racer Clicker
items.description: Racer Clicker is a fast-paced tap-to-race game where each tap accelerates your car, pushing you past rivals on the track. Feel the rush as you overtake competitors and speed your way to victory. Enjoy the intensity of racing right at your fingertips with every click!

items.title: Racing Builder
items.description: Racing Builder is a casual strategy game that combines racing and customization to deliver an exciting and fast-paced experience. In this game, your goal is to adapt your vehicle on the fly by changing wheels, modifying the body, and adding improvements, all for free, while speeding through challenging tracks to outrun your opponent at every level.

items.title: Racing Empire
items.description: Racing Empire is an adrenaline-pumping game that lets you build your own racing dynasty. Earn tokens, upgrade and customize your car, and push your limits on the track. With high-speed action and strategic car modifications, Racing Empire lets you prove you're the ultimate racing mogul. Get ready to race and conquer the competition!

items.title: Racing in City
items.description: Racing in City is a driving game where you dodge traffic and complete challenges. Navigate through city traffic on a range of tracks while sitting with a view from behind the wheel. Participate in a long and illustrious driving career. Earn points and cash them in for cars and upgrades.

items.title: Racing Limits
items.description: Racing Limits is a racing game that lets you push your skills to the max. Race and overtake vehicles in city and highway traffic with four thrilling game modes: carrier, infinite, against-time, and free mode. Choose between one-way and two-way traffic, and experience three times of day - 'Morning,' 'Sunset,' and 'Night.' With multiple camera angles, sensitive controls, and realistic physics, it's a high-speed adventure you won't want to miss. Customize, upgrade, and take on numerous race events in this graphically stunning racing world!

items.title: Rally Racer Dirt
items.description: Rally Racer Dirt is a rally drift-based game, allows you to drift on both asphalt and dirt terrains while navigating through hills. This category is redefined with the introduction of Rally Racer Dirt, offering the best realistic and stunning controls for a rally game. Enjoy the experience of drifty and realistic tuned physics, coupled with detailed graphics, various vehicles, and racing tracks. Be a rally racer, driving like Ken Blocks and Collin McRae on the tracks. The game features a Realtime Multiplayer Mode, 13 different rally cars, tunable cars with adjustable features, upgradable cars and drive properties, 5 different tuned tracks, and more. Choose between two main game modes: Challenge mode, with 60 different challenges to pass, and Survival mode, where you drift and drive as long as you can, passing checkpoints.

items.title: Ram Cars
items.description: Ram Cars is a car battle game where you drive and smash an opponent's car by drawing a line. This game offers 3D graphics, different arenas, multiple challenges, upgrades, and rewards! Draw the line to move your car. While planning your path, you will also see the trajectory of the enemy. That is where you need to think fast to react and coordinate your moving direction well to be rammed right into your opponent. The best hits are when you T-bone your opponent, which is not so easy to do! Don't forget to also upgrade your car's health and strength. More health equals harder to smash, and more strength means that a well-planned hit could destroy another fighter in one blow.

items.title: Ramp Car Jumping
items.description: Ramp Car Jumping is a casual driving game where you send your car flying off a huge ramp, crashing into various obstacles. Smash through everything in your path, do flips, and fly as far as you can! Buy vehicles and unlock new tracks when you reach each target.

items.title: Real Car Parking
items.description: Real Car Parking is a skill-testing game that challenges your parking abilities. With various parking lots, vehicle types, and difficulty levels, it's a fun way to improve your skills. Experience realistic graphics, intuitive controls, and a wide range of vehicles as you navigate through narrow streets, office buildings, and more. Get ready to park like a pro and become a parking master!

items.title: Real Cars in City
items.description: Real Cars in City is a 3D car simulation with superb graphics and various game modes. This game has realistic vehicle driving physics and quality graphics. There are 20 sports cars, 36 racetracks, 1 free ride area, a police chase area, and a crash derby area. There is a vehicle purchase and development system in the game. You can race against artificial intelligence or drive freely.

items.title: Real Drift World
items.description: Real Drift World is a dynamic driving experience where you can explore the city or map freely, either on foot or behind the wheel. Master thrilling drifts, tackle challenging road features, and catch serious air on ramps. Switch up the adventure with multiple maps, parking levels, and tournaments. In this limitless world, your skills make the rules.

items.title: Real Drive 3D Parking Games
items.description: Real Drive 3D Parking Games is a parking car simulation game where you start with an SUV and unlock various vehicles as you progress. Test your driving skills in challenging levels, from rooftop terrains to off-road adventures. Master manual gear shifting and precision parking while enjoying a wide selection of cars, including sedans, trucks, muscle cars, and supercars. Get ready to unleash your inner racer and conquer each level with finesse!

items.title: Retro Garage
items.description: Retro Garage is a detailed workshop adventure where you diagnose, repair, and customize vehicles piece by piece. Each car features over 50 parts across the body, chassis, and engine, challenging you to replace or restore damaged components. Buy new or vintage cars, tune and paint them, then either sell for profit or keep as collectibles. Beyond repairs, test your creations in drag races, racing tracks, and ring circuits. Expand your workshop, unlock new locations, and explore a collection of iconic cars from the 50s to 90s, spanning both USSR and European classics.

items.title: Road of Fury 4
items.description: Road of Fury 4 is an explosive action shooter set in a harsh post-apocalyptic world. You’ll face waves of new enemies, battle three powerful bosses, and gear up with six unique cars. With a massive arsenal at your disposal, you must upgrade, adapt, and fight your way through relentless chaos to prove your survival skills.

items.title: Road Turn
items.description: In Road Turn, a fun one-button car game, your job is to direct the traffic. Prevent traffic accidents by controlling when the cars can turn onto the highway.

items.title: Rovercraft
items.description: Rovercraft is a driving arcade game that puts your creativity and driving skills to the test. Build and customize your very own rover, outfitting it with powerful tools like jet engines, super-wheels, and other high-tech upgrades to tackle challenging alien landscapes. Each terrain is a unique puzzle, filled with treacherous obstacles and steep climbs, requiring both ingenuity in your design and precision in your driving. As you navigate through these extraterrestrial courses, the true challenge lies in achieving the perfect balance between your engineering prowess and your skills behind the wheel.

items.title: Rude Races
items.description: Rude Races is a racing game, but instead of just a regular race, you can also swing your weapon to fight your opponents and make them lose the race. You can also modify your ATV and complete all the tasks available to make a perfect score. Grab your weapon and join the battle with Rude Races.

items.title: Rush Car Driving: Race Master
items.description: Rush Car Driving: Race Master is a driving game that delivers thrilling action as you navigate heavy traffic. Push the limits of your speed and driving skills to become a winner! Experience the adrenaline of high-speed racing in heavy traffic, where split-second decisions can be the difference between victory and defeat. Explore a variety of immersive environments, from busy urban highways to rural roads. Choose from a wide selection of cars, from sports cars to muscle machines. Buckle up and start the race!

items.title: Rush Hour
items.description: Rush Hour is a high-speed racing adventure where every street becomes a thrilling challenge. Navigate busy urban traffic, pushing your reflexes and skills to the limit with each drift and daring maneuver. Embrace the adrenaline, master every sharp turn, and prove you have what it takes to reign as the ultimate champion of speed!

items.title: Sand King
items.description: Sand King is an exciting game where you become a skilled driver and paleontologist, exploring a vast desert to uncover dinosaur remains. Use a powerful vacuum to collect colored sand and reveal hidden bones, building your collection and progressing to new levels. As the challenge intensifies with more fossils to find, your trusty car and expert driving skills will guide you through the desert, leading to thrilling discoveries. Enjoy the game's captivating music to enhance your desert adventure!

items.title: Sandbox City
items.description: Sandbox City - Cars, Zombies, Ragdolls! is a zombie game where you can explore freely and drive around the city, but, be careful of the zombie's infection! Find the zombies and kill them before the infection spreads around and the city.

items.title: Sky Car Drift
items.description: Sky Car Drift is a car drifting game where you must compete drifting against your rivals on a thrilling track above the clouds. Master the art of drifting and aim for the longest drifts without crashing or falling off the edge to earn valuable trophies. Collect trophies to unlock a wide range of cool rewards, including over 200 cars, 120 drivers, 500 emotes, and 10 unique skies. Climb the trophy ladder to gain exclusive titles and showcase your skills. Compete in various drift categories, aim for the top of the leaderboards, and secure your spot in the prestigious hall of fame. Get ready to soar in Sky Car Drift!

items.title: Sky Riders
items.description: Sky Riders is a high-speed casual vehicle driving game. Put your driving skills to the test as you complete several challenging tracks. Stay focused and avoid falling off! Whether you're behind the wheel of a car or riding a motorcycle, prepare for an adrenaline-fueled adventure and unforgettable racing moments. Get ready to conquer difficult tests and feel the excitement of Sky Riders!

items.title: Slingshot Crash
items.description: Slingshot Crash is a thrilling game where you use a slingshot to launch cars and cause maximum damage. The more destruction you create, the more in-game money you earn to upgrade traffic, explosions, and more. Unleash your creativity to keep the chaos going and see just how far you can push the limits of destruction!

items.title: Slingshot Stunt Driver & Sport
items.description: Slingshot Stunt Driver & Sport is a sports car game where you morph cars into planes, embracing the ultimate thrill of aerial stunts. Adjust slingshot strength, pick your launch direction, and witness the chaos as your car takes flight. Skillfully navigate the skies, aiming for precision landings amidst challenging terrain. It's not just about driving – it's about becoming the fearless stuntman of your dreams.

items.title: Slope Car
items.description: Slope Car is an arcade game to drive your car on a randomized slope and go as far as possible. This game is a combination ofCrazy Roll 3Dand driving a car.

items.title: Smash Karts
items.description: Smash Karts is a 3D multiplayer IO kart battle game. Drive your go-kart, pick up weapons, and blow up other karts to win! Keep playing to level up and unlock new characters and prizes.

items.title: Sort Parking
items.description: Sort Parking is a puzzle game where you sort cars by type, ensuring every color car is parked in a row with cars of the same color to get to the next stage of the game. It is a classic sort-and-order game that involves skills like logic to advance to the next levels.

items.title: Sportcars Crash
items.description: Sportcars Crash is a driving game where every curve spells danger, and survival is the ultimate challenge. Get behind the steering wheel in various cars, each with its own unique traits and destructibility. Whether you choose to skillfully navigate to the finish line or revel in the thrill of crashing, the choice is yours in this adrenaline-fueled test of driving prowess and instinct.

items.title: Stick Crush
items.description: Stick Crush is an exhilarating casual physics game that tests your reactions and skills! Start by revving your car, crashing into obstacles, and launching your stick character into the sky. Once airborne, navigate challenges, dodge obstacles, and take down enemies with precise maneuvers.

items.title: Stickman Annihilation 2
items.description: Stickman Annihilation 2 is an action-packed ragdoll physicsstickman gamemade by Sergey Mezkhahov. Drive an assortment of vehicles through people, fire, walls, and enjoy the slow-motion spectacle. Rack up gold coins from causing damage and use them to purchase new vehicles and levels!

items.title: Stickman battle 1-4 Players
items.description: Stickman battle 1-4 Players is a lively collection of dynamic action games where you battle with spinning weapons, score thrilling goals, race to the finish, and survive challenging levels. Jump into quick rounds or tournaments spanning several matches. Play solo or with up to three friends or bots, customize your cars, faces, and colors, and enjoy nonstop fun together.

items.title: Stickman Zombie Annihilation
items.description: Stickman Zombie Annihilation is a vehicle driving game to reach the goal areas and kill stickman zombies along the way!

items.title: Street Race Fury
items.description: Race your car to the finish line first by clicking whenever the meter gets in the green zone. Have fun with Street Race Fury, a cool drag racingcar game!

items.title: Street Racer 2
items.description: Street Racer 2 is a driving drag-racing game where your goal is to win races, upgrade, and buy new cars. This game offers an exhilarating mix of play modes, including drag racing, off-road challenges, and arcade-style fun. Each mode delivers a distinct experience, whether chasing high-speed thrills, conquering rugged terrain, or enjoying adrenaline-packed track action.

items.title: Street Racing: Open World
items.description: Street Racing: Open World is a stunning driving simulator with realistic physics, limitless customization, and breathtaking graphics. Build and tune your dream car with countless parts and vinyls, then put your skills to the test across a massive open world filled with diverse environments, from city streets to desert dunes. Complete tasks, earn money, unlock new cars, and upgrade them. Experience the thrill of high-speed racing!

items.title: Stunt Paradise
items.description: Stunt Paradise is a high-octane driving adventure packed with daring stunts and electrifying challenges. Push your limits as you soar off ramps, pull off jaw-dropping flips, and crash through explosive obstacles. Every turn delivers a new thrill, testing your reflexes and courage. Are you ready to conquer the ultimate playground for fearless drivers?

items.title: Super Hero Driving School
items.description: Super Hero Driving School is a casual car stunt game where you can drive, fly, and perform stunts on multiple crazy tracks with unique superhero vehicles. Unlock multiple colorful tracks that will put your driving skills to the test. Even heroes need a driving license, and in this game, you can learn to drive and fly superhero vehicles like never before! But be careful, because even superheroes can have super crashes. Buckle up and get ready for super fun times!

items.title: Super Racing GT: Drag Pro
items.description: Super Racing GT: Drag Pro is a fun and challenging drag racing game in which you must test your racing skills on a variety of awesome drag strips from around the world. In this drag racing game the controls are realistic – instead of just mashing the acceleration you must time your gear shifts perfectly and find a balance between gear changing and acceleration.

items.title: Super Retro Chase
items.description: Super Retro Chase is a car-driving game to escape the police chase while also activating different checkpoints. Trick the cops with your drifting technique, upgrade your car, and get ready for your next drive! For another challenge, you can tryEndless Hot Pursuit.

items.title: Switch Wheel: Race Master
items.description: Switch Wheel is a casual race where strategy is key. Navigate diverse roads with a selection of powerful cars, speedy motorcycles, and agile helicopters. Tap the screen to switch vehicles, each offering a unique advantage. Earn coins, level up, and customize your wheels for an edge. Race against time and opponents in this challenging game with super easy controls. Prove you're number one in Switch Wheel's competitive battles!

items.title: Syder Hyper Drive
items.description: Syder Hyper Drive is a futuristic stunt car game where you can perform thrilling stunts using a variety of cool vehicles. Unlock and upgrade different rides as you tackle challenging missions in an endless adventure. Show off your skills, conquer obstacles, and push your stunt-driving limits to the max!

items.title: Taxi Driver: Master
items.description: Taxi Driver: Master is a role-playing adventure game where you navigate city streets, ferrying passengers to their destinations. Explore a vast cityscape, interact with diverse clientele, and hone your driving prowess. Maneuver your taxi using keyboard controls, ensuring timely drop-offs to earn high ratings. With realistic simulation and mobile compatibility, it's a thrilling challenge for driving enthusiasts.

items.title: Taxi Rush
items.description: Taxi Rush is a driving simulation game where you race through city streets to deliver clients swiftly and safely. Navigate dense traffic, avoid roadblocks, and manage unique passenger demands to earn rewards. Upgrade and customize your taxi, strategize your routes, and climb the leaderboard to become the ultimate taxi driver in this dynamic urban adventure.

items.title: Telekinesis Race 3D
items.description: Telekinesis Race 3D is an engaging arcade game with a unique twist - superhuman abilities. The primary objective of the game is to engage in combat and destruction. Using your telekinetic powers, you can throw objects at enemies, lift and toss foes, and even interact with environmental elements to defeat adversaries. The game encourages creative use of telekinesis to overcome challenges and progress through the levels.

items.title: Time to Park
items.description: Time to Park is a fun and interesting car parking game. In this game, you must take control of a car from a top-down point of view and try to park it in a myriad of different spots. Your driving must be precise and you must line up in the parking spot perfectly! As you start out, the levels are easy, but the parking challenges become increasingly difficult.

items.title: Tow N Go
items.description: Tow N Go is a thrilling game where you hit the road and become the coolest truck driver. Your mission is to tow cars parked in "No parking" areas and collect as many as you can at once. But beware! It's not an easy job. Avoid crashing into trains or other cars on the road. The more cars you collect, the richer you become. Challenge yourself in this exciting towing adventure and make loads of money today!

items.title: Toy Rider
items.description: Toy Rider is a driving game where you will drive a small toy car and your goal is to reach your owner's hand. Perform jaw-dropping stunts such as jumping on ramps, flying through portals, and many other crazy stunts in this incredibly fun driving game.

items.title: Traffic Cop 3D
items.description: Traffic Cop 3D is a casual game where you play as a police officer enforcing the law of the road. Scan nearby drivers and use intel from the police database to decide whether you should pull them over, or let them go, all while progressing through the story and increasing your duties as a cop.

items.title: Traffic Loop
items.description: Traffic Loop is an idle game where you can earn money from the traffic. Morning traffic is usually the worst thing in the world, but now you have a chance to get an advantage of it! Buy cars and merge them together to create a better car. Better cars mean more money, plus merging cars together can also reduce traffic. All you need to do is to create traffic, merge cars, build roads, and keep the money flowing. Be the traffic tycoon and earn unimaginable amounts of money!

items.title: Traffic Parking
items.description: Traffic Parking is a challenging car puzzle game where you guide a vehicle home by navigating around obstacles like other cars and rocks. Strategize to clear paths and unlock tricks for tricky levels. With 45 levels, customizable car skins, and daily rewards, it’s designed to keep you engaged and entertained as you master each challenge.

items.title: Truck Driving Simulator Game
items.description: Truck Driving Simulator Game is a driving game that immerses you in the thrill of truck driving throughout Asia. The graphics offer a realistic experience with unique truck models and captivating environments.

items.title: Truck Simulator: Russia
items.description: Truck Simulator Russia is a 3D truck-driving simulation game where you can explore beautiful open-world environments while driving various trucks! Take delivery jobs and be a real Russian truck driver.

items.title: Trucks Race
items.description: Trucks Race is an arcade game where your job is to move the cargo as fast as possible. Your goal is to deliver all goods to the consignee as fast as possible. As you progress, you'll earn money and level up, unlocking new roads to explore. Test your skills on the highway as you take on challenging delivery missions. Get ready for a thrilling trucking experience!

items.title: Tuning Car Racing
items.description: Tuning Car Racing is an urban racing experience packed with variety and style. Explore a sprawling city, test 8 unique cars, and compete across 6 distinct racing maps with multiple variations. It’s pure high-speed competition set against the vibrant pulse of city life.

items.title: Turbo Cars: Pipe Stunts
items.description: Turbo Cars: Pipe Stunts is a high-octane stunt driving game. Browse various cars from classic Soviet models to powerful modern supercars and take them to the tracks. Blaze down slippery slopes and smash through obstacles. Earn gold and move to the next track!

items.title: Ultimate Night Racing
items.description: Ultimate Night Racing is a driving game where you test your driving abilities against probably the most talented adversaries your city brings to the table. This drifting unblocked game will allow you to flaunt your driving strategies as you leave your rivals in a dust storm. You can buy a new car and customize it to your liking!

items.title: Vehicle Masters
items.description: Vehicle Masters is a departure from the high-octane thrills of typical racing games. Instead, it offers a unique experience focused on precision and finesse.

items.title: WheelX Race
items.description: WheelX Race delivers thrilling mini-car action across dynamic tracks filled with twists, shortcuts, and challenges. Customize your ride with engine upgrades, nitro boosts, and unique paint jobs, then take on time trials or intense head-to-head duels. Earn rewards, unlock new cars, and race through vibrant environments with intuitive controls and smooth, fast-paced gameplay.

items.title: Xtreme Rivals: Car Racing
items.description: Xtreme Rivals Car Racing is an adrenaline-fueled 3D driving game that puts you behind the wheel of high-speed machines against fierce competitors. This car racing game challenges you with different roads and landscapes with rewards to match your effort.

items.title: Zombie Drive Survivor
items.description: Zombie Drive Survivor is an action game where you get to drive a cool car and bravely face off against hordes of zombies! Bump into the zombies to crush them, but remember to watch out for your car's damage level because you don't want your car to be damaged and burnt down. Collect exp that the zombies drop every time you beat them. The exp will help you level up and become stronger. Unlock and pick awesome weapons to make defeating zombies even more fun! Many different types of zombies and enemy cars will try to stop you! But don't worry; you can earn coins to unlock new, more powerful cars and discover all sorts of cool weapons like machine guns, shotguns, rams, Molotov cocktails, rocket launchers, flamethrowers, harpoons, mines, traps, and more. There are two different game modes you can enjoy. Level game mode, where you can practice and have fun, and Endless Mode for you who want to challenge yourself to face wave after wave of zombies. The choice is yours!

items.title: Algerian Solitaire
items.description: Algerian Solitaire is a variation on the classic Solitaire (or Patience, as it is also known) card game. It is played using two decks of card, and the rules are quite complex. You can find themon Wikipedia. This game was developed by Ravalmatic.

items.title: Australian Patience
items.description: Play a fascinating and fun version ofSolitairewhich is a mixture of Klondike and Scorpion.

items.title: Auto RiskRisk
items.description: Auto RiskRisk is a strategic 2D card battle game. This is an auto battler game where you must manage your fighters by strategically equipping different items and artifacts to assemble the strongest team possible in order to win the battle. Send them off to fight against AI opponents in single-player or against other human players online. By combining certain types of items, you can increase your strength or counter the opponents' strategies. Collect money after each battle and use it to level up and buy new equipment for your fighters. You can also buy multiple of the same items to combine them into stronger versions. Each item belongs to two different sets. If you collect multiples of the same set, you get additional set bonuses. Your fighters will automatically run out and fight for you with the equipment you have assigned to them. The loser of the battle will lose health, and if you go down to 0 health, you are out of the game. The last player standing is the winner!

items.title: BattleChonk
items.description: BattleChonk is a charming defense game where you guide adorable creatures in their fight against the mischievous Gloomps. You’ll boost your dice, unleash clever attacks, and guard your town with growing strength. As challenges increase, you unlock new Chonks and upgrades, keeping every chapter fresh, strategic, and full of delightful surprises.

items.title: Card Scramble: Viola's Diner
items.description: Card Scramble: Viola’s Diner is a heartfelt single-player adventure that blends card play with board game strategy. You’ll help Viola revive her family diner by preparing dishes, unlocking new designs, and customizing the space to reflect her memories. Along the way, meet colorful characters like Uncle Joey and enjoy hundreds of levels filled with warmth, challenge, and discovery.

items.title: Card Shuffle Sort
items.description: Card Shuffle Sort is a smart and calming puzzle game that challenges you to strategically rearrange cards by color. With increasing difficulty, each level tests your organization and problem-solving skills. Enjoy beautiful designs, intuitive gameplay, and daily challenges that keep you coming back for more. Perfect for sharpening your mind while unwinding.

items.title: Classic Card Games Collection
items.description: Classic Card Games Collection is a collection of over 150 solitaire card games, including favorites like Klondike, Spider, and Freecell. Explore new games with clear rules for every variation. Customize your gaming experience with unique card designs, backgrounds, and animated win effects. Dive into the classics or try something new while enjoying the personalized feel of each game.

items.title: Classic Solitaire
items.description:
Classic Solitaire game - the time-tested card game.
Classic Solitaire brings all the fun and enjoyment of this iconic card game to your web browser. The rules and gameplay remain the same – you have to move your cards around and try to match them by suit and number. This version of solitaire is fun to play and easy to pick up.

items.title: Cribbage JD
items.description: Cribbage JD is a classic card game also known as Crib, Cribble, and Noddy. It's a multiplayer card game traditionally for two players, that involves playing and grouping cards in combinations that gain points. The cribbage board is used for score-keeping.

items.title: Dark Stones: Card Battle RPG
items.description: Dark Stones: Card Battle RPG is a strategic card-based battle game set in a dark fantasy world of magic and elemental forces. Assemble a team of humans, orcs, mages, elves, and other creatures to defeat powerful foes, capture their souls, and unlock new powers. Explore lands teeming with danger, from snowy valleys to scorched deserts and realms of the dead, while uncovering hidden secrets and facing epic challenges.

items.title: Domino Duel
items.description: Domino Duel is a versatile battle of minds offering thrilling head-to-head matchups in multiple modes. Challenge AI, duel online, or face off with friends on one screen or across the globe. With flexible settings, rich customization and helpful features like hints and move history, it’s the perfect arena to sharpen your strategy and climb the ranks.

items.title: Emerland Solitaire Endless Journey
items.description: Emerland Solitaire Endless Journey is a puzzle game where you become the hero the world needs! Embark on an incredible journey through a magical land filled with dwarves, elves, mermaids, and other amazing creatures. Traverse colorful locations, solve mystical card puzzles, and earn stars for your skill as you explore enchanted forests and majestic bluffs with helpful companions.

items.title: Emily's Hotel Solitaire
items.description: Emily's Hotel Solitaire is a puzzle game where you embark on a tropical adventure with Emily, and fulfill her grandfather's dream of building the best hotel in the world! Immerse yourself in the magical atmosphere as you enjoy the challenging games of Solitaire and create your luxurious hotel paradise. With exciting Solitaire puzzles, glorious locations, and endless opportunities for customization, this game offers an unforgettable experience!

items.title: Flames & Fortune
items.description: Flames & Fortune is a collectible card game inspired by Card Crawl. Play as a knight wielding powerful fire spells to conquer dungeons. Strategically clear all cards to escape each level, collecting gold and using your deck to overcome challenges and adversaries. Engage in tactical gameplay as you navigate through treacherous dungeons, ensuring your survival and victory.

items.title: Foono Online Multiplayer
items.description: Foono Online Multiplayer is an engaging card game that takes inspiration from classics like Uno Online and Crazy Eights. The objective is to clear your hand of cards before your opponents do. It's a game of strategy, quick thinking, and a bit of luck. Foono offers endless fun and opportunities for social interaction. Whether you're playing casually with friends or in competitive online matches, Foono promises an entertaining card game experience!

items.title: Forest Dump
items.description: Forest Dump is a casual roguelike game that takes you on a unique adventure through a quirky and polluted woodland. As a clever and resourceful fox, your mission is to clean up your corrupted forest home by flipping cards to uncover mysteries, face off against trash monsters, and collect powerful weapons to aid in your journey. Combining card-flipping mechanics with deckbuilding elements, this game offers a strategic adventure full of surprises. Will you be able to clean up the pollution and restore the forest to its former glory? Jump into Forest Dump and find out!

items.title: Gin Rummy Online
items.description: Play Gin Rummy Online (Plus). Gin Rummy is a card-matching game you can play with one or more other players. This online version of Gin Rummy lets you play against opponents of various difficulties to build your skills and become a slick Gin Rummy master!

items.title: Golf Solitaire
items.description: Golf Solitaire is a fun and challenging solo card game. Clear all the cards by placing them in order and returning them to the pile until there are none remaining. This game uses a regular 52-card deck, but the rules differ from regular Solitaire.

items.title: Hanafuda Flash
items.description: Hanafuda Flash is exactly as the title suggests - it's a flash version of a classic Japanese card game, Hanafuda. This card game involves 2 players throwing and taking cards to/from each other to create a set of cards from a "suit". There are multiple suits with different points depending on the cards you've collected. This game will need a bit of studying, but once you get the hang of it, this game is super fun because of how fast the game starts and ends.

items.title: Hearts: Classic
items.description: Hearts: Classic is an online version of the traditional card in which you are trying to avoid scoring points as the game ends when a player reaches 100 points. If you are new to the game of Hearts, then there is a handy rulebook that helps you through the game teaching you tips and how to avoid losing the game.

items.title: Infinite Heroes
items.description: Infinite Heroes is a board card game where you must join the magical world of adventure. Challenge the monster army and defeat the demon. Simple at first glance, the game will present you with complex challenges. Creatures, artifacts, portals, spells, and heroes. Play as a tireless adventurer, a powerful magician, a great warlock, or any of the eight heroes! Get loot and treasure to win. As you progress, the strength of your opponents will also grow, and to win, you need to think through every step.

items.title: Kingdom Solitaire
items.description: Kingdom Solitaire is a captivating journey where you, as Tony the butler, restore a majestic castle by mastering challenging solitaire levels. Delight in vibrant artwork, unique cards, and exciting mechanics while uncovering a heartwarming tale of a queen and her beloved pets. With constant updates introducing fresh surprises, your royal adventure will never grow dull!

items.title: Kingmaker Academy: Warrior's Duels
items.description: Kingmaker Academy: Warrior's Duels is a card battle game where you must use your strategy to beat your opponent. Strategize and outsmart your opponents as you compete against talented rivals in the school's prestigious tournament. Hone your skills with each duel and aim to become the ultimate warrior and ruler of the academy. Can you rise to the top and claim victory?

items.title: Kings and Queens Solitaire TriPeaks
items.description: Kings and Queens Solitaire TriPeaks is a casual puzzle solitaire game whose objective is to stack all cards on the game table in sequence. This game is ideal for card players, especially solitaire fans, as it is intuitive to pick up quickly with similar solitaire gameplay but with a slight twist—cards are not in laid out the same way, suits don't matter and rank order can go from high to low to high again!

items.title: Magic Towers Solitaire
items.description: Magic Towers Solitaire is a free solitaire game with a medieval theme. Move all the cards from the three peaks back to the deck. Remove all the cards to move to the next round!

items.title: MemeBattle: What's That Meme?
items.description: MemeBattle: What's That Meme? is a hilarious card game where you collect legendary memes, tackle funny scenarios, and compete for laughs. Respond with the perfect meme to win votes and climb the ranks. Build your collection by unlocking epic meme packs and enjoy endless humor with every match. Prove your comedic genius and become the ultimate Meme Master!

items.title: Nébula Tarot Cat
items.description: Nébula Tarot Cat is a mystical journey where you consult a magical AI-powered cat for guidance. Dive into the enchanting world of tarot, ask your burning questions, and uncover the universe’s secrets through Nébula’s intuitive wisdom. With every card drawn, her insights illuminate your path, blending esoteric charm and AI precision to reveal the answers you seek.

items.title: Pocketro
items.description: Pocketro is a fast-paced roguelike card game that fuses poker mechanics with strategic deck-building. You’ll craft winning hands, collect random power-ups, and face tougher challenges with each round. Every decision shapes your run, making each session unpredictable and rewarding. Test your instincts, take risks, and outsmart the table in a game of clever gambits.

items.title: Pyramid Solitaire Ancient Egypt
items.description: Clear the pyramid of cards by pairing cards which add up to 13. This Ancient Egypt themed version of Pyramid Solitaire offers excellent and engaging gameplay.

items.title: Random Cards: Tower Defense
items.description: Random Cards: Tower Defense is a tower defense game where you must use your strategy to decide which cards you will use for the battle. Each card has its own strength and its own power. Keep in mind that in order to win, you will need to calculate all the actions. Play out different tower defense scenarios, make wise decisions, and improve your cards.

items.title: RSVP
items.description: RSVP is a card game to match the colors of your guest's cards to make them happy.

items.title: Social Solitaire
items.description: Social Solitaire is a free solitaire game featuring a relaxed and normal game mode. Using the points you earn in games, you can customize your deck and theme. Take a break and play solitaire!

items.title: Solitaire Crime Stories
items.description: Solitaire Crime Stories is a casual solitaire game where you delve into the mysteries of Springdale, a seemingly tranquil town hiding dark secrets. Join journalist Lana Whitt and her assistant Bill as you solve crimes by mastering Solitaire. Explore unique locations, meet intriguing characters, and unravel the town's enigmatic puzzles. Plus, enjoy bonding with Max, the adorable kitten companion, in between investigations. Ready to become a Solitaire master and detective extraordinaire?

items.title: Solitaire Definitive Edition
items.description: Solitaire Definitive Edition is an ultimate solitaire game, featuring 63 of the most popular solitaire games in one browser-based app. Additionally, it offers four exclusive solitaire games. Play seamlessly on all your devices, with features like auto-complete, auto-deal, game loss detection, and multi-level undo. Get ready for the definitive solitaire challenge!

items.title: Solitaire FRVR
items.description: Solitaire FRVR is a great HTML5 solitaire game developed by Chris Benjaminsen.

items.title: Solitaire Klondike
items.description: Have a good time to stack all the cards completely in this Solitaire Klondike game.

items.title: Solitaire Reverse
items.description: The reversed version of Solitaire. Have fun!

items.title: Solitaire: The Great Journey
items.description: Solitaire: The Great Journey is a relaxing card game that blends classic solitaire mechanics with an adventurous twist. Match cards one above or below your stack to clear the table and move forward. With every win, you unlock a new island to explore, turning each round into a step deeper into a vibrant, rewarding journey.

items.title: Solitr
items.description: Solitr is a puzzle card game, the online version of the classic solitaire game, ideal for endless hours of fun: the perfect way to unwind after a busy day!

items.title: Spades
items.description: Have fun playing a classic internet Spades against 3 other opponents.

items.title: Speed
items.description: SPEED is one of the more classic card games that involves, well, speed. The goal of the game is to be the first player to discard all of the cards on your hand. You do this by choosing a card from your hand that is 1 step higher or lower than one of the 2 cards in the middle of the screen. This is where the title comes it - you won't be taking turns doing this. You'll need speed as the cards in the middle can only be used by the first player to discard their own cards there.

items.title: Spider FRVR
items.description: Spider FRVR is a type of Solitaire game from FRVR. You need to stack the cards on the board.

items.title: Spider Solitaire 2 Suits
items.description: Spider Solitaire 2 Suits is a challenging Solitaire game limited to two suits and two decks of cards. Move the cards around the tableau so they are in order by suit and number. Take more cards from the pile if you get stuck. See if you can win at this tricky game!

items.title: Spooky Tripeaks
items.description: Spooky Tripeaks is a Halloween variation of the Solitaire card game. You need to pass all 100 levels. Use jokers and other bonus cards to simplify the process. You can get the bonus cards by clicking on the ghosts and other spooky characters.

items.title: Survival Land
items.description: Survival Land is a casual game where you construct diverse items to build your community. Develop your village by strategically creating essential structures and advancing your society. Delve into the immersive world of VillageCraft, where your decisions shape the destiny of your evolving village. Enjoy the challenge of resource management and community growth as you embark on this engaging strategic journey.

items.title: Tavern Rumble: Roguelike Card
items.description: Tavern Rumble is a strategy roguelike deckbuilding card game. Begin your adventure with basic mercenary cards, strengthen your deck, and face challenging bosses. Explore card synergies and experience a roguelike journey with random dungeons, loot, mercenaries, and permanent death. Craft a unique deck, encounter creatures, take blessings, and become a legendary monster slayer. The game offers playable classes, cute pixel art, easy-to-learn mechanics, and the ability to play offline or online. Play now for a perfect card game break!

items.title: Tongits
items.description: Tongits is a three-player card game that is still in the Rummy family. The objective of the game is to empty your hand cards by forming sets(melds) or minimize the total score when a fight is called or when the central stack is empty. Each player will be dealt 12 cards while the dealer gets 13, and the rest of the cards are left as a draw card. The game begins when the dealer dumps a card.
