items.description: Super Billy Boy is a 2D side-scrolling platformer game to save an abducted friend from an Alien Robot.

items.title: Super Hero Driving School
items.description: Super Hero Driving School is a casual car stunt game where you can drive, fly, and perform stunts on multiple crazy tracks with unique superhero vehicles. Unlock multiple colorful tracks that will put your driving skills to the test. Even heroes need a driving license, and in this game, you can learn to drive and fly superhero vehicles like never before! But be careful, because even superheroes can have super crashes. Buckle up and get ready for super fun times!

items.title: Super Number Defense
items.description: Super Number Defense is a tower defense game where you can put your calculation skills to the test! Strategically defeat waves of enemies by harnessing the power of math. Choose your turrets wisely, as their strength and effectiveness depend on your ability to solve simple math problems. Allocate your resources wisely to maximize your defense capabilities. With its innovative blend of tower defense and math gameplay, this game offers a thrilling and educational gaming experience. Can you protect your base? It's time to unleash the power of numbers!

items.title: Super Oliver World
items.description: Super Oliver World is an arcade game where you help little Oliver escape the dangers of a parallel world full of traps and dangerous enemies. Break blocks to find power-ups, coins, and other surprises along the way!

items.title: Super Onion Boy 2
items.description: Super Onion Boy 2 is a 2D retro-style adventure game where your mission is to save your friend, who has been captured by a terrible monster with psychic powers. Defeat enemies along the way using superpowers and epic transformations, collect coins and stars to earn extra lives, find chests with magic potions, and defeat all the terrible bosses until you reach the final showdown. After saving a princess from the clutches of a terrible monster, Onion Boy wakes up in the forest, unsure if it was real or just a dream. He decides to return to the place where he saved her. Enjoy this pixelated art game and have fun on your quest!

items.title: Super Slime
items.description: Super Slime is a fast-paced platformer where you take control of a squishy, bouncy hero on a mission to save the day. Master the art of stretching, bouncing, and dodging through 100 thrilling levels packed with tricky obstacles and fierce enemies. Precision and quick reflexes are your best allies in this adorable yet challenging adventure!

items.title: Super Squirrel Blaster
items.description: Super Squirrel Blaster is a fast-paced arcade game where precise timing is key! Blast through exciting levels, dodge pesky enemies and avoid bonking your head on trees as you navigate this action-packed forest adventure. Can you master the perfect shot and conquer the wild?

items.title: Super Sucker 3D
items.description: Super Sucker 3D is a unique action game where you take control of a powerful vacuum to clear out enemies and obstacles. Suck up everything in your path, then unleash it to defeat bosses and advance through levels. Show your skill by mastering this unconventional and fun way to overcome challenges!"

items.title: Super Thief Auto
items.description: Super Thief Auto is a thrilling running game where you take on the role of a skilled thief. Steal vehicles along the way, whether it's a car, a bike, or even a boat. Race against others to reach the finish line. Avoid any obstacles in front of you and claim victory.

items.title: Superball
items.description: Superball is a fast-paced arcade challenge where you launch a barrage of balls to crush invading cells before they overwhelm you. Earn cash with every smash, upgrade your arsenal, and unlock powerful boosts to stay ahead. Endless Mode pushes your reflexes and strategy to the limit—how long can you hold the line?

items.title: Superhero Race!
items.description: Superhero Race! is an epic adventure where you become the hero the world needs. Choose your superhero story and race against villains, overcoming every challenge on your path to saving the world. It's your time to clean up the chaos and show the villains who's boss!

items.title: Supermarket Empire
items.description: Supermarket Empire is a simulation game where you become the master of your own retail kingdom! Take charge of managing and growing your supermarket as you aim to build a thriving empire. Earn money and expand your store by offering a wide range of products that cater to the needs of your customers!

items.title: Supermarket Simulator: Store Manager
items.description: Supermarket Simulator: Store Manager is a dynamic retail experience where you juggle cashier duties and store management. Scan items, process payments, and keep customers happy while managing stock and organizing shelves. As challenges intensify, you’ll grow your store and meet rising demand. Can you handle the rush and build a thriving supermarket empire?

items.title: Survival Land
items.description: Survival Land is a casual game where you construct diverse items to build your community. Develop your village by strategically creating essential structures and advancing your society. Delve into the immersive world of VillageCraft, where your decisions shape the destiny of your evolving village. Enjoy the challenge of resource management and community growth as you embark on this engaging strategic journey.

items.title: Survivor: Space Battle
items.description: Survivor: Space Battle is a horde survival game where you go into a perilous realm where every choice shapes your fate. Traverse dense forests, desolate islands, and unforgiving deserts, encountering deadly creatures and hostile elements. Your adaptability and resourcefulness are key as you scavenge for sustenance. Will you form alliances or engage in battle? Craft weapons wisely; each decision determines survival. Experience stunning graphics and intense soundscapes; ready for the ultimate challenge?

items.title: Sushi Break Dash
items.description: Sushi Break Dash is a casual game where you shoot the sushi blocks to break them. The more blocks you break, the higher your score. As you progress through levels, you can earn more balls and upgrade various skills with coins to help you advance further.

items.title: Sushi Go
items.description: Sushi Go! is a charming culinary adventure where you merge sushi pieces into mouthwatering creations and race against time to satisfy hungry guests. Manage orders, decorate your cozy restaurant, and upgrade your kitchen to keep customers happy. With every perfectly crafted roll, you’re one step closer to becoming a sushi master.

items.title: Sweet Shop 3D
items.description: Sweet Shop 3D is a fun arcade game where you manage your own sweet shop. Sell all kinds of exciting sweet treats to your customers while expanding your sweet shop and hiring new workers.

items.title: Sweety Ludo
items.description: Sweety Ludo is a charming blend of the traditional Ludo game with adorable 2D visuals. Challenge friends or global players in exciting multiplayer matches to collect candies and reign supreme!

items.title: Swing Monkey
items.description: Swing Monkey is a one-button monkey swinging game to reach the finish line successfully. This game is inspired by Stickman Hook.

items.title: Swing Monster: Decisive Battle
items.description: Swing Monster: Decisive Battle is an action-packed game where you take on the role of a fearless Webmaster, swinging through levels and taking down monstrous enemies. Use silk shots to defeat foes across multiple floors, mastering both strategy and precision. Every battle challenges your agility and reflexes in this high-flying adventure filled with nonstop excitement.

items.title: Switch!
items.description: Switch! is a fast-paced action game with one-touch gameplay. You must switch from wall to wall to avoid oncoming objects and collect stars to increase your score. Collecting 5 stars in a row will make you invincible for a short time. As you progress, the gameplay changes, getting faster and harder. The longer you last, the better your score. With appealing graphics and endless gameplay, Switch! will keep you entertained for hours.

items.title: Switch Wheel: Race Master
items.description: Switch Wheel is a casual race where strategy is key. Navigate diverse roads with a selection of powerful cars, speedy motorcycles, and agile helicopters. Tap the screen to switch vehicles, each offering a unique advantage. Earn coins, level up, and customize your wheels for an edge. Race against time and opponents in this challenging game with super easy controls. Prove you're number one in Switch Wheel's competitive battles!

items.title: Sworded io - Spin and Rub
items.description: Sworded io - Spin and Rub is a fast-paced arcade sword-fighting game where you’ll test your reflexes, tactics, and timing against waves of fierce opponents. Upgrade your fighter, unleash spells, and conquer battle arenas through pure skill and clever strategy.

items.title: Table Tower Online
items.description: Table Tower Online is a casual game where you draw your block out with care, balance it accurately, and celebrate victory when your opponent knocks the tower over. You have 54 blocks assembled into a tower. How long can you last?

items.title: Tall.io
items.description: Tall.io is a thrilling and addictive game where you fight to be the tallest stickman in the arena! Collect bricks of your color to grow taller while dodging obstacles and other stickmen that are taller than you. Run through gates and smash trees to gain more height. Progress by conquering each arena!

items.title: Tank Masters - Idle Tanks
items.description: Tank Masters - Idle Tanks is a casual game where you'll dive into the heart of epic tank battles. Take full control of your tank's trajectory, strategically plan your shots, and dominate the battlefield as you face off against formidable enemies!

items.title: Tanks Merge
items.description: Tanks Merge is a thrilling real-time strategy game that requires quick thinking and strategic planning to defeat enemy forces. Your mission is to combine and control your tanks and artillery to conquer your opponents and advance to the next level. With various tanks at your disposal, from standard bullets to powerful atomic missiles, assemble a formidable army to crush the enemy. React fast and think strategically to emerge victorious on this epic battlefield.

items.title: Tap 'n Cut
items.description: Tap 'n Cut is a fun arcade game where you can upgrade your weapon and use power-ups to slice everything around.

items.title: Tap Supermarket
items.description: Tap Supermarket is a simulation game to manage the grocery store. Check out customers, keep the store stocked, expand your inventory and keep the business running smoothly!

items.title: Tap Tap Goose
items.description: Tap Tap Goose is an arcade game where you have to help a bird navigate an endless world full of challenges and obstacles. With a simple one-tap mechanic, make your way through ever-changing levels and put your skills to the test. Compete against friends on leaderboards, engage in multiplayer matches, and push your limits in this action-packed and addictive game.

items.title: Tapdown Dungeon
items.description: Tapdown Dungeon is a strategic puzzle adventure where every click reveals a new risk or reward. Uncover hidden tiles to find treasure, powerful gear, and lurking monsters. Locate the key to descend deeper into the dungeon—but beware, one wrong move could be your last. How far will your strategy and courage take you?

items.title: Taxi Rush
items.description: Taxi Rush is a driving simulation game where you race through city streets to deliver clients swiftly and safely. Navigate dense traffic, avoid roadblocks, and manage unique passenger demands to earn rewards. Upgrade and customize your taxi, strategize your routes, and climb the leaderboard to become the ultimate taxi driver in this dynamic urban adventure.

items.title: Taxi Tycoon: Idle Business
items.description: Taxi Tycoon: Idle Business is a business simulation game where you will be able to create and manage your own taxi company. Take customers through the streets of the city, hire additional drivers, and upgrade your taxi fleet to earn more money. Open new areas and expand your business and become the biggest and most successful taxi operator in the city. With an intuitive interface and impressive graphics, this business simulation game will give you a captivating and realistic experience. As the owner of a taxi company, you will have to make important decisions to make the business thrive. You will need to hire new drivers to help you efficiently take customers to their destinations, upgrade your taxi fleet to provide customers with a quality experience, and open new areas to expand your business. Additionally, this game will be a challenge and an adventure as you will compete with other taxi operators to see who can make the most profit and become the most successful taxi operator in the city.

items.title: TCG Shop: Cards, Toys and Comics
items.description: TCG Shop: Cards, Toys and Comics is a casual simulation game where you run a fan-fueled store packed with collectibles, comics, and TCG cards. Manage shelves, handle sales, deliver orders, and grow your business into a geek paradise. Unlock upgrades, hire staff, and strategize your way to becoming a legendary merchant in this blend of tycoon, clicker, and management gameplay.

items.title: Teacher Simulator
items.description: Teacher Simulator is a fun simulation game in which you play the role of a teacher. Mark exams and ensure the kids are on their best behavior. You may be or have been a student, but now you get to be the one in charge!

items.title: Teeth Runner
items.description: Teeth Runner is an arcade game to brush the teeth of humans, zombies, vampires, and muchachos. They all require different ingredients to be used for their teeth, so be careful and pick the right toothpaste for them!

items.title: Telekinesis Race 3D
items.description: Telekinesis Race 3D is an engaging arcade game with a unique twist - superhuman abilities. The primary objective of the game is to engage in combat and destruction. Using your telekinetic powers, you can throw objects at enemies, lift and toss foes, and even interact with environmental elements to defeat adversaries. The game encourages creative use of telekinesis to overcome challenges and progress through the levels.

items.title: Tenkyu Ball
items.description: Tenkyu Ball is a physics-based puzzle game where you must guide a ball to its target without letting it fall. Use precise timing, clever strategy, and quick reflexes to overcome tricky obstacles. Each level presents new challenges that test your skill and patience. Can you master the path and complete every stage without dropping the ball?

items.title: Terraforma
items.description: Terraforma is an idle building game where you build and grow your land by placing blocks & buildings while carefully planning your placements and making your own little world. Every block will generate points, and some will be affected by nearby tiles. Buy cards, place blocks, and grow your world.

items.title: Idle Army: Battle for the Lands
items.description: Idle Army: Battle for the Lands is a strategic battle game where you lead an army of fighters to claim victory and conquer territories. Upgrade your units' attack, defense, and speed to strengthen your forces. Use tactical decisions to outsmart enemies, earn rewards, and unlock new levels. Prove your skills as a commander in this thrilling adventure!

items.title: The Bottle Boy
items.description: The Bottle Boy is a 3D puzzle platformer game where friendship is at the heart of every challenge! You play as a groovy, breakdancing Glass Bottle with a mission: to save Corky the Dog from a looming tsunami. To rescue your best friend, you'll need to fill up with water, solve math and logic puzzles, and dance your way through obstacles across a vibrant, hip-hop-inspired world. Along the way, collect photos to exchange at the HIP STYLE HOP STORE and unlock cool new looks. Get ready for a journey filled with love, puzzles, and endless style!

items.title: The Farmer
items.description: The Farmer is a farm management game that lets you take care of a farm by planting different fruits and vegetables, as well as taking care of chickens for their eggs. You make money off of the land, and you use that money to make the land prosper - which in turn makes more money for you.

items.title: The Idiot Test
items.description: The Idiot Test is the first instalment of this fun and entertaining game. In this game, you must progress through various levels of idiocy and prove that you actually have some mental brain power! Answer a range of logical and tricky questions to progress through the game and reach higher and more prestigious levels of idiot!

items.title: The Impossible Game
items.description: The Impossible Game is exactly what you would expect - a challenging game of skill, timing and precision in which you must control a square and attempt to jump over various objects at high speeds. Your square moves automatically and you simply control the jumping motion - you must time your jumps perfectly to avoid the various obstacles on each level.

items.title: The Most Addicting Sheep Game
items.description: The Most Addicting Sheep is a charming rhythm platformer game where you run, jump, and roll in sync with the beat through delightfully tricky levels. With simple controls, upbeat music, and adorable visuals, timing is everything - nail every move to master the rhythm and chase high scores. It’s irresistibly fun, deceptively challenging, and yes, it stars one seriously cute sheep. Do the right action at the right time for maximum score!

items.title: The Secret Service
items.description: The Secret Service is a quirky simulation game where you take on the role of a Secret Service agent tasked with protecting the president. Ensure safety while pulling off hilarious pranks and enjoying behind-the-scenes antics. Stay sharp, stay stealthy, and add a dose of humor to high-stakes security duty!

items.title: The Waitress
items.description: The Waitress is a classic arcade game where you play as a waitress in a distinctly average cafe. Take orders from customers and do it fast to keep them happy!

items.title: Thread Master: ASMR Embroidery
items.description: Thread Master: ASMR Embroidery is a soothing creative game that lets you unwind as you stitch detailed patterns with precision and care. You’ll craft beautiful designs while enjoying a calming, sensory-rich experience. Let each thread guide your focus, helping you relax and express your artistic side in a peaceful, meditative flow.

items.title: Through the Wall
items.description: Through the Wall is a creative puzzle game where strategy meets humor. Guide your stick figure through moving walls by striking the perfect poses to fit each opening. Every level introduces fresh challenges that test your timing, precision, and problem-solving skills, making for a fun and uniquely entertaining experience.

items.title: Tile Craft 3D
items.description: Tile Craft 3D is a fun coloring game where you stack tiles to create beautiful artwork. Match the numbers on the floor design to complete each masterpiece! Collect coins to upgrade your skills and hire helpers to speed up the painting process. As you lay down tiles, pick up coins and upgrade your abilities at the Upgrade Center. Reach level 5 to hire helpers and become a master tile crafter!

items.title: Tile Guru
items.description: Tile Guru is a casual puzzle tile-matching game that combines mental sharpness with relaxation. Spend just 10 minutes a day matching vibrant 3D tiles and finding new fruit designs while mastering strategic match flips. With its unique puzzlescapes, escalating challenges, and a serene zen-inspired color palette, this game offers a perfect blend of brain training and tranquility, making it your ideal daily escape.

items.title: Tile Journey
items.description: Tile Journey is a Match 3 puzzle game that tests your strategic skills. Take advantage of the seven empty slots to match three of the same tiles. But, be careful because failing to make a trio in all slots will end the game!

items.title: Tile Jumper 3D
items.description: Tile Jumper 3D is a thrilling music game that tests your timing and reflexes. Leap across tiles in sync with the beat, aiming for precise jumps to keep the melody alive. Challenge yourself to reach higher scores while grooving to hit tracks. Compete on the leaderboard and show your rhythm skills: how far can you go?

items.title: Time Control!
items.description: Time Control! is a casual game where you can manipulate time. Use your time control skill to dodge the obstacles and complete the missions.

items.title: Tiny Fishing
items.description: Tiny Fishing is a fun fishing game where you draw your line and hook as many fish as possible. Each fish you catch on your line earns you money. Keep fishing to earn more coins and unlock upgrades!

items.title: Toilet Rush - Draw Puzzle
items.description: Toilet Rush - Draw Puzzle is acasual gamewhere the objective is to reach the toilet first. Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to connect the boy and girl with the porcelain throne using your amazing line-drawing skills. Look out for obstacles along the way!

items.title: Tong
items.description: Tong is a wild and fast-paced PvP food fight where you battle it out by licking everything in sight. Armed with your absurdly long tongue, compete in chaotic showdowns across grimy fast food joints to claim the golden crown. Customize your Tong with ridiculous hats, spray ketchup at foes, and uncover bizarre items in this hilarious, off-the-wall licking frenzy!

items.title: Tongits
items.description: Tongits is a three-player card game that is still in the Rummy family. The objective of the game is to empty your hand cards by forming sets(melds) or minimize the total score when a fight is called or when the central stack is empty. Each player will be dealt 12 cards while the dealer gets 13, and the rest of the cards are left as a draw card. The game begins when the dealer dumps a card. The next person can either pick up the disposed card if that card makes a set or adds to a set they already have or get one from the central stack. Collect hand combinations and dump unnecessary cards. The picking and discarding of cards goes on until someone wins by Tongits, calls a fight, or until the central stack runs out of cards. If this happens, the players tally the points of the cards they have in hand, and the one with the lowest wins. To call a fight, the player needs to put down a meld on the table, and no player drops any card on any of their melds in that round. If the player can use all of their cards in combinations by connecting to opponents’ or the exposed card sets, or if the player gets rid of all their cards, then the player wins by Tongits. Have fun with your friends, enjoy exciting moments, and relieve your stress every day!

items.title: Toonle
items.description: Toonle is a creative drawing game that lets you bring your animation ideas to life. Design smooth, frame-by-frame animations using intuitive tools, a variety of brushes, and custom color palettes. Share your creations with friends and explore a vibrant community of animators. Watch inspiring content, learn new techniques through the built-in tutorial, and grow your skills as you animate, play, and connect.

items.title: Top Pizza
items.description: Top Pizza is a casual game where you step into the shoes of a pizza maestro. Your goal: master the art of crafting pizzas within a time crunch. Conquer levels, rake in cash, and splurge on game-changing upgrades. Aim to be the ultimate chef, unlocking a slew of achievements along the way. Are you ready to rise to the top and create the perfect pizza empire?

items.title: ToT or Trivia
items.description: ToT or Trivia is a quiz game featuring and game modes. In both modes, you must answer correctly to climb the money ladder. Use your prize money to buy skins in the shop and have fun answering the quiz questions!

items.title: Tow N Go
items.description: Tow N Go is a thrilling game where you hit the road and become the coolest truck driver. Your mission is to tow cars parked in "No parking" areas and collect as many as you can at once. But beware! It's not an easy job. Avoid crashing into trains or other cars on the road. The more cars you collect, the richer you become. Challenge yourself in this exciting towing adventure and make loads of money today!

items.title: Tower Crush
items.description: Tower Crush is a tower battle game in which you can customize and build the best tower to destroy your opponents.

items.title: Tower Crash 3D
items.description: Tower Crash 3D is an exciting casual game that challenges you to demolish towering structures! With physics-based 3D gameplay, only the most skilled crashers can conquer all the towers. Explore beautifully designed levels and shapes, wasting no time in becoming the ultimate tower crasher. Strategize to collapse towers using the given balls, targeting shapes with matching colors to your ball. Unleash the power of earthquake or shotgun power-ups to trigger massive chain reactions, ultimately bringing the towers to their destruction.

items.title: Tower Defense
items.description: Tower Defense is a casual game where strategic prowess is put to the test as you build walls, erect towers, and expand your kingdom to defend against relentless hordes of enemies. As the ruler of your realm, you must harness your resources wisely, fortify your defenses, and lead your forces to victory against the encroaching threat. Are you ready to rise to the challenge and safeguard your kingdom from destruction?

items.title: Tower Defense - Alien Invasion
items.description: Tower Defense Alien Invasion is a strategy-packed defense game where you protect Earth from relentless extraterrestrial threats. Place and upgrade towers with unique abilities, build smart formations, and adapt your tactics to withstand tougher waves. Every battle tests your planning and resource management as you fight to hold the line and save humanity from invasion.

items.title: Tower Defense Clash
items.description: Tower Defense Clash is a casual tower defense game where you protect a castle from the persistent attack of outsiders. Place your turrets, upgrade them, and keep the horde away from the castle. Progress through the unique levels. It's all about thinking ahead!

items.title: Tower Defense.io
items.description: Tower Defense.io is a strategic tower defense game where you protect your cave from relentless waves of enemies. Place and upgrade towers like Archers and Flame Towers to fend off unique creeps. Uncover new territories, defeat bosses, and unlock resources as you progress. Can you withstand the assault and become the ultimate defender?

items.title: Tower Jam 3D
items.description: Tower Jam 3D is an addictive match-3 puzzle game where you must clear blocks from a colorful tower while keeping it stable! This twist on classic match-3 gameplay combines the excitement of block matching with the strategy of tower stacking. Clear blocks by creating color matches without causing the tower to topple, and climb through progressively challenging levels as you master this balance.

items.title: Towering Trials
items.description: Towering Trials is an engaging vertical-scrolling platformer that challenges players to jump, dash, and fly to the finish line across various levels. This game blends creativity with skill, making it a perfect pick for platformer enthusiasts who enjoy challenging gameplay and the freedom to create and share custom content.

items.title: Tracesoccer
items.description: Tracesoccer is a modern adaptation of the classic pen-and-paper strategy game, also known as paper soccer or paper hockey. It blends strategic planning with the thrill of competition in a turn-based format, offering exciting gameplay for both casual players and competitive strategists. Whether you’re playing against friends, AI, or online opponents, the challenge is to outmaneuver your rival to score the winning goal!

items.title: Trading Card Store Simulator
items.description: Trading Card Store Simulator is a dynamic game where you manage your own card shop, stocking shelves with rare cards and enticing collectors with competitive pricing. Trade, collect, and organize your inventory while building powerful decks for exciting card battles. Grow your store into a hub for enthusiasts and create your legacy in the card trading world!

items.title: Traffic Cop 3D
items.description: Traffic Cop 3D is a casual game where you play as a police officer enforcing the law of the road. Scan nearby drivers and use intel from the police database to decide whether you should pull them over, or let them go, all while progressing through the story and increasing your duties as a cop.

items.title: Traffic Loop
items.description: Traffic Loop is an idle game where you can earn money from the traffic. Morning traffic is usually the worst thing in the world, but now you have a chance to get an advantage of it! Buy cars and merge them together to create a better car. Better cars mean more money, plus merging cars together can also reduce traffic. All you need to do is to create traffic, merge cars, build roads, and keep the money flowing. Be the traffic tycoon and earn unimaginable amounts of money!

items.title: Train Adventure
items.description: Train Adventure is a casual game where you arm a train with weapons and seek out resources. Shoot down enemies along the way and collect as much as possible!

items.title: Train Drift
items.description: Train Drift is a casual drifting game combining the excitement of arcade drifting with the unconventional world of train driving. From executing extreme drifts to engaging in thrilling clashes with other trains, players are in for an adrenaline-fueled ride. The diverse selection of trains, captivating locations, and challenging tracks contribute to the overall appeal of the game. If you're ready to master the art of drifting on iron horses, hop aboard and embark on an unforgettable train drifting adventure!

items.title: Crazy Train Snake
items.description: In Train Snake, you need to pick-up passengers and deliver them safely to their destinations without hitting any obstacle.

items.title: Trash Cafe
items.description: Trash Cafe is a quirky café simulation where you’re a clever cat running a junkyard café for hungry pigeons. Dive into a world of scraps, strategy, and squawking customers as you turn trash into tasty (well, kind of) treats.

items.title: Trash Factory
items.description: Trash Factory is a fun-filled game where you assist adorable trash pandas in sorting garbage into the right bins. These raccoons rely on you to keep their world clean! Beware, though; if you make mistakes, your boss won't be pleased, and your job will be on the line. Get ready to embark on a trashy adventure and save the day for these mischievous raccoons!

items.title: Travel Tile
items.description: Travel Tile is a mind-sharpening game where you match tiles and solve puzzles daily. Engage in 3D matching puzzles to enhance your memory and intelligence. Overcome obstacles like Ice, Chain, and Glue while building and exploring unique towns. Perfect for puzzle enthusiasts seeking a relaxing yet challenging experience.

items.title: Treasure Champion: Chest Capture
items.description: Treasure Champion: Chest Capture is an action-packed team game where stickmen compete to seize treasure! Your mission is to capture the chest at the center of the field and work with your team to bring it back to base while dodging traps and outsmarting opponents. Every successfully delivered chest earns points, and the intense gameplay keeps you on edge until the very last second.

items.title: Treasure Tails
items.description: Treasure Tails is a colorful village-building game that follows the mischievous cat Ziggy on his hunt for coins. Launch your way through playful levels, gather treasures, and construct vibrant villages as you chase the jackpot. With each adventure, Ziggy’s journey brings new surprises, challenges, and plenty of shiny rewards to collect.

items.title: Treasures Merge
items.description: Treasures Merge is a chaotic and shiny merge puzzle where loot rains down and your inner hoarder goes wild. Smash together coins, gems, goblets, and bizarre trinkets to unlock even weirder treasures. But be careful—stack too high and your vault explodes! With juicy 3D visuals and satisfying clinks, it's a frantic race to legendary loot before your greed buries you.

items.title: Trucks Race
items.description: Trucks Race is an arcade game where your job is to move the cargo as fast as possible. Your goal is to deliver all goods to the consignee as fast as possible. As you progress, you'll earn money and level up, unlocking new roads to explore. Test your skills on the highway as you take on challenging delivery missions. Get ready for a thrilling trucking experience!

items.title: True Love Calculator
items.description: True Love Calculator is a free love calculator that analyses your compatibility with a crush. Fill out your and another person’s name to get the result you’ve been waiting for. Be prepared for the unexpected!

items.title: Tube Jumpers
items.description: Tube Jumpers is a local multiplayer that can be played with up to 4 people. In the game you have to make sure to stay on your floating tube. Rocks, balls, and even sharks will jump out of the water and hit you. It's your task to make sure you land back on the tube when you're catapulted into the air.

items.title: Tung Tung Sahur: Obby Challenge
items.description: Tung Tung Sahur: Obby Challenge is a wild parkour platformer that throws you into the chaotic world of Italian Brainrot memes. Take on the role of the legendary meme icon Tung Tung Sahur and race through hilarious, trap-filled obstacle courses. Inspired by viral TikTok madness, every jump, dodge, and fall brings unexpected laughs and nonstop absurdity!

items.title: Tunnel Runner
items.description: Tunnel Runner is a level-based runner-avoid game and the follow-up to Rage Quit Racer. Race at breakneck speeds through tunnels and along pipes avoiding all in your path. Collect shields to absorb damage and use them wisely. Over 1000 levels of increasing difficulty.

items.title: Turbo Dismounting
items.description: The stickman is here once again for an experiment in Turbo Dismounting. This time, you need to do as much damage as possible to the stickman before he lands permanently. Earn money to spend on more maps and vehicles. See how many damage points you can rack up!

items.title: TV Invasion
items.description: TV Invasion is an arcade game where you take control of a character who is being attacked by dangerous TVs. You must use your TV remote control to defend yourself and defeat the TVs. As you progress through the levels, the TVs become more challenging to defeat, and you will need to use different strategies to win. How long can you survive the TV invasion?

items.title: Twerk Race 3d - Fun Run Game!
items.description: Twerk Race 3d - Fun Run Game! is a quirky blend of racing and dancing where your eating choices shape your performance. Sprint across colorful tracks, dodge obstacles, and collect food to transform your physique—light snacks keep you slim and speedy, while heavier bites bulk you up for the final showdown. Finish the run with an epic twerk battle to claim victory in this hilarious race-meets-dance adventure.

items.title: Uncle Hit: Punch the Dummy
items.description: Uncle Hit: Punch the Dummy is a fast-paced action game where you take out your frustration on a relentless, annoying dummy. With quick reflexes and nonstop punches, you’ll unleash a flurry of blows in simple, satisfying bursts. Stay sharp, keep hitting, and enjoy every moment of chaotic stress relief wrapped in hilarious impact.

items.title: Underbite: Rat Rumble Idle War
items.description: Underbite: Rat Rumble Idle War is an idle battler set in a secret rodent civilization hidden within an old attic, now torn apart by an endless war. Command the Wheel Alliance’s front line and battle against the dark magic of the Order of the Rusty Trap, a ruthless faction bent on total domination.

items.title: Unicorn Kingdom Merge
items.description: Unicorn Kingdom Merge Stickers is a delightful casual game where you play as unicorns in their magical kingdoms, collect gems, merge them, and win stickers to decorate your album. Choose your favorite unicorn, Arya, Canelita, or Candy, and have fun collecting gems and completing your sticker album.

items.title: Used Car Dealer Tycoon
items.description: Used Car Dealer Tycoon is a captivating simulation game where you take on the challenge of running a used car business from the ground up. Your success hinges on your ability to maintain an honest reputation as a dealer. Make strategic decisions, negotiate fair deals, and provide top-notch customer service to keep your business thriving. Build a reputable brand and become the go-to destination for quality used cars. Are you ready to prove yourself as an honest and successful car dealer?

items.title: Vacuum Hero: Mafia Murder
items.description: Vacuum Hero: Mafia Murder is a casual game where you play as a little innocent robot vacuum cleaner that turns out to be a killing machine! You have to kill every single mafia in the room to pass the level. If they see the evil side of yours, they will chase and kill you! Move wisely and sneak into the hall, surprise and kill them in different ways. Vacuum all their money and run to the elevator. It is up to you whether you want to clean the murder mess or not! You can support the developer's social media channels onTwitterandYouTube.

items.title: Vikings: An Archer's Journey
items.description: Vikings: An Archer's Journey is a dynamic mix of a shoot 'em up and infinite runner game with a minimalist graphic style. Play as Nott, a skilled Valkyrie archer, on a quest to rescue her wolf, Oder, from the Underworld. Master simple controls, collect power-ups, and team up with Viking heroes to defeat monsters from Nordic legends in this challenging adventure.

items.title: Village of Heroes: Roguelike TD
items.description: Village of Heroes: Roguelike TD is a roguelike tower defense game that blends strategic gameplay with thrilling adventure. Assemble a team of legendary heroes to defend your village from relentless monster invasions. Choose from various heroes, each with unique abilities and roles. Place your heroes wisely and manage your resources to survive against the odds. Build and upgrade your village to unlock new heroes and enhance your defenses. Enjoy the unpredictable and ever-changing challenges that make each run unique. Experience the strategic depth of placing and upgrading your heroes to fend off relentless enemies. Have fun on an unforgettable adventure! Defend your village, recruit legendary heroes, and conquer the monstrous hordes today!

items.title: Virtual Online Piano
items.description: Virtual Online Piano is exactly what you would expect - a virtual representation of a full-sized digital keyboard that you can play to your heart's content. This is a great way to learn music and to have some fun trying out different songs.Can't play piano? We've got you covered. Check outFriday Night Funkin'and put your keyboarding skills to the test!.

items.title: War Nations.io
items.description: War Nations.io is a real-time multiplayer game. Compete with other players to conquer the map, using simple drag-and-drop controls to lead your troops into battle. Send more attackers than your opponent's defenders to claim victory and be the last nation standing. With 2-4 players in each room and endless rooms to join, customize your nickname and avatar, and show your strategic prowess in this thrilling war game.

items.title: War of Mine
items.description: War of Mine is a captivating 2D side-camera game inspired by the iconic Minecraft theme, reimagined with unique gameplay mechanics and a strategic progression system. As a resourceful adventurer, you’ll embark on an epic journey through diverse maps and levels, battling waves of enemies in an auto-battle system where tactical preparation and smart upgrades are the keys to survival.

items.title: War Sea
items.description: War Sea is an exhilarating battle game where you take command of a battle raft to obliterate your foes. Enhance your raft's combat prowess by expanding its size, recruiting and upgrading units, and utilizing powerful bonuses. Engage in epic maritime warfare and become the master of the high seas in this thrilling adventure.

items.title: Water Pool Heroes.io
items.description: Water Pool Heroes.io is an addictive arcade game where you swim around in a pool filled with rubber ducks. Collect rubber ducks and power-ups to grow bigger, and take down the other stickmen using your tail. Watch out for the tails of your opponents, though, as they can knock you out too!

items.title: Water vs Fire
items.description: Water vs Fire is a fun and fast-paced action game where your goal is to keep the flames under control! Spray water to damp down fires, collect coins as you play, and upgrade your abilities to take on even bigger blazes. With each upgrade, your character grows stronger, making it easier to face tougher challenges and keep the fire at bay. Stay sharp, act fast, and enjoy the thrill of battling fire with water!

items.title: Watermelon Balls
items.description: Watermelon Balls is an arcade game with the challenge of fruit merging. With its refreshing theme and various game modes, it provides players with an engaging and enjoyable experience. Whether you're looking for a quick and fun gaming session or aiming to beat your own high scores, this fruity adventure offers a delightful escape into the world of watermelons and fruit merging!

items.title: Capy Merge: Animal Drop Puzzle
items.description: Capy Merge: Animal Drop Puzzle is a vibrant merging adventure where you combine quirky animals, from cheeky capybaras to adorable kittens, in strategic and entertaining ways. With delightful animations, charming sound effects, and challenging mechanics to keep the container from overflowing, every move brings joy and laughter. Explore, merge, and discover endless amusement with trending creatures!

items.title: Waterworks!
items.description: Waterworks! is a card-based strategy game with a mission to maintain good water supply and develop the medieval town of Grudziadz.

items.title: Weapons and Ragdolls
items.description: Weapons and Ragdolls is an action-packed game featuring stickman characters and realistic physics. Use a wide range of weapons, from explosives to swords and firearms, while upgrading your arsenal to take on tougher challenges. Face diverse enemies, utilize slow-motion dodging, and enjoy randomly generated battles with increasing difficulty. Each fight offers a chance to refine your combat skills and try different strategies. Get ready for endless action and excitement!

items.title: Web Slinging Race
items.description: Web Slinging Race is a casualone-button gamewhere you can show off your super spider abilities. The better you are at swinging, the faster you go. Save people by stopping the train from falling off the cliff using your web. Master the web-swinging and get your crown!

items.title: Western Farm
items.description: Western Farm is a farming simulator game where country life meets adventure and business! Build and manage your very own big Western farm — from seeding wheat fields to raising animals, fishing, chopping trees, and expanding your territory. Whether you're a farmer boy or girl, this fun and addictive game brings the farming dream to life! Jump into Western Farm and discover how fun farming can truly be.

items.title: Where's My Pizza?
items.description: Where's My Pizza? is a fun casual game where your job is to create, cook and deliver pizzas to your hungry patrons! The journey is not always an easy one. Try not to lose any pizzas (or your head!) If you make a safe delivery, you'll get handsomely rewarded. Customers love to give big tips if the pizzas are cooked to their high expectations. Once your revenue is flowing, it's time to buy new ingredients, bigger ovens, and more pizza trailers for your bike so you can be the biggest pizza powerhouse in town!

items.title: Whooo?
items.description: Whooo? It's everyone’s favorite online guessing game! Use the process of elimination to guess who your opponent is holding. Play against various characters and unlock new face cards as you progress!

items.title: Wild Archer: Castle Defense
items.description: Wild Archer: Castle Defense is a casual game where you are the last surviving archer hero and defender of your kingdom, embark on an epic journey to reclaim your castle, rescue the princess, and restore your empire to its former glory! Face relentless waves of invaders, expand your castle, and build a formidable defense to thwart your enemies. Are you ready to defend your walls and restore glory to your realm?

items.title: Wild Ranch: Business Simulator
items.description: Wild Ranch: Business Simulator is a tycoon game with time management elements where you build your factory empire in the wild west. Fight for the best land, and build farms, mills, bakeries, and sawmills. With each new level, build more and more technological production chains!

items.title: Wildlife Haven: Sandbox Safari
items.description: Wildlife Haven: Sandbox Safari is a management simulation game where you can save endangered animals and help them thrive! In this adorable and colorful game, you'll take on the role of a wildlife rescuer and work to build a sanctuary for animals in need.

items.title: Winterbells
items.description: Winterbells is a jumping game with a Christmas theme. In this game, you'll become a rabbit and jump over the bells or birds to get scores.

items.title: Pop! Pow! Witch Pong!
items.description: Pop! Pow! Witch Pong! is a spellbinding fusion of brick-breaker chaos and roguelike strategy where you play as a powerful witch launching enchanted balls to shatter monster-shaped blocks. Level up with random skills, equip magical gear, and dive into ever-changing battles. With eerie visuals and endless upgrade paths, each run offers a fresh and wickedly fun challenge.

items.title: Wood Cutter - Saw
items.description: Wood Cutter - Saw is a puzzle game where you cut wood into various shapes using a saw. Move the dots of the saw until they are aligned with the shape and watch the saw tear through each wooden block!

items.title: Wood Farmer
items.description: Wood Farmer is a casual sim game where you can mine, build, and explore various islands. Collect materials from around the world and use them to build an island paradise in this visually beautiful 3D game.

items.title: Word Fishing
items.description: Word Fishing is a casual and relaxing word game that is easy to pick up and play. Cast your net and reel in words! Push and collect letters to complete words in this relaxing yet strategic word game. With limited moves and time, every choice matters. Score big and climb the leaderboards!

items.title: Wordling
items.description: Wordling is a brain-teasing word game where you guess hidden words in four, five, or six-letter challenges. With daily puzzles, unlimited mode, and varying difficulty levels, you’ll sharpen your vocabulary, test your logic and enjoy a relaxing mental break. Challenge yourself or friends and master each clue, one letter at a time.

items.title: World Survivors
items.description: World Survivors is an intense roguelike game where you fight to survive waves of relentless enemies. As you battle through hordes, collect Legendary Cards to unlock powerful abilities and upgrades, helping you grow stronger with each encounter. Your goal is to become the ultimate Survivor Viking, mastering the chaos and proving your might. Can you outlast the enemies and claim your place at the top?

items.title: WorldGuessr Free GeoGuessr
items.description: Worldguessr is a casual quiz game, a free alternative to Geoguessr, perfect for testing and expanding your geography skills through immersive Street View exploration. Each round, you will find yourself dropped into random locations around the globe, with only environmental clues to guide you in pinpointing your exact whereabouts. From cityscapes to rural roads, your surroundings become the puzzle pieces you need to analyze, turning each game into a thrilling geographical investigation.

items.title: X Trench Run
items.description: X Trench Run is a fast-paced arcade game, just likeJet Rush. In this game, you pilot a space fighter that needs to avoid obstacles and destroy enemies, including the bosses.

items.title: Yokai Party
items.description: Yokai Party is an idle collection game where you gather playful Yokai and watch them earn coins while you’re away. Form contracts with new Yokai to boost your earnings and grow your parade. The more you collect, the livelier your Yokai celebration becomes—sit back, relax, and let the mischief turn into fortune.

items.title: Yokai Slayer
items.description: Yokai Slayer is a roguelike arcade RPG bursting with mystical action and Japanese folklore charm. Harness sacred charms and ancient powers to slash, blast, and ricochet through waves of mischievous spirits across shrines, forests, and castles. Upgrade your talismans, discover new combos each run, and face unique yokai like kappas and oni in endlessly replayable, fast-paced adventures.

items.title: Your Majesty - Build & Conquer
items.description: Your Majesty - Build & Conquer is a strategic empire-building game where you restore a realm from ruins to glory. Gather resources, trade goods, and construct vital buildings to fuel your economy. Train warriors to conquer new territories and expand your dominion. Rebuild, grow, and dominate in a game that blends tactical conquest with economic mastery.

items.title: Yummy Super Pizza
items.description: Yummy Super Pizza is a fun cooking game to make delicious pizzas. Making pizza has never been more fun! This game lets you make delicious pizzas by adding the ingredients for the dough, cooking the sauce, adding various toppings, and baking them. The best part is after you make a pizza, you can serve it to your customers, don't let them wait too long!

items.title: Yummy Waffle Ice Cream
items.description: Are you a waffle lover? Are you an ice cream lover? This game is perfect for you. Let's make a waffle and decorate it with ice cream and any kind of fruits and syrups. Be a waffle maker!

items.title: Zombie Island Survival
items.description: Zombie Island Survival lets you experience life as a zombie stranded on a deserted island, where survival is your main goal! In this unique twist on the survival genre, you’ll explore mysterious landscapes, gather vital resources, and rescue other zombie relatives scattered across the island. Build your zombie family and uncover the secrets of the island as you adapt to its challenges.

items.title: Zombie Raft
items.description: Zombie Raft is a zombiesurvival gamewhere you scavenge, expand, and survive on a raft against a relentless horde of zombies! Move forward and collect resources to expand your raft.

items.title: Zombies Attack Idle
items.description: Zombies Attack Idle is a zombie game where you will play as an anti-hero and have to kill all humans. You are the captain of the dead creatures, and you need to lead the zombies to attack humans. Collect brains to upgrade yourself and make your zombie army stronger. Be the reason for the extinction of humanity.

items.title: Zombo Buster Advance
items.description: Zombo Buster Advance is a defense game where you must protect the entrance gate from hordes of relentless zombies. Strategically position your troops, upgrade their skills, and utilize powerful gadgets to fend off the undead invasion. Show your tactical prowess and save humanity from the impending doom. Can you survive the zombie onslaught?

items.title: Zoo - Happy Animals
items.description: Zoo – Happy Animals is a zoo simulator game where you need to complete a series of everyday zoo-related tasks to progress to the next level. Be careful, though, because if you're timing is off, you may find yourself in trouble.

items.title: Zoo Island
items.description: Zoo Island is a fun and immersive zoo management game. Build and manage your own zoo choosing from a wide variety of animals. Take care of your animals and feed them, so that they are happy and healthy. You can also explore the island, discovering new rare animals and earning rewards. Become the best zoo manager ever! Please note that visitors will only donate coins if the animals are well-fed.

items.title: ZooCraft
items.description: Zoocraft is a casual game that provides you with the opportunity to build and manage your own zoo. The game allows you to create a vibrant and diverse world filled with a wide range of animal species. With Zoocraft, you'll embark on a journey to tame animals, enhance your skills, construct aviaries, and explore various regions across the globe.

items.title: Zooma Marble Quest 3D
items.description: Zooma Marble Quest 3D is a captivating modern twist on the classic marble shooter genre, delivering hours of addictive fun with its vibrant visuals and engaging gameplay. Master two dynamic game modes, and tackle progressively challenging puzzles that test your reflexes and strategy. This game offers a perfect blend of nostalgia and innovation for fans of marble-shooting adventures!

items.title: Alchemy Merge Clicker
items.description: Alchemy Merge Clicker is a clicker game where you become a master alchemist by combining fire, water, earth, and air. Tap to create basic elements and merge them to discover hundreds of unique combinations. Utilize upgrades and the prestige system to enhance your alchemy, collect achievements, and fill your collection with endless possibilities. Embark on your alchemical journey today!

items.title: Angles
items.description: Angles is a clicker game with a goal to get as many angles as possible. For each angle you pass, you get a little more points than the previous one. When the total number of points exceeds a certain value, you will open up the opportunity to commit prestige. The prestige points multiply your income by themselves. You can also use Motivation: the more motivation, the faster you pass angles.

items.title: Animal Zoo Clicker
items.description: Animal Zoo Clicker is an idle clicker game where you can purchase animals, make them big, and sell them to get some money. Clicks on the animals and collect their gold poo to receive additional money. Oversee and expand your zoo, accumulate wealth, and be the richest!

items.title: Ants: Fruits
items.description: Ants: Fruits is a clicker game where you need to help a colony of ants to collect fruits. Click on the fruits to collect them faster and not wait for the ant to get to them. You can also use abilities, for example, there is the ability of a bee that flies out of an anthill and takes the fruit. The game has a variety of achievements that you can unlock as the game progress.

items.title: Asteroid Breaker
items.description: Asteroid Breaker is an idle defense game where your auto-firing turret takes on relentless waves of asteroids. Take control manually for precision shots, earn XP to unlock roguelite-style upgrades, and grow stronger with every wave. Use your earnings to advance a permanent skill tree and build a turret so powerful, no asteroid stands a chance.

items.title: Babel Tower
items.description: Babel Tower is a full-featured clicker-idle game with a mission to complete the Tower of Babel.

items.title: Ball Block Maze
items.description: Ball Block Maze is an innovative idle-merge game where you design the ultimate maze for balls. Arrange paths using various shapes and strategically merge them to create higher-level tiles. As balls navigate your creation, they activate special zones that generate income, adding a layer of economic strategy.

items.title: Ball Ring Destruction
items.description: Ball Ring Destruction is an idle-clicker game where you control powerful balls that shatter rotating rings with every bounce. Collect cash, unlock new balls like tennis or basketballs, and boost their strength, speed, and critical hit rate. Level up, smash tougher rings, and reset progress through prestige for bigger rewards. How far will your destruction streak go?

items.title: Battery Clicker
items.description: Battery Clicker is an incremental clicker game where you have to charge your batteries and get profit from it. Buy new chargers and charging stations for automatic charging. Become a millionaire, even just from an ordinary battery!

items.title: Battle Button Clicker
items.description: Battle Button Clicker is a clicker game with roguelike elements in it. Your goal is to level up by choosing the best card on each upgrade. Choose your upgrade card wisely since each decision can determine the outcome of your epic journey! You’ll face a new challenge and a variety of cards with unique abilities and bonuses. Combine them for powerful combos.

items.title: Battle of Knights: Robby and Dragons
items.description: Battle of Knights: Robby and Dragons is an engaging clicker game where you train your hero to grow stronger and defeat fierce enemies. Wield your sword and team up with companions to face thrilling battles. Strengthen your skills and overcome every challenge in your journey to victory!

items.title: Bees Clicker
items.description: Bees Clicker is a fun clicker game where your goal is to become a successful beekeeper and maximize your honey production. Click on bees to make them produce honey faster. The more you click, the more honey you collect. Sold the honey to earn money and use your money to improve your apiary and buy new types of bees. What are you waiting for? Start clicking and make your honey business become big!

items.title: Bird Flight Idle
items.description: Bird Flight Idle is a clicker game with stunning pixel art. Let's fly through the sky with your furry friend! Click your way into the clouds, earn coins, and unlock various upgrades. Purchase beautiful skyscapes and rare birds in this clicking adventure. Let's fly across the endless expanse of the sky!

items.title: BitCoiner
items.description: BitCoiner is an idle game where you build, upgrade, and merge your way to chip-powered success. Step into the vibrant Chip World and dive into an addictive simulation where every chip you place on the microcircuit brings you closer to fortune. Merge chips to craft more powerful versions, supercharge their output with the reactor, and watch your income increase. Combining clicker, simulation, and casual gameplay, BitCoiner delivers a relaxing yet strategic experience. It's perfect for players who want to unwind while growing their digital empire.

items.title: Blade of Dimensions
items.description: Blade of Dimensions is an engaging clicker adventure where you can level up your swords, battle endless waves of monsters, and evolve your blades with unique upgrades. Unlock a plethora of swords and discover a wide array of monstrous creatures through two encyclopedias. Complete the in-game tutorial to receive valuable rewards and swiftly grasp the game's fundamentals. Challenge yourself to unearth all four secret swords, a feat only a few will master.

items.title: Block Build Destroyer
items.description: Block Build Destroyer is an idle destruction game where you tear down houses using an expanding lineup of powerful weapons. Begin with basic dynamite and work your way up to swords, pickaxes, and more. Each house brings new challenges, while your auto-attacking arsenal earns resources for upgrades. Reset progress for bonuses and demolish even faster as you chase ultimate destruction!

items.title: Block City Clicker
items.description: Block City Clicker is a clicker game where you can build your city. Click to collect resources, and build new buildings such as houses, smelters, and mills. Improve and develop your city, complete tasks, and unlock new opportunities. Your city will become bigger and more beautiful, and you will receive new opportunities for its development. Good luck!

items.title: Block Clicker
items.description: Block Clicker is a clicker game that puts you in charge of a mining company. Your objective is to enhance miners' abilities to extract new block varieties and clear islands of older blocks. Acquire upgrades to boost productivity. Earn rewards and achievements upon task completion. The game's minimalist graphics keep you engaged, while ambient audio cues enhance the experience.

items.title: Block Destroyer
items.description: Block Destroyer is a clicker game where you enter the thrilling world of block destruction. Your mission? Obliterate blocks, accumulate wealth, and conquer formidable bosses using a variety of powerful tools and strategies. Let the demolition begin!

items.title: Block Shoot Clicker
items.description: Block Shoot Clicker is a clicker game that invites you to plunge into the exciting world of collecting various weapons. Each weapon has its own characteristics. Use your weapons to shoot at multi-colored blocks that form in various figures. The game offers various improvements, achievements, and a prestige system. Let's get started and collect all the weapons!

items.title: Block Wall Destroyer
items.description: Block Wall Destroyer is an addictive idle destruction game where breaking walls is the key to progress! You start with a simple pickaxe—but don’t be fooled! You can mine, toss, and spin your tools to smash through walls and reach new levels of destruction.

items.title: Blogger Clicker
items.description: Blogger Clicker is an engaging clicker game where you start as a budding blogger, creating engaging videos on various topics like gaming, music, tech, and more to gain fame. As you grow your audience, upgrade your equipment and aim to surpass top popular bloggers. Every click helps you gain subscribers, climb the ranks, and become the ultimate internet sensation.

items.title: Bottle Flip Idle
items.description: Bottle Flip is an addictive idle game where you flip bottles onto tables to earn various currencies. Use your earnings to buy upgrades, unlock more tables, and collect unique bottles with special effects. Level up to unlock new features, boost your earnings, and master the art of the perfect flip!

items.title: Brainrot Idle Clicker
items.description: Brainrot Idle Clicker is an incremental game where you tap your way through waves of bizarre enemies in a universe overflowing with wild humor. As you level up, you’ll pick clever cards to evolve your character, unlock strange powers, and take on even weirder challenges. Stay sharp—this world only gets stranger.

items.title: BreakShoot idle
items.description: BreakShoot idle is a clicker game where you destroy the blocks before they go down to the bottom. Level up your weapons to unlock new upgrades!

items.title: Button Defense Clicker
items.description: Button Defense Clicker is an exciting clicker defense game that tests your strategic thinking and fast-clicking skills. With waves of enemies attacking, your goal is to fortify and upgrade your central button to survive. As you progress, you’ll unlock new weapons, defense upgrades, and powerful abilities to fend off increasingly difficult waves of enemies.

items.title: Candy Clicker 2
items.description: Candy Clicker 2 is an incremental clicker game where you make candies by clicking. Keep clicking to generate more candies and upgrade the candy production equipment for faster results. Become an extraordinary sweet treat producer in Candy Clicker 2!

items.title: Capybara Clicker
items.description: Capybara Clicker is aclicker gamewhere you multiply the capybara population by clicking. You can buy various upgrades to increase the output of capybaras, change the weather, and unlock new skins to make you the coolest capybara in town.

items.title: Capybara Clicker 2
items.description: Capybara Clicker 2 is a sequel to the sensational Capybara Clicker, offering a host of improved features and upgrades. Multiply your capybara population with a click, and this time, enjoy even better enhancements, weather changes, and a range of new skins to make your capybara the ultimate standout in town.

items.title: Capybara Merge Evolution
items.description: Capybara Merge Evolution is an addictive clicker game where you click capybaras into existence and unlock astonishing transformations along the way. Your capybara evolves, and so do the eggs you've conjured up with clicks.

items.title: Carnival Shooter
items.description: Carnival Shooter is a fun and engaging clicker/idle game where you use a water gun to inflate toys and earn money. Use your earnings to spawn new toys and make some upgrades. Inflated toys can be merged to create higher-level ones, which generate even more income. Each level brings new toys and exciting platforms, offering endless entertainment and challenges for players. Enjoy the blend of strategic clicking and idle progression in this carnival full of surprises and fun!

items.title: Carousel Idle Clicker
items.description: Carousel Idle Clicker is an engaging idle clicker game where you turn a small island into a thriving amusement park empire. You’ll strategically merge and upgrade carousel seats to boost your park's growth and profits. Enjoy vibrant graphics while expanding your park, and watch as your investment pays off, even when you’re not actively playing.

items.title: Carving Madness
items.description: Carving Madness offers a unique and creative clicker experience centered around the art of wood carving. With its relaxing gameplay, beautiful artwork, and the satisfaction of revealing intricate designs, the game provides players with a delightful and meditative gaming experience. Click, carve, and transform simple blocks of wood into captivating masterpieces. Dive into the world of woodcraft and upgrade your tools to reach new levels of artistic expression. If you enjoy clicker games with a creative twist, Carving Madness is the perfect choice. Start your journey to become a master wood carver!

items.title: Catty's Fishing Day
items.description: Catty's Fishing Day is a clicker game where you embark on an exciting fishing journey filled with clicker mechanics, boss battles, and adorable ducks to aid you in catching the biggest fish! Discover new areas, upgrade your gear, and prepare for epic encounters with formidable Fish Bosses. Join Catty on her fishing journey and conquer the seas one catch at a time!

items.title: Cavern Clicker
items.description: Cavern Clicker is a satisfying mining game where every click chips away at stone to uncover valuable gemstones. You’ll hire goblins, dwarves, and other allies, then merge them to boost your progress deeper underground. Upgrade your pickaxe, break tougher blocks, and keep digging as you chase riches and push toward becoming the ultimate miner.

items.title: Cell to Singularity: Mesozoic Valley
items.description: Cell to Singularity: Mesozoic Valley is a clicker science-based idle game where you get to delve into the prehistoric world of dinosaurs. Uncover hidden fossils and construct your own Jurassic simulation as you complete missions to earn fossil points, unlocking a diverse array of unique dinosaur species. Collect Trait Cards to automate fossil production, allowing for effortless point accumulation and triggering extinction events to expand your simulation even further. With each click, you’ll watch your dinosaur collection flourish, transforming your simulation into a vibrant, thriving ecosystem where the majestic creatures of the Mesozoic Era reign supreme.

items.title: Celldome
items.description: Celldom is a new type of clicker game where you swipe over a "board" to earn income instead of clicking. Spend money on upgrading your board, both expanding it and increasing the money it brings in. The game has many other upgrades that can also be bought.

items.title: Chess Clicker
items.description: Chess Clicker is a strategic clicker game blending chess mechanics with addictive upgrades. Start small by earning coins and assembling a powerful chess army. Guide your pieces across the board, utilizing classic chess rules to gain rewards. Outsmart challenging enemies, enhance your pieces, and tackle unique tasks. Unleash your strategy and claim prestigious achievements along the way!

items.title: Chicken Clicker
items.description: Chicken Clicker is a fun, clicker, idle game where you help a fearless chicken on an epic flight through infinite universes. Click to soar higher, uncover bizarre realms, and unlock unexpected surprises at every turn. With vibrant visuals, fast-paced challenges, and endless opportunities to push your limits, this quirky game will keep you coming back for more sky-high clicking. Get your fingers ready for a non-stop clickable challenge.

items.title: Chipuzik's Evolution
items.description: Chipuzik's Evolution is a merge game to combine two identical chipuziks and discover a new cooler one. Buy upgrades in the store to earn more coins. Try to open all 4 worlds and 24 chipuziks. Good luck!

items.title: Click Click Clicker
items.description: Click Click Clicker is an idle clicker game where you earn money by clicking the button on the screen. Unlock various buttons, cursor styles, themes, and music. Upgrade your income and cursors to get rich quickly!

items.title: Click 'n' Heroes
items.description: Click 'n' Heroes is a clicker game in which you will have an exciting journey into the world of endless upgrading of the main character and allies.

items.title: Click To Grill
items.description: Click To Grill is a wildly satisfying idle clicker that lets you turn up the heat on the unexpected. You’ll tap your way through an ever-expanding buffet of bizarre barbecue items—from steaks to the totally bizarre. Keep the flames roaring as you earn upgrades and turn every strange item into a perfectly charred masterpiece.

items.title: Clicker Heroes
items.description: Clicker Heroes is an originalidle clicker game. Go on an epic adventure and slay monsters, upgrade heroes with the gold you collect, find treasures, and kill bosses. Clicker Heroes is a game that helped propel clicker games into the mainstream alongside other classics likeIdle Breakout.

items.title: Clicker Knights vs Dragons
items.description: Clicker Knights vs Dragons is a fast-paced clicker game in which you assemble a team of heroes to defeat the evil monsters, as well as the dragons!

items.title: Clickermon
items.description: Clickermon is aclicker gamewhere you collect, upgrade, and evolve a monster for battle. Embark on an incredible adventure through a fantastic world of creatures, battling against wild monsters and improving your strength as you progress.

items.title: Clock Clicker
items.description: Clock Clicker is a clicker game where you earn timebucks by clicking on the clock. Use the accumulated timebucks to buy various types of watches and upgrades that will help you make more currency.

items.title: Club Tycoon: Idle Clicker
items.description: Club Tycoon: Idle Clicker is a clicker game where you will manage your own club. Do some clicks to earn money, upgrade abilities to increase efficiency, defend your club from zombie attacks, get resources, and become a club tycoon! With the combination of idle clicker and defense elements, this game will make you highly addicted to it. Your goal is to reach a specific number of dancers and defeat the final boss! Try to complete the game in the shortest time. Good luck, newbie capitalist!

items.title: Coin Clicker
items.description: Coin Clicker is an idle game where you click to get all the coins and buy upgrades to reach the maximum level!

items.title: Coin Picker
items.description: Embark on a thrilling treasure-hunting adventure in Coin Picker! Your mission is simple: dig deep, collect valuable resources, and upgrade your tools to become the ultimate treasure hunter. This addictive idle game combines strategy and action in a dynamic, fast-paced experience. Merge your pickaxe parts, send them underground, and watch as they shatter blocks and uncover hidden riches!

items.title: CoinBlock Clicker
items.description: CoinBlock Clicker is a clicker game where you just need to click the CoinBlock thousands of times to get some money. Buy some upgrades, various tubes, and also minigames to add a little boost to your income!

items.title: Commit Battery
items.description: Commit Battery is a short incremental game where you power batteries and sell them for profit. Turn the crank, sell batteries, and prepare yourself for some surprises along the way!

items.title: Commit Battery 2
items.description: Commit Battery 2 is an incremental clicker game where you fill your battery and unlock various powerful upgrades to keep the cash and electrons flowing. Can you reach the top and become the ultimate power source?

items.title: Cookie Clicker Save the World
items.description: Save The World is an interesting Cookie Clicker variation. Click to collect as many cookies as possible and save the world!

items.title: Corn Tycoon
items.description: Corn Tycoon is the ultimate farm adventure where you can grow, harvest, and sell delicious corn to become the richest farmer in town! Start by clicking on your fields to plant seeds, water them, and harvest corn. As you grow more crops, you can buy handy machines like seeders, irrigators, and harvesters to do the work faster. Don’t forget to upgrade your silos to store more corn and your water tanks to keep your fields nice and green. The more corn you grow, the more money you make! But that’s not all; Corn Tycoon is full of ways to boost your farm and earn even faster! Upgrade your trucks to transport more corn and sell it quicker at the market. Keep an eye on the sky for the flying piggy bank—click it as fast as you can to get a big money boost! As you harvest more and more corn, you’ll be able to prestige, restarting from scratch but unlocking much more expensive corn! Visit the lab to discover awesome upgrades that make your corn worth more, speed up your machines, and even help your soil grow crops quicker. Your farm becomes bigger, faster, and more profitable with every upgrade. Can you become the ultimate Corn Tycoon and grow the biggest corn empire ever? Get ready to click, plant, and harvest your way to farming fame. Let the corn adventure begin!

items.title: Cosmic Miners
items.description: Cosmic Miners is a clicker game where you have to dig deep using your space laser machine to get valuable resources. Unlock buildings like a research lab, market, and launch pad. Upgrade your machine so it can have stronger power to dig into the planet's core. Be the wealthiest planet digger in this cosmic excavation adventure!

items.title: Craft Drill Clicker
items.description: Craft Drill Clicker is a clicker game where you upgrade your drilling machine to mine endlessly. Enhance your drill, discover new mines, and excavate valuable resources. Enjoy intuitive gameplay with varied upgrades, exciting bonuses, and power-ups. Dive into this adventure to become the ultimate miner and build your mining empire!

items.title: Crafters Inc: Tycoon Empire
items.description: Crafters Inc: Tycoon Empire is an idle game where you craft amazing items like weapons and armor. Hire helpers to boost production and sell your creations to expand your team and workshop. Keep crafting and growing your empire to create even cooler things!

items.title: Crash Test Idle
items.description: Crash Test Idle is an incrementalidle gamewhere your task is to crash cars for destruction tests. The faster the car moves before the collision, the more money you get. Improve cars and buy new ones to increase your income!

items.title: Crusher Block
items.description: Crusher Block is an idle game where you smash blocks, earn money, and upgrade your tools to create the most powerful crushing machine! Can you build the ultimate resource-crushing machine?

items.title: Crusher Clicker
items.description: Crusher Clicker is an addictive game where you smash rocks and crystals, then upgrade to enhance your crushing power and speed. It's like operating a hydraulic press but with a satisfying, stress-relieving twist. Boost your crusher's power, speed, and gravity for even more dramatic destruction. Get lost in the colorful physics and the endlessly engaging gameplay.

items.title: Cube vs Ball Clicker
items.description: Cube vs Ball Clicker is an exciting clicker game. This game is a battle between cubes and balls! Do the clicks to unleash powerful balls that crush waves of cubes, earning money to upgrade your arsenal. Conquer each level and become the ruler of the ball empire. Customize your balls with unique skins and trails, and unleash the fireball skill to annihilate your foes. Can you conquer all the levels available?

items.title: Cubes Crusher
items.description: Cubes Crusher is a vibrant clicker game where you slice through colorful blocks with spinning saws to gather gold. Upgrade your tools, boost the block spawn rate, and push your setup to its limits as levels grow more intense. Stay sharp, collect fast, and see how far your crushing power can go!

items.title: Cut Annoying Orange Idle
items.description: Cut Annoying Orange Idle is a clicker game to throw kitchen utensils at fruits, earn money and expand your knife assortment. Show those annoying fruits who's boss!

items.title: Cyber Farm
items.description: Cyber Farm is a clicker/idle game in which you have to control robots that grow vegetables. You send the grown vegetables to people who live in outer space. Grow vegetables, get coins, improve production, buy new types of plants, and do research.

items.title: Dig Tycoon
items.description: Dig Tycoon - Idle Game 3D is a clicker game where you delve into the depths and build your mining empire in this addictive idle clicker game! Become a legendary mining tycoon as you dig deep to uncover gold, gems, and hidden treasures. Expand your operations, hire skilled miners, and upgrade your equipment to maximize your profits. Can you build the biggest mining empire of all time?

items.title: Doge Miner 2
items.description: Doge Mineris back in this fantastic sequel – Doge Miner 2! The mission remains the same: to purchase a spaceship and blast off to the moon, but you now have an increase amount of tools, upgrades and options at your disposal. Doge Miner 2 builds upon the fun mechanisms and gameplay of the original title and adds extras features for your enjoyment.

items.title: Donut Clicker
items.description: Donut Clicker is aclicker gamewhere you bake donuts by clicking. You can spend your donuts to upgrade your clicking power, idle income, and buy auto-clickers. The game has lots of features and an online leaderboard where players compete to be the biggest earners!

items.title: Duck Duck Clicker
items.description: Duck Duck Clicker is the ultimate duck-themed clicker game for anyone who just can't stop clicking cute things!
