Satisfy your irresistible urge to click endlessly on ridiculously adorable ducks. Rack up points, unlock fun customizations, and turn your duck into the most fabulous feathered friend in the galaxy. It's simple, it's silly, and it's dangerously addictive.

items.title: Emoji Clickers
items.description: Emoji Clickers is a clicker game where you click to earn likes, upgrade your emojis, and dominate various platforms. Become the ultimate social media influencer! Boost your click power, add auto-clickers, and rake in likes per second. Unlock new emoji characters as you progress and watch them thrive. Can you make your emojis the top influencers? Dive into the fun and find out!

items.title: Empire Clicker
items.description: Empire Clicker is a clicker game where you transform an empty plot of land into a thriving metropolis. Unleash your city-building skills as your settlement evolves into a bustling, dynamic cityscape.

items.title: Evo Fish
items.description: Evo Fish is a tranquil idle merge experience where you evolve a colorful array of fish and curate your own serene fishbowl. Tap to hatch, merge to discover new species, and enjoy quirky surprises like sneaker-wearing sharks. With soothing visuals, gentle sounds, and relaxing progression, it’s a meditative journey beneath the waves.

items.title: EvoHero: Idle Gladiators
items.description: EvoHero: Idle Gladiators is a clicker game where you need to click to make money, merge and upgrade the gladiators to make even more money! Have you ever wanted to be a fighter? Have you ever wanted to be a trainer? Now you can be each one of them! Manage your fighters and develop your arena to become the greatest Emperor in the history! Start your training today!

items.title: Fall Ball Clicker
items.description: Fall Ball Clicker is a thrilling game where you create unique balls to drop through zones filled with obstacles. Collect coins as you navigate through challenging levels, unlocking new stages and upgrades. Enhance your balls and zones to maximize your success and tackle various tasks to level up and earn valuable bonuses.

items.title: Falling Fruits
items.description: Falling Fruits is an incremental clicker game where you destroy falling fruit using attack towers. Earn cash from splattering the fruit to buy various upgrades and new towers.

items.title: Fantasy Idle Tycoon
items.description: Fantasy Idle Tycoon is an idle game where you must build yourself a blacksmith empire by managing your blacksmiths in this fantasy universe! Expand your empire by managing your investors.

items.title: Fantasy Idle Tycoon 2
items.description: Fantasy Idle Tycoon 2 is a clicker idle game where you are tasked to build an empire with the help of your crew of trusted blacksmiths. The game features classic management gameplay—build, expand, and dominate, all the while unlocking upgrades to help you grow even faster. This game is ideal for players who want to experience slow and calming satisfaction from idle gaming.

items.title: Fast Food Factory
items.description: Fast Food Factory is a clicker game that caters to food enthusiasts and those eager to delve into the world of fast food production. As you run your factory, you'll craft a variety of foods, and expand your operations. The game's addictive simplicity lies in clicking to create and combine products, allowing you to witness your culinary creations spring to life. With each unlocked production line, your ability to concoct unique food combinations flourishes. Upgrade your assembly line by combining identical machines and compete with friends to build a thriving food empire in this addictive and rewarding game!

items.title: Fish Merge FRVR
items.description: Fish Merge FRVR is a clicker  that is both fun and addicting once you get the hang of it. The game revolves around feeding and merging fish to get better fish that'll net you more gold. You'll start with a few empty fish bowls, and dropping in fish feed will attract the most basic fish. Once you have 2 of the same fish type, you can merge them to create a better fish. You'll keep repeating this to unlock all of the higher tier fish as you go. There are a couple of things to help make things easier along the way as well, like a shop to get better fish instantly, and a roulette that'll give you high tier fish every 3 minutes.

items.title: Fishing Clicker 3D
items.description: Fishing Clicker 3D is a casual clicker game featuring a variety of boats and fish on the high seas. Merge fishermen and buy some upgrades so you can earn more money and experience. Level up so you can get new, bigger boats. Discover all collections of fish species. The more you fish, the faster you will get rich! Good luck!

items.title: Fisquarium
items.description: Fisquarium is an idle clicker game that combines the joy of clicking with the soothing atmosphere of an aquarium. In this game, players click to earn fish, unlock diverse species, enhance production through upgrades, discover new fish types, collect trophies, and immerse themselves in the relaxing world of aquatic wonders. Whether you're a casual player or an avid clicker fan, Fisquarium offers a laid-back and enjoyable experience!

items.title: Soccer Clicker 2D
items.description: Soccer Clicker is a clicker simulation game that combines fast-paced clicking with strategic management. Score goals, earn money, and build your ultimate team as you rise to football glory! Are you ready to take your team to the top?

items.title: Fruit Factory Idle
items.description: Fruit Factory Idle is a fun idle game where you must manage your factory to get maximum profit. Have a factory with many conveyor belts processing different types of fruit and make sure the fruit processing process runs smoothly. Use resources efficiently to increase factory profits. Unlock new types of fruit and buy new conveyor belts. There are many varieties of fruits, from simple fruits like apples and pears to exotic fruits like pineapples and mangoes. Each fruit has its own processing specifics, adding complexity and interest to the game. Make an improvement and upgrade to your factory, such as upgrading your conveyor belts, installing new fruit processing machines, and expanding your factory.

items.title: Galactic Crusade Clicker
items.description: Galactic Crusade Clicker is a clicker game where you become a commander of a growing alien fleet that is on its way to wreak havoc on every planet. Upgrade and retrofit your ships, expand your fleet, and conquer every world that you come across.

items.title: Galactic Grind
items.description: Galactic Grind is an awesome clicked game in which you must try to create a thriving production facility and generate resources to reach space. You must start by simply clicking on the earth and picking a production building to create. Once you have created your initial building, you can click on it to boost the resource generation rate. Each building has a range of different abilities and can boost your production in a variety of ways.

items.title: Galaxy Clicker
items.description: Galaxy Clicker is an idle game featuring different planets, stars, and star systems. You will earn income each time the planet revolves around the sun. Use your income to buy new planets and merge them to create a bigger one. Don't forget to also upgrade your stamina, income, and speed. Watch this fascinating universe revolve around!

items.title: Garden Idle
items.description: Garden Idle is anidle gamewhere you buy seeds, plant them, and manage your garden. Just hover your mouse over the ripe plants to collect them. Unlock a wide variety of plants as you progress. Purchase upgrades to help you with your garden and don't forget to expand your farm by buying a new plot of land!

items.title: Gem Refiner
items.description: Gem Refiner is a clicker game where you extract precious gems from rocks, steadily upgrading your tools to amass a fortune. Purchase efficient upgrades to break rocks more skillfully, increasing your earnings. Unleash your strategic prowess as you delve into the thrilling world of gem extraction and economic prosperity.

items.title: Glass Factory 2
items.description: Glass Factory 2 is a clicker game in which you can earn money by mining and selling sand. Buy new mining tools and upgrade them to unlock workers. By opening a factory, you can melt sand into glasses and sell them. Having saved enough money, you can purchase additional equipment for glass processing.

items.title: Gridle
items.description: Gridle is an incremental idle RPG where you’ll manage a powerful party to take down waves of enemies! Strategically upgrade, heal, reassign, and level up your party members to ensure maximum progress. With 50 initial levels to conquer, the game transitions into infinite levels where the challenge never stops.

items.title: GrindCraft
items.description: GrindCraft is a Minecraft-themed clicker game based on crafting. Collect various raw materials and climb the crafting ladder to create stronger items. Hover over craftable items to reveal the resources required to create them.

items.title: Hacking Hero: Hacker Clicker
items.description: Hacking Hero: Hacker Clicker is a captivating game that immerses you in the thrilling world of hacking. Counter trojans, breach firewalls, and extract valuable information while maintaining your anonymity. Battle against the M.E.D.U.S.A. that has seized control, using viruses and spyware to liberate the cyber realm. Embark on an RPG journey, aligning with 20 unlockable heroes to infiltrate and combat these malevolent creatures. Dive into the virtual world, leading the M1ssingN0s to action, all while concealing your true identity. Accumulate cryptocurrencies to enhance your hacking skills and those of your allies. Choose targets, prepare worms, and tap your way through hacking challenges. Join the fight to save the digital realm in Hacking Hero: Hacker Clicker!

items.title: Hamster Factory ASMR
items.description: Hamster Factory ASMR is a delightful clicker idle game that puts you in charge of a hamster wheel, and every spin gets you a monetary reward. The wheel is filled with hardworking, adorable hamsters. Your mission is to manage the hamsters as they spin wheels to generate income, all the while creating the most productive and efficient factory possible. Get ready to build the ultimate hamster-powered factory in Hamster Factory ASMR!

items.title: Hamster Kombat Clicker
items.description: Hamster Kombat Clicker is an addictive clicker game where you manage a hamster empire. Tap to earn coins, unlock unique hamsters, and upgrade their skills to boost income. Conquer prestige levels, collect bonuses, and enjoy endless development in this charming game filled with cute hamsters and limitless possibilities.

items.title: Haste-Clicker
items.description: Haste-Clicker is an idle game where you click ores to break them. Clicking will earn you money to upgrade your clicking power, idle income, and unlock new ores. The game also has a rebirth system where you sacrifice your progress to increase your gains.

items.title: Hexa Block 2048 Idle
items.description: Hexa Block 2048 Idle is a merge idle hybrid game where your brain and strategy meet passive income and endless upgrades. Whether you're a puzzle-solving pro or a fan of satisfying idle games, this relaxing hexagon world has something for you. Start merging your way to glory!

items.title: Horror Bosses Clicker
items.description: Horror Bosses Clicker is a scary clicker game with many characters from horror movies! Upgrade yourself and buy weapons so you can kill all of those monsters!

items.title: Hot Road Infinite
items.description: Hot Road Infinite is an idle clicker game where you grow a collection of cars and watch them race along dynamic tracks. Upgrade vehicles, optimize your setup, and maximize earnings as your cars speed through loops and turns. Strategically manage your track to boost performance and unlock even more powerful rides.

items.title: I Best Dancer!
items.description: I Best Dancer is a clicker game where you ascend to dance stardom. Gain followers and views by going live, proving you're the ultimate dancer. Show off your moves, rise to the top, and become the dance sensation everyone's talking about. Can you outshine the competition and claim the title of the best dancer in this thrilling virtual dance-off?

items.title: Idle Airline Tycoon
items.description: Manage your airline and expand to every corner of the world!

items.title: Idle Animal Anatomy
items.description: Idle Animal Anatomy is a clicker game where you can create living organisms from scratch. The goal of the game is to create an animal cell by cell, and this will make you feel like a scientist. Grow your favorite pets and learn interesting facts about them. You will see what the internal organs of animals and humans look like. Dive into anatomy like a real scientist. Grow all the living things!

items.title: Idle Ants
items.description: Idle Ants is a fun idle game in which you must create and manage your very own Ant colony! To start with, you must create your first ant! Each ant requires a set amount of food to create, but once they have been created, they start to gather food for you. For each ant you create, the cost increases incrementally. Once you have created a small workforce, you can create a queen ant – the queen will then produce more ants for you automatically.

items.title: Idle Blogger Simulator
items.description: Idle Blogger Simulator is a clicker simulation game where you are the rising star as a digital creator, ready to take on the internet—all from behind your desk! You get to choose quirky channel themes like hilarious meme breakdowns or classic heartwarming cat videos and upgrade your gear to produce top-notch content, even better cat videos. Sharpen your skills, team up with viral stars, and watch your fanbase as you become an influencer extraordinaire. Your goal is to reach the coveted 1 billion subscribers and become the ultimate online sensation.

items.title: Idle Coffee Business
items.description: Idle Coffee Business is a clicker game where you grow your coffee shop from a tiny plot to a multi-zillionaire conglomerate empire. Serve different kinds of coffee to earn coins. Unlock different coffee recipes to generate more coins and upgrade your recipes to improve profits. Going offline? No worries, the coffee business works for you! Generate idle income while you are away, and come back to see how much you earned.

items.title: Idle Combine
items.description: Idle Combine is an idle game to combine different items to craft a new one. Each combined item gives more income. Can you collect all the items?

items.title: Idle Construction 3D
items.description: Idle Construction 3D Tycoon is a dynamic building simulation where you create an empire of world-famous landmarks. Manage a team of workers, train them to build faster and unlock iconic structures like the Eiffel Tower and Taj Mahal. Expand your business, decorate your creations, and watch every brick come together as you grow into the ultimate construction tycoon.

items.title: Idle Crafting Empire Tycoon
items.description: Idle Crafting Empire Tycoon is an economic simulator game where you manage an island empire. As the ruler, explore the island, discover resources, and craft items. Hire managers and traders to boost profits and upgrade factories to optimize production. Fulfill orders for rewards and build an empire known throughout the fantastical world!

items.title: Idle Crushing Block
items.description: Idle Crushing Block is a clicker game to destroy various blocks and use the coins to upgrade your skills and abilities!

items.title: Idle Defense
items.description: Idle Defense is an idle game where you protect the planet from incoming threats. Shoot them down and build up your defenses to keep the planet alive for as long as possible.

items.title: Idle Dice
items.description: Idle Dice is an addictive clicker idle game where every roll of the dice decides your fate, so roll wisely! The points you earn are based on your rolls, and as you accumulate more points, you can invest them in powerful upgrades and unlock additional dice to boost your score even further. Keep the momentum going, stack up your rewards, and let a bit of smooth jazz guide you as you roll your way to higher scores and endless rewards.

items.title: Idle Emoji Factory
items.description: Idle Emoji Factory is a fun clicker-idle game that sets in an emoji-producing factory.

items.title: Idle Farming Business
items.description: Idle Farming Business is anidleclicker game where you run your own farm. Buy new land plots and plant crops so you can harvest and sell them for profit. Upgrade your crops to increase productivity. Buy new land plots that come with unique crops. Have fun!

items.title: Idle Gun 2
items.description: Idle Gun 2 is a clicker game where you develop an arsenal of weapons through clicking and idling. Start with regular pistols and work your way up to powerful sniper rifles. You can upgrade guns and talents, earn trophies, and try different challenges. The game features achievements and a ranking system where players can compete for the highest spots.

items.title: Idle House Build
items.description: Idle House Build is a clicker game where you build houses and upgrade your abilities. Place a brick with every click and use builders to speed up the building process, allowing you to earn money while idling.

items.title: Idle Hurricane
items.description: Idle Hurricane is an idle game where you control a hurricane. Try to increase its size and power, and cause more destruction to the surrounding objects!

items.title: Idle Idle Gamedev
items.description: Idle Idle Gamedev, you have the opportunity to create various idle games while going idle. Upgrade the skills and increase the possibilities!

items.title: Idle Inventor
items.description: Idle Inventor is an idle game where you can build and expand your industrial empire, becoming a titan of heavy machinery and industry. Manage 5 unique factories with various vehicles, including cars, planes, and spacecraft. Hire managers, automate production lines, and complete exciting missions to grow your factory and earn profits even while you're away. Experience the thrill of being an idle tycoon and watch your empire flourish in this addictive and rewarding game!

items.title: Idle IT Company
items.description: Idle IT Company is a clicker game where you are tasked with building your very own IT company from the ground up. As an idle clicker game, your main objective is to generate income and expand your business empire.

items.title: Idle Miner
items.description: Idle Miner is an idle game about a cat who loves mining and getting different resources. There are 25 different resources; you can sell them or use them for crafting better pickaxes. Craft better and better pickaxes and mine into the depths of Earth. Also, there are 9 upgrades that will help you get better materials and craft better pickaxes. After level 50 you can prestige to make your cat stronger!

items.title: IDLE Molecules
items.description: IDLE Molecules is a clicker game in which you need to multiply a new kind of molecule that generates unique atoms. Collect atoms and sell them to earn money. Improve the structure of molecules in the laboratory. Find new molecules. Open an atom recycling factory.

items.title: Idle Monster Slayer
items.description: Idle Monster Slayer is a clicker game where you click monsters to deal damage and gather gold and resources. Use your earnings to upgrade abilities, unlock powerful features, and automate your progress. Face increasingly difficult enemies, refine your strategies, and aim for the top spot on the leaderboard as you dominate the adventure!

items.title: Idle Pet Business
items.description: Idle Pet Business is an idle game where you grow a pet shop from a tiny plot to a multi-zillionaire conglomerate pet empire. Unlock different pets and take care of them to generate coins. Upgrade your pets to improve yield and generate idle income while you are away.

items.title: Idle Pinball Breakout
items.description: Idle Pinball Breakout is a clicker-idle game that uniquely mixes pinball arcade physics, brick breaker gameplay, and idle offline earning.

items.title: Idle  Printers
items.description: Idle Printers is an incremental clicker game to earn money by selling ready-made models printed on printers. Upgrade to buy new printers and sell more!

items.title: Idle Printers 2
items.description: Idle Printers 2 is an incremental clicker game that lets you print various models. Upgrade your printers to boost productivity and buy new equipment to increase the value of your models. Keep clicking to unlock new achievements and become the ultimate printing tycoon.

items.title: Idle Research
items.description: Idle Research is an incremental game with both idle and active playstyles. Do some research and craft colorful flasks, tubes, and cylinders to earn energy.

items.title: Idle Sculpt
items.description: Idle Sculpt is an idle clicker game that takes you on a journey as a sculptor with the click of a mouse button. Create unique sculptures to earn passive income. Each time a chisel crushes a stone, you earn more money. As you sculpt better pieces, more people will gather to admire your creations.

items.title: Idle Space Business Tycoon
items.description: Idle Space Business Tycoon is a clicker game to become a space business tycoon. Build a great Citadel in this idle game by opening businesses, building your factory, upgrading them, producing goods, trading with galaxy corporations, and creating your idle farming empire.

items.title: Idle Streamer
items.description: Idle Streamer is a clicker game where you idle your way to becoming a world-famous streamer. Click to earn money, and improve your character, room, and equipment to boost your earnings!

items.title: Idle Treadmill
items.description: Idle Treadmill is a clicker game where you manage a treadmill packed with cars. Your task? Fit as many cars as possible while tapping to push them off. As you progress, earn coins to upgrade your fleet for even more chaos! Will you prove yourself as the ultimate treadmill boss?

items.title: Idle World
items.description: Idle World is a creative simulation game where you build a world from cubes, crafting life after the Big Bang. Use energy and natural elements to shape Earth’s landscapes, create trees, rivers, animals, and humans, and watch your pixel world come alive. Embrace the challenge of crafting a thriving planet and explore endless possibilities in this imaginative journey.

items.title: Idle World Miner Tycoon
items.description: Idle World Miner Tycoon is an idle clicker game where your mission is to obliterate entire planets, extracting valuable resources. Enhance your pickaxe to delve deeper and uncover more precious ores. Smelt your findings to acquire diverse materials for superior shop upgrades. Watch the quarry work for you during idle moments and unravel the mystery hidden at the planet's core. Dive into a cosmic mining adventure!

items.title: Idle Gun
items.description: Idle Gun is an idle clicker game where you earn coins for each shot discharged from a gun. You unlock more guns and various upgrades to speed up your earnings as you level up.

items.title: Incremental Fortress
items.description: Incremental Fortress is a quirky strategy game where you’ve been appointed Commandant of a fortress under siege. With the king’s trust and a chaotic army at your command, you’ll recruit brave defenders and stand against rising evil. Strengthen your forces, manage the madness, and protect the realm from its darkest threats, one upgrade at a time.

items.title: Italian Brainrot Clicker Game
items.description: Italian Brainrot Clicker is a chaotic meme clicker incremental game where you tap your way through the viral Italian Brainrot universe, unlocking all the brainrot characters and upgrades as you progress! You will get the chance to collect Italian Brainrot characters such as: Bombardino Crocodilo, Tung Tung Tung Sahur, Tralalero Tralala, Bombombini Gussini, Cappuccino Assasino, Lirili Larila, Brr Brr Patapim, Burbaloni Luliloli, Bobritto Bandito, Trippi Troppi, Chimpanzini Bananini and more! Can you collect them all?

items.title: Juice Production Tycoon
items.description: Juice Production Tycoon is an incrementalclicker gamewhere you chop fruits to earn money. You can upgrade your production line for more exotic fruits and better equipment with the money you earn. Become the best juice maker in town in Juice Production Tycoon!

items.title: Juice Production Tycoon Remake
items.description: Juice Production Tycoon Remake is a turn-based clicker game where you earn money by slicing fruit. Upgrade your blade and buy new types of exotic fruits. Having bought a juicer, it will be possible to produce juices from chopped fruits. Become the best juice maker!

items.title: Juicy Trap
items.description: Juicy Trap is a wacky idle clicker where mischievous fruits march toward their doom in outrageous contraptions. Unlock and upgrade traps like spiked pits and rolling pins to crush, smash, and splatter them in hilarious ways. Tap to speed up the chaos, earn rewards, and progress through colorful environments packed with new traps and endless juicy chain reactions.

items.title: Kingdom Cats
items.description: Kingdom of Cats is a whimsical building adventure where a golden key opens the gates to a magical feline realm. Expand your kingdom with 34 stylish structures, unlock quirky abilities, and befriend 15 charming cats. Earn achievements, collect upgrades, and enjoy witty commentary as you transform this enchanted land into a thriving cat-filled paradise.

items.title: Knight Clicker
items.description: Knight Clicker is a medieval-themed clicking adventure where every tap brings you closer to victory. Unlock powerful upgrades, boost your progress with massive multipliers, and challenge yourself to set the fastest time. Conquer new lands, strengthen your knight, and see how quickly you can rise to greatness in this fast-paced journey of strategy and progression!

items.title: LandLord - Real Estate Tycoon
items.description: LandLord - Real Estate Tycoon is a thrilling clicker management game where you build your property empire from scratch. You’ll strategically buy, sell, and manage real estate, all while aiming to dominate the market. Sharpen your entrepreneurial skills, make smart investments, and grow your wealth as you transform into a masterful landlord and a true real estate mogul!

items.title: Launch Idle
items.description: Launch idle is an arcade game to launch different objects at a distance and power them up so that they fly further; and the farther the object flies, the more coins you get! You can also play the3D version.

items.title: Launch Idle 3D
items.description: Launch idle is a clicker game where you need to launch various objects at a distance and the further the object flies, the more coins you get!

items.title: Law of the Cat God
items.description: Law of the Cat God is an idle clicker game with a unique storyline and a touch of humor. In this game, players find themselves in a future where cats have taken over the world, living a seemingly perfect life thanks to the Cat God. Players take on the role of an unnamed cat with aspirations to become the next Avatar of the Cat God. Along the way, they interact with Manny and other characters, engage in various activities, and uncover the game's lore.

items.title: Leek Factory Tycoon
items.description: Leek Factory Tycoon is an idle game where you will be managing your dream Leek Factory. Enjoy a steady flow of idle cash as you expand and upgrade your factories for big profits. Build an extensive conveyor belt system to transport and process your leeks, creating fantastic recipes. Even when you're offline, your restaurant stays open, earning you passive income. Play at your own pace or fine-tune your empire to compete on the live global leaderboard. Show the world your restaurant strategy is the most profitable!

items.title: Dragon Hunter
items.description: Dragon Hunter is a clicker RPG where you roll dice, battle monsters, and face epic dragons. Engage in thrilling encounters, level up to unlock powerful skills, and use battle magic to sway outcomes. Gather gold, rare loot, and pets, while completing quests and clearing ruins. Uncover treasures and conquer fierce bosses to become a legendary dragon hunter.

items.title: Lhama Clicker
items.description: Lhama Clicker is a clicker game where you multiply the llama population through clicking and idling. Generate infinite llamas and unlock funny skins, hats, backgrounds, and achievements. Can you unlock everything and beat the game?

items.title: Little Blacksmith Clicker
items.description: Little Blacksmith Clicker is a clicker game that puts you in the shoes of a blacksmith, where you can utilize your talents to craft formidable weapons and equipment. With a forge positioned in the center of the screen, players can gain hammers by clicking to create various items and earn money. As you advance through the game, numerous hammers can be acquired to improve your craftsmanship.

items.title: Loop Farmer Idle
items.description: Loop Farmer Idle is a clicker game where you play as a young farmer who walks around his farm. Plant new vegetables and get as many coins as possible! Click on the tools to get coins and also to earn experience. As you level up, upgrade new talents and get new types of seeds!

items.title: Loot Box Hero
items.description: Loot Box Hero is a clicker game where you earn coins by defeating enemies. Use coins for varieties of upgrades. You will also snowball your power by opening a loot box and collecting items. Challenge yourself on how further you can get!

items.title: Love Clicker: Valentine's Day
items.description: Love Clicker: Valentine's Day is a clicker game where you need to show your love to your loved one. Buy various gifts and give attention to your beloved to receive more love. When you have enough love, you will be able to create a family. There are 24 achievements in the game that you can complete as the game progresses.

items.title: Lunapark Idle Clicker: For Fun
items.description: Lunapark Idle Clicker is a clicker game where you craft the ultimate entertainment destination. Merge and expand Ferris wheel cabins, strategically upgrade attractions, and perfect park equipment to ensure unforgettable experiences for your visitors. Build your dream park, boost earnings, and aim to reign as the king of amusement park magnates!

items.title: Lunar Atoms Tycoon
items.description: Lunar Atoms Tycoon is an incremental game that takes place in the distant future where people on the Moon discovered a new kind of atoms capable of producing plasma clots. The game's goal is to develop your industry to produce and process the plasma into nano fuel.

items.title: Mad Evolution: Idle Merge
items.description: Mad Evolution: Idle Merge is a chaotic creature-combining simulator where you fuse bizarre monsters into even stranger hybrids. Gather coins nonstop, evolve your weirdest creations, and push the limits of logic as you unlock new, surreal worlds. It’s your job to unleash wild upgrades and build the ultimate monster empire in this endlessly quirky experiment.

items.title: Magic Chop Idle
items.description: Magic Chop Idle is a fun idle-incremental game about chopping the magic trees.

items.title: Martian Builders Tycoon
items.description: Martian Builders Tycoon is an exciting city-building game set on Mars. Team up with Elan Mask to transform the Martian landscape into a futuristic metropolis. Manage resources, implement advanced technologies, and overcome challenges like dust storms. Enjoy stunning graphics and strategic gameplay as you build your Martian utopia and ensure your citizens thrive.

items.title: Maxwell Clicker
items.description: Maxwell Clicker is a clicker game based on the beloved cat meme, Maxwell. Purchase upgrades, gather resources with the help of his animal friends, like Big Floppa and Fox, and venture into the mines with a capybara. Earn achievements as you progress through the game. Can you become the ultimate Maxwell fan?"

items.title: Merge Mine: Idle Clicker
items.description: Merge Mine: Idle Clicker is a fun game for those who love mining, merging, and clicking! This game is perfect for those who enjoy idle clicker games, as well as those who love to merge and manage their resources. You will play as a miner who is tasked with extracting precious resources from the ground. As you progress through the game, you will unlock new mines, hire more miners, and upgrade your equipment to increase your mining efficiency.

items.title: MergeMine Idle
items.description: MergeMine Idle is an idle clicker game with a merge element in the game. Click on the enemies in the danger zone to earn money and use it to buy the shovels. Merge the same shovels to make them more durable, and start digging. Get resources and try to get as deep as you can. After you get the resources, make powerful weapons from them so you can use them to fight against dangerous monsters!

items.title: Merging Gears
items.description: Merging Gears is a fun and addictive clicker game where you must build and operate a gear-based mechanism to earn profits. By adding new gears and increasing the speed of rotation, you can make your mechanisms more efficient and profitable. The game simulates the performance of the mechanism in real-time, allowing players to see how each gear affects the system. Players can reinvest their profits to buy new and more advanced gear and become gear masters in the process.

items.title: Mine Loop
items.description: Mine Loop is an idle game that challenges you to dig deep and explore the earth with your train to unearth valuable ores. Transform into the premier Mine Company by collecting ores, earning money, and upgrading your operations. Expand your rail system with new carts, merge for increased capacity, and elevate ore market prices. Relax as the looping train effortlessly gathers your riches, but don't forget to tap for a speed boost. Delve deeper for rare ores as your gold collection grows!

items.title: Mine Merge Mania
items.description: Mine Merge Mania is an addictive clicker game that invites you to embark on an exhilarating mining adventure. As the master of your own mine, you'll start with basic tools like shovels and pickaxes and progressively unlock new horizons by merging tools and upgrading your mining operation. The goal is to dig deeper, collect valuable resources, and become a legendary miner!

items.title: MineClicker
items.description: MineClicker is a non-endless clicker game set in the Minecraft universe. Click to kill mobs and mine blocks. Earn XP and gather stone to buy various upgrades and hire recruits to makeidlingeasier.

items.title: Minecube
items.description: Minecube is a casual clicker game where you mine blocks to build grand statues. Recruit miners and other helpers to mine resources faster. Use your bonuses to quickly wipe out several blocks at once.

items.title: MineMerge
items.description: MineMerge is a clicker game with merge mechanics. Merge identical blocks to collect the resources you need to craft weapons and armor. Defeat enemies, complete quests, and fight the Ender Dragon.

items.title: Miner's Odyssey
items.description: Miner's Odyssey is an incremental game with charming pixel graphics reminiscent of Minecraft. Embark on a thrilling mining adventure, delving deeper into the mine as you unearth blocks to gather resources for creating powerful tools and upgrades. Merge picks to forge enhanced versions, enabling faster and more efficient mining. Navigate through various obstacles and challenges, honing your skills and tools to conquer new depths. Unravel portals to other dimensions, each offering unique opportunities and resources to obtain powerful artifacts and reach the pinnacle of development. With endless possibilities and an exciting journey!

items.title: MineTap Merge Clicker
items.description: MineTap Merge Clicker is an idle clicker that combines merge mechanics with crafting and adventure. Dive into a pixelated world where you mine resources, craft powerful gear, and battle zombies and other monsters. Build your own village as you gather materials, merge items, and level up your character. Become a legendary hero by crafting epic weapons and conquering challenges.

items.title: Mining for the Village
items.description: Mining for the Village is a clicker game where you need to gather some resources, make some money, buy tools, build, and improve facilities for the maintenance of residents. Build your settlement from scratch.

items.title: Mining in Notebook
items.description: Mining in Notebook is an idle clicker game with notebook-style graphics! There are many different tools and resources that can make you engage more in the game. Can you unlock everything?

items.title: Mining in Notebook 2
items.description: Mining in Notebook 2 (Colony) is the second part of the idle-clicker in a notebook style. Now you have to develop your village and extract resources. Also, the concept of buying many different instruments has been preserved.

items.title: Mining Rush
items.description: Mining Rush is a clicker game where you can mine minerals, earn money, and buy new mining tools. Not just like an ordinary clicker game, this time you can also get construction materials and build your own city. The game has 60 different tools that you can unlock! Have some fun mining!

items.title: Mr. Mine
items.description: Mr. Mine is an addictive idle mining clicker arcade game that puts you in charge of building a mining empire from the ground up! Start by drilling deep into the Earth’s crust, extracting valuable minerals and hidden treasures.

items.title: Money Factory
items.description: Money Factory is a fast-paced, clicker incremental game where you build your financial empire by strategically connecting tokens on the game board. Each connection generates cash, and the more valuable the tokens you combine, the faster your earnings soar. Plan your moves carefully, optimize your token placements, and watch as your money factory transforms into a booming financial powerhouse!

items.title: Money Factory: Tycoon Idle Game
items.description: Money Factory is a fast-paced clicker game with strategic elements where you build and expand your financial empire by optimizing money production lines. Start with a simple setup and gradually grow by upgrading equipment, unlocking new production areas, and enhancing efficiency to skyrocket your profits.

items.title: Money Gun Clicker
items.description: Money Gun Clicker is a fast-paced clicker game where you fire bills like a high-rolling tycoon. Tap to shoot streams of cash, unlock upgrades, and boost your income with every wild blast. As the stacks grow, so does the madness—keep clicking and watch your money machine turn into a true cash-spraying powerhouse.

items.title: Money Maker Idle
items.description: Money Maker Idle is a fast-paced tapping game where you grow a money-printing empire from a humble machine into a financial powerhouse. Upgrade production lanes, unlock slicing bonuses, and trigger cash storms to accelerate your fortune. With every tap, you edge closer to billionaire status in a whirlwind of wealth, strategy, and satisfying money-making chaos.

items.title: Money Tree 2: Cash Grow Game
items.description: Money Tree 2 is the ultimate game to become the world's wealthiest business tycoon! Live the life of a billionaire and use your idle money to build your own empire. Grow your wealth like trees and buy the most expensive cars, houses, yachts, and jewelry. Hire celebrities to help you manage your endless cash and invest in a range of luxury items. If you dream of being a billionaire, "Cash Tycoon" is the perfect clicker game for you!

items.title: Monster Impact
items.description: Monster Impact is a clicker game in which you become the hero that can gather allies to help you defeat the monsters.

items.title: Monster Slayer
items.description: Monster Slayer is an action-packed game where you battle quirky monsters and gather valuable resources. Strengthen your hero by unlocking powerful skills and spells, capture monster souls to expand your collection, and trade Flame Shards for rare relics. Enhance your abilities with Inlay Stones and potions as you take on ever-stronger foes in your quest for victory!

items.title: My Chicken Farm
items.description:
My Chicken Farm is a clicker game in which you have to breed chickens on a chicken farm that lay eggs for you.
 Collect and sell eggs to buy new chickens and buy new objects to increase the efficiency of earning money.
 You can also put seeds on the field for them, build a monument or even install a music center. And you can also dress up the chicken in different hats. There are 8 types of multicolored hens in the game, which differ in the valuable eggs produced. And also you are waiting for various interesting events that occur during the game.

items.title: My Flour Factory
items.description: My Flour Factory is an incremental clicker game about managing your flour factory. Start by growing and selling wheat, then buy a factory and produce flour. Open a lab and do research. You can also buy a bakery and start baking bread! Grow your business and become the main supplier of flour and bread in the world!

items.title: My Sugar Factory
items.description: My Sugar Factory is an incremental clicker game about managing your sugar factory. Start with one sugarcane bush and make millions! Buy a factory and open a laboratory to improve the sugar cane variety.

items.title: My Sugar Factory 2
items.description: My Sugar Factory 2 is the second part of the gameMy Sugar Factory. In this game, you are also invited to take control of the sugar cane plantation and establish a sugar plant with many innovations and updated nice graphics.

items.title: My Sugar Factory 3
items.description: My Sugar Factory 3 is a captivating clicker game that blends economic strategy with factory management. You begin by cultivating sugarcane, advancing to establish a comprehensive production chain that includes crafting sugar and expanding into diverse goods like paper, fuel briquettes, and alcohol. The game challenges you to optimize processes, open a research lab to enhance efficiency and grow your enterprise. The ultimate goal is to transform your humble factory into a thriving business empire. Every decision offers opportunities for growth and innovation, providing a rewarding and engaging gameplay experience for fans of management and economic simulators.

items.title: Mystery Digger
items.description: Mystery Digger is a clicker idle game where you explore underground mysteries and upgrade your drilling machine. You uncover hidden notes and intriguing items that piece together a captivating story.

items.title: Noob Basketball Clicker
items.description: Noob Basketball Clicker is a fun and addicting clicker game that combines with unique basketball elements. Your goal is to manage the basketball court and earn money by shooting the ball into the basket. Just click your mouse to send the ball flying toward the hoop. Each hit will bring you profit, which you can use to improve your gaming experience. Develop your skills, acquire new balls, and expand your support team to increase your income. This game offers addictive gameplay that will keep you busy for hours. Immerse yourself in a competitive atmosphere and test your business management skills. Become a real basketball tycoon and conquer this virtual sport!

items.title: Noob's Chicken Farm Tycoon
items.description: Noob's Chicken Farm Tycoon is a clicker game where you must help Noob to run his chicken farm. Breed and upgrade your chickens, buy useful tools for the farm, and protect your chicken from the fox's attack. You can put on various masks for your chickens, such as Noob, zombies, demons, cats, and more. Tired of chicken? Swap them out for a Banana Cat or Noobidi Toilet that makes toilet paper instead of eggs. You can also buy a dinosaur whose eggs are bigger and more expensive to sell! Build your chicken farm in different locations, like in a forest, under the sea, or even in hell. Compete with other chicken breeders to see who manages the best chicks!

items.title: Obby: Pull a Sword
items.description: Obby: Pull a Sword is an action-packed clicker incremental game where you train to build strength and draw powerful swords. Face off against mighty bosses, unlock new abilities, and collect unique pets along the way. Each victory brings you closer to becoming the ultimate warrior. Can you master the challenge and prove your strength?

items.title: Oil Mining 3D: Petrol Factory
items.description: Oil Mining 3D: Petrol Factory is an idle simulation game where you step into the oil era and build your own energy empire from the ground up. Drill, refine, upgrade, and expand your way to becoming a powerful tycoon in the global oil industry. Start with a small rig and grow your factory into a massive production empire as you manage operations, optimize output, and invest in cutting-edge tech.

items.title: One Treasure
items.description: One Treasure is an action-filled clicker incremental game where every click brings you closer to precious pirate booty and fortune! Sail through uncharted waters, engage in fierce battles with ruthless pirate ships, and uncover long-lost treasures buried beneath the waves. As you defeat powerful enemies and amass piles of glittering gold, you'll upgrade your ship with deadly weaponry and boost your skills, turning your vessel into an unstoppable force. With each voyage, the stakes rise, and the excitement intensifies—prepare for an epic quest of naval warfare, treasure hunting, and untold riches!

items.title: Painter's Voyage Idle
items.description: Painter's Voyage Idle is an idle game about an artist who paints things and creatures on his travel journey. Acquire new tools, develop skills and fill up your gallery to become the best painter!

items.title: Matches Craft - Idle Game
items.description: Matches Craft - Idle game is a creative game where you build intricate sculptures using matchsticks and set them ablaze for a satisfying display. Carefully place each piece, speed up the process with quick taps, and hire workers to craft faster! With multiple levels, unique objects, and a night mode, every creation brings a new level of enjoyment!

items.title: Particle Clicker
items.description: Particle Clicker is an idle game made by CERN which is modeled on Cookie Clicker. Clicking the particle lets you run tests and provides you with data. Have fun!

items.title: Pen Dig
items.description: Pen Dig is a fun and engaging clicker idle game where you start with a simple pencil and dig your way to riches. Upgrade your pens, from basic to extraordinary, as you break stones and earn coins. Build a thriving city by mining resources, constructing buildings, and unlocking new areas. Craft your unique strategy to create a prosperous metropolis!

items.title: Pendulum Master
items.description: Pendulum Master is an idle game where you will earn money every time the pendulum swings. Buy new pendulums, upgrade them, and merge them together to create a better one. Watch the beauty of swinging balls.

items.title: Pinball Idle
items.description: Pinball Idle is an idle clicker game where you must develop your pinball machine. Start the game with almost nothing on your table and slowly increase the number of objects on your table and make it to be a fully packed pinball machine.

items.title: Pixel Smashers
items.description: Pixel Smashers is an idle simulator game that lets you dive into a Minecraft-inspired world of destruction, where you command a fleet of tools designed for block-breaking mayhem! Your mission? Use your arsenal of flying pickaxes, axes, and swords to demolish blocks in a confined area and earn rewards along the way. The more blocks you smash, the more powerful your tools become!

items.title: Pixelartist Clicker
items.description: Pixelartist Clicker is a relaxing clicker game to draw pixel art and collect it. Buy various upgrades to increase your drawing speed and eventually automate it. You can reset all your progress to increase your level, which permanently increases various perks, allowing you to quickly catch up and surpass your previous progress.

items.title: Planet Clicker
items.description: Planet Clicker is a simple clicker game in which your goal is to increase energy production and colonize other planets. Buy and upgrade various means of energy production, and watch the units flow!

items.title: Planet Clicker 2
items.description: Planet Clicker 2 is a clicker game where you increase energy production and expand to new planets. Buy and upgrade your energy production to keep upgrading. There are several new features and planets in this second version of the game!

items.title: Planet Evolution: Idle Clicker
items.description: Planet Evolution: Idle Clicker is an idle game where you build your own planet the way you like! It is an easy-to-learn, simple, and relaxing idle game in which you can decorate and build your own unique planets in different areas of the universe with beautiful objects.

items.title: Planet Life Idle
items.description: Planet Life Idle is an incremental idle game where you embark on a cosmic journey to create and grow your very own planet. Start small, collect resources like grass, and gradually bring your planet to life by unlocking amazing new features. From robots to trees and clouds, your planet will evolve into a vibrant world full of life and surprises. Sit back, relax, and watch as your hard work transforms your humble beginnings into a thriving, self-sustaining planet.

items.title: Planet Miner FRVR
items.description: Planet Miner FRVR is a clicker game where your goal is to amass tons and tons of gold from different planets, so you can get enough gold to access more planets where you can mine more gold, and so on. Don't let that description fool you though, this is not a boring game. There are a lot of things to do, like clearing up meteors, digging up for treasure, and continuously upgrading your planets, miners, and mining materials so you can optimize your farming.

items.title: Planetary Terraformer
items.description: Planetary Terraformer is a relaxing clicker game where aliens breathe life into barren planets, one upgrade at a time! Start with a lifeless rock and transform it step by step. Build the atmosphere, seed clouds, grow forests, spark civilization, and send satellites into orbit. Every click brings your alien world closer to thriving life.

items.title: Plinko Clicker
items.description: Plinko Clicker is a game of chance and strategy where every ball you drop bounces through pins to multiply your rewards. With each click, you launch new balls, watch your earnings grow, and unlock upgrades. Add extra pins, strengthen your drops, and design the ultimate board to maximize your winnings with every bounce.

items.title: Poke the Presidents
items.description: Poke the President is a clicker game where you triumph over politicians using an arsenal of quirky weapons. Unleash your creativity, inflicting humorous damage on them and revel in their exaggerated reactions. Accumulate in-game currency to splurge on a variety of weapons and items from the shop. Get ready for a lighthearted and entertaining experience!

items.title: Pro Construction: Simulation 3D
items.description: Pro Construction: Simulator 3D is a creative building game where you shape bricks, transport materials, and construct incredible monuments. You’ll direct trains, merge trollies for faster deliveries, and upgrade tools to tackle massive projects. With soothing gameplay and stunning 3D visuals, you are free to unleash your imagination and build a thriving cityscape.

items.title: Quantum God
items.description: Quantum God is a clicker game where the game concept is based on the universe expansion theory. The main mechanic is to increase the size of your universe. In this game you will buy various physical objects and thereby increase your income. Also, you can upgrade your buildings by resetting their number to one. When you will gather enough size, you will be able to gain prestige points named "U-Coins". There are also several achievements in the game, and you will receive various rewards for completing them. You will go from the size of neutrinos to the size of humans, stars, galaxies, and even much larger objects!

items.title: Race Clicker: Drift Max
items.description: Race Clicker: DRIFT MAX is an action-packed clicker game that puts you in the driver’s seat of intense drift races. Get ready to tap your way to victory in this fast-paced game where every split-second decision counts. Are you ready to drift your way to the top?

items.title: Race Clicker: Tap Tap Game
items.description: Race Clicker: Tap Tap Game is a clicker game with a thrilling racing experience that challenges your speed, agility, and strategy. Control your runner with a single tap through intricate tracks and obstacles. Train your character to enhance muscle, speed, and endurance, unlocking new skills and items. Master quick reactions and strategic speed usage to outpace opponents and claim victory. With stunning scenery and varied terrain, find the balance between speed and endurance to become the ultimate race champion.

items.title: Racer Clicker
items.description: Racer Clicker is a fast-paced tap-to-race game where each tap accelerates your car, pushing you past rivals on the track. Feel the rush as you overtake competitors and speed your way to victory. Enjoy the intensity of racing right at your fingertips with every click!

items.title: REDLINE: Idle Front
items.description: REDLINE: Idle Front is a sleek idle-clicker hybrid where you build and upgrade five high-tech turrets to crush endless waves of enemies. Strategically deploy machine guns, shotguns, snipers, missile launchers, and lasers to handle bosses every five waves. Tap to overclock your turrets for extra firepower and plan upgrades to master this clean, minimalist turret defense challenge.

items.title: Resource Clicker
items.description: Resource Clicker is an addictive game where you collect resources by clicking and building mines. Discover new locations, uncover secrets, and advance in resource mining. Immerse yourself in the colorful world and engaging gameplay as you progress.

items.title: Revolution Idle X
items.description: Revolution Idle X is a newly remade version of the classic game, boasting various features and complexities. Despite being a demo, this version surpasses the content and graphics of its predecessor. The objective is simple; fill circles to increase your numbers and achieve the rainbow spectrum. Enjoy the infinite possibilities of prestige, promotion, and endless gameplay. Start having fun now!

items.title: Rocket Launch
items.description: Rocket Launch is an exciting clicker game where you accelerate space rockets to earn money and make upgrades. Click to boost your rocket's speed and accumulate wealth for enhancements. Purchase new rockets with unique features, such as higher speed or greater fuel capacity. Compete in special race sections for additional rewards and thrills. Manage clicks strategically to maximize performance and progress. Immerse yourself in stunning space visuals and dynamic gameplay. Enhance your rocket, progress strategically, and achieve victory in the depths of space!

items.title: Room Clicker
items.description: Room Clicker is an awesome idle clicker game with a simple premise. You can click anywhere in the room to earn cash. Click as fast as you like to generate income. The faster you click the better! Purchase a variety of upgrades as you progress.

items.title: RPG Idle Clicker
items.description: RPG Idle Clicker is an incremental game where you embark on an adventure to slay monsters. Click to deal damage, earn gold, and unlock powerful swords to enhance your attacks. Upgrade your blades and recruit auto-attacking heroes who battle monsters every second, even while you are offline. With stunning WebGL visuals, face tougher enemies and epic bosses in this browser-based game. Whether you prefer active gameplay or idle progression, RPG Idle Clicker offers endless growth. Get ready and become the ultimate monster hunter!

items.title: Run Idle
items.description: Run Idle is an idle incremental game where you will train these adorable pets who need to run fast and overcome various obstacles in their path. Volve your pets and help them reach new heights in speed and skill for them to pass all the challenges along their way and become true running champions.

items.title: Satisfying Ball Clicker
items.description: Satisfying Ball Clicker is an incremental clicker game in which the goal is to spawn vibrant, bouncing balls inside rotating circles. As the balls ricochet around the circle, they transform into dazzling colors, adding to the mesmerizing chaos. Each ball that escapes the circle and falls brings valuable rewards, which you can use to unlock powerful upgrades. The more you play, the more satisfying it becomes to watch your ever-growing collection of colorful balls bounce, collide, and evolve.

items.title: Sculpture Collector
items.description: Sculpture Collector is a clicker game where every tap reveals a path to hidden treasures buried in stone. Chip away to unearth rare, beautiful sculptures and add them to your growing collection. With each new find, you get closer to becoming the ultimate collector. Start tapping and discover the ancient wonders waiting for you!

items.title: Shoot Gun Clicker
items.description: Shoot Gun is a clicker game where you have to open your collection of a gun and destroy unusual figures developing your income and experience.

items.title: Simple Loot Idle
items.description: Simple Loot Idle is a clicker game to equip your hero with the better loot items you get from killing monsters. Sell loot which is worse and get some money to upgrade your hero. Become the strongest warrior in the world!

items.title: Sky Blocks Falling
items.description: Sky Blocks Falling is an idle Arkanoid-style game where you catch falling blocks to fill platforms and earn money.

items.title: Slicer Cursor Idle
items.description: Slicer Cursor is a unique idle game where the cursor takes center stage. The game revolves around slicing enemies using your cursor, with the aim of leveling up upgrades to increase its slicing power. As an idle game, "Slicer Cursor" offers players a satisfying blend of slicing action and strategic upgrades, making it an entertaining and casual experience for players who enjoy incremental gameplay!

items.title: Slime Clicker
items.description: Slime Clicker is the ultimate clicker game where you make the slime multiply by clicking and buy upgrades to increase the rate of slime production. Unlock achievements, complete quests, and discover new types of slimes and environments to make a perfect cool-looking combo. Unlock all possible slimes and get billions of slime. Unlock achievements and be the best slime farmer. Feed your slime to make him happy to produce even more slime. You can also use the rebirth button to start the game over with an epic permanent slime bonus.

items.title: Slime Farm 3
items.description: Slime Farm 3 is a clicker game where you breed a variety of slimes. Buy and collect the slimes they produce, and combine them to create unique species! Unlock achievements by completing various tasks. Dive into the world of slimes and build the ultimate slime farm!

items.title: Slime Farm Remake
items.description: Slime Farm Remake is a clicker game in which you have to breed slimes that bring you money. There are eight types of different slimes that you can breed. You can also dress them up in different hats to make them look fancy, buy flowers for them, build a monument or even put up a music center. There are also exciting events waiting for you during the game.

items.title: SpinHunter
items.description: SpinHunter is a cool hunting game in which you want to persevere and become the ultimate hunter in the world. You must use your weapons, skill and hunting technique to eliminate a variety of different animals.

items.title: Stickman Clicker
items.description: Stickman Clicker is a clicker game where you help a stickman become a billionaire. Tap to earn money, invest in upgrades, and unlock stylish accessories. Customize your stickman and achieve milestones by unlocking various achievements. How wealthy can you get?

items.title: Street Life
items.description: Street Life is a clicker merge game where you rise from the streets to stardom by tapping, merging, and jamming with your musical monkey. Perform soulful tunes, earn riches, and transform your style as you journey from a struggling street performer to a global sensation. Are you ready to conquer the world through music and dance?

items.title: Survival Runners
items.description: Survival Runners is a fast-paced adventure where you race through thrilling worlds, collecting coins and unlocking powerful gear. Upgrade your character, discover legendary swords from chests, and smash mines for extra loot. Battle rivals and conquer unique challenges in each new world. Can you rise to the top and become the ultimate Survival Runner?

items.title: Survivor Idle Run
items.description: Survivor Idle Run is an idle clicker game where you must survive the zombie apocalypse and become the ultimate hero! Take control of your character and battle against hordes of flesh-eating zombies. Along the way, summon powerful allies to fight alongside you and merge them to create even stronger allies. Want to speed up the action? Click to enter fever mode and take down enemies at lightning speed! With idle gameplay, your hero will keep fighting even when you’re away. Are you ready to take on the undead and save the world? Join the adventure now and become the ultimate survivor! Discover new allies so your hero won’t have to face the zombie apocalypse alone! Summon allies to help you in battle and watch as they change in looks and strengths as you progress through the game. Will you choose to fight alongside cowboys, ninjas, gangsters, or other powerful allies? Merge three allies to create a stronger one and unlock even more powerful characters as you reach new milestones. With each new ally, you’ll gain a unique advantage in the fight against the undead. Join the adventure now and discover your new favorite allies. Survive the relentless zombie apocalypse and become the ultimate hero!

items.title: Sword Adventure Idle
items.description: Sword Adventure Idle is a captivating clicker game where you uncover the rarest and most potent swords. As you travel through mystical lands, you encounter challenges and enemies while your power increases. With each new upgrade and blade, your strength grows. Are you ready to start your sword adventure?

items.title: Sword Merging Simulator
items.description: Sword Merging Simulator is a clicker game where you merge swords to make them stronger. Combine swords and destroy as many monsters as possible!

items.title: The Cool Merge
items.description: The Cool Merge is a clicker game where you witness the magic of merging creatures. Dive into a world brimming with fantastical beings waiting to be discovered. Match and merge these adorable creatures to unveil new surprises. With endless replayability, soothing music, and delightful visuals, it's an enchanting journey for all ages. So, immerse yourself and start merging to uncover the wonders that await!

items.title: Miner Madness Tycoon
items.description: Miner Madness Tycoon is an immersive game that takes you on a thrilling journey through time, allowing you to build a prosperous mining empire. Gather valuable resources to amass incredible wealth. With engaging gameplay and captivating mechanics, this game offers a fantastic experience where you can unleash your entrepreneurial skills and conquer the mining industry. Get ready to embark on an epic adventure and become a mining tycoon!

items.title: Tower Merge
items.description: Tower Merge is a game about merging blocks and increasing income. You start with one tower but are then able to get more towers. Special towers give you special bonuses. Try to make the tallest tower and reach the highest numbers.

items.title: Treasure Hunt Idle
items.description: Treasure Hunt Idle is a clicker game where you embark on a journey to uncover hidden riches. Progress through clicks and upgrading your resources. Level up to earn special boosts that will speed up your journey. Play for speed or casual play, pick your boosts wisely. Uncovering the wealth of Treasure Hunt Idle!

items.title: Weapon Tester
items.description: Weapon Tester is a clicker game where you have to test different weapons to kill monsters in various locations. The weapon shop and the upgrade menu will help you with this.

items.title: Weapons Journey
items.description: Weapons Journey is a clicker game where you control weapons and beat the incoming monsters. Go on an adventure and come across waves of different monsters. Unlock new weapons and powers to defeat them and become stronger and stronger!

items.title: Weaponsmith Idle
items.description: Weaponsmith Idle is an idle game where you play as a fledgling smith starting up a smithing business. Build and expand your weaponsmithing operation by refining only the finest resources.

items.title: Wednesday Clicker
items.description: Wednesday Clicker is a clicker game with a bunch of Wednesday's movie elements in it. Follow certain actions to give you income in various ways. Increase your income and open all the activities!

items.title: Your Chronicle
items.description: Your Chronicle is an adventurous text-based idle RPG game.

items.title: 456 Guys
items.description: 456 Guys is a massive multiplayer survival game where up to 456 players compete through unpredictable challenges until only one remains. You’ll race through dangerous obstacle courses, outsmart tricky puzzles, and clash in intense arenas like the Glass Bridges, Honeycomb Maze, and Sumo Ring. With rotating levels and weekly tournaments, every match delivers fresh excitement and global competition.

items.title: Airborne Motocross
items.description: Airborne Motocross is a driving game where your dirt bike transforms into a glider. Experience smooth physics as you race through secret paths and reach hidden treasure caves in the sky. Discover cool items like gravity changers, boosters, and more across hundreds of tracks, ensuring endless excitement and challenges.

items.title: Baby Chicco Adventures
items.description: Baby Chicco Adventures is a platform game in which you will help our little penguin to escape the dangers of the video game world.

items.title: Bobb's World
items.description: Bobb's World is an arcade game where you play as Bobb, who is very hungry and wants to eat all the food in the universe! Help him to go from planet to planet to eat all the food. Avoid hazards and jump on enemies to defeat them. Good luck!

items.title: BuildNow GG
items.description: BuildNow GG is an online build-and-shoot game featuring various game modes, weapons, and maps. Build and battle your way to the top of the leaderboard and hone your skills in offline training mode.

items.title: Car Sky Survival
items.description: Car Sky Survival is a thrilling multiplayer survival race where sharp reflexes and clever tactics decide who rules the arena. Pilot your custom-tuned cars through a dynamic two-level battleground—fight for dominance on the top platform, but if you drop, battle back from below for a dramatic comeback. Drift, dodge traps, and outlast rivals to claim ultimate victory.

items.title: Cat Life Simulator 3D
items.description: Cat Life Simulator is an adventure game where you experience life as a cat! Explore diverse locations, hunt animals, and complete quests for both animals and humans. Upgrade your skills, collect rare items for your home, and cook food. Help your cat grow, start a family, and raise strong kittens. Customize your cat’s appearance, buy home items, and earn rewards for your achievements!

items.title: Diep.io
items.description: Diep.io is a survival .io game where you control a circle armed with a cannon. The aim is simple: move around the map and destroy the other players whilst improving and upgrading your own circle.

items.title: Drop Ahead: Sandbox Madness
items.description: Drop Ahead: Sandbox Madness is an adventure game that offers endless fun and creativity. Jump into the excitement by creating and sharing your own levels, or try out those made by players worldwide. Compete for top spots on the leaderboards. With constant updates, fresh challenges, and customizable skins, the fun never stops. Ready to dive into the madness and show off your skills?

items.title: Fantasy Madness
items.description: Fantasy Madness is a roguelike action-survival game set in a wildpunk World of Fantasy. Your goal is to stand against evil forces who want to destroy the natural order. Use a wide arsenal of arcane powers granted by beloved Mother Nature to smash down orcs from the Clan of Aluminum Helmets and other cunning foes.

items.title: Highway Racer
items.description: Highway Racer is a 3D racing game where you speed down a highway dodging cars. Build up your speed and avoid hitting traffic while taking risks like near misses and driving on the wrong side for bonus points.

items.title: Kour.io
items.description: Kour.io is a multiplayer IO FPS game that plunges you into intense battles across various maps with many guns and modes to play!

items.title: Laser Tanks
items.description: Laser Tanks is a fast-paced top-down shooter where you command powerful laser tanks to battle alien monsters across varied landscapes. Blast through waves of wild creatures using an arsenal of weapons, pilot advanced tanks, and dive into Dungeon Survivor Mode for endless action-packed challenges in this relentless alien showdown.

items.title: Multiplayer Quick Tag
items.description: Multiplayer Quick Tag is a casual game tag where the last one out loses a life! With fast-paced platformer action, this casual game promises hours of fun and excitement for players of all ages. Are you ready to sprint, jump, and tag your way to victory in Multiplayer Quick Tag? Whether you're playing against the computer or competing with friends, the adrenaline-pumping excitement of this fast-paced platformer will keep you coming back for more. So, gather your friends, choose your control scheme, and let the tag games begin!

items.title: Online Robot Royale
items.description: Online Robot Royale is a high-speed shooting game where you enter 15-player elimination rounds with only one life to spare. Customize your robot's look before the match, then dive into intense, quick-fire battles where precision and agility rule. Track your stats, climb the leaderboards, and prove you’ve got what it takes to be the last robot standing.

items.title: POOBO Survival
items.description: POOBO Survival is a thrilling survival game where over 30 unique heroes face challenging stages. Collect weapons and green diamonds to enhance your chances of success. Survive 20 intense waves to pass each level. It may seem easy, but it's a tough battle that will test your skills and strategy.

items.title: Poxel.io
items.description: Poxel.io is a, io fast-paced first-person shooter that throws you into intense pixelated battles across diverse maps. Choose from a wide arsenal of weapons, master different game modes, and outplay your rivals to claim the top spot. Every match is a test of skill and strategy: do you have what it takes to dominate the battlefield?

items.title: Ragdoll Soccer 2 Players
items.description: Ragdoll Soccer: 2 Players is a sports soccer game that delivers the ultimate blend of soccer and chaos, where wobbly ragdoll physics takes over the field for hilarious and unpredictable gameplay! Step into the shoes (or, more accurately, the floppy limbs) of a stickman player and take on the challenge solo or face off against a friend in intense local multiplayer. With a variety of modes like Championship, Penalty Shootout, and single-player, there's never a dull moment.

items.title: Rock Climbing?
items.description: Rock Climbing is a thrilling casual game where you guide a unique two-headed creature. Stay composed as you aim for your landing spot, holding and releasing the button for a strategic jump. Rotate mid-air for precision, but be cautious not to collide with your second head to avoid unwanted bouncing. If you miss, savor the calming mountain sounds before embarking on your ascent again.

items.title: Sandbox City
items.description: Sandbox City - Cars, Zombies, Ragdolls! is a zombie game where you can explore freely and drive around the city, but, be careful of the zombie's infection! Find the zombies and kill them before the infection spreads around and the city.

items.title: Slime Jumper
items.description: Slime Jumper is a casual yet challenging 2D precision platformer that puts your skills to the test. Featuring a unique Jump-Only control system, this game delivers a fresh twist on platforming by limiting the player's input to just two buttons for maximum simplicity and precision.

items.title: Smash Karts
items.description: Smash Karts is a 3D multiplayer IO kart battle game. Drive your go-kart, pick up weapons, and blow up other karts to win! Keep playing to level up and unlock new characters and prizes.

items.title: Snake.io
items.description: Snake.io is an online io game where you control a snake, striving to survive in a battlefield of other snakes. Consume colorful food to grow larger and defeat rivals to become a formidable force

items.title: Snake Lite
items.description: Snake Lite is a casual arcade snake game with a competitive twist. Unlike other slither and snake games, you not only collect goodies and power-ups but also compete against other players to become the largest worm-like snake in the arena.

items.title: Sunset Bike Racing
items.description: Sunset Bike Racer is an adrenaline-pumping offroad adventure game that puts your skills to the test. Experience thrilling bike physics on challenging tracks. Earn stars to unlock powerful bikes and dominate the competition. Need a second chance? Reverse time and try again! Compete against ghosts, perform stunts, and discover hidden secrets on dozens of dynamic tracks. Are you ready to race into the sunset?

items.title: Taxi Rush
items.description: Taxi Rush is a driving simulation game where you race through city streets to deliver clients swiftly and safely. Navigate dense traffic, avoid roadblocks, and manage unique passenger demands to earn rewards. Upgrade and customize your taxi, strategize your routes, and climb the leaderboard to become the ultimate taxi driver in this dynamic urban adventure.

items.title: TV Invasion
items.description: TV Invasion is an arcade game where you take control of a character who is being attacked by dangerous TVs. You must use your TV remote control to defend yourself and defeat the TVs. As you progress through the levels, the TVs become more challenging to defeat, and you will need to use different strategies to win. How long can you survive the TV invasion?

items.title: UpRunner
items.description: UpRunner is a fast-paced vertical speed-running game that challenges you to be the fastest on the platform. Compete in thrilling multiplayer lobbies or design and share your own custom maps. Earn coins by winning races or completing challenges, and use them to unlock an array of unique, randomly generated skins that keep your gameplay experience fresh and personalized. With a vibrant community and endless customization, UpRunner offers endless excitement for speedrun enthusiasts and creative gamers!

items.title: Anime Boy
items.description: Anime Boy is a dress-up game perfect for anime fans. Create stylish outfits for a high school boy using a wide range of T-shirts, jackets, pants, and hairstyles. Customize his look to resemble someone you know, or design your ideal boyfriend. With countless clothing options, experiment and create handsome anime characters.

items.title: Anime Couple: Avatar Maker
items.description: Anime Couple: Avatar Maker is your ultimate creative escape into the world of anime character design. Craft stunning anime couples with romantic flair, dress up stylish girl avatars, and mix and match accessories, hairstyles, and outfits. With relaxing ASMR touches and a vibrant anime art style, this avatar creator lets your imagination shine in every love-filled duo you design.

items.title: Anime Couple Dress Up
items.description: Anime Couple Dress Up is a stylish game to dress up your favorite anime characters in the way you like!

items.title: Anime Girls Dress Up Games
items.description: Anime Girls Dress Up Games is a beauty game that vibrant fusion of fashion and Japanese pop culture. Immerse yourself in manga-inspired beauty, crafting outfits for charming animatronic characters. Whether it's the classic schoolgirl look or trendy attire, the options are vast. From high heels to adorable pets, explore endless possibilities. Hone your outfit designing skills in this delightful beauty salon experience.

items.title: Anime Kawaii Dress Up
items.description: Anime Kawaii Dress Up is a beauty game that offers the chance to style 6 cute dolls with a blend of Japanese fashion, mixing styles like cute, daily European, fairy tales, and more. You can create a variety of outfits using categories such as skirts, dresses, hairstyles, tops, accessories, and jewelry. The game captures different Tokyo styles, including Gyaru, Lolita, Kogal, and more, appealing to modern Asian youth. With a variety of characters and backgrounds, you can showcase your fashionista talent and create countless cute outfit combinations. Enjoy the world of kawaii fashion with this offline anime dress-up game!

items.title: Anime Princess Dress Up
items.description: Anime Princess Dress Up is a beauty game where you create your own kawaii princess character with a range of costumes and hairstyles. The game offers numerous items like dresses, tops, skirts, shoes, bags, and accessories to mix and match for endless combinations. You can customize your anime princess's face, skin color, hairstyle, and makeup, then add glitter wings, face masks, and even cute baby pets. With various backgrounds to choose from, including magic castles and princess rooms, this dress-up game is perfect for creating your ideal anime fashion princess. Share your creations with friends and enjoy the magic of princess dress-up and makeover games!

items.title: Anna's Story: Dress Up DIY
items.description: Anna’s Story: Dress Up DIY is a whimsical paper doll adventure where you style Anna for every chapter of her fairy tale journey. Choose from dazzling wardrobes filled with costumes, festive outfits, and chic accessories to fit each occasion, from magical dates to seasonal celebrations. With charming art and fairy tale vibes every look you create brings Anna’s story to life.

items.title: ASMR Beauty Care
items.description: ASMR Beauty Care is a soothing simulation game from the ASMR Treatment series, where you become a beauty care specialist.
