items.description: Blocky Demolition Derby is a fast-paced and fun demolition derby simulation game with blocky objects. Destroy other vehicles and show your dominance in the arena!

items.title: Boom Karts
items.description: Boom Karts is a high-speed racing game where you face off against rivals in competitions. You’ll drift through wild tracks, launch powerful boosts, and outmaneuver opponents in thrilling races. Every corner is a new chance to take the lead—so stay sharp, race smart, and aim for the podium with every lap.

items.title: Burnout Drift
items.description: Burnout Drift is a drifting game in our driving category featuring a range of custom cars and tracks. Choose your ride, take it to the streets, and earn money for your drifting skills. Use your cash to customize your car and buy epic new motors to take around the tracks.

items.title: Bus Driving Simulator
items.description: Bus Driving Simulator is a fun driving bus simulation that puts you in the driver’s seat of a very large vehicle for exciting long routes and passenger transport missions. The landscapes and sounds are quite real, adding to the pressure of your time-sensitive pick-ups and drop-offs. Test your driving skills and aim to become the top bus driver in town.

items.title: Bus Simulator Real
items.description: Bus Simulator Real is a detailed driving simulation that puts you behind the wheel of authentic Indian buses across diverse landscapes. From busy city streets to snowy mountain roads, each route challenges your skills with realistic traffic, weather, and passenger interactions. Customize buses, explore immersive environments, and master multiple modes as you build your career as a professional driver.

items.title: Car Crash Simulator Royale
items.description: Car Crash Simulator Royale is a 3D car crash derby game. This game is a mix between a crash simulator style engine, fast-paced action, demolition derby, and car war games

items.title: Car Eats Car: Arctic Adventure
items.description: Car Eats Car: Arctic Adventure is a car driving game with to survive and fight against rivals in a dynamic race. Overtake enemies, upgrade your monster car, and create your own car in the incubator. Good driving skills and turbo speed come in handy in this crazy driving simulator.

items.title: Car Eats Car: Underwater Adventure
items.description: Car Eats Car: Underwater Adventure is a survival car driving game with an underwater theme. Your friends are put to prison, do everything you can to free the evil cars. Become a car tycoon, upgrade cars, and fight the boss to survive in these ultimate crazy underwater races!

items.title: Car Eats Car: Volcanic Adventure
items.description: Car Eats Car: Volcanic Adventure is a survival driving game set in the pit of a fiery volcano. Blast through 2D levels in your mobile fossil, evading enemies and traps. Collect rubies to spend on upgrades for your vehicle to make it stronger for the next level!

items.title: Car Games: Car Racing Game
items.description: Car Games: Car Racing Game is a thrilling car racing game set in a vibrant urban landscape. Speed through the city streets, mastering various racing modes to showcase your skills. Compete in intense, night-time races, and enjoy the excitement of turbo driving games with stunning 3D graphics. Perfect for fans of fast-paced car challenges.

items.title: Car Sky Survival
items.description: Car Sky Survival is a thrilling multiplayer survival race where sharp reflexes and clever tactics decide who rules the arena. Pilot your custom-tuned cars through a dynamic two-level battleground—fight for dominance on the top platform, but if you drop, battle back from below for a dramatic comeback. Drift, dodge traps, and outlast rivals to claim ultimate victory.

items.title: Cargo Truck Driver Simulator
items.description: Cargo Truck Driver Simulator is a rugged simulation game where you take the wheel of powerful trucks to transport cargo across extreme terrains. Navigate snowy roads, muddy hills, and narrow zig-zag paths with precision and control. Face challenging levels, master off-road driving, and prove your skills as a determined transporter in a realistic 3D world.

items.title: Cargo Truck Parking
items.description: Cargo Truck Parking is a realistic simulation game where you take control of massive delivery trucks and master the art of parking. Sharpen your skills by navigating tight turns and handling manual gear shifts. Make deliveries safe, finish your tasks in time, and you will be rewarded. With each task, you’ll become a true expert in truck driving and precision parking.

items.title: Cave FRVR
items.description: Cave FRVR is an epic piloting game in which you must pilot your craft through a never-ending cave – you must be careful to avoid hitting the walls otherwise your airplane will take damage and eventually be destroyed! Use the left click mouse button to make your plane fly and control its movements – you must click at the right time and try to maintain a stable altitude.

items.title: City Car Driving Simulator 2
items.description: City Car Driving Simulator 2 is the second instalment of this fantastic 3D driving game. If you love racing and unlimited driving, you will surely enjoy this title! Before you start racing you can choose your vehicle – choose from a range of different super cars and sports cars – all with powerful engines and awesome controls.

items.title: City Car Driving Simulator: Online
items.description: City Car Driving Simulator: Online is a multiplayer driving game set in dynamic urban landscapes. Customize your ride both visually and mechanically, then hit the streets to earn cash by pushing your skills to the limit. Engage in heart-pounding pursuits with law enforcement, outmaneuvering relentless cops to prove you're the ultimate outlaw. Unleash your creativity by designing your own stunt-filled playgrounds throughout the city. Team up with friends or challenge rivals in intense online multiplayer action, racing, drifting, and competing in real-time with players from around the world.

items.title: City Car Driving Simulator: Stunt Master
items.description: City Car Driving Simulator: Stunt Master is the fifth episode in the awesomeCity Car Driving Simulatorseries. Customize and drive your favorite car around the neon-lit city streets, building up notoriety and points for cars and upgrades.

items.title: City Car Driving Simulator: Ultimate 2
items.description: City Car Driving Simulator: Ultimate 2 is an exhilarating driving game that puts you in control of high-speed stunts and thrilling pursuits against a relentless police force. Earn cash by performing daring feats and escaping the law, unlocking a wide range of vehicles, and upgrading their parts along the way. Navigate treacherous city streets, outmaneuvering the police through intricate traffic, narrow alleys, and busy highways. Stay ahead of the game with lightning-fast reflexes, strategic thinking, and exceptional driving skills. Customize and upgrade your vehicles to build the ultimate ride for an unforgettable driving experience.

items.title: City Classic Car Driving: 131
items.description: City Classic Car Driving: 131 is a car driving game to test your driving skills. Take your ride, reach high speeds, drive through traffic, and lose the cops. Customize your car in the garage and show it off on the roads of the city. Complete missions like races, pursuits, drift events, and earn more cash. Prepare yourself to be the drift and racing king!

items.title: Crash & Stunt
items.description: Experience the thrill of realistic car crashes in Crash & Stunt! This dynamic crash sim is packed with cars, tuning options, and exhilarating ragdoll jumps. Explore a range of tracks and complete missions for extra rewards!

items.title: Crazy Motorcycle
items.description: Crazy Motorcycle is a driving game where you guide a noob rider on a high-speed motorcycle to the finish line. Navigate through thrilling levels, jumping over gaps and dodging obstacles. Get ready for an adrenaline rush as you tackle exciting challenges on your way to victory!

items.title: Crazy MotoX Multiplayer
items.description: Crazy MotoX Multiplayer is a fast-paced 2D multiplayer motocross racing game that throws you into ever-changing tracks. You’ll race against others, navigate wild terrain, and push your reflexes to the limit. Each day brings a brand-new course, so sharpen your skills and aim for the top of the leaderboard with every daring run.

items.title: Crazy MX
items.description: Crazy MX is a stunt motorbike game that you can play solo or with your friend locally. Showcase your daredevil skills with motorbike tricks like Superman, free hand and backflips. Whether riding solo or competing with a friend, get ready to unleash a flurry of jaw-dropping stunts and defy gravity on the track!

items.title: Crazy Plane Landing
items.description: Crazy Plane Landing is not your typical driving airplane game—here, you take the pilot’s seat in a gravity-defying airplane and launch into the skies. There is a serene exhilaration of soaring when you get the hang of the controls, but it doesn't last long. You need to land! Every flight pushes your skills to the limit as you navigate unpredictable terrains and intense weather conditions. Will you make a smooth touchdown or end in a spectacular, fiery crash?

items.title: Cyber Cars Punk Racing
items.description: Cyber Cars Punk Racing is a 3D car driving game with futuristic cars and theme. There are super vehicles, neon city, and many game modes. 16 supercars, 60 racetracks, 2 players, 1 free ride area, Hot Pursuit area, and a battlefield are waiting for you. This game has a vehicle purchase and development system, and you can race against artificial intelligence or drive freely.

items.title: Cyber Cars Punk Racing 2
items.description: Cyber Cars Punk Racing 2 is the second installment of theCyber Cars Punk Racingseries with newer cars, more engaging graphics, easier gameplay, and new maps. This series has a leaderboard, missions, and a great free driving range.

items.title: Cycle Extreme
items.description: Cycle Extreme is a mountain bike riding game to beat the extreme downhill tracks challenge.

items.title: Deadly Descent
items.description: Deadly Descent is a thrilling driving simulator that challenges you to make it down a treacherous mountain road. Your goal is to reach the finish line, but the path is filled with dangerous obstacles—any collision will destroy your car. Careful, precise driving is key to survival, making this game perfect for players who enjoy realistic car destruction and high-stakes simulation.

items.title: Death Chase
items.description: Death Chase is a battle-driving game featuring races on tracks filled with traps and obstacles. Buy upgrades and weapons for your vehicle and target other racers in the explosively chaotic Death Chase.

items.title: Demolition Derby 2
items.description: Demolition Derby 2 is an adrenaline-fueled driving game that puts you behind the wheel in a high-stakes battle for survival. Inspired by the chaotic excitement of demolition derbies across the globe, this game challenges you to smash, crash, and obliterate your rivals’ cars in a brutal quest for victory. Each match is a no-holds-barred competition where strategy meets sheer mayhem. Whether you’re slamming into opponents at full speed or maneuvering through wreckage to deliver the final blow, the intense action and bone-crushing collisions keep you on the edge of your seat. The goal is to outlast your competitors and reign supreme.

items.title: Demolition Derby 3
items.description: Demolition Derby 3 is a thrilling car game offering open-world driving and multiplayer modes. Choose from 100 vehicles, upgrade performance, and customize your ride. Enjoy 20+ tracks and demolition arenas, daily rewards, and first-person driving!

items.title: Drift Arena
items.description: Drift Arena is a driving drift simulator game in which you prove your driving skills and become the champion drift king once you master your balance, speed, and direction on the road.

items.title: Drift Escape
items.description: Drift Escape is an adrenaline-fueled game that pits you as a skilled driver evading police and military chases in a bustling city. Showcase your drifting talents while dodging obstacles and causing pursuers to crash. With realistic graphics and intuitive controls, it offers an immersive urban escape. Master the art of drifting, prove your driving skills, and become the ultimate evasive driver.

items.title: Drift Hunters
items.description: Drift Hunters is a free-to-play car 3D game that lets you experience the art of drifting with an impressive range of tuned-up cars and dynamic tracks.

items.title: Drift.io
items.description: Drift.io is a thrilling online racing game where you take on high-speed drift challenges across dynamic tracks. With realistic physics, stunning visuals, and customizable cars, you’ll immerse yourself in intense races. Compete in single-player or multiplayer modes, earn coins, and unlock exclusive cars and upgrades as you rise to the top.

items.title: Drift King
items.description: Drift King is a fast-paced car chase game where you outmaneuver pursuing cops, capture flags, and dodge obstacles for as long as possible. With simple two-button controls and instant restarts, the action never slows down. Choose your car, master tight drifts, and push your skills to survive the relentless, adrenaline-fueled pursuit.

items.title: Drive Taxi
items.description: Now drive your taxi to pick up all the passengers and deliver them to your destination. Also, pay attention to the other cars on the road.

items.title: Endless Hot Pursuit
items.description: Drive your car and survive as long as possible from the police chase! Make use of the weapons and obstacles around the maps to help your escape.

items.title: Endless Truck
items.description: Go on an endless truck ride in this fun driving game! Complete missions at each level. Collect money to buy upgrades. You can earn extra money by performing cool stunts. If you get a perfect landing you get a huge speed boost so aim for those as well. Keep going as long as you don't run out of fuel!

items.title: Epic Racing - Descent on Cars
items.description: Epic Racing - Descent on Cars is a high-speed demolition showdown where racing isn’t just about speed—it’s about survival. Crash, clash, and careen down wild tracks packed with brutal obstacles. Choose your car, master the chaos, and brace for bone-rattling impacts as you race to victory in a metal-twisting frenzy.

items.title: Go Kart Racing 3D
items.description: Go Kart Racing 3D is an exhilarating kart racing game featuring over 15 thrilling tracks. Challenge AI opponents, customize your cars, and upgrade your character's abilities. Earn rewards, unlock new levels, and get ready for an adrenaline-fueled ride!

items.title: GoKarts.io
items.description: GoKarts.io is a wild 3D multiplayer kart combat game where speed and strategy collide in explosive arenas. You’ll race, battle, and outmaneuver rivals using an arsenal of crazy weapons and power-ups. Level up to unlock bold characters, flashy karts, and fresh gear. Dive into seasonal events, collect epic loot, and leave your mark in this nonstop racing brawl.

items.title: Grocery Kart
items.description: Grocery Kart is a unique drifting game where, this time, you're not driving a car but a shopping cart instead! Choose your cart and head to the supermarket filled with goods. Show off your steering and drifting skills to maneuver between obstacles and collect as many groceries as possible. Collect Coke to boost your speed and avoid expired products. Try to complete all the missions and earn some cash. You can also compete with your friend locally in two-player mode. Show them who the Cart Drift King is!

items.title: Gun Racing
items.description: Gun Racing is a driving racing game where speed meets firepower. Blaze through intense tracks as you race against rivals armed with powerful weapons designed to destroy the competition. Upgrade your cars, fine-tune your driving skills, and unleash devastating attacks to dominate every race. Gun Racing features fierce, high-octane tournaments straight to the finish line.

items.title: Hard Wheels
items.description: Drive an awesome monster truck in Hard Wheels and overcome various challenging tracks. There are many obstacles along the way, and you will need all your driving skills to get past them. You must prevent the car from flipping over. Can you beat all 12 levels in this 2D side-scrolling monster truck game?

items.title: Heavy Duty: Vehicle Zone
items.description: Heavy Duty: Vehicle Zone is an action-packed simulation where you lead a fearless team of workers through high-stakes missions. Whether it’s building on rocky terrain, hauling cargo across choppy seas, or tearing down obstacles in the sky, your crew never backs down. Suit up, tackle every task head-on, and prove you’ve got what it takes to lead the ultimate workforce.

items.title: Highway Racer
items.description: Highway Racer is a 3D racing game where you speed down a highway dodging cars. Build up your speed and avoid hitting traffic while taking risks like near misses and driving on the wrong side for bonus points.

items.title: Highway Racer 2
items.description: Highway Racer 2 is a high-speedracing gamethat puts your driving skills to the test. Dodge the traffic and obstacles while collecting power-ups to boost your speed. Customize your car to your heart's content to reflect your style. Race against other players online in multiplayer mode! Are you ready to take on the highway?

items.title: Hill Masters
items.description: Hill Masters is a thrilling simulator where you test your driving skills across diverse vehicles, including trucks, buses, and police cars. Navigate rugged terrains and realistic traffic systems while mastering smooth controls and advanced braking techniques. Customize your interiors and adapt to challenging road conditions in this immersive driving experience designed to sharpen your abilities and precision.

items.title: Hill Racing
items.description: Hill Racing is a driving game where you get ready to tackle the thrilling challenges of hill climb racing as you navigate your way through treacherous terrain with cars of your choice. Collect stars to increase your score count and maximize your chances of winning, while ensuring you don't run out of fuel by collecting fuel bottles along the way. Immerse yourself in the captivating background themes as you embark on this exhilarating journey. Are you ready to conquer the hills, collect stars, and fuel your way to victory in this exciting driving adventure?

items.title: Hotgear
items.description: Hotgear is an ultimate racing game that challenges you to outpace rivals with sharp reflexes and bold decisions. You’ll customize powerful rides, navigate intense chases, and push your limits in daring escapes. Every pursuit tests your skill and strategy, keeping you on edge as you race toward ultimate dominance on the streets.

items.title: Aero Mania
items.description: Aero Mania is a high-speed racing game where you take flight on thrilling tracks packed with twists, turns, and surprises. Control a wild bird, use zany powerups to gain the edge, and soar past rivals in pulse-pounding races. Sharpen your reflexes, upgrade your ride, and aim to leave every challenger in your tailwind.

items.title: Inferno Drift
items.description: Inferno Drift is an arcade game where you have to drive and stay on the track as long as possible. Collect coins along the way to gain special abilities. Destroy your opponents to earn extra scores. Stay on the path and don't fall off the cliff, or you will sink into the lava abyss. This is a battle for survival. Can you survive and achieve the highest score?

items.title: Just Park It 12
items.description: Just Park It 12 is the twelfth episode of the semi-trailer truck parking series, Just Park It. You are facing tough situations inspired by real-life. You have to park your truck in difficult-to-reach spots, drive through heavy traffic, and all of this without heavily damaging your truck.

items.title: Krash Karts
items.description: Krash Karts is a high-speed, bumper-car brawl where every turn could spell victory or destruction. Race head-to-head, unleash wild power-ups, and send opponents flying in a chaos-fueled quest for glory. Dodge, drift, and demolish in this turbo-charged showdown that blends kart-racing thrills with demolition derby intensity! Are you ready to rule the road?

items.title: Mad Truck Challenge Special
items.description: Mad Truck Challenge Special is an action-paced monster truck racing game. Upgrade your truck to maximize its performance and do whatever it takes to be a winner! Love this kind of game? Then you should also checkMonsters' Wheels SpecialandDeath Chase!

items.title: Madness Cars Destroy
items.description: Madness Cars Destroy is a high-octane car driving game packed with six thrilling modes. Push rivals off narrowing paths in Funnel, survive the spinning Rotating Cube, or dodge bombs in Deadly Arena. Outsmart opponents in Right Color, evade traps in Deadly Bouncers, and pass the explosive Hot Potato. Choose your ride and jump into intense, fast-paced action!

items.title: Mega Ramp Car Game: Car Stunts
items.description: Mega Ramp Car Game is a thrilling driving game where you race on wild tracks and perform incredible stunts in a 3D world. Choose from various cool cars, unlock exciting features, and push your limits. Get ready, rev your engine, and dive into the non-stop fun and excitement of Mega Ramp Car Game!

items.title: Mega Ramp Car Stunt
items.description: Mega Ramp Car Stunt is an adrenaline-pumping driving race game that challenges players to embark on an exhilarating journey through an array of mega ramps and stunt-filled tracks. With a selection of unique cars and an endless array of ramps and springboards, players are thrust into a world of high-speed racing, daring jumps, and spectacular stunts.

items.title: Modern Car Racing 2
items.description: Do you like classic and new race cars and high speeds? Modern Car Racing 2 is just for you! Do not forget to take your daily bonus. Enjoy this great 3D car driving game or try one of our many other car gameshere.

items.title: Monster Kart
items.description: Monster Kart is a kart racing game with several unique characters and a plethora of tracks. Reach the end of each track as fast as possible to unlock new karts and climb the leaderboard!

items.title: Monster Truck Arena
items.description: Monster Truck Arena is a stunt-driving game where you must drive a massive monster truck, do some tricks in the arena, and reach the finish line. Do some huge air jumps and mega stunts! Enter the Monster Truck Arena and drive the biggest, meanest, and most exciting monster trucks. Use the ramps as an excuse for amazing jumps. Drive your monster truck across cars that look like toys compared to you, and do loop-the-loops. Most importantly, do all of it with style. Complete all 50 different missions to test your driving skills, and show off your skill!

items.title: Moscow Metro Driver 3D
items.description: Moscow Metro Driver 3D is a realistic train-driving experience where you operate authentic metro models across detailed routes. Transport passengers, explore iconic stations and hear genuine onboard announcements. Master driver mode to control speed, stops, and schedules, or enter training mode to learn the fundamentals. Every journey captures the atmosphere of Moscow’s bustling underground network.

items.title: Moto Maniac
items.description: Just likeMoto X3M, Moto Maniac lets you drive a dirt bike and overcome challenging obstacles-filled courses to safely reach the finish line.

items.title: Moto Maniac 2
items.description: Moto Maniac 2 is a side-scrolling dirt bike riding game with a mission to overcome all the obstacles as fast as you can. This game is a sequel toMoto Maniacand set in a different environment. This time you are playing on bridges in the night. The bridges are under construction, so you have to be careful not to fall into the abyss and not to hit your head. On top of the obstacles on the way, it's dark! Fortunately, you have a drone that will light your way.

items.title: Moto Maniac 3
items.description: Moto Maniac 3 is the sequel to Moto Maniac 2, a bike trial game. This time there is a wild bear that is chasing you, so better make it quick to the finish line!

items.title: Moto Racing Club
items.description: Moto Racing Club is a high-speed 3D driving bike game where you are tasked to tear through bustling city highways, dodge traffic, and push your reflexes to the limit as you race to victory. Choose from 3 unique characters and take on five dynamic levels, each packed with twists, turns, and ever-increasing challenges. Use your nitro boosts to surge ahead and perform jaw-dropping stunts to outmaneuver rivals in a bid for the top spot.

items.title: Moto X3M
items.description: Moto X3M is a driving bike game that takes dirt bike racing to the next level. It combines high-speed thrills with a test of precision and timing across 22 adrenaline-filled levels. Each course introduces fresh, intense obstacles—from gravity-defying loops to dangerous ramps and explosive traps—keeping you on the edge of your seat. Gear up, strap on your helmet, and prepare to perform stunts of a lifetime as you race against the clock.

items.title: Moto X3M 4 Winter
items.description: Moto X3M 4 Winter is a driving game, the fourth installment in the addictive Moto X3M series. In this version ofMoto X3M, you’ll be venturing through an icy road packed with 15+ new levels. Do stunts, break records, and enjoy the scenery in this fuel-soaked winter wonderland!

items.title: Moto X3M 5: Pool Party
items.description: Moto X3M 5: Pool Party is the 5th excellent title in the Moto X3M series. The gameplay is just as exciting as inthe original Moto X3M: you control a motocross bike and must work your way through a series of levels as fast as you can.

items.title: Moto X3M 6: Spooky Land
items.description: Moto X3M 6: Spooky Land is a driving game, the spooky sixth installment in the Moto X3M series. Drive your motorbike through Halloween-themed tracks filled with obstacles and stunt opportunities. Get your bike through the trials quickly to earn more points! Log in to your CrazyGames account to save your progress and continue using it on another device.

items.title: MotoGP: Motocross Race
items.description: MotoGP Motocross Race is an adrenaline-fueled racing game where MotoGP and Motocross worlds collide. Race through tracks and rugged terrains as you push your skills and speed to the limit. With high-speed asphalt races and thrilling off-road challenges, you’ll experience intense, action-packed gameplay perfect for any motorbike enthusiast.

items.title: Mr. Racer - Car Racing
items.description: Mr Racer - Car Racing is a fast-paced driving game where you speed through traffic-packed streets in sleek supercars, taking on challenges to prove you're the ultimate racer.

items.title: MR RACER Stunt Mania
items.description: MR RACER Stunt Mania is a thrilling 3D arcade racer that blends high-speed action with jaw-dropping stunts. Tackle challenging tracks filled with ramps, obstacles, and fierce AI rivals as you unlock cars, upgrade performance, and master unique environments. With smooth controls, vibrant visuals, and endless level-based challenges, it delivers a racing experience that’s both casual and competitive.

items.title: MX Offroad Master
items.description: MX Offroad Master is a driving bike game where you cycle down steep mountain slopes. Hop on any of the four mountain bikes and get ready for high-octane stunts. You can play either free ride or mountain ride game modes, and there is the option to play locally with a friend or solo.

items.title: Nitro Burnout
items.description: Nitro Burnout is a realistic car simulator that puts you in control of precision drifting, blazing speed runs, and deep vehicle customization. You’ll master lifelike physics, swap engines, fine-tune performance, and leave your mark on every track. Every turn sharpens your skills—and every race brings you closer to ultimate driving mastery.

items.title: No Limits: Drag Racing
items.description: No Limits: Drag Racing is the ultimate car racing experience, designed to push your driving skills to the limit! Compete in fast-paced, adrenaline-pumping street races against fierce opponents. Customize your ride with upgrades, fine-tune engine performance, and dominate the track. With realistic physics, stunning graphics, and a variety of tracks, every race is an intense battle for victory. Can you rise to the top and become the drag racing champion?

items.title: OK Parking
items.description: Drive the cool-looking red car into the marked parking locations without hitting any obstacle.

items.title: Paperly: Paper Plane Adventure
items.description: Paperly: Paper Plane Adventure is an exciting game where you must fly a paper plane and reach your destination. Avoid any objects that will hinder your way, collect extra time and Quantum as you fly, accelerate your paper plane, and reach the finish. Gravity will be your best friend in your journey of exploration, and it will act as an engine for your paper plane, so make sure to make the best use of it. Diving down will give you more momentum, and going up will take momentum from your airplane. Take a wind boost and dash on the air like crazy!

items.title: Parking Fury 3D: Side Hustle
items.description: Parking Fury 3D: Side Hustle is a high-speed driving mission game where you take on various roles, from taxi driver to ambulance hero, navigating busy city streets. You'll master parking, traffic dodging, and even pull off daring car heists while evading the law. Every mission challenges your timing, precision, and driving skills.

items.title: Parking Space
items.description: In Parking Space, you have to skillfully drive cars and park them perfectly at the designated locations.

items.title: Perfect Drive
items.description: Perfect Drive is a fast-paced driving game that puts your skills to the test. Whether you're a seasoned driver or just starting out, buckle up and prove your abilities on the road. With every challenge, you'll need quick reflexes and precision to show you're the ultimate driver.

items.title: Decorate My BMW M5
items.description: Decorate the BMW to look as cool and pimped out as possible.

items.title: Pizza Car
items.description: Pizza Car is a simulation game where you do what it takes to be the city’s ultimate pizza chef on wheels! Get behind the wheel of your pizza car and bring hot, fresh pizzas to hungry customers! From busy city streets to quiet suburban neighborhoods, every order is a chance to prove your skills as both a chef and a driver. Take orders, prepare delicious pizzas, and keep customers happy to grow your business!

items.title: Plane Chase
items.description: Plane Chase is a driving game where you chase planes in your souped-up ride, aiming to leap into them mid-flight! Maneuver through absurd obstacles, make daring jumps, and customize your car for the ultimate getaway. With split-second decisions and strategic boosts, can you master the craziest chase ever? Fasten your seatbelt and rev your engine – it's time for takeoff!

items.title: PolyTrack
items.description: Polytrack is a classic car racing game with a slight twist. You race a car you've customized, on a track you might have designed yourself. This is a fast-paced, low-poly driving game featuring thrilling loops, jumps, and high-speed action where every millisecond counts.

items.title: Racing Empire
items.description: Racing Empire is an adrenaline-pumping game that lets you build your own racing dynasty. Earn tokens, upgrade and customize your car, and push your limits on the track. With high-speed action and strategic car modifications, Racing Empire lets you prove you're the ultimate racing mogul. Get ready to race and conquer the competition!

items.title: Racing in City
items.description: Racing in City is a driving game where you dodge traffic and complete challenges. Navigate through city traffic on a range of tracks while sitting with a view from behind the wheel. Participate in a long and illustrious driving career. Earn points and cash them in for cars and upgrades.

items.title: Racing Limits
items.description: Racing Limits is a racing game that lets you push your skills to the max. Race and overtake vehicles in city and highway traffic with four thrilling game modes: carrier, infinite, against-time, and free mode. Choose between one-way and two-way traffic, and experience three times of day - 'Morning,' 'Sunset,' and 'Night.' With multiple camera angles, sensitive controls, and realistic physics, it's a high-speed adventure you won't want to miss. Customize, upgrade, and take on numerous race events in this graphically stunning racing world!

items.title: Rally Racer Dirt
items.description: Rally Racer Dirt is a rally drift-based game, allows you to drift on both asphalt and dirt terrains while navigating through hills. This category is redefined with the introduction of Rally Racer Dirt, offering the best realistic and stunning controls for a rally game. Enjoy the experience of drifty and realistic tuned physics, coupled with detailed graphics, various vehicles, and racing tracks. Be a rally racer, driving like Ken Blocks and Collin McRae on the tracks. The game features a Realtime Multiplayer Mode, 13 different rally cars, tunable cars with adjustable features, upgradable cars and drive properties, 5 different tuned tracks, and more. Choose between two main game modes: Challenge mode, with 60 different challenges to pass, and Survival mode, where you drift and drive as long as you can, passing checkpoints.

items.title: Real Car Parking
items.description: Real Car Parking is a skill-testing game that challenges your parking abilities. With various parking lots, vehicle types, and difficulty levels, it's a fun way to improve your skills. Experience realistic graphics, intuitive controls, and a wide range of vehicles as you navigate through narrow streets, office buildings, and more. Get ready to park like a pro and become a parking master!

items.title: Real Cars in City
items.description: Real Cars in City is a 3D car simulation with superb graphics and various game modes. This game has realistic vehicle driving physics and quality graphics. There are 20 sports cars, 36 racetracks, 1 free ride area, a police chase area, and a crash derby area. There is a vehicle purchase and development system in the game. You can race against artificial intelligence or drive freely.

items.title: Real Drift World
items.description: Real Drift World is a dynamic driving experience where you can explore the city or map freely, either on foot or behind the wheel. Master thrilling drifts, tackle challenging road features, and catch serious air on ramps. Switch up the adventure with multiple maps, parking levels, and tournaments. In this limitless world, your skills make the rules.

items.title: Real Drive 3D Parking Games
items.description: Real Drive 3D Parking Games is a parking car simulation game where you start with an SUV and unlock various vehicles as you progress. Test your driving skills in challenging levels, from rooftop terrains to off-road adventures. Master manual gear shifting and precision parking while enjoying a wide selection of cars, including sedans, trucks, muscle cars, and supercars. Get ready to unleash your inner racer and conquer each level with finesse!

items.title: Retro Garage
items.description: Retro Garage is a detailed workshop adventure where you diagnose, repair, and customize vehicles piece by piece. Each car features over 50 parts across the body, chassis, and engine, challenging you to replace or restore damaged components. Buy new or vintage cars, tune and paint them, then either sell for profit or keep as collectibles. Beyond repairs, test your creations in drag races, racing tracks, and ring circuits. Expand your workshop, unlock new locations, and explore a collection of iconic cars from the 50s to 90s, spanning both USSR and European classics.

items.title: Rovercraft
items.description: Rovercraft is a driving arcade game that puts your creativity and driving skills to the test. Build and customize your very own rover, outfitting it with powerful tools like jet engines, super-wheels, and other high-tech upgrades to tackle challenging alien landscapes. Each terrain is a unique puzzle, filled with treacherous obstacles and steep climbs, requiring both ingenuity in your design and precision in your driving. As you navigate through these extraterrestrial courses, the true challenge lies in achieving the perfect balance between your engineering prowess and your skills behind the wheel.

items.title: Rude Races
items.description: Rude Races is a racing game, but instead of just a regular race, you can also swing your weapon to fight your opponents and make them lose the race. You can also modify your ATV and complete all the tasks available to make a perfect score. Grab your weapon and join the battle with Rude Races.

items.title: Rush Car Driving: Race Master
items.description: Rush Car Driving: Race Master is a driving game that delivers thrilling action as you navigate heavy traffic. Push the limits of your speed and driving skills to become a winner! Experience the adrenaline of high-speed racing in heavy traffic, where split-second decisions can be the difference between victory and defeat. Explore a variety of immersive environments, from busy urban highways to rural roads. Choose from a wide selection of cars, from sports cars to muscle machines. Buckle up and start the race!

items.title: Sky Car Drift
items.description: Sky Car Drift is a car drifting game where you must compete drifting against your rivals on a thrilling track above the clouds. Master the art of drifting and aim for the longest drifts without crashing or falling off the edge to earn valuable trophies. Collect trophies to unlock a wide range of cool rewards, including over 200 cars, 120 drivers, 500 emotes, and 10 unique skies. Climb the trophy ladder to gain exclusive titles and showcase your skills. Compete in various drift categories, aim for the top of the leaderboards, and secure your spot in the prestigious hall of fame. Get ready to soar in Sky Car Drift!

items.title: Sky Riders
items.description: Sky Riders is a high-speed casual vehicle driving game. Put your driving skills to the test as you complete several challenging tracks. Stay focused and avoid falling off! Whether you're behind the wheel of a car or riding a motorcycle, prepare for an adrenaline-fueled adventure and unforgettable racing moments. Get ready to conquer difficult tests and feel the excitement of Sky Riders!

items.title: Sportcars Crash
items.description: Sportcars Crash is a driving game where every curve spells danger, and survival is the ultimate challenge. Get behind the steering wheel in various cars, each with its own unique traits and destructibility. Whether you choose to skillfully navigate to the finish line or revel in the thrill of crashing, the choice is yours in this adrenaline-fueled test of driving prowess and instinct.

items.title: Stickman Annihilation 2
items.description: Stickman Annihilation 2 is an action-packed ragdoll physicsstickman gamemade by Sergey Mezkhahov. Drive an assortment of vehicles through people, fire, walls, and enjoy the slow-motion spectacle. Rack up gold coins from causing damage and use them to purchase new vehicles and levels!

items.title: Stickman Skate: 360 Epic City
items.description: Stickman Skate: 360 Epic City is a fun stickman skateboarding game to try to collect all the coins and complete the levels successfully.

items.title: Stickman Zombie Annihilation
items.description: Stickman Zombie Annihilation is a vehicle driving game to reach the goal areas and kill stickman zombies along the way!

items.title: Street Race Fury
items.description: Race your car to the finish line first by clicking whenever the meter gets in the green zone. Have fun with Street Race Fury, a cool drag racingcar game!

items.title: Street Racer 2
items.description: Street Racer 2 is a driving drag-racing game where your goal is to win races, upgrade, and buy new cars. This game offers an exhilarating mix of play modes, including drag racing, off-road challenges, and arcade-style fun. Each mode delivers a distinct experience, whether chasing high-speed thrills, conquering rugged terrain, or enjoying adrenaline-packed track action.

items.title: Street Racing: Open World
items.description: Street Racing: Open World is a stunning driving simulator with realistic physics, limitless customization, and breathtaking graphics. Build and tune your dream car with countless parts and vinyls, then put your skills to the test across a massive open world filled with diverse environments, from city streets to desert dunes. Complete tasks, earn money, unlock new cars, and upgrade them. Experience the thrill of high-speed racing!

items.title: Stunt Paradise
items.description: Stunt Paradise is a high-octane driving adventure packed with daring stunts and electrifying challenges. Push your limits as you soar off ramps, pull off jaw-dropping flips, and crash through explosive obstacles. Every turn delivers a new thrill, testing your reflexes and courage. Are you ready to conquer the ultimate playground for fearless drivers?

items.title: Sunset Bike Racing
items.description: Sunset Bike Racer is an adrenaline-pumping offroad adventure game that puts your skills to the test. Experience thrilling bike physics on challenging tracks. Earn stars to unlock powerful bikes and dominate the competition. Need a second chance? Reverse time and try again! Compete against ghosts, perform stunts, and discover hidden secrets on dozens of dynamic tracks. Are you ready to race into the sunset?

items.title: Super Racing GT: Drag Pro
items.description: Super Racing GT: Drag Pro is a fun and challenging drag racing game in which you must test your racing skills on a variety of awesome drag strips from around the world. In this drag racing game the controls are realistic – instead of just mashing the acceleration you must time your gear shifts perfectly and find a balance between gear changing and acceleration.

items.title: Super Retro Chase
items.description: Super Retro Chase is a car-driving game to escape the police chase while also activating different checkpoints. Trick the cops with your drifting technique, upgrade your car, and get ready for your next drive! For another challenge, you can tryEndless Hot Pursuit.

items.title: Syder Hyper Drive
items.description: Syder Hyper Drive is a futuristic stunt car game where you can perform thrilling stunts using a variety of cool vehicles. Unlock and upgrade different rides as you tackle challenging missions in an endless adventure. Show off your skills, conquer obstacles, and push your stunt-driving limits to the max!

items.title: Taxi Driver: Master
items.description: Taxi Driver: Master is a role-playing adventure game where you navigate city streets, ferrying passengers to their destinations. Explore a vast cityscape, interact with diverse clientele, and hone your driving prowess. Maneuver your taxi using keyboard controls, ensuring timely drop-offs to earn high ratings. With realistic simulation and mobile compatibility, it's a thrilling challenge for driving enthusiasts.

items.title: Team Order: Racing Manager
items.description: Team Order: Racing Manager is a Formula-1 racing management game. Try to bring only the best for your team and win the races!

items.title: The Cargo
items.description: The Cargo is a 2D cargo loading and truck delivery game with buyable upgrade options.

items.title: Time to Park
items.description: Time to Park is a fun and interesting car parking game. In this game, you must take control of a car from a top-down point of view and try to park it in a myriad of different spots. Your driving must be precise and you must line up in the parking spot perfectly! As you start out, the levels are easy, but the parking challenges become increasingly difficult.

items.title: Toy Rider
items.description: Toy Rider is a driving game where you will drive a small toy car and your goal is to reach your owner's hand. Perform jaw-dropping stunts such as jumping on ramps, flying through portals, and many other crazy stunts in this incredibly fun driving game.

items.title: Traffic Rider
items.description: Traffic Rider is a first-person driving bike endless game that puts you on a motorbike for an exhilarating ride. With a full career mode, lifelike bike sounds, and detailed graphics, it redefines arcade racing. Speed through highways, overtake traffic, and upgrade your rides to conquer challenging missions. Embrace the thrill and master the art of smooth racing.

items.title: Trials Ice Ride
items.description: Trials Ice Ride is a 2D trial bike riding game that sets in icy outdoor tracks.

items.title: Trial Mania
items.description: Trial Mania is a high-octane driving bike game that combines racing with daring stunts. Test your skills on challenging tracks, master extreme techniques, and aim to become the ultimate motorcycle champion. Each course pushes your abilities to the limit, offering a thrilling experience for every adrenaline-seeking rider. Join the fun and become the best motocross rider in Trial Mania!

items.title: Trials Ride
items.description: Ride your cool trial bike skillfully through the big hangar and try to complete the level without falling.

items.title: Trolley Racing
items.description: Trolley Racing is a driving game where you should drive a shopping trolley to the finish line without falling. Be careful with the obstacles and various traps. Make sure to brake the trolley when it's needed. Try to complete all the levels and be the best trolley rider! Good luck!

items.title: Truck Driving Simulator Game
items.description: Truck Driving Simulator Game is a driving game that immerses you in the thrill of truck driving throughout Asia. The graphics offer a realistic experience with unique truck models and captivating environments.

items.title: Truck Simulator: Russia
items.description: Truck Simulator Russia is a 3D truck-driving simulation game where you can explore beautiful open-world environments while driving various trucks! Take delivery jobs and be a real Russian truck driver.

items.title: Truck Space
items.description: Truck Space is a truck simulation game where you drive a large truck and park it in the marked parking area. Complete the task in the shortest time to earn a higher score and unlock various achievements.

items.title: Tuning Car Racing
items.description: Tuning Car Racing is an urban racing experience packed with variety and style. Explore a sprawling city, test 8 unique cars, and compete across 6 distinct racing maps with multiple variations. It’s pure high-speed competition set against the vibrant pulse of city life.

items.title: Turbo Cars: Pipe Stunts
items.description: Turbo Cars: Pipe Stunts is a high-octane stunt driving game. Browse various cars from classic Soviet models to powerful modern supercars and take them to the tracks. Blaze down slippery slopes and smash through obstacles. Earn gold and move to the next track!

items.title: Ultimate Night Racing
items.description: Ultimate Night Racing is a driving game where you test your driving abilities against probably the most talented adversaries your city brings to the table. This drifting unblocked game will allow you to flaunt your driving strategies as you leave your rivals in a dust storm. You can buy a new car and customize it to your liking!

items.title: Vehicle Masters
items.description: Vehicle Masters is a departure from the high-octane thrills of typical racing games. Instead, it offers a unique experience focused on precision and finesse.

items.title: Wheelie Up
items.description: Wheelie Up is a thrilling balance game where you aim to keep a perfect wheelie while navigating challenging levels. Control your bike’s balance, avoiding obstacles as speed and difficulty increase. Unlock new skins and bikes with each own characteristics. Test your skills, challenge your friends, climb the leaderboards, and become the ultimate wheelie master!

items.title: WheelX Race
items.description: WheelX Race delivers thrilling mini-car action across dynamic tracks filled with twists, shortcuts, and challenges. Customize your ride with engine upgrades, nitro boosts, and unique paint jobs, then take on time trials or intense head-to-head duels. Earn rewards, unlock new cars, and race through vibrant environments with intuitive controls and smooth, fast-paced gameplay.

items.title: Xtreme Moto Mayhem
items.description: Xtreme Moto Mayhem is a heart-pounding driving motorcycle game that challenges you to master intense stunts and high-speed races. With 100 different levels, a diverse collection of bikes, and various environments, you’ll push your skills to the limit. Upgrade your ride, earn rewards, and dominate the tracks in this ultimate two-wheeled adventure.

items.title: Xtreme Rivals: Car Racing
items.description: Xtreme Rivals Car Racing is an adrenaline-fueled 3D driving game that puts you behind the wheel of high-speed machines against fierce competitors. This car racing game challenges you with different roads and landscapes with rewards to match your effort.

items.title: 100 Doors
items.description: 100 Doors is a 3D point-and-click room escape game with interactive elements and puzzles that sets in a big school building.

items.title: 100 Doors: Around the World
items.description: 100 Doors: Around the World is a thrilling point-and-click adventure where you guide Henry Basil and his granddaughter Claudette on a high-stakes journey. Solve puzzles, battle fierce monsters, and uncover hidden secrets as you race to find the legendary Incan mask. Every choice matters in this gripping tale of exploration, danger, and family mystery.

items.title: 911: Cannibal
items.description: 911: Cannibal is a spine-chilling horror game where you have to escape the house of a maniacal cannibal. Playing as a kidnapped teenager, your mission is to find items that help you escape by solving various puzzles, all while covering your tracks to avoid detection. Can you outsmart the cannibal and escape his clutches, or will you be his next victim? Explore the ominous house, uncover notes, and unravel the twisted story of Minnesota's most frightening maniac.

items.title: 911: Prey
items.description: 911: Prey is a scary horror game with puzzles. In this game, you are a kidnapped teenager that needs to escape from a cannibal maniac who brought you to his house. Search for any useful items to help you get out of his house. Be very careful and cover up your tracks so that the maniac does not suspect anything!

items.title: Alice is Dead 2
items.description: Alice is Dead 2 is an escape game where you are in a Jail of Wonderland and try to get out from there. Enter a darkly twisted take on Alice in Wonderland as you play the assassin, White Rabbit who needs to escape from his cell in this point-and-click adventure game.

items.title: Alice is Dead 3
items.description: Alice is Dead 3 is the third sequel game from Alice is Dead. In this puzzle game, you will play as the bunny from Alice in Wonderland. Try to solve all the mysteries to finish the game.

items.title: And Again
items.description: And Again is a captivating platform puzzle game that challenges your intellect across 54 creative levels. Your goal is to collect three pins to unlock each portal, with every level offering its own unique twist. With charming cartoon-style graphics, 10 unique heroes, and immersive music, you'll stay engaged while solving puzzles, earning gold coins, and unlocking helpful hints.

items.title: Antarctica 88
items.description: Antarctica 88 is ahorror gamewhere you’re part of a rescue squad investigating a research station in Antarctica after communications went dark. It's up to you to solve the mystery. The game is filled with monsters, and there are various weapons to collect and puzzles to solve. Explore and discover objects to uncover more of the story. Can you open all the endings and find out the whole story?

items.title: Bad Cat - Granny's Return
items.description: Bad Cat - Granny's Return is a delightful casual adventure where you embrace the life of a mischievous feline. Explore a sprawling house filled with interactive objects to climb, scratch, and topple. Each room offers surprises, unique challenges, and exciting mini-games. Unleash your inner chaos-maker as you leave your mark, literally and figuratively, on every piece of furniture and decor!

items.title: Bathroom Escape
items.description: Bathroom Escape is an escape game where you must solve all the puzzles to escape from the bathroom. Find any objects that can be useful, and also, use your logic and memory skills to solve the riddles.

items.title: Bear Haven
items.description: Bear Haven is a horror game where you need to survive the night from the scary bear. You are a new part-time electrician in Bear Haven Motel who get a night shift job. There's a lack of guests at this time and also there are some strange problems with the electrical system at night, make sure you'll manage to fix them all before 6 AM or you'll be fired. But beware of the bear! Hide and turn off the light if you see one of them. Don't let the bear get you!

items.title: Big Giant Games (Prison Escape Puzzle)
items.description: Big Giant Games is a collection of thematic room escape games. Get some clues in the area and find your way to escape.

items.title: Black Light Escape
items.description: Black Light Escape is an escape game where you need to use logical reasoning to solve the most diverse puzzles. It takes attention and intelligence to escape, the game has a unique system of hints where the black light can guide you to the most diverse challenges responses.

items.title: Black Light Escape 2
items.description: Black Light Escape 2 is an immersive escape series that tests your logical reasoning skills through a variety of challenging puzzles. Escaping requires keen attention and intelligence, but fear not, as the game offers a unique hint system using black light to guide you towards solving diverse challenges. Engage your mind, have fun, and prepare for an exciting escape adventure!

items.title: Bomboo: Endless Bombing Fun
items.description: Bomboo: Endless Bombing Fun is an explosive Bomberman-style adventure where quirky ghost heroes take on slimes in endlessly challenging levels. Strategically plant bombs, smash obstacles, and grab powerful upgrades like speed boosts and remote blasts. Unlock colorful characters and themes as you spin for coins and conquer the chaos in this fast-paced, ghostly blast fest.

items.title: Break Free
items.description: Break Free is a casual game that puts your stealth and timing to the test as you escape from one guarded cell after another. Strike when the guards aren’t looking, dodge traps and dogs, and collect coins with each successful breakout. Use your earnings to upgrade your escape artist and take on even trickier challenges.

items.title: Chat Noir
items.description: Chat Noir is a fun little strategy game where you have only one goal - to keep the cat from running away. You'll do this by tapping/clicking on a tile which will make it impassable for the cat. Every time you change a tile, the cat will move one space. You'll have to be 3 steps ahead if you want to trap the cat in, so make sure to put your thinking cap on before starting!

items.title: Clicker Heroes Escape
items.description: Clicker Heroes Escape is an adventure escape game set in the enchanting world of Clicker Heroes. Solve intricate puzzles and uncover hidden clues to escape from various mythical realms. This game blends challenging escape mechanics with clicker gameplay, offering a fresh experience for both Clicker Heroes fans and puzzle lovers. Embark on a thrilling adventure filled with unique challenges and strategic choices. Are you ready to overcome obstacles and break free? Dive and experience a captivating blend of puzzle-solving and idle gaming!

items.title: Computer Office Escape
items.description: Computer Office Escape is a room escape game in a room with many digital stuff and PCs.

items.title: Cornfield
items.description: Cornfield is a pulse-pounding puzzle-survival game where you must outsmart a relentless corn monster. Navigate a shadowy maze filled with complex challenges, testing your strategy and nerves. Solve puzzles quickly and carefully to find the exit before the terrifying creature catches up and becomes their meal. Every step could be your last in this heart-pounding escape adventure.

items.title: Crazy Crypt Escape
items.description: Crazy Crypt Escape is an ancient-themed room escape game that will awaken the explorer within you. Step into the enigmatic crypt, a place steeped in mystery and rich history, where a labyrinth of cunning puzzles awaits your wit and ingenuity.

items.title: Crimson Room
items.description: Crimson Room is an escape room game originally developed in Flash. It was one of the first of its kind. Toshimitsu Takagi developed the game in 2004 and helped to popularize the escape room genre. To play the game, simply point and click. See if you can escape the Crimson Room!

items.title: Cube Stories: Escape
items.description: Cube Stories: Escape is an adventure point-and-click puzzle game that guides you into the depths of an abandoned mansion shrouded in mystery. You are a fearless video blogger on an adrenaline-fueled journey to uncover the truth behind a haunting urban legend. With every step you take, the eerie atmosphere tightens its grip, and the mansion’s shadowy corridors pull you deeper into the unknown. As you journey through the dimly lit rooms, cryptic puzzles and hidden clues await, each one unraveling more of the dark secrets concealed within the mansion's ancient walls. Your quick thinking and sharp wits are the only tools between you and this forsaken house's mysteries.

items.title: Daily AMazeBalls
items.description: Daily AMazeBalls is a fast-paced puzzle challenge where you guide a nimble ball through twisting mazes using flippers and bounce tricks. Each day delivers a brand-new set of clever traps and surprising turns that demand sharp thinking and quick reflexes. Navigate to the green goal with style and precision as you chase your next brainy victory.

items.title: Daily Kitchen Escape
items.description: Daily Kitchen Escape is a puzzle-packed escape game where each day reveals a new room filled with hidden clues and brain-teasing challenges. Use your wits to solve clever conundrums, crack codes, and uncover secrets as you try to break free. A fresh room awaits daily, how many can you outsmart in a row?

items.title: Daily Room Escape
items.description: Daily Room Escape offers a brain-teasing puzzle adventure game where you are in a unique room filled with intricate riddles and hidden clues. Sharpen your problem-solving skills and unravel mind-bending puzzles to find the key to freedom. Each day brings a new theme, a different set of challenges, and fresh surprises waiting to be discovered. Keep coming back for your daily dose of brain-teasing fun, and see if you have what it takes to outsmart each escape room.

items.title: Design House Escape
items.description: Design House Escape is an escape game where you must navigate through a series of challenging rooms in a mysterious house. Use floor plans and models to strategize your escape. Every corner holds secrets and obstacles to overcome. Can you unravel the mysteries and find your way out?

items.title: Diner in the Storm
items.description: Diner in the Storm is a puzzle adventure game that plunges you into a heart-pounding escape adventure, where danger lurks not only outside but within the walls of a seemingly ordinary roadside diner. Caught in the grip of a sudden and ominous storm, you seek shelter in a roadside diner, only to find that safety is fleeting, and the diner harbors dark secrets. As the storm rages on, you must solve a series of intricate puzzles that push your logic, wit, and nerves to the limit. Each puzzle reveals new mysteries about the diner’s hidden past.

items.title: Doors Castle
items.description: Doors Castle is a thrilling adventure through a haunted fortress filled with secrets, puzzles, and lurking horrors. Every shadow hides danger, every door holds a mystery. Explore eerie hallways, uncover hidden paths, and stay one step ahead of the creatures stalking the dark.

items.title: Doors: Paradox
items.description: Doors: Paradox is a fantasy escape puzzle game where you need to find objects to help you open the portal door. This game has beautiful 3D graphics and absorbing audio that you don't want to miss.

items.title: Dr. Psycho: Hospital Escape
items.description: Dr. Psycho: Hospital Escape is a thrilling horror escape game where you are trapped in a nightmare clinic and need to get out of there. Gather essential items to unlock doors and escape the clutches of the deranged Doctor Psycho and his psychotic patients. Time is ticking, you only have 3 days to break free. Navigate terrifying space and uncover multiple escape routes while avoiding detection. Hide in cleverly hidden places and explore the place carefully avoiding deadly traps. Can you outwit the doctor and secure your asylum escape?

items.title: DRAMA
items.description: DRAMA is a tricky platformer game with various puzzles to overcome. Think outside the box to complete the game with the most lives spared. Sometimes you have to find hidden objects, other times you have to use your skill, and in some cases, you have to put all your skills to the test.

items.title: Drift Escape
items.description: Drift Escape is an adrenaline-fueled game that pits you as a skilled driver evading police and military chases in a bustling city. Showcase your drifting talents while dodging obstacles and causing pursuers to crash. With realistic graphics and intuitive controls, it offers an immersive urban escape. Master the art of drifting, prove your driving skills, and become the ultimate evasive driver.

items.title: Drift King
items.description: Drift King is a fast-paced car chase game where you outmaneuver pursuing cops, capture flags, and dodge obstacles for as long as possible. With simple two-button controls and instant restarts, the action never slows down. Choose your car, master tight drifts, and push your skills to survive the relentless, adrenaline-fueled pursuit.

items.title: Elevator Room Escape
items.description: Elevator Room Escape is anescape room gamewhere you solve puzzles to open the elevator and get out! Can you solve all the puzzles and escape the elevator?

items.title: Embercry
items.description: Embercry is a thrilling adventure escape game where you unravel the mysterious disappearance from a locked house. Explore the captivating storyline of this room escape quest as you collect hidden clues, search every room, solve intricate puzzles, and ultimately find your way out while uncovering the main mystery. Are you ready to unravel the mystery?

items.title: Endless Hot Pursuit
items.description: Drive your car and survive as long as possible from the police chase! Make use of the weapons and obstacles around the maps to help your escape.

items.title: Escape From Pizzeria
items.description: Escape From Pizzeria is a adventure game where you’re trapped inside a dark, eerie restaurant with secrets lurking in every corner. You’ll navigate creepy hallways, dodge traps, and uncover clues to escape. Stay alert, think fast, and whatever you do, don’t let the chef catch you snooping around his haunted kitchen.

items.title: Escape From Prison Multiplayer
items.description: Escape From Prison Multiplayer is a thrilling multiplayer platformer game where your mission is to make a daring escape from prison! Customize your brave little mouse and race against time to break out. Each room you conquer brings you closer to freedom, but watch out for the dangerous traps and obstacles in your way! Can you outsmart the prison's challenges and make a successful escape? Test your skills and find out if you have what it takes to flee from prison!

items.title: From the Bunker
items.description: From the Bunker is an intense adventure puzzle escape game where the apocalypse has left you stranded in a desolate, crumbling bunker. With limited resources and danger lurking around every corner, your mission is to outlast the harsh environment, scavenge for critical supplies, and plot your escape before time runs out. As you navigate the bunker’s eerie corridors, you'll need to upgrade your tools, defend yourself against unexpected threats, and take on challenges that will push your ingenuity and strategic thinking to the limit.

items.title: Escape from Zombies
items.description: Escape From Zombies is a thrilling zombie action game where your mission is to save as many people as possible. Navigate through exciting levels, armed with a variety of weapons and simple controls. In this transformed world, overrun by zombies, it's up to you to guide survivors to the airfield for their safety. Exercise caution with missiles and exploding barrels to prevent harm to the people you're rescuing. The fate of humanity rests in your hands!

items.title: Escape Game: Room With a Lamp
items.description: Escape Game: Room With a Lamp is an adventure escape game where you must use logic to complete all the riddles in the house. Can you solve all the riddles? Let's find out!

items.title: Escape or Die
items.description: Escape or Die is an escape room puzzle game. You have 10 minutes to evacuate the room before the bomb explodes. The chances are slim, but if you think fast, you might survive!

items.title: Escape or Die 2
items.description: Escape or Die 2 is an escape room puzzle game. It’s the second game after the originalEscape or Die. You have 10 minutes to get out before poisonous gas fills the room!

items.title: Escape or Die 3
items.description: Escape or Die 3 is an adventure escape game where you must search the room for items that will help you escape. Search items in drawers, boxes, and anything else that you think will help you reach the end. Look carefully at the various patterns around the room and solve the riddles. Good luck to search for your way to escape!

items.title: Escape or Die 4
items.description: Escape or Die 4 is an escape puzzle game where you must search the room for items that will help you escape. Look through drawers, boxes, and anything else that you think will help you reach the end. Look carefully at the various patterns around the room and move quickly. You’ll need to find several items before you can escape.

items.title: Moon Trip
items.description: Moon Trip is an escape puzzle game where you are an experienced mission astronaut with a rocket that suddenly landed on the moon and must return to the Earth. There are many mysteries and puzzles that need to be solved for you to escape. You’ll discover bunnies, robots, spaceships, aliens, stars, treasure chests, and even a bar. Some puzzles will seriously test your IQ and tease your brain. Can you solve them all and fly back?

items.title: Escape Room: Strange Case 2
items.description: Escape Room: Strange Case 2 is an adventure-packed escape game that immerses you in a suspenseful journey through the dark and eerie corridors of a mysterious asylum. Unravel sinister secrets, solve intricate puzzles, uncover hidden clues, and unlock doors as you navigate through the haunting environment.

items.title: Escape Series
items.description: Escape Series is an adventure puzzle game where your mission is to search for useful items in various rooms to aid in your escape. Carefully examine every detail around you and use your logic to solve the challenging riddles that stand in your way. Each room presents unique puzzles, requiring sharp observation and clever thinking. Find the clues, solve the puzzles, and make your escape!

items.title: Escaping the Prison
items.description: Escaping the Prison is a wildly unique adventure puzzle game in which you aim to escape from prison! After being thrown in a prison cell, you must use anything and everything at your disposal to escape: teleporters, anti-gravity equipment, toilet plungers—nothing is off limits in your attempt to escape! But be careful because one wrong move or a split-second hesitation could send you right back to your cell—or worse!

items.title: Everytown
items.description: Everytown is an immersive point-and-click puzzle adventure that invites you into the mysterious world of a seemingly ordinary small-town hotel. But not everything is as it seems. As a young security agent sent to investigate, your mission is to uncover the truth behind the secrets that lie within and save lives.

items.title: Exhibit of Sorrows
items.description: Exhibit of Sorrows is a short horror game set in a curious circus-themed exhibit. Explore this strange interactive museum, follow instructions, and don’t upset the clown!

items.title: Faraway: Puzzle Escape
items.description: Faraway: Puzzle Escape is a fantastic 3D puzzle game in which you must explore a foreign landscape and solve the mystery of the explorers who came here before you. Each level presents an amazing 3D environment and a series of ancient ruins which you must search to find clues. You can check objects and break open pottery to find notes left from previous explorers. These notes help tell the tale of the ruins and the civilization that lived here.

items.title: Fleeing the Complex
items.description: Fleeing the Complex is an amazing stick-figure escape adventure game. You are trapped inside a small prison cell, and you must escape not just your cell but the whole prison! If you fail, death is awaiting you... The highly secured prison is guarded by some strong stick soldiers. You must make good and fast decisions to make it out alive. Good luck!

items.title: Game Cafe Escape
items.description: Game Cafe Escape is another room escape game from masasgames. This time you have to solve puzzles and escape from a beautifully designed game cafe.

items.title: Haunted School 2
items.description: Haunted School 2 is ahorror gameset ten years after the events in the firstHaunted School. Return once more to the eerie abandoned school to perform another exorcism.

items.title: Horror Tale 2: Samantha
items.description: Horror Tale 2: Samantha is a spine-chilling first-person horror adventure game. Help Samantha escape from prison and uncover new secrets about the terrifying antagonist who kidnapped her. Solve puzzles, meet interesting characters, and unravel the mystery!

items.title: Horror Tale 3: The Witch
items.description: Horror Tale 3: The Witch is a spine-chilling first-person adventure that plunges you into the eerie town of Lakewitch, where children are vanishing without a trace. Solve mind-bending puzzles, explore haunting locations, and face the sinister witch Wanda in your quest to uncover the truth. Will you unravel the dark mystery and survive the nightmare?

items.title: Horror Tale
items.description: Horror Tale Kidnapper is a frightening first-person horror adventure game. Solve the disturbing mystery of the missing children at Lakewitch. Who is the kidnapper, and why are they doing it? Where are the children disappearing, and how can we save them? It's up to you to find out.

items.title: House Escape: Office
items.description: House Escape: Office is anescape gamewhere you find tools and use them to solve puzzles. Can you find all the hidden clues and escape?

items.title: Infiltrating the Airship
items.description: Infiltrating the Airship is an adventure game that continues Puffballs United's string of popular games from this genre (other titles includeBreaking the Bank,Fleeing the Complex, andEscaping the Prison) and presents a new scenario for you to tackle.

items.title: Isometric Escape
items.description: Isometric is an escape game where you solve a series of puzzles to escape from isometric rooms. Find all the useful objects and use your logic and memory to solve the riddles.

items.title: Isometric Escape 2
items.description: Isometric Escape 2 is a challenging escape game where you need to solve a series of puzzles in order to escape from isometric rooms. Use your logic and memory to find useful objects and solve riddles. With an isometric perspective, the game offers a unique visual experience as players navigate through the rooms.

items.title: Isometric Escapes
items.description: Isometric Escapes is a 3D adventure escape game where you must search for useful items in the rooms to help you escape. Look carefully around the rooms, and use your logic to solve the riddles. Find your way to escape!

items.title: Jail Escape
items.description: Jail Escape is an engaging puzzle game where you solve clever challenges to break free from various environments. Use your logic and intelligence to uncover hidden clues. Each level tests your problem-solving skills with intricate designs and intriguing puzzles, keeping you immersed as you strive to escape.

items.title: Jailbreak: Hide or Attack!
items.description: Jailbreak: Hide or Shoot! is a casual escape game that combines the intensity of a shooter, the strategy of hide and seek, and mind-bending puzzles. Dive into a world of prison romance and challenge your wits and reflexes across numerous unique levels. With straightforward controls, this game offers addictive gameplay to help you unwind. Are you tough enough to make a prison break? Find out now!

items.title: Kitchen Escape
items.description: Kitchen Escape is an adventure escape game where you must use your logic to find the key and escape from the kitchen. Find tools to help you out, solve puzzles, and crack the passwords!

items.title: Krampus
items.description: Krampus is a horror game to put all the items on the plates, activate the spell, and trap Krampus! Can you defeat him?

items.title: Laqueus Escape: Chapter I
items.description: Laqueus Escape is a 3D room escape game. You have to figure out how to escape the mysterious place. Try thechapter 2!

items.title: Laqueus Escape: Chapter V
items.description: Laqueus Escape: Chapter V is the fifth episode of an escape game Laques Escape. Use your logic to solve all of the difficult riddles to finish the game.

items.title: Laqueus Escape 2: Chapter I
items.description: Laqueus Escape 2: Chapter I is an adventure escape game where you need to use your logic to escape from the room. You don't know how or when you've got into this strange facility. The time behaves strangely, and the place is ruined. Find your way out by solving all the puzzles and challenges!

items.title: Laqueus Escape 2: Chapter II
items.description: Laqueus Escape 2: Chapter II is a continuous series from the Laqueus Escape 2 adventure escape game. You are still trying to get out of this strange facility. Try to find all the clues that will help you solve all the riddles and successfully open the locked door. Things are getting more complicated, so prepare yourself to use your logic.

items.title: Laqueus Escape 2 - Chapter III
items.description: Laqueus Escape 2: Chapter III is an adventure escape game where you navigate a mysterious facility, unlocking doors by deciphering clues. Sharpen your vision and math skills to solve riddles and progress through this gripping escape experience. Uncover hidden secrets and overcome obstacles as you strive to break free from the enigmatic surroundings.

items.title: Laqueus Escape: Chapter II
items.description: This is the second episode ofLaqueus Escape: Chapter 1, a 3D thrilling room escape game!

items.title: Laqueus Escape: Chapter III
items.description: Laqueus Escape: Chapter III is the next episode of Laqueus Escape, a mysterious room escape game. Escaping was never this hard. Use your head and carry on!

items.title: Laqueus Escape: Chapter IV
items.description: Laqueus Escape - Chapter IV is a new chapter and new challenges of the Laqueus Escape series, a 3D room escape game. Look around, find clues, and use objects and solve puzzles to win this escape room game.

items.title: Laqueus Escape: Chapter VI
items.description: Laqueus Escape: Chapter VI is an episode of Laqueus Escape with a bigger and trickier 3D escape game than ever!

items.title: Little Cabin in the Woods
items.description: Little Cabin in the Woods: A Forgotten Hill Tale is an escape type game in which you are trying to escape the monsters from your past. You managed to escape them once and you went to live with your grandpa in the woods inside of a little cabin. The monsters have found you once again but this time you are brave and ready to take them on.

items.title: Machine Room Escape
items.description: Machine Room Escape is a room escape game with various machines to interact with.

items.title: Medieval Escape
items.description: Medieval Escape is a puzzle adventure game where you find yourself trapped in a room, it's up to you to uncover hidden clues, solve intricate puzzles, and locate essential items that will pave your path to freedom. Can you secure your freedom?

items.title: Mirror Room Escape
items.description: Mirror Room Escape is a puzzle adventure where you must navigate a mysterious room filled with reflective illusions. Solve intricate challenges by deciphering clues hidden within the mirrors, and testing your wits and perception. Every step unveils secrets and unexpected twists as you race against time to unlock the path to freedom. Will you outsmart the reflections?

items.title: Must Escape the Wizards Castle
items.description: Must Escape the Wizard's Castle is a puzzle-escape game where you must carefully explore your surroundings and interact with various objects by clicking on them. By investigating and collecting items, you can add them to your inventory for later use.

items.title: Mystic Escape
items.description: Mystic Escape is an escape game to reveal your lost memories that took place on the island. Enjoy this escape game experience by solving these challenging Japanese-style puzzles surrounded by beautiful scenery. Find mysterious artifacts and clues on the island that will lead you to the solution.

items.title: Noob: Island Escape
items.description: Noob: Island Escape is a casual adventure game where you help Noob build a new ship and escape from the island! Collect resources and build the means required to escape the island. How long can you survive?

items.title: Noob Miner 2: Escape From Prison
items.description: Noob Miner 2: Escape From Prison is an adventure arcade mining game where your survival depends on your skills and strategy! You control your noob miner to dig, fly, eat, purchase goods, and pretty much do everything possible to not only survive but escape from confinement.

items.title: Noob's Farm Escape
items.description: Noob's Farm Escape is an exciting adventure game where you help a cute pig find freedom. Navigate obstacles and avoid traps, with each level presenting unique challenges.
