The game blends puzzle, action, and strategy, requiring quick reactions and thoughtful decisions. As you progress, tasks become tougher, promoting logical thinking and spatial imagination.

items.title: Noob: Zombie Prison Escape
items.description: Noob: Zombie Prison Escape is an action platforming game inspired by the style of Minecraft. Your mission is to help Noob escape from a zombie-infested prison by finding keys, coins, solving puzzles, avoiding traps, and using parkour skills to navigate platforms. Along the way, you'll need to shoot down monsters with a crossbow, complete tasks involving torches, and face various challenges in 10 different levels. Fans of the Noob series and Minecraft-style gameplay will find this game engaging as it features beloved characters and a variety of puzzles and adventures to solve.

items.title: Nuclear Day
items.description: Nuclear Day is a survival adventure game where a nuclear explosion has turned the world into a wasteland of radiation, hunger, disease, and suffering. As a lone survivor, your goal is to escape the dying city and reunite with the love of your youth. Will you help others survive, or will you leave them behind to save yourself? The choice is yours.

items.title: Obby World: Squid Escape
items.description: Obby World: Squid Escape is a casual parkour game where you jump your way through a whirlwind of obstacles and surprising challenges. Anything is possible in the variety of games offered. You will find yourself leaping across deadly gaps, racing through winding tracks on a speedy bike, and making daring escapes from high-security prisons. Each mode offers new thrills, so get ready to test your reflexes.

items.title: Open 100 Doors
items.description: Open 100 Doors is apuzzle gamewhere you must find a way to find and open doors. There are a lot of tricky doors with interesting puzzles you must solve. Beautiful stories will be waiting for you!

items.title: Paint Room Escape
items.description: Paint Room Escape is a puzzle escape game where creativity is key to finding your way out of a room with four walls, a desk, a shelf, an air conditioner, a safe, and a locked door. The only way out is to problem-solve your way to freedom by solving riddles using colors, paints, and painting tools that can be found throughout the room. Each clue will lead to the next, until finally, your colorful journey leads you to an exit.

items.title: POOBO Survival
items.description: POOBO Survival is a thrilling survival game where over 30 unique heroes face challenging stages. Collect weapons and green diamonds to enhance your chances of success. Survive 20 intense waves to pass each level. It may seem easy, but it's a tough battle that will test your skills and strategy.

items.title: Prison Escape.io
items.description: Prison Escape.io is a multiplayer escape game where you race against time to outsmart guards, dodge tricky traps, and break free from confinement. Team up with friends or compete in wild multiplayer challenges. Every second counts as you run, jump, and strategize your way through daring escapes packed with surprises and nonstop excitement.

items.title: Push Push Cat
items.description: Push Push Cat is a puzzle game where you push and slide cats to rescue! Push the blocks and make a way to save the cute cats who have lost their homes. You can adopt cute homeless cats in various themes and customize them and shoot selfies. When you encounter a puzzle that is difficult to solve, you can use hints!

items.title: Puzzle Room Escape
items.description: Puzzle Room Escape is a escape game that offers only one exit route. Solve puzzles to break free from a locked room. Your task is to escape the room through ingenuity and quick thinking.

items.title: Python Snake Simulator
items.description: Python Snake Simulator is a simulation game in which you take on the role of a phyton. Hunt the bunnies and rats. Eat all the eggs, fish, and meats. Be careful of the wolf, bear, and armed humans. Find your way to escape from the construction site. Solve the puzzles, obstacles, and hurdles of the task. And last but not least, kill the Eagle boss! Enjoy and feel the experience of becoming a phyton!

items.title: Red Escape
items.description: Red Escape is a captivating adventure puzzle game that puts your wits and problem-solving skills to the test! Trapped in a series of three rooms, your goal is to use logic, gather tools, uncover hidden clues, and solve intricate puzzles to make your escape. Do you have the skills to solve every puzzle and escape all three rooms?

items.title: Riddle School
items.description: Riddle School is a fun game of mystery and puzzle solving and the first title in the Riddle School series. You are stuck in school in a boring class and you want to escape! You must interact with various objects in the classrooms and hallway and try to deceive and confuse the teachers and try to leave the school and your boring class! This game has a simple click interface, fun gameplay and challenging puzzles.

items.title: Riddle School 2
items.description: Help Phil to escape the school in this sequel of Riddle School!

items.title: Room Escape: Strange Case
items.description: Room Escape: Strange Case is a mystery puzzle game where you, the true detective, delve into the enigma of the elusive "Alchemist." Unravel the chilling tale of defiled graves, navigating through a unique graphic style and atmospheric puzzles. Encounter strange characters and escape clever traps in your quest to unveil the Alchemist's identity. Are you up for the challenge of this original and mysterious adventure? You can also watch the walkthrough forchapter 1,chapter 2, andchapter 3.

items.title: Rooms Home Escape
items.description: Rooms Home escape is a puzzleescape gamewhere you suddenly find yourself locked inside a house. Collect tools and find relevant clues. Solve compelling puzzles and find your way out!

items.title: Scary Horror Escape Room
items.description: Scary Horror Escape Room is a creepyescape room gameset in a mysterious place. Solve tricky puzzles and escape the place alive!

items.title: Schoolboy Escape: Runaway
items.description: Schoolboy Escape: Runaway is an adventure puzzle escape game where you're a determined kid with pretty strict parents who wants to break free from being grounded in your room. Tiptoe across quiet hallways, avoid being seen, and use clever tricks to carry out your great escape. Your friends are waiting for you on the outside. Do you have what it takes to join them?

items.title: Silent House
items.description: You woke up and found yourself locked in a strange room. You also find out that you are not alone! Silent House is a horror game with deep gameplay that is all about trying to conquer your fear and escape from the horrors.

items.title: Siren Head: Playing in the Forest
items.description: Siren Head: Playing in the Forest immerses you in a gripping action game where an accident leaves you stranded in a dark forest. Your sole objective is to escape this eerie nightmare, but the terrifying Siren Head stands in your way. Survive the encounter and gather car parts to repair your vehicle and flee from this horrifying creature. Beware of the imposing and haunting 3D model of the Lilac-Headed monster, ready to send shivers down your spine. Experience an unexpected plot as you strive to survive and confront the Siren Head. Brace yourself for an intense final battle, where your skills will be put to the test in this chilling horror story. Can you conquer the nightmare and save your family?

items.title: Skinwalker
items.description: Skinwalker is an adventure puzzle escape game where you are trapped in the heart of a frozen wilderness. Your goal is to survive a winter forest while escaping from a relentless, terrifying creature. Your survival hinges on your ability to gather essential items and stay one step ahead of a relentless and terrifying creature

items.title: Space Museum Escape
items.description: Space Museum Escape is a room escape game to exit the space museum successfully by getting hints and solving different puzzles.

items.title: SpiderDoll
items.description: SpiderDoll is a Spider Rope Hero game. Swing through New York City wrapping bad guys in your web and getting closer to saving Mary. Escape OctoPuppet and battle Green Goblin using your SpiderDoll abilities. Run, swing, and shoot your way through the city!

items.title: Stealing the Diamond
items.description: Stealing The Diamond is another in a series of amazing stick figure adventure games. In Stealing The Diamond, you guessed it; you try to steal a diamond! An extremely large diamond at that! You have choices to make in your quest for theft! Will you rush in and risk everything or try to sneak your way to your prize? Whatever you decide, be careful as one wrong move will leave you without a diamond and maybe even less! Do you have what it takes to pull off the diamond heist and make it out alive? If you like this game, make sure to also try outFleeing the Complex, the last game in the Henry Stickmin series!

items.title: Stickman Escape School
items.description: Stickman Escape School is a fun adventure game where you need to find a way to escape from school. You are a student who doesn't exactly like to study and decides to cut class and ditch your boring teacher's class. There are a lot of different items you could use to escape from school, but if you choose the wrong one, you can be caught and forced to study for pretty much your entire life. The risks are steep, but the rewards are plenty—you get to skip school! Try to choose the right items so you can escape successfully!

items.title: Submachine 9: The Temple
items.description: The Temple is the ninth episode of the Submachine puzzle-game series where you explore a mysterious temple and reveal its hidden secrets. Collect the items, use them in the right place, and complete all the riddles.

items.title: Super Retro Chase
items.description: Super Retro Chase is a car-driving game to escape the police chase while also activating different checkpoints. Trick the cops with your drifting technique, upgrade your car, and get ready for your next drive! For another challenge, you can tryEndless Hot Pursuit.

items.title: SYNTAXIA
items.description: SYNTAXIA is an adventure story game where you awaken in a decaying complex, confused and alone. A nearby laptop flickers to life, granting you a mysterious power. Whatever you write becomes a reality. Use this unique ability to navigate the enigmatic Sensoria Komplex, solve puzzles, and uncover hidden secrets as you search for a way out. Can you rewrite your fate and escape?

items.title: The Box of Secrets
items.description: The Box of Secrets is an exciting puzzle game inspired by the escape game genres such as "Prison Escape" and "100 Doors". Solve riddles, look for items to find your way out to open boxes. Use your wits and wit to find the key to each secret box! Travel to different locations and find the way to open simple boxes, advanced cases, safes with combination locks, ancient boxes, and many others.

items.title: The Dawn of Slenderman
items.description: The Dawn of Slenderman a first-person horror survival game to find the required pages and to either avoid and kill Slenderman.

items.title: The Rooms: Escape Challenge
items.description: The Rooms: Escape Challenge is a puzzle game where you find the keys and hidden items to solve riddles. How far can you escape the room?

items.title: The White Room
items.description: The White Room is an escape room game with a relaxed pace. You are locked in a room and you have to leave it using logic and the objects around you. There is no timer, so you have time to think a bit more clearly!

items.title: The White Room 2
items.description: The White Room 2 is a quick escape game of logic with a cartoon art style. You are locked in a room and you have to leave it using logic and objects around you, can you make it?

items.title: The White Room 3
items.description: The White Room 3 is an escape game where you must use your logic and objects around you to escape from the locked room.

items.title: The White Room 4
items.description: The White Room 4 is an immersive escape game that challenges your logic and problem-solving skills. Find yourself trapped in a hotel room and embark on a thrilling adventure to escape. Utilize the tools at your disposal, solve intricate puzzles, uncover hidden clues, and crack passwords to unlock your path to freedom. Will you be able to conquer the puzzles and break free from this challenging escape experience?

items.title: The White Room 5
items.description: The White Room 5 is the fifth sequel of an adventure escape game with a cartoon art style. Find objects that can help you escape the room and use your logic to solve the puzzles. Good luck!

items.title: Think to Escape
items.description: Think To Escape is an escape game to save yourself from the hotel that is on fire, you have to use your logic and tools around you to escape before the fire reaches you. Solve puzzles, open safes, collect objects, and use them to survive!

items.title: Think to Escape: School
items.description: Think to Escape: School is a challenging escape game where you must find clues and prove your puzzle-solving skills. Escape from the library and classroom by finding the key. There are some useful objects that you can use to help solve the riddles. Use your logic and memory skills to escape!

items.title: Think to Escape 2
items.description: Think to Escape 2 is a challenging escape game that puts your puzzle-solving skills to the test. Escape from common rooms by finding useful objects and solving riddles with logic and memory. Think you're smart? Try Think to Escape 2 and prove it!

items.title: Think to Escape 3
items.description: Think to Escape 3 is an escape game set on a sinking ship. There are 3 levels available that you need to finish to save yourself. Get out of the locked room, find any useful things, escape the sinking ship, and to survive from the sea!

items.title: Trap the Cat
items.description: An HTML5 remake of Circle the Cat, where the player has to try and catch the cat before it escapes. Now you can play as the cat or watch the game plays by itself!

items.title: Trapped
items.description: Trapped is an escape game where you must solve the puzzle to finish the game. Follow the storyline and try to escape.

items.title: Video Studio Escape
items.description: Video Studio Escape is anescape gamewhere your objective is to escape from a video studio room. Solve all the complicated puzzles to open the door and get out from there. Hope you can do it, good luck!

items.title: Vintage Escape
items.description: Vintage Escape is a puzzle escape game where in this game, your father was an inventor and left a special tool for you as a gift and a test. You have to solve puzzles and use objects and passwords to leave this classic victorian room. Good luck!

items.title: Against Zombies
items.description: Against Zombies is an action-packed 3D shooter that thrusts you into a perilous journey through a world overrun by zombies. Battle hordes of the most fearsome undead while defending your last hope for escape - a getaway car. Face the apocalypse head-on in this thrilling game of survival.

items.title: Fury Foot
items.description: Anger Foot 3D is an action-packed game where your foot becomes your ultimate weapon. Foot fights through challenging rooms to defeat enemies and unlock powerful weapons. You can customize your foot fighter for even more fast-paced combat and immerse yourself in a vibrant world with a high-energy soundtrack. Kick your way to victory in this adrenaline-fueled adventure!

items.title: Attack of Duty
items.description: Attack of Duty is an arcade shooting game where your mission is to destroy all opponents. Drag to aim and shoot down enemies, intercepting incoming threats. Charge up your rockets and fire them at challenging foes. Defend the land, sea, and skies as you battle to protect your territory. Engage in intense combat and prove your skills in this shooting game!

items.title: Battle Area
items.description: Control an elite soldier and take out all the enemies that have captured the Mars mine in this cool FPS game.

items.title: Block Contra: Clutch Strike
items.description: Block Contra: Clutch Strike is a shooting game fusion of Counter-Strike's intensity and Block Strike's thrilling combat. Climb the ranks and challenge gaming greats like S1mple and Donk in adrenaline-pumping showdowns.

items.title: Bullet Force
items.description: Bullet Force is an online multiplayer FPS game featuring fast-paced action. Battle against other players on tactical maps using a range of weapons at your disposal. Crate custom games and buy new perks to improve your character.

items.title: Bullet Fury 2
items.description: Bullet Fury 2 is an FPS game to eliminate all enemies that are guarding a laboratory and is a sequel to Bullet Fury.

items.title: Bulletstorm
items.description: Bulletstorm is a relentless FPS survival shooter set in a devastated world overrun by the undead. Dual-wield over 50 unique firearms, command a diverse team of heroes, and take on screen-flooding zombie hordes with explosive intensity. With roguelike upgrades, unpredictable loot, and massive boss battles, every fight is a chaotic push for humanity’s last stand.

items.title: Chicken CS
items.description: Chicken CS is a wild first-person shooter where you step into the feathers of a fearless chicken and dive into action-packed, hilarious battles! From teaming up in fast-paced competitions to climbing the ranks and becoming the ultimate chicken champion, this game takes classic FPS gameplay and gives it a quirky, feathery twist. With every shot, jump, and wall-climb, the chaos never stops. Show off your sharp shooting skills and rule the roost in the world of Chicken CS — let the feathered mayhem begin!

items.title: Command Strike FPS
items.description: Command Strike FPS is an action-packed game involving intense battles across multiple maps. Take part in thrilling commando missions, capture flags, and dominate your enemies in various offline game modes. Armed with powerful guns and pistols, it’s time to prove your skills and become the ultimate super soldier!

items.title: DEADSHOT.io
items.description: DEADSHOT.io is a high-octane IO first-person shooter that drops you into nonstop action across a variety of ever-changing maps. Arm yourself with a wide range of weapons and explore multiple game modes that keep the gameplay fresh. Face off against friends or challenge global players in fast-paced matches, and log in to access exclusive perks and upgrades that give you a competitive edge.

items.title: Dino Hunting Jurassic World
items.description: Dino Hunting Jurassic World is an exhilarating dinosaur-hunting adventure where you step into a Jurassic world. Take on the role of a dino hunter, armed with the latest firearms and sniper rifles, and embark on a quest to protect the world from deadly dinosaurs. Navigate through various jungles and track down your prey while facing unique challenges and realistic sound effects that bring the experience to life.

items.title: Doomsday Shooter
items.description: Doomsday Shooter is an addictive FPS game that throws you into an apocalyptic world, where you must fend off hordes of sinister creepers with 11 different weapons at your disposal. Protect the pixel world from demons and avoid dangerous creatures like kamikazes, golems, spirits, and poisonous plants. Use your bazooka, axe, machine gun, or sniper rifle to take down your enemies and punish anything that moves. With fast dynamics and unique enemies, you'll be hooked on the pixelated style and addictive gameplay as you fight your way to the prince of darkness!

items.title: Doors Castle
items.description: Doors Castle is a thrilling adventure through a haunted fortress filled with secrets, puzzles, and lurking horrors. Every shadow hides danger, every door holds a mystery. Explore eerie hallways, uncover hidden paths, and stay one step ahead of the creatures stalking the dark.

items.title: Escape from Zombies
items.description: Escape From Zombies is a thrilling zombie action game where your mission is to save as many people as possible. Navigate through exciting levels, armed with a variety of weapons and simple controls. In this transformed world, overrun by zombies, it's up to you to guide survivors to the airfield for their safety. Exercise caution with missiles and exploding barrels to prevent harm to the people you're rescuing. The fate of humanity rests in your hands!

items.title: Forward Assault Remix
items.description: Forward Assault Remix is an exhilarating first-person shooter game from the developers of Bullet Force. This game stands out with fantastic 3D graphics, competitive games, and a fully-fledged clan system. Lock and load for a highly competitive online FPS game in your web browser!

items.title: Fragen
items.description: Fragen is an intense shooting FPS game where you face adrenaline-filled battles on your own or in a team. Whether you choose free-for-all or team deathmatch, your goal is to survive and dominate. You will need to customize your arsenal, up your game plan, and outpace your rivals in every fight. It's non-stop action for the start.

items.title: Funny Blade & Magic
items.description: Funny Blade & Magic is an action game where you step into a goofy world seeking to reclaim the throne of the goblin king after your uncle betrayed you. Use magical abilities and powerful weapons like swords, axes, and hammers to fight close-quarters with unique bosses and enemies. Are you ready to become the funniest and strongest goblin?

items.title: Funny Shooter - Destroy All
items.description: Funny Shooter - Destroy All is a first-person shooter game where you kill all of these orange men of different sizes and abilities. There are many types of weapons you can choose to kill the enemies. . Avoid enemy grenades and pitchforks. Dodge blows from clubs, axes, and chainsaws. Destroy enemies with a grenade launcher and a bazooka. Shoot them with machine guns and pistols. Protect yourself from the invasion of enemies and destroy them all!

items.title: Funny Shooter 2
items.description: Funny Shooter 2 is a funFPS gamewhere you fight hordes of absurd enemies! Use various weapons to slay these bizarre beings and upgrade your weapons arsenal as you progress.

items.title: Grandfather Road Chase: Shooter
items.description: Grandfather Road Chase Realistic Shooter is an adrenaline-pumping shooting game that challenges you to escape relentless pursuits using various weapons acquired throughout the game.

items.title: Hazmob FPS: Online Shooter
items.description: Hazmob FPS: Online Shooter is a multiplayer shooting FPS game where every second counts! Play against other players across multiple game modes in non-stop combat. This first-person shooter game is ideal for those seeking a bit of thrill.

items.title: Hyperblox Shooting
items.description: Hyperblox Shooting is a high-energy multiplayer shooter where every elimination upgrades your gear in real time. You’ll start with simple weapons and earn stronger firepower as you rack up victories. Stay sharp, adapt quickly, and use your momentum to climb the ranks. Each round challenges your reflexes and rewards your tactical decisions on the battlefield.

items.title: Iron Friend
items.description: Iron Friend is a spine-chilling first-person horror game where you must confront dark mysteries and survive terrifying encounters. As a staff member thrown into a horrifying situation, your goal is to uncover the truth behind the eerie events unfolding around you. Navigate through creepy environments, solve puzzles, and avoid lurking dangers as you piece together the sinister secrets hidden within. With every step, the tension rises as you face disturbing consequences for every wrong move. Will you survive the nightmare, or will you become another victim of the terror?

items.title: Iron Legion
items.description: Iron Legion is a fierce action game that puts you in command of powerful modern tanks. You’ll charge into explosive battles where strategy and precision decide victory. Customize your combat vehicle, outsmart rivals, and prove your skill on the battlefield. Every clash tests your courage as you rise toward becoming a true legend of armored warfare.

items.title: Jungle Deer Hunting
items.description: Jungle Deer Hunting is a first person shooter game that transports players to an African safari wildlife expedition, casting them within range of a variety of animals ready for the hunt. The objective is simple — shoot down a targeted number of animals throughout a series of landscapes, in some cases, using precision sniper skills. Not to worry, game developers have added targets on many of the animals, making distance shooting slightly more attainable.

items.title: Sniper Challenge
items.description: Sniper Challenge is a high-stakes shooting game where you play as a sniper tasked with eliminating contestants before they complete intense trials. Use sharp aim to line up each shot and prevent anyone from reaching the ultimate prize. With smooth controls and detailed 3D graphics, every shot counts in this mission-driven experience.

items.title: Kirka.io
items.description: Kirka.io is an online FPS game with a voxelated art style. You can play teams, solo or parkour mode in a range of battle locations. Once you’ve picked a game, you can customize your weapons loadout to suit your playing style.

items.title: Kour.io
items.description: Kour.io is a multiplayer IO FPS game that plunges you into intense battles across various maps with many guns and modes to play!

items.title: Krunker
items.description: Krunker is a fast-paced, pixel-style first-person shooter where players battle it out in online arenas against opponents from around the world. Whether you're playing for fun or competing at a high level, Krunker.io offers nonstop FPS action.

items.title: Mad GunS - Battle Royale
items.description: Mad GunS - Battle Royale is a wacky royal battle where chaos rules and anything can be a weapon. Arm yourself with bananas, handbags, or even hamster guns as you take on zombies, giant turkeys, and wild octopuses in outrageous online modes. Explore unique maps, craft your own levels, and fight to save Mr. Cat in this explosive pixel showdown.

items.title: Mine Shooter: Save Your World
items.description: Mine Shooter: Save Your World is an FPS game where an army of enemies attacks the world of Minecraft. Use machine guns and pistols in your arsenal. Crush enemies with a shotgun. Blow them up with a grenade launcher and a bazooka. Destroy creepers before they explode. Dodge golems and endermen.

items.title: Mini Mine
items.description: Mini Mine is a thrilling adventure arcade game where you dig deep, fight fierce monsters, and trade smartly to save Noob’s kidnapped girlfriend. Mine resources to upgrade weapons and tools, build a thriving village, and uncover hidden treasures. Unlock unique characters, set up automated production, and take down Cheater in an epic showdown!

items.title: Muscle Gun.IO
items.description: Muscle Gun.IO is a multiplayer shooting FPS game where you get over 55 customizable weapons, each with its own unique upgrades, so you can outgun your opponents and dominate the battlefield. Use your weapons and might to fight battles with other players. The more you win, the more you earn, so you can boost not only your gameplay but your stats as well. With intuitive controls and fast-paced maps, you can create custom matches or dive into modes like Team Deathmatch, Capture the Flag, and more.

items.title: Narrow One
items.description: Narrow.One is an online archery game developed by Pelican Party Studios. Fight fast-paced battles using your trusty bow and arrow. Protect and capture the flag in 14 unique levels, and invite your friends to join in the action!

items.title: Overtide.io
items.description: Overtide.io is a fast-paced first-person shooter game that puts your reflexes and strategy to the test in action-packed modes like Free-For-All and Kill Confirmed. Battle through intense maps, customize your loadout, and earn upgrades as you climb the ranks. Hone your aim, perfect your movement, and prove you’ve got what it takes to dominate the leaderboard.

items.title: Paintball King
items.description: Paintball King is a casual first-person shooter (FPS) game with a twist. In this game, you can wield a variety of unusual weapons like pistols, the KA 74, an automatic turret, or even a banana! Your objective is to compete in different arenas with the goal of being the first to finish the game, and maybe even earning the title of Queen or King. This quirky and fun-filled game offers a unique take on the FPS genre, where unconventional weapons and fast-paced action lead to hours of entertainment. Get ready to dive into a paintball battle like no other!

items.title: Pixel Combat: Zombies Strike
items.description: Pixel Combat: Zombies Strike is a thrilling pixel-style defense game where you hold the line inside a zombie-infested house. Armed with powerful weapons and hidden secrets, you must survive wave after wave, uncover secret rooms, and work toward building a time machine. Every location challenges your skills as you fight to secure humanity’s last hope for salvation.

items.title: Pixel Warfare
items.description: Pixel Warfare is an IO multiplayer shooting game featuring blocky graphics and 8-bit music, offering a retro experience. The fast-paced, tactical gameplay delivers an exciting FPS experience, with various weapons and maps that keep you on your toes. Choose a game from the menu screen and go straight into the action.

items.title: Poxel.io
items.description: Poxel.io is a, io fast-paced first-person shooter that throws you into intense pixelated battles across diverse maps. Choose from a wide arsenal of weapons, master different game modes, and outplay your rivals to claim the top spot. Every match is a test of skill and strategy: do you have what it takes to dominate the battlefield?

items.title: Professor Strange
items.description: Professor Strange is an action game where you play as a Supreme Mage. Take down your foes with various thrilling moves. Slash and cut your enemies, teleport them to the other dimension, and use your shield to defend yourself. Use your magical superpower and save the world!

items.title: Rift of Hell: Demons War
items.description: Rift of Hell: Demons War is an adrenaline-pumping FPS game where you battle through the depths of hell, facing relentless hordes of demons in hellish catacombs. Armed with various powerful weapons and an endless supply of ammo, your mission is to destroy every fiend in your way. As you descend closer to the citadel, you’ll collect gold from fallen enemies, which boosts your strength, speed, and firepower. You'll grow stronger with each step, upgrading your arsenal and armor to take on even deadlier creatures. Can you survive and conquer the demonic onslaught?

items.title: Shot Blaster
items.description: Shot Blaster is an arcade game to create your custom gun and shot all the stickmen who are running toward you. Kill them all to complete the level!

items.title: SkillWarz
items.description: SkillWarz is a fast-paced first-person shooter offering advanced movement mechanics and diverse game modes like Deathmatch, Gun Game, and Skull Hunt. Navigate through dynamic day and night maps featuring bounce pads, teleports, and battle pickups. Unlock unique classes, customize your gear, and challenge others or practice against bots in action-packed matches tailored to your style.

items.title: Sniper Shot: Bullet Time
items.description: Sniper Shot: Bullet Time is a thrilling shooting sniper game that puts a powerful sniper rifle in your hands, challenging you to eliminate your enemies with precision and style. Line up your shot, and pull the trigger. Witness the intense, slow-motion bullet animation as it makes an impact. With each shot, you can experiment by targeting different parts of the enemy’s body, adding a layer of strategy to every kill.

items.title: Tanks 3D
items.description: Tanks 3D is a high-intensity multiplayer io game where up to 1,000 tank commanders collide on a vast, fully destructible battlefield. Transform the terrain to suit your strategy, build barriers, dig trenches, and outmaneuver your enemies. Pick from a range of tanks and weapon loadouts, fight across diverse maps, and team up with others to take control of the warzone.

items.title: Team Fluffy Online
items.description: Team Fluffy Online is a fast-paced multiplayer shooter where cute but deadly animals battle it out in wild arenas! Choose from a roster of furry characters, each with unique abilities, and arm yourself with a shotgun, pistol, or bat to take down the opposing team. Inspired by genre classics like Team Fortress, but with a playful twist, this game combines tactical team play with chaotic action.

items.title: The Dawn of Slenderman
items.description: The Dawn of Slenderman a first-person horror survival game to find the required pages and to either avoid and kill Slenderman.

items.title: Time Shooter
items.description: Time Shooter is anFPS gamewhere time only moves when you move. When you are inactive, the world slows down almost to a stop, like inSUPERHOT. You can look around and plan your further actions. Dodge bullets in slow motion and crush all the enemies without taking damage! Check outTime Shooter 2for the sequel.

items.title: Time Shooter 2
items.description: Time Shooter 2 is a first-person shooter where time stands still until you move. Plan your shots and moves carefully. Dodge enemy fire in epic slo-mo combat and make your way around the map using time to your advantage.

items.title: Time Shooter 3: SWAT
items.description: Time Shooter 3: SWAT is a shooting FPS game where your movement affects time. It is the sequel toTime Shooter 2and takes inspiration from the game SuperHot. Dodge enemy attacks and skillfully take down enemies using time as your ultimate weapon.

items.title: Toilets Worms Shooter
items.description: Toilets Worms Shooter is an FPS game where you kill mutated toilet worm monsters until none are left. Each enemy is unique and requires a different approach to be destroyed. Buy new weapons or upgrade existing ones to make it easier for you to kill all the monsters. Get ready for this exciting and unpredictable action game!

items.title: War Brokers
items.description: War Brokers is a fast-paced IO shooting FPS game set in a vibrant blocky universe where intense online battles await. You will compete against other players using an extensive arsenal of weapons and vehicles, allowing for diverse combat strategies. Teamwork is essential as you collaborate with your squad to execute missions and outsmart opponents, all while navigating the chaotic battlefield. Whether you prefer engaging from a distance, storming the front lines, or utilizing vehicles for added firepower, War Brokers promises endless excitement.

items.title: Warfare Area
items.description: In Warfare Area, you take a role as a solo soldier that needs to wipe out all the enemy soldiers in the facility.

items.title: Warzone Armor
items.description: Warzone Armor is a multiplayer shooting action game where two teams fight to the death. Your mission is to drive into enemy territory, destroy their units, and earn points for your team. The team with the highest score at the end of the match claims victory. With fast-paced action and strategic gameplay, Warzone Armor delivers intense vehicular combat like never before!

items.title: Wild Hunter 3D
items.description: Wild Hunter 3D is an action-packed hunting simulation game that takes you on an immersive adventure into the wilderness. Your mission is to track and hunt various wild animals, including bears, crocodiles, deer, buffalo, and wolves. With 100 challenging levels set across three distinct game worlds such as dense forests, icy tundras, and arid deserts, you'll experience a variety of environments that test your skills and strategy.

items.title: Zombie Hunter
items.description: Zombie Hunter is an FPS game where you have to kill all the zombies to survive in the post-apocalypse wasteland. Shoot the undead and save humanity in this zombie survival game! Grab your firearm, aim at every walking dead, and kill zombies to prevent the end of the world.

items.title: Zombie World
items.description: Zombie World is an intense shooter game where your survival depends on eliminating hordes of zombies. As chaos reigns and security becomes a distant memory, test your courage and skills to shoot down the undead. Engage in a relentless battle and discover how far you will push yourself to stay alive in a gripping zombie apocalypse.

items.title: Zomblox
items.description: Zomblox is a pixel-packed FPS where meme madness meets zombie survival in a school under siege. Battle through classrooms, pools, and secret vents as you face off against undead classmates—and the zombified teacher herself. Complete missions, uncover hidden secrets, grab wild weapon skins, and rescue your friends in this chaotic, meme-fueled shooter.

items.title: 911: Cannibal
items.description: 911: Cannibal is a spine-chilling horror game where you have to escape the house of a maniacal cannibal. Playing as a kidnapped teenager, your mission is to find items that help you escape by solving various puzzles, all while covering your tracks to avoid detection. Can you outsmart the cannibal and escape his clutches, or will you be his next victim? Explore the ominous house, uncover notes, and unravel the twisted story of Minnesota's most frightening maniac.

items.title: 911: Prey
items.description: 911: Prey is a scary horror game with puzzles. In this game, you are a kidnapped teenager that needs to escape from a cannibal maniac who brought you to his house. Search for any useful items to help you get out of his house. Be very careful and cover up your tracks so that the maniac does not suspect anything!

items.title: Antarctica 88
items.description: Antarctica 88 is ahorror gamewhere you’re part of a rescue squad investigating a research station in Antarctica after communications went dark. It's up to you to solve the mystery. The game is filled with monsters, and there are various weapons to collect and puzzles to solve. Explore and discover objects to uncover more of the story. Can you open all the endings and find out the whole story?

items.title: Bear Haven
items.description: Bear Haven is a horror game where you need to survive the night from the scary bear. You are a new part-time electrician in Bear Haven Motel who get a night shift job. There's a lack of guests at this time and also there are some strange problems with the electrical system at night, make sure you'll manage to fix them all before 6 AM or you'll be fired. But beware of the bear! Hide and turn off the light if you see one of them. Don't let the bear get you!

items.title: Cornfield
items.description: Cornfield is a pulse-pounding puzzle-survival game where you must outsmart a relentless corn monster. Navigate a shadowy maze filled with complex challenges, testing your strategy and nerves. Solve puzzles quickly and carefully to find the exit before the terrifying creature catches up and becomes their meal. Every step could be your last in this heart-pounding escape adventure.

items.title: Diner in the Storm
items.description: Diner in the Storm is a puzzle adventure game that plunges you into a heart-pounding escape adventure, where danger lurks not only outside but within the walls of a seemingly ordinary roadside diner. Caught in the grip of a sudden and ominous storm, you seek shelter in a roadside diner, only to find that safety is fleeting, and the diner harbors dark secrets. As the storm rages on, you must solve a series of intricate puzzles that push your logic, wit, and nerves to the limit. Each puzzle reveals new mysteries about the diner’s hidden past.

items.title: Dr. Psycho: Hospital Escape
items.description: Dr. Psycho: Hospital Escape is a thrilling horror escape game where you are trapped in a nightmare clinic and need to get out of there. Gather essential items to unlock doors and escape the clutches of the deranged Doctor Psycho and his psychotic patients. Time is ticking, you only have 3 days to break free. Navigate terrifying space and uncover multiple escape routes while avoiding detection. Hide in cleverly hidden places and explore the place carefully avoiding deadly traps. Can you outwit the doctor and secure your asylum escape?

items.title: DUST - A Post Apocalyptic RPG
items.description: DUST is a text-based adventure game set in a radiated post-apocalyptic world.

items.title: Escape Room: Strange Case 2
items.description: Escape Room: Strange Case 2 is an adventure-packed escape game that immerses you in a suspenseful journey through the dark and eerie corridors of a mysterious asylum. Unravel sinister secrets, solve intricate puzzles, uncover hidden clues, and unlock doors as you navigate through the haunting environment.

items.title: Exhibit of Sorrows
items.description: Exhibit of Sorrows is a short horror game set in a curious circus-themed exhibit. Explore this strange interactive museum, follow instructions, and don’t upset the clown!

items.title: Halloween Chainsaw Massacre
items.description: Halloween Chainsaw Massacre is an action game where the city was filled with magical monster pumpkins. Use your chainsaw and destroy all enemies! Saw them apart. Make a long-range throw at the enemy and tear him apart. Use a circular attack and take down all the pumpkins around. Free the city and become a hero!

items.title: Haunted School
items.description: Haunted School is a horror survival game where you search a school for the tools required to exorcise a demonic child. Explore the map looking for clues and supplies. How long will you survive the Haunted School?

items.title: Haunted School 2
items.description: Haunted School 2 is ahorror gameset ten years after the events in the firstHaunted School. Return once more to the eerie abandoned school to perform another exorcism.

items.title: Horror Nights Story
items.description: Do you ever feel like there are creatures lurking just behind you? Waiting to grab you? In Horror Nights Story this comes true! You must dig down and try to escape from the evil creatures that are following you.

items.title: Horror Room: Scary Hotel Tycoon
items.description: Horror Room: Scary Hotel Tycoon is a simulation game where you manage a spine-chilling theme park. You’ll design terrifying rooms, hire creepy actors, and come up with creative ways to scare visitors. Keep your attractions running smoothly by cleaning, repairing, and maintaining equipment. Track guest feedback to make improvements and aim to become the top fright master in the business!

items.title: Horror Tale 2: Samantha
items.description: Horror Tale 2: Samantha is a spine-chilling first-person horror adventure game. Help Samantha escape from prison and uncover new secrets about the terrifying antagonist who kidnapped her. Solve puzzles, meet interesting characters, and unravel the mystery!

items.title: Horror Tale 3: The Witch
items.description: Horror Tale 3: The Witch is a spine-chilling first-person adventure that plunges you into the eerie town of Lakewitch, where children are vanishing without a trace. Solve mind-bending puzzles, explore haunting locations, and face the sinister witch Wanda in your quest to uncover the truth. Will you unravel the dark mystery and survive the nightmare?

items.title: Horror Tale
items.description: Horror Tale Kidnapper is a frightening first-person horror adventure game. Solve the disturbing mystery of the missing children at Lakewitch. Who is the kidnapper, and why are they doing it? Where are the children disappearing, and how can we save them? It's up to you to find out.

items.title: Iron Friend
items.description: Iron Friend is a spine-chilling first-person horror game where you must confront dark mysteries and survive terrifying encounters. As a staff member thrown into a horrifying situation, your goal is to uncover the truth behind the eerie events unfolding around you. Navigate through creepy environments, solve puzzles, and avoid lurking dangers as you piece together the sinister secrets hidden within. With every step, the tension rises as you face disturbing consequences for every wrong move. Will you survive the nightmare, or will you become another victim of the terror?

items.title: Krampus
items.description: Krampus is a horror game to put all the items on the plates, activate the spell, and trap Krampus! Can you defeat him?

items.title: Little Cabin in the Woods
items.description: Little Cabin in the Woods: A Forgotten Hill Tale is an escape type game in which you are trying to escape the monsters from your past. You managed to escape them once and you went to live with your grandpa in the woods inside of a little cabin. The monsters have found you once again but this time you are brave and ready to take them on.

items.title: MIDNIGHT Remastered
items.description: This is the remastered edition of MIDNIGHT. Help the character to collect all the seven letters that are scattered in a dark and mysterious mansion.

items.title: Mr. Dude: Online Multiverse Challenge
items.description: Mr. Dude: Online Multiverse Challenge is a casual multiplayer game where pretty much anything can happen. Play with other people from around the world, or with your friends in one of the many challenging yet wacky game modes.

items.title: Night Watchman
items.description: Night Watchman is ahorror gamewithjump scareswhere you keep watch in the dark. It’s likeHide N Seek, but with scary characters and dangerous dolls that look similar to characters from Four Nights At Freddy's . Cover your eyes and wait to attack - but don’t wait too long!

items.title: Room Escape: Strange Case
items.description: Room Escape: Strange Case is a mystery puzzle game where you, the true detective, delve into the enigma of the elusive "Alchemist." Unravel the chilling tale of defiled graves, navigating through a unique graphic style and atmospheric puzzles. Encounter strange characters and escape clever traps in your quest to unveil the Alchemist's identity. Are you up for the challenge of this original and mysterious adventure? You can also watch the walkthrough forchapter 1,chapter 2, andchapter 3.

items.title: Scary Horror Escape Room
items.description: Scary Horror Escape Room is a creepyescape room gameset in a mysterious place. Solve tricky puzzles and escape the place alive!

items.title: Silent House
items.description: You woke up and found yourself locked in a strange room. You also find out that you are not alone! Silent House is a horror game with deep gameplay that is all about trying to conquer your fear and escape from the horrors.

items.title: Siren Head: Playing in the Forest
items.description: Siren Head: Playing in the Forest immerses you in a gripping action game where an accident leaves you stranded in a dark forest. Your sole objective is to escape this eerie nightmare, but the terrifying Siren Head stands in your way. Survive the encounter and gather car parts to repair your vehicle and flee from this horrifying creature. Beware of the imposing and haunting 3D model of the Lilac-Headed monster, ready to send shivers down your spine. Experience an unexpected plot as you strive to survive and confront the Siren Head. Brace yourself for an intense final battle, where your skills will be put to the test in this chilling horror story. Can you conquer the nightmare and save your family?

items.title: Skinwalker
items.description: Skinwalker is an adventure puzzle escape game where you are trapped in the heart of a frozen wilderness. Your goal is to survive a winter forest while escaping from a relentless, terrifying creature. Your survival hinges on your ability to gather essential items and stay one step ahead of a relentless and terrifying creature

items.title: Sprunki
items.description: Sprunki is a casual music game that lets you craft unique soundscapes. This modded version of Incredibox by NyankoBfLolCombine gives you DJ control to mix loops, vocals, beats, and melodies—pretty much create your own musical style. The game features vibrant characters and sounds for a completely immersive experience full of rhythmic possibilities. Whether you're a music enthusiast or just love experimenting, it’s a fun and engaging way to express your creativity.

items.title: SYNTAXIA
items.description: SYNTAXIA is an adventure story game where you awaken in a decaying complex, confused and alone. A nearby laptop flickers to life, granting you a mysterious power. Whatever you write becomes a reality. Use this unique ability to navigate the enigmatic Sensoria Komplex, solve puzzles, and uncover hidden secrets as you search for a way out. Can you rewrite your fate and escape?

items.title: The Dawn of Slenderman
items.description: The Dawn of Slenderman a first-person horror survival game to find the required pages and to either avoid and kill Slenderman.

items.title: Agar.io
items.description: Agar.io is the original .io grow game. Play as a simple agar cell fighting to become the largest cell in a multiplayer game arena. Avoid the bigger cells and consume the smaller ones to grow larger.

items.title: Agents.io
items.description: Agents.io is a thrilling multiplayer game where you engage in action-packed battles with rival gangs. As a player, you take control of your own gang and navigate through dynamic battlegrounds, aiming to eliminate rival agents and secure victory for your team. Quick reflexes, strategic shooting, and effective communication with your teammates are essential to succeed in this intense showdown.

items.title: Archer Clash
items.description: Archer Clash is a fast-paced io game where you guide a lone hero racing across a rolling, hill-like battle arena. You’ll recruit allies, adapt your tactics, and face shifting challenges as you fight for control. Every decision shapes your path to victory, blending quick reflexes with smart strategy in a thrilling clash of skill and growth.

items.title: Archers Battle
items.description: Archers Battle is an .io-style third-person shooter game, packed with stickmen, horses, bows, and arrows! Battle against players from around the world, collect diamonds, and rise to the top of the leaderboard! Jump into the Archers Battle arena, unleash your inner marksman, and prove your skill in this chaotic stickman showdown!

items.title: Arx Arcana (Last Mage Standing)
items.description: Arx Arcana: Dungeon Royale is a cool battle royale game with a fantasy twist. The 2D graphics and top-down gameplay are superb. In this multiplayer game, you must fight against hundreds of players from around the world.

items.title: BattleDudes.io
items.description: BattleDudes.io is an action-packed 2D multiplayer IO battle game where chaos reigns supreme. Engage in fierce battles against other players, unleashing a powerful arsenal of guns, tanks, and explosive weaponry to dominate the battlefield.

items.title: Big Battle Mini
items.description: Big Battle Mini is an action-packed online multiplayer game where you face off against friends and rivals in fast, thrilling mini battles. Test your reflexes, outsmart opponents and claim victory in quick-fire matches that keep the competition fierce and the fun nonstop.

items.title: BlockTanks.io
items.description: BlockTanks is an online tank battle .io game. Choose your preferred game mode and shoot to destroy enemy tanks and increase your score. You can play solo or in teams. Find upgrades to gain an advantage and dominate the leaderboard!

items.title: Bloxd.io
items.description: Bloxd.io is an IO adventure game with Minecraft-style visuals and multiple game modes, including parkour challenges, creative sandbox building, and combat-based gameplay.

items.title: Braains.io
items.description: Which side will you choose in Braains.io? Braains.io is an awesome multiplayer game of survival – you start as a human but you can transform into a zombie immediately if you wish and try to turn the other players into a zombie too.

items.title: BrutalMania.io (Brutal Mania)
items.description: BrutalMania.io (Brutal Mania) is an online gladiator IO action game where you are armed with savage weapons with a straightforward mission to take down every rival gladiator in sight. The battles are brutal, the carnage is real, and only the strongest will survive. Smash, slice, and crush your way to becoming the last warrior standing in this gruesome fight for supremacy. With each victory, you grow stronger, unlocking powerful upgrades and devastating new weapons to dominate the arena.

items.title: Build Royale
items.description: Build Royale is a battle royale game where you build defenses and battle other players in a 2D top-down world. Explore the map and find various weapons and resources to help you take down your enemies.

items.title: Bump.io
items.description: There are 16 cars are involved in the competition. You must avoid collisions with the boundaries to win. Bumping other cars give energy, and destroying other cars to give volume growth.

items.title: Car Clash 2
items.description: Car Clash 2 is an intense io game where cars battle in a challenging desert arena. Choose a powerful vehicle with high health, armor, and speed to stay alive. Collect map features to boost your attack range, speed, and power. Earn Cash and GEMs by surviving and destroying enemies, and use them to acquire even the most expensive cars. Let the battle begin!

items.title: ClashBall.io
items.description: ClashBall.io is an exciting, competitive, fast-paced io multiplayer game that demands precise timing, sharp focus, and strategic gameplay. Step into a dynamic, enclosed arena where survival is everything. Dodge, deflect, and outplay your opponents to claim victory!

items.title: Copter.io
items.description: Copter.io, also known as Copter Royale, is an epic .io game in which you fly around in a helicopter and battle other players. It's made by the same developer asYohoho, an equally awesome pirate battle .io game. Have fun!

items.title: CubeRealm.io
items.description: CubeRealm.io is a captivating online block game inspired by classics like Minecraft and Terraria. In this immersive world, you’ll gather resources, craft tools, and explore diverse biomes from skylands to deep underground caverns. Whether you’re building, battling, or exploring, the game offers endless possibilities with ever-evolving game modes and challenging landscapes to conquer.

items.title: Cubes 2048.io
items.description: Cubes 2048.io is an addictive online game that fusesSnakeand2048. Get a bigger number by collecting free cubes and eating other players with a smaller number than you. Your cubes with the same value that bump into one another willmerge.

items.title: Cubox.io
items.description: Cubox.io is a thrilling adventure where you build, fight, and explore unique biomes. Choose paths like Winter or Hell, battle fierce monsters, and customize your playstyle with powerful gear. Lead armies, craft, and create your dream home. Join friends or guilds, conquer challenges, and uncover endless surprises in this ever-evolving world.

items.title: DEADSHOT.io
items.description: DEADSHOT.io is a high-octane IO first-person shooter that drops you into nonstop action across a variety of ever-changing maps. Arm yourself with a wide range of weapons and explore multiple game modes that keep the gameplay fresh. Face off against friends or challenge global players in fast-paced matches, and log in to access exclusive perks and upgrades that give you a competitive edge.

items.title: Diep.io
items.description: Diep.io is a survival .io game where you control a circle armed with a cannon. The aim is simple: move around the map and destroy the other players whilst improving and upgrading your own circle.

items.title: Digdig.io
items.description: digdig.io is a fun .io game where you dig and grow to become bigger than your opponents. There are various game modes to play and achievements to unlock.

items.title: Digworm.io
items.description: DigWorm.io is a fast-paced multiplayer arena where you guide a hungry worm tunneling underground in a race for food, energy, and dominance. Devour glowing orbs to grow, use boosts to outmaneuver rivals, and time your slows to recover health. It’s a competitive, strategy-driven worm-eat-worm world where quick reflexes rule the dirt.

items.title: Dragon.io
items.description: Dragon.io is a snake game, but with dragons! Avoid obstacles, collect food to grow, destroy the other dragons that are smaller than you, and be the longest dragon in the arena to win! Collect power-ups such as fast and shield to help you get a lot of advantages if you can get to them before your opponents. But be careful since you can also be a victim to a stronger dragon.

items.title: Dragon Joust (.io)
items.description: Dragon Joust is a .io game where you must hop aboard your dragon and joust! As you knock enemies off their dragons, you can collect the loot they drop. As you collect, your lance grows and grows!

items.title: Ducklings
items.description: Ducklings is a fun .io game where you rescue all the ducklings from the dangers of aquatic life. Dangers like reckless boat drivers that'll row into you and end your objectives early. Keep collecting ducklings and taking them home safely to your nest. Reach targets and grow your home into the baddest bird nest in the bay.

items.title: DuckPark.io
items.description: When AquaPark.io meets ducks, you get DuckPark.io! The rubber ducks are racing to the bath. Can you be the first one to get in? Race ahead using boosters and sneaky tactics to get to the tub before your duck rivals.

items.title: Egg Folks Multiplayer
items.description: Egg Folks Multiplayer is a lively party game where up to 20 players battle it out across four thrilling mini-games. Dive into the chaos, customize your character with endless skin combinations, and outlast the competition in this colorful quest for glory. Get ready for fast-paced fun that keeps you on your toes!

items.title: EpicBallz.io
items.description: EpicBallz.io is an addictive 3D IO game where you need to grow by eating collectibles and enemies in a competitive arena. Navigate the obstacles and avoid massive balls to survive and dominate the leaderboard. Strategize to catch boosters, avoid divider signs, and utilize speed power-ups. Engage in thrilling multiplayer battles, customize with cool skins, and strive for supremacy in this addictive online adventure!

items.title: Escape From Pizzeria
items.description: Escape From Pizzeria is a adventure game where you’re trapped inside a dark, eerie restaurant with secrets lurking in every corner. You’ll navigate creepy hallways, dodge traps, and uncover clues to escape. Stay alert, think fast, and whatever you do, don’t let the chef catch you snooping around his haunted kitchen.

items.title: Eternal Siege
items.description: Eternal Siege is a gripping medieval survival game where you face wave after wave of undead enemies with nothing but your sword and skill. Slash through relentless zombie hordes, time your defenses with precision, and sharpen your combat instincts as each wave grows more brutal. Can you endure the siege and emerge as the last warrior standing?

items.title: EvoWars.io
items.description: EvoWars.io is an IO battle game set in a top-down online battle arena. Collect orbs and battle other players to evolve your warrior. Each evolution improves your weapon range but slows your movement. How many will you slay before you fall?

items.title: Ferals.io
items.description: Ferals.io is an exhilarating .io game where you start as a charming little bug, feasting on delicious fruits to grow stronger. Watch out, though! Larger creatures lurk, looking for a snack. Can you rise to dominance in this thrilling game and become the mightiest critter on the playground? Embark on the journey and find out!

items.title: Fish IO
items.description: Fish IO is a fast-paced underwater adventure where you dominate the ocean as a fierce predator. Engage in dynamic multiplayer battles, explore vibrant marine landscapes, and control unique fish with special abilities. With stunning visuals and addictive gameplay, you’ll dive into an exhilarating quest to outsmart rivals and claim the ultimate ocean crown!

items.title: GoBattle.io
items.description: GoBattle.io is a multiplayer .io game in which you control a knight and battle against other players to become a king. Choose one of several available knights, including Batman and Vegeta! Throw your weapon at the other knights to damage them. When you kill a player, you receive their coins; your coins determine your ranking. Your weapon upgrades after you collect 20 and 40 coins. You can grab various weapons in the area and restore a portion of health by picking up a potion. Use your shield to cover incoming damage. Can you become the next king?

items.title: Gold Rush Arena
items.description: Gold Rush Arena is an io game where you start the game as a small cube traveling through a vast 3D arena. You need to collect as many gold cubes as possible to grow in size and score game points. Be careful and beware of the big cubes that want to swallow you. Don't forget to use potions to increase your speed, heal yourself, or create a protective shield from huge, voracious cubes.

items.title: Goober Dash
items.description: Goober Dash is a multiplayer battle royale game that you can play online. Dash your opponents into deadly spikes, gather precious coins, and unlock a plethora of unique costumes as you strive to outlast the competition. Invite your friends to engage in epic battles in custom private lobbies. Unleash your creativity with the level editor, crafting and conquering your very own battlegrounds. Climb the global and country-based seasonal leaderboards to prove your dominance in this thrilling contest.

items.title: Goober Royale
items.description: Goober Royale is an arena game where you compete against other players to be the last one standing. Collect coins to level up your weapons and character, blast opponents, and dodge rising water levels. Survival hinges on your skill and strategy in this fast-paced, action-packed battle!

items.title: Goober Shot
items.description: Goober Shot is an exhilarating online archery game where you compete against three other players in intense battles. Hone your skills, aim precisely, and dodge swiftly to outshoot your rivals. Climb the global leaderboards and prove yourself as the ultimate archery champion. Every arrow counts in this thrilling quest for supremacy!

items.title: Gridpunk - 3v3 Battle Royale
items.description: Gridpunk - Battle Royale 3v3 PvP is an IO battle game where lightning-fast reflexes and precision will determine how far you make it through to the end of this real-time shooter action. This high-intensity game requires you to stay sharp, aim true, and master the art of drone attacks to outwit and overpower your opponents. Each 3v3 PvP match puts you against players in real-time in multiplayer battles. There’s no room for luck—it's all about skill, strategy, and timing.

items.title: Grow A Garden | Growden.io
items.description: Grow a Garden in Growden.io! In Growden.io, you can grow a garden of your dreams and unlock pets to help you grow a garden. You’ll purchase seeds from the shop, plant them on your farm, and nurture them into thriving crops. As your harvest grows, you can gather profits, discover rare finds, and take pride in showcasing your most beautiful fruits along the way. Once you earn $50,000 coins, you can use them to purchase pet eggs, where you have to wait 1 hour to unlock your pets (dogs, capybaras, rabbits, dinosaurs, bees, and more!). You can also purchase gear from the gear shop to help you grow a garden even faster, such as sprinklers and watering cans! Additionally, the weather changes every few minutes to multiple modes: Daytime, Nighttime, Desert, Rain, and Frosty. Your plants get rare mutations whenever the weather events happen, so make sure to stay in the game as long as possible to get your plants mutated so you can earn more coins!

items.title: Gulper.io
items.description: Gulper.io is an online IO snake game where you compete against other players in a multiplayer battle arena. Like Slither.io, you take control of a worm and nurture it to become a healthy, strong, indestructible snake. How do you get there? Eat shiny bits and grow big to eliminate the other worms.

items.title: Hand Spinner IO 3D
items.description: Hand Spinner IO 3D is a superb game about the fidget spinner! You must control a single fidget spinner and try to eliminate other players by knocking out their spinner from the ring.

items.title: Hexanaut.io
items.description: Hexanaut.io is an io game where you conquer the largest area you can. Be careful not to cut your own line and also not be cut by another player too. There are totems on the map that can be captured and provide additional bonuses. How big area that you can conquer? Prove your skill in this territory-capturing game.

items.title: Hire Rush
items.description: Hire Rush is a fast-paced recruitment adventure where you race to build the biggest hiring empire. Collect candidates, dodge rival agencies, and use power-ups to boost your team. Strategically grow your crew, unlock new zones, and customize your squad as you climb the leaderboard to become the ultimate HR mastermind.

items.title: Holey.io Battle Royale
items.description: Holey.io is a battle royale game where you consume various items and opponents with smaller holes. You will grow bigger as you swallow! The map will continuously shrink, forcing players into a narrower environment until there is only one person left standing. Consume, grow, and become the last hole standing in the arena!

items.title: Industry Idle
items.description: Industry Idle is an idle game where you need to build factories, produce some resources, and also do market trading. There are more than 130 different factories that you can build and manage and more than 150 different resources you can produce. This game also has a realistic market simulation to upgrade your trading skills. Build your base, expand and scale up your productions, and improve and optimize your economy.

items.title: Brainrots.io
items.description: Italian Brainrot Quiz is a wild 3D multiplayer guessing game that challenges you to identify chaotic, meme-inspired Italian characters from visual clues. You’ll race through 60 hilarious rounds, test your meme knowledge, and compete with others to claim the top spot. Whether you're solo or with friends, this quiz delivers nonstop energy and nostalgic humor.

items.title: Junon.io
items.description: Junon.io is a co-op space station survival game with a mission to build and defend your colony against the evil Empire. You start off by mining asteroids for ores, and you also need to maintain a supply of food, water, oxygen, fuel, and power to survive. Eventually, you will be able to automate production systems from farming, butchering corpses, to refilling turret ammo. Love co-op game like this? Check outDredark.

items.title: Colonist.io
items.description: Colonist.io is a free online board game inspired by Settlers of Catan. Take the role of a settler and build your civilization by expanding your territory, trading goods, and building an army. Set up a game with friends and build your empire!

items.title: Kiomet
items.description: Kiomet is an immersive, real-time Io strategy game that challenges you to grow and defend your kingdom in a dynamic, ever-changing world. Expand your realm by strategically capturing new territories, all while defending against rival players and unpredictable threats. Rally your forces to claim vital lands, strengthen your holdings with upgrades, and skillfully plan your conquests to rise to the top of the leaderboard. With every decision you make, you’ll inch closer to ultimate domination.

items.title: Knife.io
items.description: Knife.io is a fast-paced battle game, and filled with sharp competition! In Knife.io, your goal is simple: throw knives at your enemies, dodge their attacks, and be the last one standing!

items.title: Kour.io
items.description: Kour.io is a multiplayer IO FPS game that plunges you into intense battles across various maps with many guns and modes to play!

items.title: Krunker
items.description: Krunker is a fast-paced, pixel-style first-person shooter where players battle it out in online arenas against opponents from around the world. Whether you're playing for fun or competing at a high level, Krunker.io offers nonstop FPS action.

items.title: LOLBeans io
items.description: LOLBeans.io is a multiplayer racing game where you have to avoid obstacles. Race to the end of the obstacle course in battle-royale-style elimination gameplay. Move through the levels until you’re the only bean left standing.

items.title: Lurkers.io
items.description: Lurkers.io is a multiplayer game featuring fast-paced action, resource gathering, and a fully destructible environment. Arm yourself with various weapons, build and destroy structures, and engage in competitive or cooperative gameplay across multiple modes.

items.title: Mine-Craft.io
items.description: Mine-Craft.io is an Io game that offers features similar to Minecraft and much more. Players can gather resources, construct houses, build complex mechanisms, form alliances, and defend against nocturnal monsters and hostile players.

items.title: MineEnergy2
items.description: MineEnergy2 is similar to Minecraft but with industrial tech mods. Extract energy, sell it, and purchase upgrades in this competitive world. Suitable for Minecraft aficionados, industrial fashion enthusiasts, and those keen on leading the pack. Mine ores, buy tools, and fortify your base with energy generators and more. Compete with top players, gather resources, and dominate the leaderboard. Choose your skin, enter your nickname, and embark on your journey.

items.title: Miniblox
items.description: Miniblox is an online game featuring voxelated graphics and a diverse selection of minigames. Explore endless possibilities as you delve into a vibrant world of creativity and competition. Join in, and let the voxel adventures begin!

items.title: MiniGiants.io
items.description: MiniGiants.io is a top-down multiplayer deathmatch IO game. Take control of your own MiniGiant and battle other players for rewards. You can choose from several classes. As you level up, you'll grow larger and more powerful, earning more loot to strengthen your character!

items.title: Mk48.io
items.description: Mk48.io is an Io battleship game that thrusts you into the heart of intense multiplayer naval warfare, where only the fiercest captains have what it takes to dominate the seas. Command your vessel and level up by collecting valuable crates and sinking enemy ships, gaining power and upgrades as you rise. Choose from an impressive fleet of 43 meticulously crafted boats, each inspired by real-world warships, and equip your ship with nine powerful weapons that evolve over ten thrilling levels.

items.title: MooMoo.io Sandbox
items.description: Test your survival strategies in MooMoo.io Sandbox. This sandbox version ofMooMoo.iogives you unlimited resources, letting you craft all the structures and experiment with resources in any way you want! You can still die, so be cautious.

items.title: MooMoo.io
items.description: MooMoo.io is a challenging .io game about gathering resources and building a village. Hit trees and rocks to collect wood and stones. You can use those resources to build walls and windmills. The walls provide protection to your marked resources and windmills. The windmills can give you points over time. You can also hit fruit bushes to get food that you can use to restore HP. Just like inmost .io games, the goal is to level up by gathering resources. In this game, you can choose from different upgrades when you level up. Make sure to watch out for other people as they can be hostile. Have fun!

items.title: Mope.io
items.description: Mope.io is a multiplayer .io game where you have to eat, evolve, and survive. Much likeFlyOrDie, you survive by eating food and other animals. The more you eat, the more you evolve. You can go from being a humble mouse to a powerful dragon if you don't get eaten before then!

items.title: Narrow One
items.description: Narrow.One is an online archery game developed by Pelican Party Studios. Fight fast-paced battles using your trusty bow and arrow. Protect and capture the flag in 14 unique levels, and invite your friends to join in the action!

items.title: Netquel
items.description: Netquel is an IO multiplayer space war game where you must build your spacecraft and destroy your opponent. You will start as a small spacecraft at the beginning. Collect space debris and mine asteroids to develop your spacecraft and make it big! Destroy rival players and be at the top of the chart!

items.title: Noob Snake 2048
items.description: Noob Snake 2048 is an engaging snake IO arcade game with multiple game modes. Collect blocks to grow your tail and dominate the arena! Outmaneuver your opponents, consume their blocks, and watch them crumble as you rise to the top. Each block you gather boosts your size and strength, but only the most skilled players will reign supreme. Test your reflexes, strategy, and hunger for victory in this fast-paced, action-packed snake adventure. Climb the leaderboard and prove you have what it takes.

items.title: NuggetRoyale.io (Nugget Royale)
items.description: NuggetRoyale.io is a competitive .io game in which you play as a chicken and battle other players. In true Battle Royale style, each match has only one winner. Will you be the nugget or will you triumph as the chicken king? Good luck!

items.title: Overtide.io
items.description: Overtide.io is a fast-paced first-person shooter game that puts your reflexes and strategy to the test in action-packed modes like Free-For-All and Kill Confirmed. Battle through intense maps, customize your loadout, and earn upgrades as you climb the ranks. Hone your aim, perfect your movement, and prove you’ve got what it takes to dominate the leaderboard.

items.title: Paint War
items.description: Paint Wars is a fast-paced, browser-based .io game where your paintbrush becomes your weapon. Compete in 45-second rounds with up to 3 other players, dashing across shifting arenas and splashing vibrant colors to claim territory for your team.

items.title: Paper.io 2
items.description: Paper.io 2 is an.io gamewhere you have to capture as much territory as possible by painting it. Paint the map in your own color to take over the Paper.io world! Look out for other players vying to claim your space.

items.title: Pixel Warfare
items.description: Pixel Warfare is an IO multiplayer shooting game featuring blocky graphics and 8-bit music, offering a retro experience. The fast-paced, tactical gameplay delivers an exciting FPS experience, with various weapons and maps that keep you on your toes. Choose a game from the menu screen and go straight into the action.

items.title: Powerline.io
items.description: Play as a glowing line of electricity in Powerline.io, a multiplayer Snake-inspired.io game. This electric battle takes place in an arena that puts you at odds with other Powerlines. Destroy them and collect their energy crystals to get bigger!

items.title: Poxel.io
items.description: Poxel.io is a, io fast-paced first-person shooter that throws you into intense pixelated battles across diverse maps. Choose from a wide arsenal of weapons, master different game modes, and outplay your rivals to claim the top spot. Every match is a test of skill and strategy: do you have what it takes to dominate the battlefield?

items.title: Raidfield 2
items.description: Raidfield 2 is a World War II third-person shooter that blends tactical teamwork with fast-paced combat. You’ll take charge as a bold soldier, lead your squad through chaotic battlefields, and make every shot count. With dynamic missions and strategic objectives, your decisions shape the fight. Rally your team and charge into history.

items.title: Rocket Bot Royale
items.description: Rocket Bot Royale is a gravity-defying multiplayer tank game set in a battle royale arena. Blast other players, collect coins, avoid the rising water levels, and survive for longer than the rest.

items.title: SeaDragons.io
items.description: SeaDragons.io is an epic combination ofSlither.ioand sea monsters. You control a sea dragon that needs to grow bigger and dominate the entire sea.

items.title: Ships 3D
items.description: Ships 3D is an online naval warfare game featuring frantic battles and chaotic smash-ups at sea. Join your friends in thrilling multiplayer ship wars featuring up to 20 players.

items.title: Simply Prop Hunt
items.description: Simply Prop Hunt is a fast-paced multiplayer hide-and-seek game with a clever twist. Players take turns disguising themselves as everyday objects or hunting down hidden props. As a prop, your goal is to blend seamlessly into the environment and avoid detection. As a hunter, you’ll need sharp eyes and quick reflexes to uncover the sneakiest disguises before time runs out. With fast and unpredictable rounds, every match is a new challenge. Outsmart your opponents, stay hidden until the final whistle, or track down every last prop to prove yourself as the ultimate hunter.

items.title: SimplyUp.io
items.description: Simply Up is a competitive multiplayer parkour game where you race to scale an endless vertical world, leap by leap. Every jump tests your timing and precision, and one slip means falling with no checkpoints to save you. Race against friends or strangers and see who can climb the highest without looking down.

items.title: SlitherCraft.io
items.description: SlitherCraft.io is an online slither-like game with a Minecraft theme. Slip and slide around the arena eating blocks and other blocky snakes that have perished on the battlefield. Launch TNT at your opponents to try and take them down!

items.title: Smash Karts
items.description: Smash Karts is a 3D multiplayer IO kart battle game. Drive your go-kart, pick up weapons, and blow up other karts to win! Keep playing to level up and unlock new characters and prizes.

items.title: Snake Clash.io
items.description: Snake Clash.io is an io snake game where you compete against players, outmaneuver rivals, and dominate the leaderboard. Grow longer, strategize, and prove your skill in fast-paced battles.

items.title: Snake.io
items.description: Snake.io is an online io game where you control a snake, striving to survive in a battlefield of other snakes. Consume colorful food to grow larger and defeat rivals to become a formidable force

items.title: Snake Lite
items.description: Snake Lite is a casual arcade snake game with a competitive twist. Unlike other slither and snake games, you not only collect goodies and power-ups but also compete against other players to become the largest worm-like snake in the arena.

items.title: Snowball.io
