items.description: Snowball.io is a fun multiplayer arenaIO gamewhere you throw snowballs at other players. In this epic snow battle, you accumulate snow and take down other players while avoiding the disappearing ice platforms. The last player standing wins the match!

items.title: Space.io
items.description: Space.io is a fast-paced 3D space battle game where you jump into the cockpit of a powerful spaceship! Face off against nine enemy pilots in an intense dogfight, where only the best warrior survives. Outsmart and outmaneuver your opponents, shoot them down before they get you, and climb the rankings to prove your dominance!

items.title: Stabfish.io
items.description: Stabfish.io is a free IO game where you play as a deadly oceanic beast. Join a multiplayer arena of fish equipped with fatal tusks and take down your share of prey while avoiding the sharp end of another player’s stabber. Collect the fish like trophies, eat food for boosts, and dominate the sea.

items.title: Stabfish 2
items.description: Stabfish 2 is an IO shark game that takes the intense underwater combat ofStabfish.ioto a whole new level! You are in an arena as a deadly shark, ready for thrilling battles against other players, aiming to impale as many rivals as possible. Stabfish 2 is the sequel toStabfish.io,and this sequel ramps up the action with even more ways to dominate the depths with a variety of new shark types, powerful abilities, and exciting loot to discover. Show your skill, unlock unique upgrades, and claim your place as the most feared predator in the ocean.

items.title: StarBlast
items.description: StarBlast is a fun multiplayer arcade shooter set in space. Mine asteroids and fight other players in your own fully upgradable spaceship. Work together with your teammates to ensure victory.

items.title: Sugar Rush
items.description: Sugar Rush is a competitive game where players build their own bridges using collectible candies. Beware of potential looters and navigate through various levels with obstacles such as holes, walls, and hitters. Collect candies of your own color and climb up the leaderboard by being faster than others. The game also offers customization options for character skins and colors. Enjoy the adventure and build the best bridge possible!

items.title: Survev.io
items.description: SurvEv.io Battle Royale is an IO battle multiplayer game that puts you in a high-stakes fight for survival on a constantly shrinking island encompassed by the color red. You start with nothing but soon scavenge for weapons, gear, and essential supplies scattered across the map. Every second counts as you battle to stay ahead of the deadly red zone and within the ever-shifting safe zone. Choose to go solo, team up with a partner in duo mode, or join forces with a squad, strategizing your way to outlast up to 50 fierce opponents.

items.title: Taming.io
items.description: Taming.io is a survival-based .io game where magical pets aid you in combat. Gather resources, build your base, and evolve through upgrades while battling rivals and their creatures.

items.title: Tanks 3D
items.description: Tanks 3D is a high-intensity multiplayer io game where up to 1,000 tank commanders collide on a vast, fully destructible battlefield. Transform the terrain to suit your strategy, build barriers, dig trenches, and outmaneuver your enemies. Pick from a range of tanks and weapon loadouts, fight across diverse maps, and team up with others to take control of the warzone.

items.title: TheLast.io
items.description: TheLast.io is an epic fantasy 2D battle royale game. In this title, you must fight using a variety of magic and melee skills. You must work hard and do what you can to outlast your opponents and be the last character standing!

items.title: TileMan.io
items.description: TileMan.io is an awesome multiplayer IO game in which you must try to claim as much territory as possible. You start with a random block color, and you must try to convert all the blocks on the map into the same color. This might sound easy, but don't forget there are other players to contend with!

items.title: UpRunner
items.description: UpRunner is a fast-paced vertical speed-running game that challenges you to be the fastest on the platform. Compete in thrilling multiplayer lobbies or design and share your own custom maps. Earn coins by winning races or completing challenges, and use them to unlock an array of unique, randomly generated skins that keep your gameplay experience fresh and personalized. With a vibrant community and endless customization, UpRunner offers endless excitement for speedrun enthusiasts and creative gamers!

items.title: Vortex.io
items.description: Vortex.io is an io game where you drive your boat, unleash whirlpools, and engage in epic battles against others. Create a powerful water hole that draws everything in, strategically positioning whirlpools to trap and overwhelm foes. Challenge players in intense PvP combat, aim precise attacks, and unleash devastating whirlpool strikes. Master the art of whirlpools to navigate, evade attacks, and employ powerful tactics. Explore a dynamic water world filled with stunning environments, mysterious creatures, and hidden treasures. Prepare to conquer Vortex.io and become the reigning champion of the waterscape!

items.title: War Brokers
items.description: War Brokers is a fast-paced IO shooting FPS game set in a vibrant blocky universe where intense online battles await. You will compete against other players using an extensive arsenal of weapons and vehicles, allowing for diverse combat strategies. Teamwork is essential as you collaborate with your squad to execute missions and outsmart opponents, all while navigating the chaotic battlefield. Whether you prefer engaging from a distance, storming the front lines, or utilizing vehicles for added firepower, War Brokers promises endless excitement.

items.title: WarCall.io
items.description: WarCall.io is an IO fantasy battle royale game where champions battle in a large multiplayer arena using various melee weapons.

items.title: Worm Hunt
items.description: Worm Hunt is an .io game where you battle against other worms in a colorful online arena. Squirm around, picking up food and boosters to grow your worm bigger. Use your coins to buy various skins and upgrades for the next game!

items.title: Wormate.io
items.description: Wormate is a .io game inspired by popular multiplayer games like Slither.io. Set in a large arena, you must slither around consuming food and power-ups to grow your worm larger. Once you grow bigger, you can trap other worms and get their food! See how big you can get in Wormate.

items.title: Worms.Zone
items.description: Worms Zone is an Io arcade game where you join the fight to become the biggest worm. You must eat as much food as possible to grow bigger. Slither your way towards the power-ups to get an edge.

items.title: Yohoho.io
items.description: Yohoho and welcome to the pirate battle royale! Your ship has been wrecked on the shore of this bootylicious island. Fight the other pirates and secure as much treasure as possible! Yohoho.io is a thrillingonline .io gamewhere ye battle and plunder your foes!

items.title: Advent Mahjong
items.description: Advent Mahjong is a match 3 Christmas-themed game to connect identical tiles and remove them from the grid to move on to the next challenging levels before you run out of time. By passing a level, you get one day closer to Christmas, and the closer you get the more challenging the levels are.

items.title: Aloha Mahjong
items.description: Aloha Mahjong is a relaxing puzzle game set in the beautiful landscapes of Hawaii. With 365 levels inspired by the island’s culture, you’ll match tiles featuring traditional symbols and exotic elements. Enjoy the peaceful, tropical atmosphere as you challenge yourself in this unique twist on the classic Mahjong experience.

items.title: Butterfly Shimai
items.description: Butterfly Shimai is a captivating mahjong connect game that takes you on a journey to match and release beautiful butterflies. Explore the enchanting world of butterflies as you connect identical pairs and set them free to soar. With mesmerizing visuals and engaging gameplay, Butterfly Shimai offers a delightful experience formahjongenthusiasts. Challenge yourself to find all the matching butterflies and witness their graceful flight in this immersive game.

items.title: Celtic Mahjong Solitaire
items.description: Celtic Mahjong Solitaire is amahjong gamewith a Solitaire variation ruleset. Match tiles with each other to remove them from the board, but make sure that both tiles have a free space on either their left or right side (you won't be able to highlight them otherwise as it's an invalid move). Clear the board in as little time as possible and try to beat the high score!

items.title: Daily Mahjong
items.description: Daily Mahjong is a fun game to spend time. Your task is to remove all the tiles from the board. You must remove the same tiles one by one, and only from the top layer. The faster you finish the game, the more score bonus will be received. Every game is unique as piece location will be randomized. Track your progress daily and get better on this game.

items.title: Gold Mahjong FRVR
items.description: Gold Mahjong FRVR is a Mahjong game with a mission to clear the gold tiles, and it comes with a daily challenge.

items.title: Happy Farm: The Crop
items.description: Happy Farm: The Crop is a farm-themed mahjong game with a customizable tiles appearance.

items.title: Mahjong 3D Classic
items.description: Mahjong 3D is aclassic mahjong gamewith 3D tiles. You can also make your own mahjong layout as you like in the editor mode and also choose your favorite tile set available in this game. Have fun!

items.title: Mahjong Big
items.description: Mahjong Big is a relaxing game that challenges players to pair identicalmahjongtiles. Strive for a flawless 3-star rating on each level and conquer the Daily Challenge. Collect diamonds during gameplay to unlock exciting new stages, adding depth and enjoyment to the gaming experience. Have fun!

items.title: Mahjong Online
items.description: Mahjong Online is the classic version of the ancient board game that requires you to clear the board by matching the same patterned tiles. The rules dictate that there must be two or more of the same tiles to clear tiles from the play area and successfully win the game.

items.title: Mahjong Connect (Legacy)
items.description: Mahjong Connect is amahjong gameto match all the tiles to clear the board. Can you beat all the levels?

items.title: Mahjong Connect 2 (Legacy)
items.description: Mahjong Connect 2 is the second episode of the classical Mahjong game, Mahjong Connect.

items.title: Mahjong Digital
items.description: Mahjong Digital is an excitingmahjong-connecting gamewith a digital theme.

items.title: Mahjong Empire
items.description: Mahjong Empire is amahjong game, but it plays differently as you play alone and the rules are a little similar to a solitaire game. As such, the goal of the game is to clear the board of all the tiles. This can be done by pairing identical tiles to remove them from play. There are a few restrictions though. First, you have to make sure that both tiles have a free side (left or right). Also, the tiles must not be under another tile. A Hint button is available if you're unable to find any more pairs, as well as a Shuffle button. You can only use them a limited number of times so be sure to use them wisely!

items.title: Mahjong FRVR
items.description: Mahjong Frvr is a great HTML5 mahjong game developed by Chris Benjaminsen. Check out hisblogto read more about this project, or try one ofour many other mahjong games.

items.title: Mahjong Gardens
items.description: Mahjong Gardens is a puzzle game that lets you playmahjongin its solitaire variation. You are clearing tiles from the board by pairing identical tiles with each other. Pairing has a few rules, including being unable to pair tiles if one of the two tiles does not have one free edge, as well as one of the tiles, should not be under any other tile. The game ends when all tiles have been paired, or if you run out of moves and shuffles.

items.title: Mahjong Kitchen
items.description: Mahjong Kitchen is a new concept ofmahjong gamewhere you can buy recipes and complete the order of the customers. This game will completely immerse you in the atmosphere of a pleasant cafe. Figure out the recipes and discover more new dishes!

items.title: Mahjong Magic Islands
items.description: Mahjong Magic Islands is a puzzle game where ancient cities are in desperate need of your magical assistance to restore their waning natural beauty. Join forces with mythical creatures scattered across these mystical islands as you embark on a captivating adventure to save these lands from darkness and bring back their former glory. Are you ready to embark on a mystical journey filled with magic, adventure, and ancient mysteries in the Mahjong Magic Islands?

items.title: Mahjong Monster Arena
items.description: Mahjong Monster Arena is a uniquemahjong gamewhere you must create monsters by matching 3 mahjong tiles. Evolve your monsters and win challenging battles against enemies and bosses!

items.title: Mahjong Pet Quest
items.description: Mahjong Pet Quest is a charming puzzle adventure where classic Mahjong gets a cute twist with adorable animal-themed tiles. Match pairs of animal tiles to clear the board. You can only match tiles that are free and have no other tiles blocking them! Clear all the tiles to complete the level and move on to the next.

items.title: Mahjong Pirate Plunder Journey
items.description: Mahjong Pirate Plunder Journey is a Mahjong game to match pairs of pirate-themed tiles.

items.title: Mahjong Shanghai
items.description: Mahjong Shanghai is a free Mahjong game where you match the tiles until there are none remaining. There are two game modes in this classic game, one for kids and one for adults!

items.title: Mahjong Sweet Connection
items.description: Mahjong Sweet Connection is a connecting Mahjong game with a gravitational element.

items.title: Mahjong Titans
items.description: Mahjong Titans is an iconic Mahjong game where you continually match two tiles to remove them from the board until there are none left. When you clear all the tiles, the level is complete!

items.title: Mahjong Tower
items.description: Mahjong Tower 2 is a puzzle game in which you play different variations of the solitaire version ofmahjong. You are able to choose from different layouts, and the challenge and strategy for each are a little different, even if they all have the exact same rules.

items.title: Mahjong Unlimited
items.description: Mahjong Unlimited is a classic oriental puzzle game that brings the timeless charm of Mahjong to your fingertips. Whether you're a seasoned player or new to the game, Mahjong Unlimited offers a perfect blend of relaxation and challenge with its infinitely generated levels and customizable features!

items.title: Mahjongg Solitaire
items.description: Mahjongg Solitaire is an onlinemahjong puzzle boardgame that features traditional rules and modern visuals. There are no shuffles, and the game is timed, but the game's pace is relaxed.

items.title: Master Qwan's Mahjong
items.description: Master Qwan's Mahjong is a puzzle game in which you play amahjongvariation of Solitaire. You are matching pairs of tiles that have the same face, but both tiles need to have an open space to their right or left side. Some tiles will be stacked, so any tile on their side that is lower than their stack will not be considered as part of that rule. You should keep doing this until the board is cleared of all the tiles. If you run out of moves, you can select to shuffle the board, but it will cost you a bit of your score.

items.title: Monster Mahjong
items.description: Monster Mahjong is a combination of a mahjong puzzle game with a monster-fighting battle. Combine tiles to create monsters and merge monsters to become a legend!

items.title: Om Nom Connect Classic
items.description: Om Nom Connect Classic is a puzzle game to connect all the identical Om Nom and friend characters.

items.title: Onet Connect Classic
items.description: Onet Connect is a puzzle connect matching game inspired by mahjong gameplay. Your objective is simple—connect pairs of identical images to clear the board completely, but don’t take too long—there is a clock ticking your chances to win away. Plan your moves carefully, and if you find yourself stuck, use the hints button to keep the game going. Challenge your speed and strategy in this timeless puzzle adventure!

items.title: Onet World
items.description: Onet World is a cute Mahjong-style game where you must link identical animal tiles and clear the board.

items.title: Piles of Mahjong
items.description: Piles of Mahjong is an engaging and relaxing puzzle game that combines the classic elements of Mahjong with a match-three twist. As you progress through the levels, you’ll need to clear stacks of tiles by matching three identical ones, but be careful—strategic thinking is essential to avoid getting stuck!

items.title: Resize Mahjong
items.description: Resize Mahjong is amahjong gamewith a cute animal theme. Find and match tiles with the same pictures of animals. Unlike regular mahjong, the game has tiles of different shapes and sizes. It is possible to combine tiles of the different sizes among themselves, the main thing that on them identical animals were represented.

items.title: Scandinavian Mahjong
items.description: Scandinavian Mahjong is a delightful twist on the classic game, set in a charming Scandinavian-inspired home reminiscent of IKEA. With 365 levels, each representing various objects or concepts, from horoscope signs to letters of the alphabet, immerse yourself in this cozy winter edition for hours of relaxing fun.

items.title: Tasty Match: Mahjong Pairs
items.description: Tasty Match: Mahjong Pairs is a colorful and addictive puzzle game where your goal is to connect pairs of identical tiles. Clear the entire mahjong tiles before the time runs out. Connect more distant tiles to get more stars. Win the game and collect the chest. Over time, new beautiful tiles will unlocked, and the level configurations will become more complicated.

items.title: Valentine Mahjong
items.description: Valentine Mahjong is a Valentine-themedmahjong gameto clear all the tiles within the time limit.

items.title: War Mahjong
items.description: War Mahjong (Tiles of the Unexpected) is a mahjong-style tile-matching game with a war theme. Although it's not like typicalmahjong games, your objective is to clear the tiles by clicking on groups with the same image.

items.title: Blocky Tank 3D
items.description: Blocky Tank 3D is an exciting 3D game where you command powerful blocky tanks to battle zombies, spiders, and mutant bosses. An evil wizard has turned villagers into zombies and unleashed an army of monsters to take over the world. Starting as a noob, you must fight through action-packed battles, upgrade your tank, and rise through the ranks to stop this dark force.

items.title: Bloxd.io
items.description: Bloxd.io is an IO adventure game with Minecraft-style visuals and multiple game modes, including parkour challenges, creative sandbox building, and combat-based gameplay.

items.title: BoomCraft
items.description: BoomCraft is a 2-player TNT game where you defeat your friend and become the survivor. With 4 different maps fight against your friend and make tactics!

items.title: Craft World
items.description: Craft World: Building Games is the new builder simulator where everything is limited only by your imagination! Build various houses of more than 300 unique blocks and decorate the rooms with various decor and furniture! The game has a similar visual style toMinecraft.

items.title: CubeCraft: Merge & Battle
items.description: CubeCraft: Merge & Battle is a casual merge game where you step into the world of CubeCraft, where battles, strategy, and powerful merges await! Your mission? Defend the Noob village by merging mobs into unstoppable monsters and crushing invading enemies!

items.title: CubeRealm.io
items.description: CubeRealm.io is a captivating online block game inspired by classics like Minecraft and Terraria. In this immersive world, you’ll gather resources, craft tools, and explore diverse biomes from skylands to deep underground caverns. Whether you’re building, battling, or exploring, the game offers endless possibilities with ever-evolving game modes and challenging landscapes to conquer.

items.title: DOP Noob: Draw to Save
items.description: DOP Noob: Draw to Save is a puzzle drawing game that will challenge your brain and logic. Draw a line to protect Noob from dangerous things such as cave spiders, sharp saws, fire, zombies, skeleton archers, and more. Noob is in big trouble, so your mission is to rescue him! This game created by Noob vs Pro team has been inspired by Save the Dog, Draw to Save, and Minecraft Universe!

items.title: GrindCraft
items.description: GrindCraft is a Minecraft-themed clicker game based on crafting. Collect various raw materials and climb the crafting ladder to create stronger items. Hover over craftable items to reveal the resources required to create them.

items.title: Haste-Clicker
items.description: Haste-Clicker is an idle game where you click ores to break them. Clicking will earn you money to upgrade your clicking power, idle income, and unlock new ores. The game also has a rebirth system where you sacrifice your progress to increase your gains.

items.title: Herobrine vs Monster School
items.description: Herobrine vs Monster School is an archery game where you play as Herobrine who finally gets angry at all of the students of the Monster School who behaved terribly. Therefore, Herobrine decided to destroy Monster School and everything connected with it with his crossbow, wooden arrows, and TNT! Shoot zombies, slugs, skeletons, and bosses!

items.title: Horror Nights Story
items.description: Do you ever feel like there are creatures lurking just behind you? Waiting to grab you? In Horror Nights Story this comes true! You must dig down and try to escape from the evil creatures that are following you.

items.title: Idle Noob Lumberjack
items.description: Idle Noob Lumberjack is an arcade game where you can collect and sell resources, build houses, and discover new lands. The more land you discover, the more resources you can collect. Hire small minions who can help you to collect resources while you are resting.

items.title: Kirka.io
items.description: Kirka.io is an online FPS game with a voxelated art style. You can play teams, solo or parkour mode in a range of battle locations. Once you’ve picked a game, you can customize your weapons loadout to suit your playing style.

items.title: Lurkers.io
items.description: Lurkers.io is a multiplayer game featuring fast-paced action, resource gathering, and a fully destructible environment. Arm yourself with various weapons, build and destroy structures, and engage in competitive or cooperative gameplay across multiple modes.

items.title: Merge & Dig!
items.description: Merge & Dig! is a casual game where you'll delve deep into the earth, merge pickaxes, and conquer challenging levels filled with various ores and blocks. With each dig, upgrade your pickaxes, merge them to improve their efficiency, and dominate the underground world!

items.title: Merge Mine: Mobs Attack!
items.description: Merge Mine: Mobs Attack! is a casual merge game set in the beloved Minecraft universe. Merge eggs with mobs, summon powerful meme characters, and engage in exciting battles against iconic meme adversaries! With a variety of features and endless merging possibilities, prepare to immerse yourself in a thrilling merging frenzy like never before! Are you ready to merge, summon, and conquer your way to victory in Merge Mine: Mobs Attack?

items.title: Mine-Craft.io
items.description: Mine-Craft.io is an Io game that offers features similar to Minecraft and much more. Players can gather resources, construct houses, build complex mechanisms, form alliances, and defend against nocturnal monsters and hostile players.

items.title: Mine Shooter: Save Your World
items.description: Mine Shooter: Save Your World is an FPS game where an army of enemies attacks the world of Minecraft. Use machine guns and pistols in your arsenal. Crush enemies with a shotgun. Blow them up with a grenade launcher and a bazooka. Destroy creepers before they explode. Dodge golems and endermen.

items.title: MineClicker
items.description: MineClicker is a non-endless clicker game set in the Minecraft universe. Click to kill mobs and mine blocks. Earn XP and gather stone to buy various upgrades and hire recruits to makeidlingeasier.

items.title: MineEnergy2
items.description: MineEnergy2 is similar to Minecraft but with industrial tech mods. Extract energy, sell it, and purchase upgrades in this competitive world. Suitable for Minecraft aficionados, industrial fashion enthusiasts, and those keen on leading the pack. Mine ores, buy tools, and fortify your base with energy generators and more. Compete with top players, gather resources, and dominate the leaderboard. Choose your skin, enter your nickname, and embark on your journey.

items.title: MineMerge
items.description: MineMerge is a clicker game with merge mechanics. Merge identical blocks to collect the resources you need to craft weapons and armor. Defeat enemies, complete quests, and fight the Ender Dragon.

items.title: Miner's Odyssey
items.description: Miner's Odyssey is an incremental game with charming pixel graphics reminiscent of Minecraft. Embark on a thrilling mining adventure, delving deeper into the mine as you unearth blocks to gather resources for creating powerful tools and upgrades. Merge picks to forge enhanced versions, enabling faster and more efficient mining. Navigate through various obstacles and challenges, honing your skills and tools to conquer new depths. Unravel portals to other dimensions, each offering unique opportunities and resources to obtain powerful artifacts and reach the pinnacle of development. With endless possibilities and an exciting journey!

items.title: MineTap Merge Clicker
items.description: MineTap Merge Clicker is an idle clicker that combines merge mechanics with crafting and adventure. Dive into a pixelated world where you mine resources, craft powerful gear, and battle zombies and other monsters. Build your own village as you gather materials, merge items, and level up your character. Become a legendary hero by crafting epic weapons and conquering challenges.

items.title: Miniblox
items.description: Miniblox is an online game featuring voxelated graphics and a diverse selection of minigames. Explore endless possibilities as you delve into a vibrant world of creativity and competition. Join in, and let the voxel adventures begin!

items.title: Monster School 3
items.description: Monster School 3 is a continuation of the Monster School series. Teacher Herobrine gave the school students a new challenge, this time they will have to draw with blocks to survive on the floor is a lava challenge! Play as Monster School students which are Zombies, Craftsman, Noob, Pro, Hacker, God, Noob Digger, and Girl. Good luck students!

items.title: Monster School Herobrine Siren Head
items.description: Monster School Herobrine Siren Head is an action game where you need to kill all of these zombies. Choose your character to play between the girl or Herobrine. You can also choose which world you want to play, Zombies at School or Siren Head in the City Town. Collect lucky boxes so you can place traps for all of these monsters. So, what are you waiting for? Equip your weapon and start the action!

items.title: Noob Digger: Pro Drill Miner
items.description: Noob Digger: Pro Drill Miner is a thrilling mining adventure where you pilot a powerful drill deep into the earth in search of treasures and secrets. Unearth valuable resources, trade for upgrades, and uncover mysterious bunkers to assemble the legendary Super Drill. Dig not just for riches—but to rebuild your dream home and win back your lost love.

items.title: Noob: Island Escape
items.description: Noob: Island Escape is a casual adventure game where you help Noob build a new ship and escape from the island! Collect resources and build the means required to escape the island. How long can you survive?

items.title: Noob Miner 2: Escape From Prison
items.description: Noob Miner 2: Escape From Prison is an adventure arcade mining game where your survival depends on your skills and strategy! You control your noob miner to dig, fly, eat, purchase goods, and pretty much do everything possible to not only survive but escape from confinement.

items.title: Noob Miner: Escape From Prison
items.description: Noob Miner: Escape From Prison is a casual game where you play as a prisoner and mine for resources. Get resources, buy new picks, eat cakes, blow up everything with dynamite, and find a way to escape prison. How soon will you be able to escape?

items.title: Noob: Space Escape!
items.description: Noob: Space Escape! is a survival crafting adventure where you guide Noob through a mysterious floating world filled with danger. Gather resources, upgrade your gear, and battle monsters as you work to repair your rocket. Explore hidden islands packed with traps, secrets, and fierce enemies, digging, building, and fighting your way toward freedom before time runs out.

items.title: Noob Tower Defense
items.description: Noob Tower defense is an action game where you build towers and traps for zombie monsters. Get coins after killing zombies and upgrade heroes to take revenge!

items.title: Noob Trolls Pro
items.description: Noob Trolls Pro is afunny gamewhere you make prank videos. Become internet famous by trolling the unsuspecting Pro with a range of mischievous antics. Be careful not to let Pro catch you!

items.title: Noob VS Monsters
items.description: Noob VS Monsters is an arcade game where you have to defend your house by killing all the monsters using a bow and arrow. Defend your house by building various blocks in front of your door. Buy different types of arrows to help you kill monsters and zombies. Survive for 12 nights, where there will be more enemies every night, and the nights will get longer. Prepare yourself to fight a very dangerous boss on night 12. Also, try playing Endless mode for a more challenging difficulty. Let the night begin!

items.title: Noob vs Pro: Zombie Apocalypse
items.description: Noob vs Pro: Zombie Apocalypse is an exciting zombie game with a fun storyline that awaits you. Go through level after level. Noob lives quietly in his small house in the forest, suddenly zombies attacked the world of blocks! Whole hordes of zombies want to destroy everything in their path. Help Noob and Pro to end them. Kill zombies, and destroy everything in your path. Survive in this challenging zombie!

items.title: Noob: Zombie Prison Escape
items.description: Noob: Zombie Prison Escape is an action platforming game inspired by the style of Minecraft. Your mission is to help Noob escape from a zombie-infested prison by finding keys, coins, solving puzzles, avoiding traps, and using parkour skills to navigate platforms. Along the way, you'll need to shoot down monsters with a crossbow, complete tasks involving torches, and face various challenges in 10 different levels. Fans of the Noob series and Minecraft-style gameplay will find this game engaging as it features beloved characters and a variety of puzzles and adventures to solve.

items.title: Nubik vs Herobrin's Army
items.description: Nubik vs Herobrin's Army is an arcade game where you hordes of monsters. Craft weapons, upgrade them, and use them to defeat enemies. Become a hero and save your brother!

items.title: Pixel Warfare
items.description: Pixel Warfare is an IO multiplayer shooting game featuring blocky graphics and 8-bit music, offering a retro experience. The fast-paced, tactical gameplay delivers an exciting FPS experience, with various weapons and maps that keep you on your toes. Choose a game from the menu screen and go straight into the action.

items.title: Poxel.io
items.description: Poxel.io is a, io fast-paced first-person shooter that throws you into intense pixelated battles across diverse maps. Choose from a wide arsenal of weapons, master different game modes, and outplay your rivals to claim the top spot. Every match is a test of skill and strategy: do you have what it takes to dominate the battlefield?

items.title: Red Stickman vs Monster School
items.description: Red Stickman vs Monster School is an action game where you play as a stickman who has to fight various monsters and zombies. Beat them all and participate in the Monster School challenge together with the Red Stickman. Check out ourstickman gamesfor more!

items.title: Red Stickman vs Monster School 2
items.description: Red Stickman vs Monster School 2 is a platformer shooting game where you battle mobs with bullets. Now the stickman is armed with a pistol, machine gun, uzi, rocket launcher, laser gun, RPG, and much more! Shoot through your undead foes and reach the end in this action-packed stickman adventure! Check out ourstickman gamesfor more.

items.title: Skyblock Survive With Noob!
items.description: Skyblock Survive With Noob! is an adventure game where you control Noob, who finds himself marooned on the floating island of Skyblock. You will need to collect resources like food and water, build shelter, and explore Skyblock and all the challenges and surprises it brings.

items.title: SlitherCraft.io
items.description: SlitherCraft.io is an online slither-like game with a Minecraft theme. Slip and slide around the arena eating blocks and other blocky snakes that have perished on the battlefield. Launch TNT at your opponents to try and take them down!

items.title: Stick Fighter vs Zombies
items.description: Stick Fighter vs Zombies is an action-packed 2D platformer where you control a red stickman battling endless waves of zombies in a blocky world reminiscent of Minecraft. Get ready for epic fights as you face off against zombies, skeleton archers, withers, and even Noob in this thrilling survival game! This fast-paced combat will keep you on your toes as you protect your stickman friends from the zombie apocalypse.

items.title: Stickman Epic
items.description: Stickman Epic is a fast-paced action arcade game that puts your fearless stickman hero on a mission to eliminate hordes of relentless zombies. In this adrenaline-charged adventure, your objective is to battle through waves of enemies while upgrading your character to become stronger and more resilient to even more difficult challenges along the way to victory.

items.title: Stickman King
items.description: Stickman King is an action-packed arcade adventure where you guide a brave stickman through four distinct biomes. Face relentless enemies and defeat powerful bosses to prove your strength. Each battle tests your skill and agility as you strive to claim the title of King of Stickmen. Do you have what it takes to reign supreme?

items.title: Survival Craft Adventure
items.description: Survival Craft Adventure is a 2D-pixel game where you must gather resources, craft, and build in order to survive. Create your weapon, such as a sword and a bow with its arrows. Find a treasure chest and complete quests to receive the awesome reward. Build a house to keep you safe from the night. There are many things you can do in this game! Mine the dungeons, fight monsters, raise pets, defeat bosses, etc.

items.title: TNTcraft
items.description: TNTcraft is a Bomberman-like game in a Minecraft world where your mission is to explode the zombie spawner using TNT. Make a team with an AI or play with your friend locally. Make tactics and explode zombies, but beware, some of the zombies can explode and may hurt you. There are four different maps available. Fight against zombies with your friend, make tactics, and blast your TNTs!

items.title: Trap Craft
items.description: Trap Craft is a defense game where there is a hacker who is ready to fulfill any desire of a Princess, Noob, Pro, Herobrine, and the rest if they want to play a game that the hacker prepared. The game is to protect the portal from the zombies' attack. Each character has its own ending, so find out all of them! Set traps and fight against the zombies, survive, and also get yourself a pet for your company.

items.title: Vampire Pixel Survivors
items.description: Vampire Pixel Survivors is the ultimate roguelike survival action game where you will find yourself surrounded by relentlessly undead waves. Collect experience and coins to level up your weapons and skills as you strive to be the last one standing in this unforgiving world. Explore diverse stages in desert landscapes, lush forests, and snowy realms. Craft powerful weapons, from flamethrowers to lasers, to annihilate undead hordes. Patience, skill, and upgrading your gear are your keys to survival. Are you up for the challenge of becoming the ultimate survivor?

items.title: War of Mine
items.description: War of Mine is a captivating 2D side-camera game inspired by the iconic Minecraft theme, reimagined with unique gameplay mechanics and a strategic progression system. As a resourceful adventurer, you’ll embark on an epic journey through diverse maps and levels, battling waves of enemies in an auto-battle system where tactical preparation and smart upgrades are the keys to survival.

items.title: ZombieCraft
items.description: ZombieCraft is a third-person shooting game where you must survive the zombie wave. This game features intense zombie shooting in a vast blocky world. You are the only person alive, and your mission is to use different types of weapons to shoot all incoming zombies.

items.title: ZooCraft
items.description: Zoocraft is a casual game that provides you with the opportunity to build and manage your own zoo. The game allows you to create a vibrant and diverse world filled with a wide range of animal species. With Zoocraft, you'll embark on a journey to tame animals, enhance your skills, construct aviaries, and explore various regions across the globe.

items.title: 8 Ball Billiards Classic
items.description: 8-Ball Billiards is a free online pool game in our sports category, ideal for one or two players. You can play solo against AI or challenge other players in two-player mode. The game is easy for anyone to play, so pick up a cue and line up your first shot.

items.title: 8 Ball Pool Billiards Multiplayer
items.description: 8 Ball Pool Billiards Multiplayer is a competitive sports pool game that lets you test your skills in exhilarating 2-player matches against friends or go head-to-head with players from around the world. Perfect your game by competing against expert bots to sharpen your strategies and techniques. Whether you’re aiming to outwit a friend or conquer global rivals, every shot counts in your quest to become the ultimate billiards champion.

items.title: Billiards
items.description: Billiards is a sports game where you can play 2 types of billiards game which is 8 ball or straight pool. You can play by yourself, with 2 players, or with the computer.

items.title: Billiards Pool 8
items.description: Pool 8 is a famous billiard variety. The goal of the game is to score all the balls of one group (either “striped” or “solid”), and at the end to score the ball with the number 8. Whoever does this, they become the winner of the game.

items.title: Blast Billiards
items.description: Blast Billiards is a sports game where you clear bombs in 100 seconds by putting them in the holes with a billiard stick.

items.title: Blast Billiards 4
items.description: Blast Billiards 4: The Bombs Are Back in Town is the fourth episode of the famous classic Blast Billiards series. Clear all the bomb balls before the time expires in 15 exciting levels!

items.title: Mafia Billiard Tricks
items.description: Mafia Billiard Tricks is a billiard arcade game in which you can play the challenging game of billiards. You are not only playing for fun though however; you opponents are part of the infamous mafia. You must earn their respect by beating each crew member at the game of billiards.

items.title: Pool 8
items.description: Pool 8 is a brain-teasing puzzle game based on a Pool board. Pot the balls in the correct order to move through a series of increasingly difficult challenges!

items.title: Pool Club
items.description: Pocket all stripe and solid balls before the clock runs out. Each pocketed ball adds 50 points and 5 seconds. The cue ball deducts 20 points. Have fun!

items.title: Pool Hustlers
items.description: Pool Hustlers is a pool game where you must try your best to sink as many balls as possible against the ticking clock. Get ready for a fast-paced, precision-focused pool game set in a lively 80s billiards hall. This classic game will bring an adrenaline rush to your usual pool experience, taking you back to an era when pool tables were the battlegrounds for skilled hustlers. Get ready and show your best pool skills!

items.title: Royal Pool
items.description: Embark on an exhilarating journey into the world of billiards with Royal Pool, where endless fun and excitement await players of all skill levels. With its extensive level selection, diverse table designs, realistic ball physics, Royal Pool offers an immersive and addictive gameplay experience that will keep you coming back for more. Are you ready to conquer the world of billiards and become the ultimate master?

items.title: 100 Doors
items.description: 100 Doors is a 3D point-and-click room escape game with interactive elements and puzzles that sets in a big school building.

items.title: 100 Doors: Around the World
items.description: 100 Doors: Around the World is a thrilling point-and-click adventure where you guide Henry Basil and his granddaughter Claudette on a high-stakes journey. Solve puzzles, battle fierce monsters, and uncover hidden secrets as you race to find the legendary Incan mask. Every choice matters in this gripping tale of exploration, danger, and family mystery.

items.title: 100 Doors Challenge
items.description: 100 Doors Challenge is a point-and-click puzzle game with a hidden object twist. Your goal is to open each of the 100 doors using hidden objects and solving puzzles to move to the next floor. Explore detailed locations and enjoy a variety of beautiful, animated levels! Collect clues and merge them with the objective to get the door open. Features include exciting puzzles, intricate mechanics like time and space manipulation, and cool animations.

items.title: 10x10
items.description: 10x10 is a fun and free 10x10 puzzle game inspired by Tetris. The field's size is 10x10, and you can freely place the assigned blocks into it. Once a line is successfully formed, it will disappear. Place them in the correct positions so that you can keep forming lines. What is your best score? Have fun!

items.title: 10x10! Arabian Nights
items.description: 10x10! Arabian Nights is a game where you place gems on a 10x10 grid to clear rows. Each turn presents you with three different gem shapes, and your goal is to position them carefully. When a row is completely filled, it disappears, making room for more gems. Strategize your moves to achieve the highest score possible.

items.title: 10x10! Classic
items.description: 10x10! Classic is the original version of this challenging puzzle game. This game takes inspiration from the iconic game of Tetris and features similar gameplay mechanics – you have a 10x10 square and you must fill the square up with different colored blocks. The blocks come in different shapes and formations and you must rotate them and fit them together.

2048 is a single-player sliding tile puzzle game developed by Gabriele Cirulli. Merge tiles with the same power of 2 to get the total sum. The goal is to keep merging tiles this way until you reach 2048!

items.title: 2048 Blocks Merge
items.description: 2048 Blocks Merge is a puzzle game where you must match and merge the block tiles to create increasingly large numbers to 2048 and way beyond. Pit your brain power against the IQ standings to see how you fair over time. Don't worry if you make a mistake, as special powerups are available to help you out!

items.title: 2048 City Builder
items.description: 2048 City Builder is a vibrant and addictive puzzle game that combines the strategic challenge of 2048 with the creative joy of city-building! Immerse yourself in a colorful world bursting with cartoonish charm as you merge tiles to construct your dream city. In this unique blend of gameplay mechanics, players must strategically merge matching tiles to unlock new buildings and landmarks, each adding to the splendor of their growing cityscape. With every successful merge, watch your city skyline transform from humble beginnings to a bustling metropolis filled with life and energy.

items.title: 2048 in Flasks
items.description: 2048 in Flasks is a puzzle game where you drop numbered balls into flasks and merge them to score bigger. Go through 50 levels, mix and match those balls, and watch those numbers grow as you aim for victory. Get ready to merge and master in a flask of fun!

items.title: 2048 Multiplayer
items.description: 2048 Multiplayer is the multiplayer version of the famous2048puzzle game!

items.title: 2248 Puzzle - Link Numbers
items.description: 2248 Puzzle - Link Numbers is a puzzle game where your mission is to connect balls with matching numbers and extend the chain with bigger numbers. How long can you make your connections?

items.title: 3 Tiles
items.description: 3 Tiles is a charming tile-matching game where you uncover and group sets of three identical picture tiles. With tiles arranged in intricate stacks, your challenge is to clear each stage by strategically removing matching sets. Test your focus and enjoy the satisfaction of organizing the field tile by tile!

items.title: Connect 4 Online Multiplayer
items.description: 4 In A Row Connected Multiplayer Online is a classic board game to connect four or more pieces in a row. You can play this 6x7 grid board game with your friends or with bots. Be the first player to create a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal line with at least four pieces to win!

items.title: 4Hexa
items.description: 4 Hexa is a simple yet addictive hexagon merge puzzle game! Do you enjoy colorful, number-based hexagon puzzles? Then this is the perfect merge game for you!

items.title: 9 Blocks
items.description: 9 Blocks is an innovative puzzle logic game that challenges you to combine blocks in unique and original ways. Rotate and drag the blocks strategically to merge it with adjacent blocks, both horizontally and vertically. Your main goal is to fill the box with black blocks by carefully planning each move and thinking ahead. With intuitive controls and challenging mechanics, 9 Blocks provides a refreshing and engaging puzzle experience for players looking for a mix of strategy and fun!

items.title: A Dark Room
items.description: A Dark Room is a text-based puzzle game to light the fire and see where it takes you. Let's start the adventure together!

items.title: Advent Mahjong
items.description: Advent Mahjong is a match 3 Christmas-themed game to connect identical tiles and remove them from the grid to move on to the next challenging levels before you run out of time. By passing a level, you get one day closer to Christmas, and the closer you get the more challenging the levels are.

items.title: Aim Master
items.description: Aim Master is a fun puzzle game that challenges your focus and precision. Your goal is to shoot the ball so it hits every white object in one take. Progress through levels to improve your skills and complete all challenges. Customize the ball's color to match your mood and enhance your gaming experience.

items.title: Alchemy
items.description: Alchemy is a puzzle game where you combine two elements to make the third one. Do some experiments to discover them all.

items.title: Alchemy Puzzle
items.description: Alchemy Puzzle is a creative puzzle game where you combine simple items to craft clever solutions and complete each level. You’ll face lighthearted challenges that test your thinking and bring a smile as quirky characters and real-world logic mix in surprising ways. Let your imagination lead as you solve delightful fusion-filled puzzles.

items.title: Alice is Dead 2
items.description: Alice is Dead 2 is an escape game where you are in a Jail of Wonderland and try to get out from there. Enter a darkly twisted take on Alice in Wonderland as you play the assassin, White Rabbit who needs to escape from his cell in this point-and-click adventure game.

items.title: Alice is Dead 3
items.description: Alice is Dead 3 is the third sequel game from Alice is Dead. In this puzzle game, you will play as the bunny from Alice in Wonderland. Try to solve all the mysteries to finish the game.

items.title: Aloha Mahjong
items.description: Aloha Mahjong is a relaxing puzzle game set in the beautiful landscapes of Hawaii. With 365 levels inspired by the island’s culture, you’ll match tiles featuring traditional symbols and exotic elements. Enjoy the peaceful, tropical atmosphere as you challenge yourself in this unique twist on the classic Mahjong experience.

items.title: And Again
items.description: And Again is a captivating platform puzzle game that challenges your intellect across 54 creative levels. Your goal is to collect three pins to unlock each portal, with every level offering its own unique twist. With charming cartoon-style graphics, 10 unique heroes, and immersive music, you'll stay engaged while solving puzzles, earning gold coins, and unlocking helpful hints.

items.title: Antbuster
items.description: Don't you just hate it when you're having a wonderful picnic, then ants suddenly attack your food? Well, here's your chance for revenge! Antbuster is a tower defense game where you protect your cake from being stolen by those pesky ants.

items.title: AritMazeTic
items.description: AritMazeTic is a puzzle game in which you need to move from block to block through mazes by doing some basic mathematical operations. How fast can you reach 1,000,000 points? Will you move 500 times before getting down to 0?

items.title: Australian Patience
items.description: Play a fascinating and fun version ofSolitairewhich is a mixture of Klondike and Scorpion.

items.title: Battle Chess
items.description: Battle Chess is an engaging puzzle game that requires strategic thinking to outwit your opponent. Solve amazing puzzles and merge your knights while preventing your enemy from doing the same. Experience exciting knight battles that will keep you on your toes. Plan your attacks carefully to defeat your adversary. The enemy's chess moves will mirror your own, so, be careful and think ahead before you move.

items.title: Beam
items.description: Beam is a fantastic puzzle game with a mission to guide the beam from the entrance to the exit points.

items.title: Big Giant Games (Prison Escape Puzzle)
items.description: Big Giant Games is a collection of thematic room escape games. Get some clues in the area and find your way to escape.

items.title: Big Tall Small
items.description: Big Tall Small is a puzzle-platformer game in which you must control the three characters of different sizes and make them all reach the exit successfully.

items.title: Bird Sort Puzzle
items.description: Bird Sort Puzzle is a sorting puzzle game that features a collection of colorful birds in a unique art style. This sorting game offers fun and challenging brain training that's suitable for all ages. Test your IQ by passing unique levels and unlocking new challenges. Play for free and enjoy super fun challenges and awesome brain teasers!

items.title: Black
items.description: Black is another color-based puzzle game for you! Can you make the screen black in all 25 levels? Each level has its own logic. You can also get the FREE mobile version with 50 levels (including new levels that are more suitable for mobile play).

items.title: Blackriver Mystery: Hidden Objects
items.description: Blackriver Mystery: Hidden Objects is a game where you step into the shoes of a mystical detective tasked with restoring a town from ruins. Engage in exciting quests, solve intriguing puzzles, and uncover hidden objects in beautiful locations. Encounter monsters, explore eerie anomalies, and play mini-games to unravel the secrets of Black River. Good luck, detective!

items.title: Block Champ
items.description: Block Champ is a 10x10-style Tetris game with a few unique twists and turns. Create horizontal and vertical rows of blocks to clear them from the game and increase your score.

items.title: Block Legends
items.description: Block Legends is a puzzle game where you drag and match blocks. In this casual puzzle game, you drag and arrange blocks on a board. Form a horizontal or vertical line to clear it and discover diamonds, bombs, and score multipliers along the way. Complete missions to earn rewards, with new challenges resetting every few minutes to keep the action going. Collect enough diamonds to buy powerful items like bombs and nukes, helping you clear levels with ease.

items.title: Block Magic Puzzle
items.description: Block Magic Puzzle is a classic game similar to Tetris with a10x10play style. Fill the empty 8x8 tiles with the blocks until it fulls horizontally or vertically and makes them disappear. There are 5 different modes you can play, Classic mode, Timed mode, Blast mode, Advanced mode, and Challenge Mode. Get ready and let's have some fun!

items.title: Block Puzzle
items.description: Into this new kind of puzzle game, you should move a lot of shapes onto the playing field and align them into lines or squares to make the best score possible.

items.title: Block Puzzle Item Rush
items.description: Block Puzzle Item Rush is a fresh and exciting puzzle game that combines classic block puzzle mechanics with unique hand-drawn Pop-Art Graphics to create a visually engaging and fun experience. Your objective is simple: drag and drop the tiles into the correct positions to fill lines and clear them from the board. However, what sets this game apart is the variety of special items you can earn by clearing lines, each of which has its exciting effect on the playing field. Try it out and see if you have what it takes to earn the best rank and beat your friends' high scores!

items.title: Block Blaster
items.description: Block Blaster is a puzzle game that blends the challenge of a grid-based cube game with the addictive fun of classic block puzzles. Exercise your brain as you navigate through increasingly intricate levels, with endless opportunities to sharpen your skills and elevate your IQ score. Dive into a world of pure puzzle bliss and let the block-matching adventure begin!

items.title: Block Puzzle Slide - Block Jam
items.description: Block Puzzle Slide: Block Jam is a fast-paced sliding puzzle where you’ll race against time to clear vibrant grids. Move colorful blocks to their matching exits as the challenges grow harder with each level. You’ll need quick thinking and sharp moves to outsmart tight spaces and stubborn shapes. Can you master every tricky board?

items.title: Block Puzzle Tropical Story
items.description: Block Puzzle Tropical Story is a vibrant puzzle game that blends relaxing gameplay with a sense of island adventure. You’ll connect blocks, solve clever challenges, and unlock stunning tropical locations. As you explore lush jungles and serene beaches, each level rewards you with stars and new areas, turning every puzzle into a step deeper into paradise.

items.title: Block Tour
items.description: Block Tour isn’t just a casual game—it’s a daily workout for your brain! Backed by science, solving block puzzles can improve cognitive function, reduce the risk of dementia, and keep your mind sharp no matter your age. Whether you’re a student striving for mental clarity or an adult focused on lifelong brain health, Block Tour offers the perfect blend of fun and neuroscience. Ready to prove the power of your brain? Take challenge yourself on a global puzzle adventure—one block at a time!

items.title: BlockBuster Puzzle
items.description: BlockBuster Puzzle is a Tetris-like game where you match colorful blocks so they disappear from the game screen. Unlock new realms and challenges as you progress, enjoying vibrant graphics and immersive gameplay. Prove your skills as a true puzzle master with every level you advance.

items.title: Blockogramm
items.description: Blockogramm is a creative puzzle game where you craft vibrant pixel art by placing colorful blocks in just the right spots. Drag and drop shades to fill each grid with precision, building images from simple shapes to intricate masterpieces. With hundreds of levels, soothing gameplay, and a splash of artistic challenge, it's perfect for puzzle lovers, and pixel art enthusiasts alike.

items.title: Blocks Fill Tangram
items.description: Blocks Fill Tangram is a fun Tangram puzzle game with 12 journeys and 80 levels per journey, with a similar playstyle to10x10. Fit the colorful blocks into place to win each puzzle.

items.title: Bloom Sort
items.description: Bloom Sort is a relaxing merge puzzle game set in Amy’s Flower Shop. Arrange flower pots, merge matching petals, and unlock stunning new blooms as you go. Beautiful graphics, calming music, and gentle challenges make it easy to unwind. Collect coins, bonuses, and rewards as you dive into this vibrant, brain-teasing floral journey.

items.title: Blooming Gardens
items.description: Blooming Gardens is a puzzle game that might look like a simple farming game, but it's more than just that. It's a board game where you care for a garden that grows flowers continuously as you move them around. You are tasked with lining up 5 of the same flowers to make them disappear. If your garden gets overgrown with flowers and becomes too much to handle, you lose.

items.title: Blue
items.description: After Yellow,Red, andBlack, now you got Blue, another puzzle game for you! Can you make the screen blue in all 25 levels? Each level has its own challenge.

items.title: Bolts and Nuts
items.description: Bolts and Nuts is a simple and fun puzzle game in which you test your logic and strategic thinking by solving unique puzzles, all with a ticking timer breathing down your neck.

items.title: Bouncy Farm!
items.description: Bouncy Farm: Puzzle Golf is an arcade game where mini-golf meets farmyard! Bounce around a pig, a rooster, and a sheep through obstacles at each level. Collect 3 stars to get a perfect score! This game is simple to play, but it is pretty challenging. It's great for all ages!

items.title: Boom Land Lite
items.description: Boom Land Lite is a puzzle game where you have the role of a demolition man. You've got several types of bombs to demolish a variety of buildings. Your aim is to destroy as much as you can of the building.

items.title: Bouncy Buddies: Physics Puzzle
items.description: Bouncy Buddies is a charming 2D physics-based puzzle adventure game that immerses you in a quirky, 80s-inspired world full of color and creativity. Use your clever thinking, quick reflexes, or sheer force to overcome a variety of puzzles as you journey to Evil Cyclox's castle to rescue Bouncy Jr. With multiple solutions to each challenge, you’re free to explore unique approaches to each puzzle and uncover surprises along the way. Your goal is to destroy enemies and get to the portal. Sounds easy, right? Dive into this nostalgic yet refreshing game filled with delightful obstacles, unique characters, and brain-bending puzzles!

items.title: Box It Up
items.description: Box It Up is a fast-paced puzzle game that tests your skills in managing a bustling can factory. Organize and pack cans with precision, mastering vibrant and challenging levels designed to keep you on your toes. With its colorful visuals and thrilling mechanics Box It Up offers an addictive experience perfect for puzzle enthusiasts and beverage fans alike!

items.title: Brain Teaser
items.description: Brain Teaser tests your thinking by providing a set of questions. You need to think out of the box if you don't want to get tricked.

items.title: Braindom 2: Who is Lying?
items.description: Braindom 2: Who is Lying is abrain gamefilled with tricky puzzles and mind games to stimulate your intellect. Become a master of logical deduction and solve the various mysteries presented to you in each level.

items.title: Brainrot Evolution: 2048 Merge Fight
items.description: Brainrot Evolution: 2048 Merge Fight is a chaotic twist on the classic 2048 formula, where you merge iconic brainrot animals to evolve and fight evil clones. Unlock legendary meme creatures like Tung Tung Tung Sahur, Tralalero Tralala, Cappuccino Assassino, Ballerina Cappuccina, Brr Brr Patapim, and many more. Every merge brings you closer to unlocking bizarre evolutions packed with humor and energy. Fast, funny, and unpredictable, Brainrot Merge challenges you to evolve smart or risk getting overrun in the madness.

items.title: Break the Glass
items.description: Break the Glass is a physics-based puzzle game where you launch balls to shatter every wine glass on the stage. With minimalist visuals and satisfying break effects, each level pushes your timing, precision, and problem-solving skills. Unique obstacles keep the gameplay fresh and make every smash a rewarding challenge for puzzle fans and destruction lovers alike.

items.title: Brick Bash Saga
items.description: Brick Bash Saga is a dynamic game where you aim and throw balls to shatter bricks in unique and ever-changing layouts. Each level brings a fresh challenge, testing your precision and strategy. With its engaging gameplay and creative stages, it guarantees an entertaining experience as you break your way through increasingly complex puzzles.

items.title: Bricks Sort
items.description: Bricks Sort is a colorful and satisfying 3D puzzle game that puts your sorting and logic skills to the test! Arrange vibrant bricks to match patterns, complete structures, and clear each level with precision. With smooth animations and increasingly complex challenges, every stage offers a new twist for puzzle lovers.

items.title: Bridge Builder
items.description: Bridge Builder Simulator is a physics-based puzzle game where you step into the shoes of a design engineer tasked with constructing sturdy bridges. Using limited materials, you must improvise, adapt, and balance logic with creativity to support passing vehicles. Across diverse locations and increasingly complex challenges, each structure you build tests your problem-solving skills and engineering finesse.

items.title: Bubble Merge 2048
items.description: Bubble Merge 2048 combines the addictive fun of bubble shooting with the strategic challenge of 2048! In this innovative bubble puzzle game, you need to complete all the tasks to win the level. Shoot and merge bubbles to reach higher numbers and destroy the objects around the merged balls. Get ready to blast through exciting puzzles as you explore this vibrant world.

items.title: Bubble Sorting
items.description: Bubble Sorting is a simplelogic game. Sort the bubbles into the right tubes until there is only one color per tube. Bubble Sorting won’t let you place two bubbles with different colors directly next to one another, so you’ll have to think logically and find your own way to sort the bubbles.

items.title: Bubbly Lab
items.description: Bubbly Lab is a physics puzzle game where you have to catch all the adorable bubbles in the laboratory. Use a super strong vacuum cleaner to get the bubbles into the flask. Use your logic to move lab items to help you get bubbles. Solve interesting puzzles in this fun and unique game!

items.title: Butterfly Shimai
items.description: Butterfly Shimai is a captivating mahjong connect game that takes you on a journey to match and release beautiful butterflies. Explore the enchanting world of butterflies as you connect identical pairs and set them free to soar. With mesmerizing visuals and engaging gameplay, Butterfly Shimai offers a delightful experience formahjongenthusiasts. Challenge yourself to find all the matching butterflies and witness their graceful flight in this immersive game.

items.title: Cake Sort Puzzle 3D
items.description: Cake Sort Puzzle 3D is a captivating color-matching puzzle game where you merge cake and pie slices to create complete desserts. As you solve progressively challenging puzzles, you’ll explore global cuisines, unlock new cakes, and train your brain. Enjoy the journey, master each level, and climb the leaderboard in this delightful 3D adventure.

items.title: Candy Riddles
items.description: Candy Riddles is a puzzle match-3 puzzle game bursting with tasty-looking, mouth-watering sweets! Prepare for a world of sugary fun as you match cookies, donuts, ice creams, and more to rack up points and progress through challenging levels. With each successful match of three or more treats, you'll clear the board and make way for even more delicious combinations. The more matches you make, the bigger your rewards, so keep matching and savor the sweet satisfaction of getting to the next level!

items.title: Candy Block Jam
items.description: Candy Block Jam is a colorful puzzle adventure where you slide candy blocks into place to clear the board. Each move challenges your logic as you match sweets, solve tricky layouts, and unlock satisfying chain reactions. With its blend of strategy and relaxation, you’ll test your mind while enjoying a sweet and rewarding gameplay experience.

items.title: Capybara Block Blast
items.description: Capybara Block Blast is a cozy puzzle game where you blast blocks alongside the world’s chillest animal, the capybara! Match colorful block shapes, clear lines, and rack up points while enjoying adorable animations and relaxing vibes. Whether you’re chasing a high score or just unwinding, this game offers the perfect mix of challenge and comfort.

items.title: Capybara Block Shot
items.description: Capybara Block Shot is a chill and cozy puzzle adventure where your goal is to merge number blocks, unlock high scores, and keep the vibes flowing. Join the most relaxed capybara on a journey to 2048 and beyond.

items.title: Card Shuffle Sort
items.description: Card Shuffle Sort is a smart and calming puzzle game that challenges you to strategically rearrange cards by color. With increasing difficulty, each level tests your organization and problem-solving skills. Enjoy beautiful designs, intuitive gameplay, and daily challenges that keep you coming back for more. Perfect for sharpening your mind while unwinding.

items.title: Castle Craft
items.description: Castle Craft is a mystical adventure puzzle game where you merge resources while looking for Fiona's missing husband, Michael, all the while uncovering plenty of mysteries along the way. Begin in a fog-covered land, using ancient keys to explore hidden realms and trace the path of your lost family through different eras. Discover mysterious lands and piece together an enchanting legacy.

items.title: Cat Sorter Puzzle
items.description: Cat Sorter Puzzle is a puzzle game in which you sort many types of cats into one container. These fluffy troublemakers have spread over different seats and are waiting for someone clever enough to stack them by color. Use your logical thinking to get the best results in this contemplative game. There are several game modes available: Classic, Meditation, Time Mode, Sticky, and Challenges. Playing this game is an excellent way to boost your mood while sharpening your attention skills!

items.title: Categories
items.description: Categories is a word game where you prepare yourself for a daily dose of word-sorting fun! This engaging word game challenges players to group words that share a common theme into categories to solve the puzzle. Whether you're a casual player looking for some brain-teasing entertainment or a dedicated word wizard seeking to hone your categorization skills, Categories offers something for everyone!

items.title: Caterpillars
items.description: Caterpillars is a charming puzzle game where every level is a journey of color and transformation! Guide playful caterpillars to their matching cocoons, clear the board, and watch them prepare to become beautiful butterflies. With simple drag-and-drop controls and clever level design, Caterpillars offers the perfect mix of relaxing gameplay and brain-teasing strategy. Whether you’re in for a quick session or a longer puzzle marathon, each level brings a satisfying new challenge.

items.title: Celtic Mahjong Solitaire
items.description: Celtic Mahjong Solitaire is amahjong gamewith a Solitaire variation ruleset. Match tiles with each other to remove them from the board, but make sure that both tiles have a free space on either their left or right side (you won't be able to highlight them otherwise as it's an invalid move). Clear the board in as little time as possible and try to beat the high score!

items.title: Chat Noir
items.description: Chat Noir is a fun little strategy game where you have only one goal - to keep the cat from running away. You'll do this by tapping/clicking on a tile which will make it impassable for the cat. Every time you change a tile, the cat will move one space. You'll have to be 3 steps ahead if you want to trap the cat in, so make sure to put your thinking cap on before starting!

items.title: Checkers & Draughts Multiplayer
items.description: Checkers & Draughts Multiplayer is an online checkers game where you can challenge friends or compete with players worldwide. Play and test your skills in multiple exciting variants, including Default Checkers, International Draughts, Russian Draughts, Brazilian Draughts, and Canadian Draughts.

items.title: English Checkers Free
items.description: English Checkers Free is a classic strategy game where you can challenge a powerful engine or play online with real opponents. With levels ranging from beginner to World Champion, you'll find the perfect match for your skills. Enjoy interactive hints, undo moves, and even play with a friend on the same screen. Customize your game and improve with every move.

items.title: Chef Slide
items.description: Chef Slide is an engaging puzzle game in which you prepare dishes for customers by sliding a plate across a chaotic kitchen. After a mishap among the chefs, all the ingredients are scattered, and it’s up to you to collect them in the correct order to complete each recipe. Step into the bustling kitchen and test your puzzle-solving skills in this chaotic culinary adventure!

items.title: Chess Free
items.description: Chess Free is an online puzzle chess game where you can compete against players worldwide in exciting one-on-one matches. Challenge yourself by outsmarting opponents of various skill levels to strengthen yours. If you prefer to play solo, level up your abilities against the computer, choosing from a range of difficulty settings—from beginner to World Champion. Whether you're just learning the game or aiming for grandmaster status, interactive hints help refine your moves to get you there.

items.title: Chess Nations
items.description: Chess Nations is a unique chess experience where you lead historical figures like Julius Caesar and Abraham Lincoln. Each nation has a distinct starting position, requiring you to master strategic styles and adapt to new challenges. Climb the ranks, compete against other players, and dominate the chessboard through the lens of history.

items.title: Chessformer
items.description: Chessformer is a challenging puzzle arcade game where your movements are confined to the chess piece you're given. Use your chess pieces' unique abilities to navigate through each stage and reach the king.

items.title: Chicken and Bee
items.description: Chicken And Bee is a 2D puzzle game. In the game, you start with a chicken that can transform into a bee. Both the chicken and the bee have unique abilities. Use your logic and strategy to complete all the levels. Good luck!

items.title: Chips Sort Puzzle
items.description: Chips Sort Puzzle is a relaxing sorting challenge where you organize colorful chips into linked containers based on specific tasks. With its calming gameplay and engaging puzzles, this game offers a perfect balance of strategy and relaxation as you focus on creating order and completing each level with precision.

items.title: Christmas Mansion
items.description: Christmas Mansion is a festive match-3 adventure where you rebuild a magical winter town alongside a helpful elf. Solve puzzles to unlock decorations, overcome snowy challenges, and restore charming buildings like cookie factories and toy workshops. From glowing trees to gingerbread tales, every chapter brings new holiday cheer, and even a dragon if you reach Episode 4!

items.title: Circle The Cat
items.description: Circle the Cat is a puzzle game where you draw circles around a cat in an attempt to trap it. Click the dots and stop the cat from escaping! This is the original trap the cat game that was made in Flash and is now available through emulation in any web browser.

items.title: Circuit Master
items.description: Circuit Master is an engaging puzzle game where you play the role of a skilled electrician solving complex circuits! You aim to connect various components—such as wires, fans, and machines—correctly, allowing electricity to flow seamlessly through the board. Are you ready to become the ultimate Circuit Master and bring electricity to life through clever puzzle-solving? Plug in, power up, and take on the challenge today!

items.title: Classic Solitaire
items.description:
Classic Solitaire game - the time-tested card game.
Classic Solitaire brings all the fun and enjoyment of this iconic card game to your web browser. The rules and gameplay remain the same – you have to move your cards around and try to match them by suit and number. This version of solitaire is fun to play and easy to pick up.

items.title: Clone2048
items.description: Clone2048 is a 2048 merge game with some action in it. In the year 2048, Dr. Wong is investigating a Wuberan planet that has been infected with a mysterious virus. Place all of Dr. Wong's clone soldiers in the right spot to make the soldiers merge into stronger soldiers to beat all the zombies on the planet.

items.title: Coffee Match: Block Puzzle
items.description: Coffee Match: Block Puzzle is a fast-paced sorting challenge where your mission is to match coffee cups to their trays before time runs out. Slide trays, sort cups, and think fast as each level ramps up the difficulty. Use clever boosters to freeze time or shuffle your way out of a jam in this vibrant, caffeine-fueled puzzle frenzy.

items.title: Collect Em All!
items.description: Collect Em All! Is apuzzle gamewhere you connect all the adjacent same colored blocks. Make long chains of colors to create beautiful sounds and unlock explosive power-ups!

items.title: Color King
items.description: Color King is a puzzle game where you move and connect at least 5 of the same-colored balls to make them disappear. You can arrange them horizontally, vertically, or diagonally. Every time you move a ball, three new balls will appear on the board. Thus, every next move will be more and more difficult for you. To move a ball, just simply click on it to select, then click on the destination square. You can only move a ball to a particular place if there is a path between the current position of the ball and the desired destination. Collect coins as you go and use them to buy new theme colors for the balls. Your main goal is to earn the maximum score and beat the opponent. Points are earned every time you manage to remove balls from the field. The longer the line you make, the more points you will earn.

items.title: Color Match
items.description: Color Match is a creative puzzle art color-matching game where you unleash your inner artist. Blend colors skillfully to bring 3D objects to life, turning each into a stunning work of art. With every stroke, challenge your creativity and enjoy the satisfaction of crafting vibrant masterpieces in this immersive and artistic experience.

items.title: Color Mix - Jelly Merge
items.description: Color Mix - Jelly Merge is a puzzle game where your objective is to merge jellies of the same color. Move the cubes to make jellies of the same color collide and combine into one. The more jellies you merge, the bigger the reward. Earn special bonuses along the way that give you an edge at each level. As you progress, you'll face increasingly tricky levels, but the rewards will grow with the challenge!

items.title: Color Nuts & Bolts Puzzle
items.description: Color Nuts & Bolts Puzzle is a captivating puzzle game where your objective is to cleverly match colored screws with their corresponding nuts. The game also includes a challenge mode that reveals a complete picture as you solve puzzles. Are you ready to embark on this exciting puzzle-solving adventure?

items.title: Color Roll 3D
items.description: Color Roll 3D is a puzzle color game that challenges you to unroll colorful layers in the right sequence to recreate intricate images. With increasingly complex levels, this one click sharpens your logic and attention to detail. Enjoy smooth mechanics and satisfying visuals as you immerse yourself in this brain-teasing, relaxing experience.

items.title: Color Screw: Unscrew & Match
items.description: Color Screw: Unscrew & Match is a unique puzzle game that combines the fun of match-3 with the strategic challenge of disassembling objects! Unscrew various items, from toy cars to intricate gadgets, and place screws in a grid to trigger exciting match-3 combos and clear the board. Perfect for fans of creative puzzles, this game will keep you entertained with its satisfying visuals and brain-teasing challenges.

items.title: Color Sort: Kitchen Chaos
items.description: Color Sort: Kitchen Chaos is a fun puzzle game where you sort sauces by color to clean up the chef's kitchen. Enjoy the challenge of organizing a messy kitchen while testing your sorting skills. Dive into the colorful chaos and bring order to the culinary madness! Select a bottle from which you want to pour the sauce, then touch another bottle to pour it into. Sort the sauces by color so that each bottle contains only one color. Help the chef restore order in the kitchen by sorting sauces by color into different bottles before the time runs out.

items.title: Color Water Sort 3D
items.description: Color Water Sort 3D is a vibrant and engaging puzzle game that challenges your strategy and patience. The goal is to sort colored water into the correct tubes, one color at a time. While it starts simple, the increasing number of tubes and colors adds to the challenge with each level. Featuring vivid visuals and satisfying mechanics, this game offers a relaxing yet exciting experience as you pour, strategize, and conquer each level.

items.title: ColorBox Puzzle
items.description: ColorBox Puzzle is an addictive puzzle game where you must solve pixel block challenges to complete vibrant images. Drag and drop the blocks into the correct positions within each pattern to fill it perfectly.
