With a wide range of funny patterns and multiple difficulty levels, immerse yourself in the captivating world of colorful blocks. Test your skills and enjoy the satisfying gameplay of this puzzle adventure!

items.title: Construct a Bridge
items.description: Construct a Bridge is a cool physics-based game in which you can put your engineering brain to the test. In each level, you will be required to build a bridge capable of withstanding the weight of a heavy truck passing across it. How you build your bridge is entirely up to you.

items.title: Construction Set - 3D Builder
items.description: Construction Set - 3D Builder is a creative building puzzle game that lets you step into the role of a master builder. You’ll design and assemble intricate 3D structures, piece by piece, turning simple parts into impressive creations. Challenge your skills, unleash your imagination, and watch your architectural masterpieces come to life.

items.title: Cookie Hangman
items.description: Cookie Hangman is an engaging puzzle game that invites you to become a Hangman champion with a sweet twist. Embark on a delightful word-guessing adventure, where you must unravel hidden words to save an adorable cookie character from the clutches of becoming a hangman. The game offers over 500 levels of mind-teasing puzzles to keep you hooked. Dress up your cookie character with a variety of outfits, each offering additional lives or moves to enhance your gameplay. Utilize power-ups like bombs and hints when you're stuck, and open treasure chests to reveal rewards like coins, bombs, and hints. The game not only entertains but also enhances your vocabulary and word-guessing skills. With vibrant visuals, captivating animations, and customization options, Cookie Hangman is a delightful and educational choice for players of all ages. Start your word-guessing adventure now and save the cookie character from becoming a hangman!

items.title: Craft Brainrot
items.description: Craft Brainrot is a crafting game where you merge hilariously mismatched elements from Italian meme culture to uncover wild, unexpected combos. You’ll mix things like espresso and ballerinas to create absurd fusions like the Ballerina Cappuccina. With each merge, you dive deeper into a world of surreal humor and unpredictable discoveries.

items.title: Crazy Bus
items.description: Crazy Bus is a fast-paced puzzle game where you organize passengers onto arriving buses in the correct order. Clear the bus stop efficiently by planning your moves and managing the chaos. Test your quick thinking and precision as the challenges become increasingly tricky with every passing bus.

items.title: Crazy Crypt Escape
items.description: Crazy Crypt Escape is an ancient-themed room escape game that will awaken the explorer within you. Step into the enigmatic crypt, a place steeped in mystery and rich history, where a labyrinth of cunning puzzles awaits your wit and ingenuity.

items.title: Cribbage JD
items.description: Cribbage JD is a classic card game also known as Crib, Cribble, and Noddy. It's a multiplayer card game traditionally for two players, that involves playing and grouping cards in combinations that gain points. The cribbage board is used for score-keeping.

items.title: Crocword
items.description: Crocword is a challenging and entertaining crossword puzzle game. Help Professor Croc solve colorful crosswords by swiping or clicking to build words from letters. Earn coins for solving puzzles and use clues for tough answers. Test your brain with hundreds of levels and enjoy playing with friends and family.

items.title: Crossword
items.description: Crossword is a puzzle game, and as the title suggests, you will try to fill up a crossword puzzle. There's a little twist though, you don't have any clues to go on. All you get are some letters that are already on the board, and some letters you can use to fill the board. Each time you tap a tile to use a letter, all other tiles using that letter will automatically be filled as well. Sounds easy enough, right? Well, you can go through all five levels of difficulty to keep the game interesting, so you can enjoy all those brain teasing crossword puzzles.

items.title: Crossword Connect
items.description: Connect the letters to solve the crossword. Find bonus words to earn extra points and use the hints if you get stuck. Crossword Connect is a relaxing puzzle game you can play at a steady pace.

items.title: Cryptoword
items.description: Cryptoword is a word game that takes you on an epic journey through enchanted realms. Tackle challenging puzzles, face formidable foes, and discover hidden treasures. Every level is packed with new surprises and thrills, ensuring you stay engaged and excited. Dive into this mesmerizing world and become the ultimate adventurer.

items.title: Cube to Hole Puzzle
items.description: Cube to Hole Puzzle is a clever logic game that challenges you to match colored cubes with their correct holes. With tight spaces and limited moves, every decision matters. You’ll need to think ahead, pick the right cube at the right moment, and avoid dead ends as you work through each increasingly tricky level.

items.title: Cubxer
items.description: Cubxer is a cube stacking match-3 puzzle game similar to the old classic Columns. At each turn you control a dropping column of colored cubes. Make color matches with cubes at the bottom.

items.title: Cups - Water Sort Puzzle
items.description: Cups - Water Sort Puzzle is a fun puzzle game where you sort colored liquids into glass cups. Sort all the colors neatly together to move to the next level!

items.title: Cut The Rope 2
items.description: In the sequel of this great physics game you once again have to cut the rope and collect the stars. Have fun with Cut The Rope 2!

items.title: Cut the Rope
items.description: Cut the Rope to feed large pieces of candy to a hungry creature called Om Nom. Collect all the stars for the highest rating and progress to more challenging levels with new puzzles.

items.title: Cut the Rope: Magic
items.description: Cut the Rope: Magic is a fun puzzle game in which your character Om Nom has been transported to a strange magical world. You must help Om Nom collect gold stars and catch food! All you have to do on each level is cut a series of ropes - how and when you cut these ropes will determine the way that the candy falls and if it reaches Om Nom or not.

items.title: Cut the Rope Time Travel
items.description: Cut the rope and collect stars in different ages. Have fun with Cut the Rope Time Travel!

items.title: Cute Cats Match
items.description: Cute Cats Match is a delightful tile-matching game packed with adorable feline friends. Your mission is simple: match identical cats, clear the board, and complete each level. With every stage comes a fresh challenge to test your puzzle-solving skills, making the experience both fun and rewarding. Thanks to its easy-to-learn mechanics and relaxing gameplay, you can enjoy Cute Cats Match casually in your free time or dive into tougher stages for a greater challenge. Step into the charming world of cats and start matching today!

items.title: Cypher - Code Breaker
items.description: Cypher - Code Breaker is a brain-teasing logic game where you decipher hidden digits using clever clues and formulas. Each symbol masks a number, and your job is to reveal the correct combination without guessing. Inspired by classics like Sudoku and Mastermind, this puzzle challenges you to think critically and find the one true solution.

items.title: Daily AMazeBalls
items.description: Daily AMazeBalls is a fast-paced puzzle challenge where you guide a nimble ball through twisting mazes using flippers and bounce tricks. Each day delivers a brand-new set of clever traps and surprising turns that demand sharp thinking and quick reflexes. Navigate to the green goal with style and precision as you chase your next brainy victory.

items.title: Daily Mahjong
items.description: Daily Mahjong is a fun game to spend time. Your task is to remove all the tiles from the board. You must remove the same tiles one by one, and only from the top layer. The faster you finish the game, the more score bonus will be received. Every game is unique as piece location will be randomized. Track your progress daily and get better on this game.

items.title: Daily Puzzle
items.description: Daily Puzzle is an excellent choice for those who like to spend time putting jigsaws together. Check back every day so you don't miss a single new puzzle. Earn stars and unlock a collection of unique pictures. Several difficulty levels will help you learn how to solve puzzles and hone your skill.

items.title: Defuse the Bomb 3D
items.description: Defuse the Bomb 3D is a casual bomb-defusing puzzle game. Defuse the bombs within the time limit following the instructions shown. Earn rewards and use them to upgrade your bomb defusal lab!

items.title: Detective Holmes: Hidden Object
items.description: Detective Holmes: Hidden Object takes you on a thrilling mystery adventure alongside the legendary Sherlock Holmes! Join Arthur Conan Doyle’s famous detective as he conducts a new investigation, searching for clues in the most unexpected places. Test your powers of observation and uncover hidden details that could be the key to solving the case. One small clue can make all the difference. Are you ready to assist Detective Holmes in cracking the mystery?

items.title: Detective IQ: Brain Games
items.description: Detective IQ: Brain Game is a puzzle quiz game filled with brain teasers, puzzles, and mysteries waiting to be solved! As you begin the game, you will quickly learn from Detective Mehul—one of the top detectives in the Detective Society. This time, it’s your turn to follow his path. Your mission: master ten essential detective skills and become the first-ever legendary detective!

items.title: Detective Loupe Puzzle
items.description: Detective Loupe Puzzle is a captivating point-and-click mystery adventure. Immerse yourself in crime scenes, scour for clues, and interrogate suspects to crack cases. With each level offering a fresh mystery and a diverse cast of characters, put your detective skills to the test. Utilize hints and a magnifying glass to uncover crucial evidence and ensure justice prevails.

items.title: Diamant: Sky Stories Match 3
items.description: Diamant: Sky Stories Match 3 is a vibrant match-3 adventure where you build a floating city in the clouds. Solve colorful puzzles, summon mighty golems with unique powers, and unlock extraordinary buildings to grow your sky island. With each blueprint you discover and upgrade, your city soars higher, blending puzzle mastery with imaginative world-building.

items.title: Diamond Dungeon: Match 3
items.description: Diamond Dungeon: Match 3 is the ultimate arcade match 3 game where your mission is to obliterate crystals and conquer challenging levels. Match 3 crystals in a line or combine four or more for bonus crystals with unique effects. Explore classic obstacles and encounter new puzzle mechanics like gravity, teleporters, magic spheres, hidden treasures, and more. With beautiful gems, regular level updates, and a captivating soundtrack, this game is a gem for puzzle lovers of all ages.

items.title: Diamond Rush 2
items.description: Diamond Rush 2 is a fun match 3 game with a space theme. Fill up the bar to finish the level. The bar will reduce if you're not doing anything, and if it's empty it will be game over!

items.title: Dice Puzzle
items.description: Dice Puzzle is a puzzle game where your task is to strategically place numbered cubes on the board, aiming to merge three adjacent cubes with the same number. As they combine, their value increases. Carefully select cubes with different points, considering their placement to match with others effectively. Be mindful, as cubes may appear individually or in pairs. Merge three or more dice horizontally or vertically to create higher-valued cubes. Utilize the storage space wisely to save cubes for later use. Test your puzzle-solving skills in this engaging dice-merging game!

items.title: Diner in the Storm
items.description: Diner in the Storm is a puzzle adventure game that plunges you into a heart-pounding escape adventure, where danger lurks not only outside but within the walls of a seemingly ordinary roadside diner. Caught in the grip of a sudden and ominous storm, you seek shelter in a roadside diner, only to find that safety is fleeting, and the diner harbors dark secrets. As the storm rages on, you must solve a series of intricate puzzles that push your logic, wit, and nerves to the limit. Each puzzle reveals new mysteries about the diner’s hidden past.

items.title: Dishwasher
items.description: Dishwasher is an engaging and light-hearted game where you become the ultimate dishwasher organizer! Your task is to strategically place dishes of different sizes and shapes, such as plates, glasses, cutlery, and pans, into the dishwasher. Get some money and use it to customize your dream home and buy some clothes. Design your space with unique furniture, decorations, and upgrades to make it truly yours.

items.title: Domino Duel
items.description: Domino Duel is a versatile battle of minds offering thrilling head-to-head matchups in multiple modes. Challenge AI, duel online, or face off with friends on one screen or across the globe. With flexible settings, rich customization and helpful features like hints and move history, it’s the perfect arena to sharpen your strategy and climb the ranks.

items.title: DonutCats Merge
items.description: DonutCats Merge is an exciting game where you have to merge the same cats in donuts. Each DonutCat brings coins and increases your income. Unlock all 40 unique DonutCats!

items.title: Doodle Block Puzzle
items.description: Doodle Block Puzzle is a puzzle brain game that will have you hooked from the get-go with its visually vibrant game graphics. Your goal is to strategically arrange colorful blocks to fit perfectly into designated spaces. With a whopping 186 unique levels, each puzzle presents a fresh challenge that tests your logic, precision, and strategic thinking. As you advance, the puzzles grow increasingly complex, offering an engaging and rewarding experience for players of all skill levels.

items.title: Doors: Paradox
items.description: Doors: Paradox is a fantasy escape puzzle game where you need to find objects to help you open the portal door. This game has beautiful 3D graphics and absorbing audio that you don't want to miss.

items.title: DOP Noob: Draw to Save
items.description: DOP Noob: Draw to Save is a puzzle drawing game that will challenge your brain and logic. Draw a line to protect Noob from dangerous things such as cave spiders, sharp saws, fire, zombies, skeleton archers, and more. Noob is in big trouble, so your mission is to rescue him! This game created by Noob vs Pro team has been inspired by Save the Dog, Draw to Save, and Minecraft Universe!

items.title: Dot King
items.description: Dotking is a challenging puzzle game where you have to connect multiple dots by color to fill the board without any blank spaces. This game tests your creative ability to connect dots of different colors on a complex maze-like board. Each level requires strategy and concentration, providing a high level of challenge that draws gamers into the heart of the game. Dotking combines a thrilling visual experience with strategic gameplay to take puzzle gaming to a new level. Challenge yourself in the game world and hone your strategy to fill the board perfectly.

items.title: Drag Master
items.description: Drag Master is a puzzle game about collecting and creating unique works of art! Each level presents a fresh challenge where you must think outside the box, assemble stunning paintings, and sell them to earn rewards. With countless levels and endless imaginative possibilities, Drag Master is the perfect game for puzzle lovers and art enthusiasts alike.

items.title: Draw Bridge
items.description: Draw Bridge is a brain-teasing adventure where you design creative pathways to guide a car through obstacles to safety. With each level presenting new challenges, your goal is to draw safe bridges and roads to rescue the stranded vehicle. Sharpen your problem-solving skills and unleash your creativity in this engaging puzzle journey!

items.title: Draw Bridge Puzzle
items.description: Draw Bridge Puzzle is a clever puzzle game where you drag to create a path and guide bikes safely to the finish line. Sketch a single, sturdy bridge over gaps and avoid collisions with other vehicles on each level. With ragdoll physics, brain-teasing challenges, and endless fun, you’ll test your creativity and strategy to keep every ride safe and smooth.

items.title: Draw Quiz
items.description: Draw Quiz is a casual puzzle game designed for those who love combining the fun of drawing with the challenge of solving puzzles. In this engaging and creative game, players are tasked with drawing an object based on a given description or clue, and then guessing what the item is. As you progress through the levels, the difficulty increases, providing an entertaining and exciting experience. Can you guess every item and prove yourself as the ultimate smart painter? Start drawing and see how far your creativity takes you!

items.title: Draw To Smash!
items.description: Draw To Smash is a clever puzzle game where you draw lines, shapes, or doodles to crush all the troublesome eggs. Test your strategic thinking as you plan each move and predict outcomes to solve intricate puzzles. With each level, sharpen your logical skills and unlock exciting bonus challenges that will push your intellect to new heights.

items.title: Drop & Merge the Numbers
items.description: Drop & Merge the Numbers is a super addictive2048merge puzzle game. Use your strategy to drop the numbers in the row so they can merge and create a larger number. How good and how far can you go? Let's merge numbers!

items.title: Dungeons n' Ducks
items.description: Dungeons n' Ducks is a puzzle game where you guide the duckie through a dungeon by rotating rooms and adjusting water levels. Your goal is to help Duckie collect keys and navigate to freedom. Each move requires strategic thinking as you manipulate the environment to create the perfect path.

items.title: Dusya and Lava
items.description: Dusya and Lava is a delightful puzzle game that adds a fresh twist to the classic Sokoban concept. Navigate through challenges, moving boxes while avoiding lava, collecting keys, and retrieving a stray ball into the portal. This addictive game provides an exhilarating journey with unique obstacles. Join Dusya in overcoming difficulties to successfully return the ball, making each level a thrilling adventure!

items.title: Emily's Hotel Solitaire
items.description: Emily's Hotel Solitaire is a puzzle game where you embark on a tropical adventure with Emily, and fulfill her grandfather's dream of building the best hotel in the world! Immerse yourself in the magical atmosphere as you enjoy the challenging games of Solitaire and create your luxurious hotel paradise. With exciting Solitaire puzzles, glorious locations, and endless opportunities for customization, this game offers an unforgettable experience!

items.title: Emoji Guess Master!
items.description: Emoji Guess Master! is a fun-filled adventure that tests your creativity and quick thinking. Match two emojis to a given word, challenging your knowledge and intuition. With engaging gameplay, a variety of difficulty levels, and vibrant visuals, you’ll improve your cognitive skills while having a blast. Perfect for quick play sessions or longer challenges.

items.title: Emoji Hunt
items.description: Emoji Hunt is a puzzle game to find the animal emoji before the time runs out! This game has 100 levels to beat and lots of powerups you can get. Prove the sharpness of your eyes by playing Emoji Hunt!

items.title: Emoji Puzzle!
items.description: Emoji Puzzle is a puzzle connect game that brings the world of emojis to life in a whole new way. Dive into a series of cleverly designed puzzles that challenge your lateral thinking and creativity. Each puzzle is based on the emotional and symbolic associations of the emojis we use daily, offering a unique and engaging experience. As you progress, you'll test your ability to connect emojis in fun, unexpected ways, while exploring the deeper connections and meanings behind them. Perfect for players who love a mental challenge, Emoji Puzzle helps you level up your problem-solving skills, all while having fun.

items.title: Escape or Die 4
items.description: Escape or Die 4 is an escape puzzle game where you must search the room for items that will help you escape. Look through drawers, boxes, and anything else that you think will help you reach the end. Look carefully at the various patterns around the room and move quickly. You’ll need to find several items before you can escape.

items.title: Moon Trip
items.description: Moon Trip is an escape puzzle game where you are an experienced mission astronaut with a rocket that suddenly landed on the moon and must return to the Earth. There are many mysteries and puzzles that need to be solved for you to escape. You’ll discover bunnies, robots, spaceships, aliens, stars, treasure chests, and even a bar. Some puzzles will seriously test your IQ and tease your brain. Can you solve them all and fly back?

items.title: Everytown
items.description: Everytown is an immersive point-and-click puzzle adventure that invites you into the mysterious world of a seemingly ordinary small-town hotel. But not everything is as it seems. As a young security agent sent to investigate, your mission is to uncover the truth behind the secrets that lie within and save lives.

items.title: Exhibit of Sorrows
items.description: Exhibit of Sorrows is a short horror game set in a curious circus-themed exhibit. Explore this strange interactive museum, follow instructions, and don’t upset the clown!

items.title: Factory Balls
items.description: Factory Balls is a Bart Bontepuzzle gamein which you match the ball with the image. Pick up one of the balls and use the available tools to make the required ball. When you’ve made the ball as shown in the picture on the box, you’ll move to the next challenge.

items.title: Factory Balls 2
items.description: Factory Balls 2 is a puzzle game where your main task is to create balls that should match the ones being requested. At each level, you'll be shown a box with a label in front showing the type of ball that needs to be shipped. You'll then create a ball that looks exactly as the label using the balls on the left side of the screen and the different tools given to you (including paint, sticky tapes, belts, and other stuff). Some of the levels will require a bit of logic, so make sure you've got your thinking cap on!

items.title: Factory Balls Forever
items.description: Factory Balls Forever is a logic game by Bart Bonte. You might think that working on the assembly line is tedious work, but not if you're manufacturing Factory Balls! Your job in this logic puzzle game is to custom craft each ball to a specific order. You've got all the tools you need to fulfill each order... except the instruction manual.

items.title: Fairy Puzzle
items.description: Fairy Puzzle is a jigsaw puzzle game where you must match puzzle pieces and complete the images. The game has 50 levels with different colorful pictures.

items.title: Fairyland Merge & Magic
items.description: Fairyland Merge & Magic is a puzzle casual merge game set on an enchanting island of imagination and wonder. Step into a vibrant mosaic of captivating stories, each intricately crafted with actual magical elements, where every move you make has the power to shape your own whimsical world. The game beautifully combines fantasy with strategic puzzle-solving, offering a unique experience that is as mesmerizing as it is immersive. From mystical creatures to enchanted artifacts, you’ll merge and collect a wide array of items, breathing life into the Fairyland of your dreams.

items.title: Fall Words
items.description: Fall Words is a puzzle game that challenges you to collect stars by strategically dropping letters. Each level presents unique mechanics like bridges, dominoes, and more, adding depth to the gameplay. Navigate through the romantic storyline of two alien lovers exchanging messages while mastering your typing skills. Unleash your creativity and conquer each level with finesse!

items.title: Faraway: Puzzle Escape
items.description: Faraway: Puzzle Escape is a fantastic 3D puzzle game in which you must explore a foreign landscape and solve the mystery of the explorers who came here before you. Each level presents an amazing 3D environment and a series of ancient ruins which you must search to find clues. You can check objects and break open pottery to find notes left from previous explorers. These notes help tell the tale of the ruins and the civilization that lived here.

items.title: Farm Merge Valley
items.description: Farm Merge Valley is a puzzle business farming game where you merge various animals and objects to upgrade them. Grow crops and add animals to your farm while expanding to exciting new lands. Discover the peaceful farm life you always dreamed of while reaping the rewards from various challenges.

items.title: Favorite Puzzles
items.description: Favorite Puzzles is a free jigsaw puzzle game with a wide selection of beautiful images to suit everyone. This game is designed to give you the ultimate puzzle-solving experience. Customize your gameplay by adding your own photos and transforming them into personalized puzzles to challenge your skills. Compete against players worldwide on the leaderboards and test your abilities in a dynamic, competitive environment. Plus, return daily for fresh puzzles and exciting rewards that keep the challenge alive! Whether you’re aiming for the top spot or just looking for a fun, personalized twist, this game offers endless opportunities for puzzle lovers.

items.title: Fill The Fridge
items.description: Fill The Fridge is a puzzle/casual sorting game where you organize your fridge after a supermarket shopping spree. Stock shelves with various items, finding the perfect spots for each. Enjoy the challenge of emptying your shopping carts and refilling the fridge. This engaging puzzle game makes organizing the kitchen both fun and satisfying.

items.title: Fill the Gap
items.description: Fill the Gap is the Tetris-style puzzle game in which you are given three different shape blocks in a random order over and over again. You need to try and fill all of the empty rows and all of the empty columns with the shapes that you are given. You are trying to fill the whole space, however, the shapes will not necessarily fit perfectly each time.

items.title: Fill the Heart
items.description: Fill the Heart is a calming puzzle challenge where you slide to gather hearts of different colors, each with its own unique twist. Green hearts stop your movement, blue hearts need multiple touches, and teleporters keep you on your toes. With soothing visuals and clever mechanics, it’s a relaxing yet engaging test of strategy.

items.title: Find Bird
items.description: Find Bird is a simple yet fun game where you must find the same bird according to the example. Find the bird quickly before the birds run away. Sometimes a thief bird will appear and it may have coins and tremendous treasures that you can collect. Click on the thief bird and do not miss it. You can also try using three powerful power-ups such as adding one more heart, resetting the timer and stopping for a while, and removing half of the birds that you can purchase in the shop section. The bird will level up if you find many of the same kind. Collect all of the birds and look at the collections in the birds' book. So, what are you waiting for? Prove your keen eye skills and good luck!

items.title: Find Cat
items.description: The cute British shorthair blue cat likes to play hide-and-seek with me. Where did it hide today? Under the sofa, inside the box? Inside the toy? still in the uncle's hat?

items.title: Find Cat 2
items.description: Our cute cat is coming back! In Find Cat 2, our cat goes to the park and go shopping with its owner, but it likes to play hide and seek with the owner. Can you find the cat? This time you can also merge items!

items.title: Find It - Find The Differences
items.description: Find It - Find The Differences is a fun puzzle game that puts your observation skills to the ultimate test. Each level shows you two seemingly identical images, but hidden within them are subtle differences waiting to be discovered. As you progress, the game ramps up in difficulty, starting with easier challenges and moving into more complex, intricate scenes that will push your focus and attention to the limit.

items.title: Find Me: Lost Objects
items.description: Find Me: Lost Objects is a puzzle adventure where you join Octo the Octopus on a thrilling quest across stunning underwater realms and even into outer space! Uncover hidden objects, face exciting challenges, and assist Octo in rescuing his true love. With enchanting worlds, surprising twists, and heartwarming moments, this quest will keep you hooked from start to finish!

items.title: Find The Difference
items.description: Find the Difference is an engaging game that tests your attention and concentration skills as you search for 10 differences in various pictures. Sharpen your observation abilities, enhance visual thinking, boost memory, reduce stress, and improve concentration. With no time limit, this game is suitable for all ages and provides a relaxing and enjoyable experience. Challenge yourself and see how many differences you can spot!

items.title: Find the Pieces
items.description: Find the Pieces is a puzzle game that challenges your mind with its vast collection of levels. Join players worldwide in unraveling art-pop pictures through logic and observation. Relax and unwind as you search for hidden art amidst the pieces. Become a master of the game and enjoy the thrill of discovery!

items.title: Find Them All!
items.description: Find them all is a puzzle game that sharpens your cognitive skills. Uncover hidden objects and crack puzzles, but beware – appearances can be deceiving! With each level, embrace creative thinking to solve mysteries. Time to unwind and elevate your brainpower. Embark on this enthralling journey and discover the unexpected. Ready to test your wits? Engage with "Mind Explorer" for a mentally stimulating experience.

items.title: Five-O
items.description: Five-O puts a numerical twist on the classic crossword board game! Instead of letters, you place number tiles, forming sequences that must add up to multiples of five, with no more than five tiles per sequence. Think strategically, maximize your bonuses, and outscore your opponent in Five-O!

items.title: Flip The Box
items.description: Flip The Box is a puzzle game where you must paint all the squares on the floor with colors using a block. This game comes with different and unique mechanics. Embark on this challenging game!

items.title: Flow 2048 3D
items.description: Flow 2048 3D is a strategic puzzle game where you connect matching tiles to merge numbers and climb toward higher scores. Each successful fusion creates stronger tiles, pushing you closer to the elusive 2048 milestone. With every move you’ll balance planning and intuition, testing your mind in a simple yet deeply addictive challenge.

items.title: Flow Mania
items.description: Flow Mania is an epic and challenging puzzle game in which you must attempt to connect all of the colored dots on each level. This might sound easy, but you have to think hard about the way that you move the colored dots and connect them together as there is only one correct path for each level.

items.title: Foono Online Multiplayer
items.description: Foono Online Multiplayer is an engaging card game that takes inspiration from classics like Uno Online and Crazy Eights. The objective is to clear your hand of cards before your opponents do. It's a game of strategy, quick thinking, and a bit of luck. Foono offers endless fun and opportunities for social interaction. Whether you're playing casually with friends or in competitive online matches, Foono promises an entertaining card game experience!

items.title: Foreign Creature
items.description: Foreign Creature is a point-and-click game that lets you play as an alien that can take over the bodies of any living creature on earth. Use this transfer mechanic to free yourself from being a scientific experiment, then causing chaos everywhere you go! Your choices matter, and the order of doing things can be the reason you can leave a scenario, or get stuck there, so be sure to pick your transfers and moves wisely.

items.title: Foreign Creature 2
items.description: Foreign Creature 2 is a point-and-click puzzle-adventure game created by Belugerin Games. You play as a clone of a king from an alien planet, and you were sent to earth on a mission - learn how to use evil and build an army to re-conquer your own planet. This has proven hard, but you are now on the verge of completing your mission, but now you'll also need to erase all evidence of your existence to keep yourself safe from the fearful eyes of the human race.

items.title: Forgotten Treasure 2
items.description: Forgotten Treasure 2 is a puzzle game where you combine jewels to crash obstacles using your logic and go through numerous challenges. At the moment, there are more than a thousand levels and this is far from the limit. Some of them are real tests for the brain!

items.title: Fortune Match
items.description: Fortune Match is a puzzle match-3 game with a mystical world theme. Swipe the mystical symbols and solve the match-3 quests. There are thousands of intriguing levels available. Receive coins and get extra boosters to make your quest easier. The fun and excitement will never end, and you will always be entertained! Enter the mystical world of colors and enjoy the fun!

items.title: Free The Cat
items.description: Free The Cat is a puzzle game where you must move tiles and create a pathway for the cat to get free! The cute and adorable cat is trapped, and it's your mission to set it free! Solve a wide variety of brain-teasing challenges. Roll, slide, and solve your way to victory in this purr-fect challenging puzzle game!

items.title: GeoQuizle
items.description: GeoQuizle is a collection of geography and photography guessing games that let you unleash your inner explorer. There are four game modes you can play:

items.title: Get a Screw: 3D Puzzle!
items.description: Get a Screw: 3D Puzzle! is a brain-twisting 3D puzzle game where you twist, turn, and assemble clever mechanisms using screws and parts. Each level challenges your logic and precision with unique tasks and satisfying builds. Simple to control but packed with clever puzzles, it’s a fun and engaging way to sharpen your mind, one screw at a time!

items.title: Gin Rummy Online
items.description: Play Gin Rummy Online (Plus). Gin Rummy is a card-matching game you can play with one or more other players. This online version of Gin Rummy lets you play against opponents of various difficulties to build your skills and become a slick Gin Rummy master!

items.title: God of Light
items.description: God of Light is s visual-rich puzzle game in which you become the God of Light that needs to activate the Sources of Life.

items.title: Gold Mahjong FRVR
items.description: Gold Mahjong FRVR is a Mahjong game with a mission to clear the gold tiles, and it comes with a daily challenge.

items.title: Gold Train FRVR
items.description: Gold Train FRVR is the train puzzle game in which you are a rail road manager in charge of designing track for trains to reach their destination successfully. You will have a set number of pieces of track to lay in which ever order you choose however there will be a specific number of each type.

items.title: Golf Solitaire
items.description: Golf Solitaire is a fun and challenging solo card game. Clear all the cards by placing them in order and returning them to the pile until there are none remaining. This game uses a regular 52-card deck, but the rules differ from regular Solitaire.

items.title: Green
items.description: Green is a challenging puzzle game made byBart Bonte. Like his previous games,blackandblue, you must turn the whole screen a single color by solving the puzzle. This time the color is green. Have fun!

items.title: Grid Odyssey: Nonograms
items.description: Grid Odyssey: Nonograms is a captivating logic puzzle adventure where you use number clues to uncover hidden pixel images. Sharpen your focus and reasoning as you fill in each square, gradually revealing the picture beneath. With every solved grid, the mystery deepens, making this a rewarding and addictive challenge for puzzle lovers.

items.title: Grow Cube
items.description: Grow Cube is an awesome turn-based game in which you must turn your cube into a beautiful habitation complete with a gorgeous garden and plants. During each move, you can place a different object - the order in which you place the objects will have an effect on the cube and determine how things grow. You can level each item up and as they level up, they grow in size and structure.

items.title: Grow Island
items.description: Grow Island is an episode of Grow series in which you need to place the correct items in order to develop your island fully.

items.title: Grow Nano
items.description: Grow Nano is a fun little puzzle game in which your goal is to heal a boy that is all tuckered out. You'll do this by selecting one of the 8 healing items one by one. These items may evolve depending on when you gave it to the boy, and what other things you have given that the item can interact with.

items.title: Grow RPG
items.description: Grow RPG is a cool turn based RPG game in which you must build up your kingdom and fight against the evil demon who is trying to destroy your world. Each turn you must place an object in your world such as a tree, a house, some stone, a chest or water for example. Each object has a different function and placing it in a different order will result in a certain line of the story playing out.

items.title: Grow Tower
items.description: Grow Tower is another fantastic episode from the superb Grow series. This episode is a mini-series but uses the same mechanics as the other grow games. In this title your aim is simple – you must use the objects at your disposal to create a tower and try to level each item up as far as possible.

items.title: Grow Valley
items.description: Grow Valley is a puzzle game with a turn-based system in which you need to build and develop an empty valley.

items.title: Growmi
items.description: Growmi is a platformer puzzle game where you solve puzzles to regain power. Your character has a limited set of moves that increase over time as you clear more areas of the game. Show the world how smart your Growmi is and complete the game!

items.title: Guess Who Online
items.description: Guess Who? brings the classic board game everyone loves to the digital realm! Each player has a character, and the opposing player must guess who they are. Choose from a variety of different questions and answer truthfully. Guess Who? can be played online and against the computer.

items.title: Gummy Blocks Battle
items.description: Gummy Blocks Battle is a block puzzle game where you drop blocks to form and clear full lines on the screen, both vertically and horizontally. Simply drag and place the blocks on the board to create lines. It's easy to play and incredibly fun! Enjoy the challenge of fitting the pieces together and watch the lines disappear as you progress. Perfect for a quick game to test your puzzle skills or for extended play sessions. Dive into Gummy Blocks Battle and experience the joy of this addictive puzzle game!

items.title: Gun Match Screw
items.description: Gun Match Screw is a unique level-based puzzle game that blends screw-matching mechanics with inventive gun-shaped boards. Each level challenges you to align colored screws, designed as bullets, to unlock intricate parts and complete the puzzle. You’ll need sharp focus and careful strategy to master every board, making each solved stage a satisfying step forward.

items.title: Hanafuda Flash
items.description: Hanafuda Flash is exactly as the title suggests - it's a flash version of a classic Japanese card game, Hanafuda. This card game involves 2 players throwing and taking cards to/from each other to create a set of cards from a "suit". There are multiple suits with different points depending on the cards you've collected. This game will need a bit of studying, but once you get the hang of it, this game is super fun because of how fast the game starts and ends.

items.title: Hanoi 3D
items.description: Hanoi 3D is a challenging logic puzzle game that tasks you with stacking rings of the same color, from large to small. Test your strategic thinking and spatial reasoning. Can you successfully arrange the rings and complete the levels?

items.title: Happy Farm: The Crop
items.description: Happy Farm: The Crop is a farm-themed mahjong game with a customizable tiles appearance.

items.title: Heart Box
items.description: Heart Box is a brain-teasing physics puzzle game where you guide Robby, a robot with a constantly draining battery, through over 180 challenging levels and crazy experiments. Engage with various objects to free Robby from the charger. Explore an online database of 10,000+ player-created levels, design your own puzzles with the Level Editor, and choose from a variety of robot skins. With realistic physics, vibrant cartoons, and leaderboards, get ready for a fun and electrifying adventure!

items.title: Hello Kitty – Activity Book
items.description: Hello Kitty – Activity Book is a memory game that helps develop your concentration skills with coloring books, jigsaw puzzles, andspot the difference. Can you complete each level?

items.title: Heroes of Match 3
items.description: Heroes of Match 3 is a delightful puzzle adventure set in a whimsical medieval world. Match sweets in lines of three to create powerful combos and help King Donuttan the Third reclaim his throne. Dive into charming scenes, meet amusing characters, and see if you have what it takes to become the next royal heir!

items.title: Hex FRVR
items.description: Hex FRVR is an easy to understand yet fun to master puzzle game. Create and destroy full lines on the screen in any of the primary three directions by dragging and dropping blocks to the screen and get amazing combo bonuses by destroying multiple lines at the same time. Made by Chris Benjaminsen.

items.title: Hexa Blast
items.description: Hexa Blast is a fun and challenging puzzle game where you must find the right combination to be able to complete the puzzle. Drag and drop all the hexa blocks on the board. The rule is simple: everything must fit! Enjoy the satisfaction of pieces fitting neatly in place. Our unique hexagonal pieces will stretch your mind in ways you never imagined in this addictive puzzle game. Keep your brain active and sharp, analyze all the possibilities, and try to finish all puzzles. Your puzzle skills will be put to the test. There are no time limits, so enjoy your time at your own pace.

items.title: Hexa Sort
items.description: Hexa Sort is an addictive puzzle-sorting game that combines strategic matching and merging challenges. In this brain teaser, you will get to shuffle, stack, and strategize to create satisfying color matches. Featuring sleek 3D graphics, a dazzling array of vibrant hues, and soothing gameplay, this addictive challenge strikes the perfect balance between excitement and relaxation. Whether you’re seeking a mental workout or a calming escape, Hexa Sort delivers an experience that’s as rewarding as it is visually stunning.

items.title: Hidden Object: Clues and Mysteries
items.description: Hidden Object: Clues and Mysteries is a charming puzzle game that invites players to uncover secrets hidden within cozy, beautifully illustrated scenes. Follow a calm and clever detective as your guide while you explore each setting, searching for concealed items, solving gentle puzzles, and connecting mysterious clues. Designed for fans of hidden object adventures, relaxing mysteries, and soothing brain teasers this game offers a blend of casual gameplay and subtle intrigue. It’s the perfect escape for puzzle lovers of all ages, delivering a tranquil yet engaging experience.

items.title: Hidden Objects
items.description: Hidden Objects is a puzzle game where the thrill of discovery meets exquisite aesthetics. Delve into beautifully crafted interiors meticulously designed to conceal an array of diverse items. With each hidden object blending seamlessly into the scene, your keen eye and sharp wit will be put to the test. Classic hints are available, but true mastery lies in your ability to uncover every hidden treasure. Embark on this adventure of visual delight and challenge your perception in Hidden Objects.

items.title: Hidden Objects: Save the Girl 3D
items.description: Hidden Objects: Save the Girl 3D is an engaging and immersive puzzle game that challenges players to become real ghostbusters and heroes. In this game, you'll embark on a mission to protect people from mischievous ghosts who have hidden behind everyday environmental items. To succeed, you must use your wit to solve puzzles, search for hidden objects, and save the world from these playful yet troublesome apparitions. Dive into the world of ghost hunting, test your wits, and embark on an adventure filled with secrets!

items.title: Hidden Shapes Animals
items.description: Hidden Shapes Animals is a captivating puzzle game designed to provide a quick and relaxing experience while relieving stress. If you're seeking a moment of tranquility, this game is perfect for you.

items.title: Hidden Shapes Lovely Cats
items.description: Hidden Shapes Lovely Cats is a delightful puzzle game designed for cat lovers. Immerse yourself in an enchanting world filled with adorable kittens and enjoy the satisfaction of solving puzzles while basking in moments of pure fun.

items.title: Home Design: Decorate House
items.description: Home Design: Decorate House is an addictive game that combines home renovation and a classic match-3 game. It's a perfect time killer where you help clients decide, master, design, and decorate their homes and transform their dreams into reality with zen home makeovers! Show off your design skills, renovate and decorate an old house, and create your style!

items.title: IColorcoin: Sort Puzzle
items.description: iColorcoin: Sort Puzzle is an addictive and fun game where you arrange and merge coins to create larger numbers. Strategically sort same-color chips to merge them and fill the grid. Deal more coins into the slots and enjoy the sorting fun. This challenging game is perfect for all ages!

items.title: Image Crossword
items.description: Image Crossword is a creative word puzzle game where pictures become letters, blending visual clues with clever wordplay. Each themed level challenges you to decipher images that reveal words, while power-ups and hints keep the journey exciting. As you progress, the puzzles get trickier, sharpening your mind and stretching your vocabulary in this imaginative word adventure.

items.title: Impossible Date
items.description: Impossible Date is a funny puzzle game where you solve various dating encounters with questionable solutions. Navigate a range of dating gaffes, cause chaos, and untangle embarrassing situations with the power of logic.

items.title: Inca Cubes 2048
items.description: Inca Cubes 2048 is a unique 2048 puzzle game where you must launch numbered cubes to merge them with identical cubes. Each merge increases the value of the block. With beautiful Incan-themed graphics and addictive gameplay, this game will keep you entertained for hours.

items.title: Isometric Escape 2
items.description: Isometric Escape 2 is a challenging escape game where you need to solve a series of puzzles in order to escape from isometric rooms. Use your logic and memory to find useful objects and solve riddles. With an isometric perspective, the game offers a unique visual experience as players navigate through the rooms.

items.title: Jail Escape
items.description: Jail Escape is an engaging puzzle game where you solve clever challenges to break free from various environments. Use your logic and intelligence to uncover hidden clues. Each level tests your problem-solving skills with intricate designs and intriguing puzzles, keeping you immersed as you strive to escape.

items.title: Jewel Hunter
items.description: Jewel Hunter is a quick and challenging match-3 game. You only have a limited amount of moves to complete the level goal. By doing so, you can score as many points as possible. Match 4 or more jewels to get a special jewel that can explode when you match it. If you are quick enough at matching jewels, you can build up score multipliers.  Have fun!

items.title: Jewel Monsters
items.description: Jewel Monsters is a match-3 game to attack the monster by matching identical gems of the same color as fast as possible.

items.title: Jewels FRVR
items.description: Jewels FRVR is a match-3 game to match the jewels and complete the daily missions.

items.title: Jigsaw Fantasy
items.description: Jigsaw Fantasy is a relaxing puzzle game that lets you choose from a wide range of images or even upload your own photos to turn them into custom puzzles. Drag and drop scattered pieces into place with simple, intuitive controls, making it enjoyable for both kids and adults. Whether you want a calming break or a brain-teasing challenge, it offers hours of creative fun.

items.title: JuicyJong
items.description: JuicyJong is a vibrant and clever twist on classic Mahjong, offering a mind-engaging color puzzle experience packed with juicy fun! Swipe tiles to collapse matching symbols and uncover strategic moves as you dive deeper into this refreshing puzzle adventure. With every level, JuicyJong challenges your logic and sharpens your focus.

items.title: Jump and Hover
items.description: Jump and Hover is a puzzle platform game where you can hover midair but only for a short time. Recharge your hover energy by landing on the ground or touching a battery.

items.title: Just Slide (Remastered)
items.description: Just Slide (Remastered) is a puzzle game to slide and paint all the area successfully.

items.title: Kawaii Friends: Tiles Matcher
items.description: Kawaii Friends: Tiles Matcher is a delightful puzzle game where you match adorable tiles featuring cute characters and vibrant colors. Your goal is to pair three identical tiles. As you progress, the puzzles become more challenging, testing your matching skills. With charming art style and soothing music, this game offers a relaxing yet engaging experience for all ages. Collect rewards, unlock new levels, and enjoy the playful world of kawaii creatures as you master the art of tile matching!

items.title: Kingdom Solitaire
items.description: Kingdom Solitaire is a captivating journey where you, as Tony the butler, restore a majestic castle by mastering challenging solitaire levels. Delight in vibrant artwork, unique cards, and exciting mechanics while uncovering a heartwarming tale of a queen and her beloved pets. With constant updates introducing fresh surprises, your royal adventure will never grow dull!

items.title: Kitty Scramble: Word Stacks
items.description: Kitty Scramble is a word puzzle game where you guide a cute kitty to uncover hidden words on the letter-filled board. Enjoy addicting gameplay with numerous challenging puzzles that test your word skills. Connect to Facebook to share your progress and receive bonuses, and log in regularly for exciting prizes. Easy to play but tough to master, Kitty Scramble is your ticket to becoming a word expert. Embark on the feline word-hunting journey now!

items.title: Knots Jam: Thread Puzzle 3D
items.description: Knots Jam: Thread Puzzle 3D is a captivating puzzle game that blends the charm of embroidery with mind-bending challenges. Untangle vibrant threads, create intricate patterns, and let your creativity shine. With calming gameplay, stunning visuals, and puzzles designed to boost your problem-solving skills, this game offers the perfect balance of relaxation and artistry. Dive into the joy of unraveling and weaving today!

items.title: Lava and Aqua
items.description: Lava and Aqua is a puzzle game where you need to reach the exit without touching the lava on each level. The lava will flow every time you move, so think before you step. Good luck!

items.title: Leap and Avoid 2
items.description: Leap and Avoid 2 is a thrilling platform adventure where you guide a nimble white ball through treacherous caves and high-tech labs. Navigate white platforms, dodge the deadly black ones, and uncover hidden paths brimming with coins. Use your earnings to unlock upgrades like shields and speed boosts as you race for secrets, treasures, and leaderboard glory.

items.title: LetterClash
items.description: LetterClash is a strategic word battle game where every move matters. Compete against opponents by forming words, capturing territory, and using powerful bonuses to control the board. Outsmart your rival and be the first to conquer the top row, or risk losing your ground.

items.title: Letters Match
items.description: Letters Match is a puzzle game where you combine identical letters or magic words to clear them from the field. It blends elements of matching games, word searches, and field-clearing challenges. Your objective is to make as many letters disappear, leaving minimal letters on the field. Stretch your brain with this engaging letter-matching puzzle!

items.title: Lexy
items.description: Lexy is a puzzle game where players must find words within 100 seconds. The bigger the words, the higher the score. Race against the clock, earn points for quick discoveries and get fresh letters every 2 minutes. Embark on a unique word-hunting adventure that's both challenging and fun!

items.title: Light Line
items.description: Light Line is a puzzle connecting game where you guide glowing lines to fill in every blank space on the screen. It is a soothing experience that combines logic and creativity, challenging you to think strategically while enjoying the satisfying flow of light. Sharpen your mind as you solve increasingly intricate patterns with precision and style!

items.title: Light The Lamp
items.description: Light The Lamp is a casual puzzle game to light a bulb by finding a way to insert the hanging plug into the socket with various challenges.

items.title: Lines
items.description: Lines is a challenging and satisfying puzzle connect game where you twist and turn tiles to create continuous paths. Your goal is to rotate the tiles to form a complete line that connects the starting point to the end. As you progress through the game, the puzzles become increasingly tricky, testing your strategic thinking and pathfinding skills. Get ready for hours of fun and brain-teasing gameplay as you work through each level, trying to find the perfect solution!

items.title: Link Town
items.description: Link Town is a vibrant puzzle game that blends logical thinking with charming city-building fun! Connect matching landmarks or city services by drawing roads between them, but be careful, paths can’t cross! Complete the entire grid to finish the layout and watch your tiny town come to life.

items.title: Little Cabin in the Woods
items.description: Little Cabin in the Woods: A Forgotten Hill Tale is an escape type game in which you are trying to escape the monsters from your past. You managed to escape them once and you went to live with your grandpa in the woods inside of a little cabin. The monsters have found you once again but this time you are brave and ready to take them on.

items.title: Little Fox: Bubble Spinner Pop
items.description: Little Fox: Bubble Spinner Pop is a classic bubble shooter game with a spinning mechanism. The game has 120 levels.

items.title: Logica Emotica
items.description: Logica Emotica is an emoji-infused puzzle game where each level has its own puzzle to complete. Use your logic to figure out what to do. Can you solve all these 25 levels available? Complete each level by using the cursor keys, moving things into place, and filling up areas! It's up to you to discover! Enjoy!

items.title: Logo Quiz: Game World Trivia
items.description: Logo Quiz: Game World Trivia is a trivia quiz game where you must identify logos all around the world. Challenges your brand knowledge with over 200 intriguing brand facts. Win every stages and earn coins. Use your coins to buy new characters in the Shop menu. Uncover the secrets behind iconic logos, progressing through levels packed with captivating trivia. This game is perfect for both adults and kids!

items.title: Looper
items.description: Looper is a joyous and melodiousmusic gamethat tests your sense of rhythm and timing. Get ready to start tapping your way through a colorful universe of beats and melodies! With hundreds of unique levels, Looper is the perfect game to soothe your puzzling needs.

items.title: Love Colors
items.description: Love Colors is a beautiful and fun drawing/painting game. If you enjoy painting and creating stunning works of art then this is the game for you! You are presented with different black and white stencil drawings such as a bunch of flowers – you can paint them using different color pallets to create a gorgeous painting.

items.title: Ludo Hero
items.description: Experience the classic thrill of the original Ludo board game with Ludo Hero, a popular title from our puzzle board game selection. You'll get to battle it out in competitive matches against computer opponents or challenge players from around the globe in this dynamic online version. Whether you're strategizing your moves or outmaneuvering opponents, Ludo Hero brings all the excitement of this timeless game to your screen!

items.title: Ludo King
items.description: Ludo King™ is a classic board game also known as Pachisi or Parcheesi. The objective of the game is to bring all of your four colored tokens to the designated home column.

items.title: Ludo Legend
items.description: Ludo Legend is an interesting board game to play Ludo with up to 3 other players. Show your strategy skill and have fun with your friends in this awesome Ludo game!

items.title: Ludo Party
items.description: Ludo Party Game is a fun multiplayer board game that brings a fresh spin to the classic Ludo experience. You’ll compete with friends, chat during matches, and personalize your game through unique customizations. Sharpen your strategy, enjoy friendly competition, and create lasting memories as you roll the dice and chase victory.

items.title: Mage's Secret
items.description: Mage's Secret is a magical merge-based puzzle game that challenges players to unite mystical monsters for various purposes, from sacrificing them in the Magic Cauldron to using them in battle. Every decision matters as you strategically summon, combine, and utilize monsters to expand your magical power and playing field.

items.title: Magic Forest: Block Puzzle
items.description: Magic Forest: Block Puzzle is a fun puzzle game with a fantasy universe theme. Put blocks in the area, build, and destroy structures by creating lines. Train your brain and challenge your skills with this exciting skill game that will keep you entertained for hours.

items.title: Magic Kingdom: Hex Match
items.description: Magic Kingdom: Hex Match is a game where you are the third son of a great king, sent to a distant land to prove your worth. Collect six vital resources—food, water, stone, wood, workers, and metal—to construct new buildings. Unlock all structures and create a stunning, magical kingdom!

items.title: Magic Towers Solitaire
items.description: Magic Towers Solitaire is a free solitaire game with a medieval theme. Move all the cards from the three peaks back to the deck. Remove all the cards to move to the next round!

items.title: Mahjong 3D Classic
items.description: Mahjong 3D is aclassic mahjong gamewith 3D tiles. You can also make your own mahjong layout as you like in the editor mode and also choose your favorite tile set available in this game. Have fun!

items.title: Mahjong Big
items.description: Mahjong Big is a relaxing game that challenges players to pair identicalmahjongtiles. Strive for a flawless 3-star rating on each level and conquer the Daily Challenge. Collect diamonds during gameplay to unlock exciting new stages, adding depth and enjoyment to the gaming experience. Have fun!

items.title: Mahjong Online
items.description: Mahjong Online is the classic version of the ancient board game that requires you to clear the board by matching the same patterned tiles. The rules dictate that there must be two or more of the same tiles to clear tiles from the play area and successfully win the game.

items.title: Mahjong Connect (Legacy)
items.description: Mahjong Connect is amahjong gameto match all the tiles to clear the board. Can you beat all the levels?

items.title: Mahjong Connect 2 (Legacy)
items.description: Mahjong Connect 2 is the second episode of the classical Mahjong game, Mahjong Connect.

items.title: Mahjong Digital
items.description: Mahjong Digital is an excitingmahjong-connecting gamewith a digital theme.

items.title: Mahjong Empire
items.description: Mahjong Empire is amahjong game, but it plays differently as you play alone and the rules are a little similar to a solitaire game. As such, the goal of the game is to clear the board of all the tiles. This can be done by pairing identical tiles to remove them from play. There are a few restrictions though. First, you have to make sure that both tiles have a free side (left or right). Also, the tiles must not be under another tile. A Hint button is available if you're unable to find any more pairs, as well as a Shuffle button. You can only use them a limited number of times so be sure to use them wisely!

items.title: Mahjong FRVR
items.description: Mahjong Frvr is a great HTML5 mahjong game developed by Chris Benjaminsen. Check out hisblogto read more about this project, or try one ofour many other mahjong games.

items.title: Mahjong Gardens
items.description: Mahjong Gardens is a puzzle game that lets you playmahjongin its solitaire variation. You are clearing tiles from the board by pairing identical tiles with each other. Pairing has a few rules, including being unable to pair tiles if one of the two tiles does not have one free edge, as well as one of the tiles, should not be under any other tile. The game ends when all tiles have been paired, or if you run out of moves and shuffles.

items.title: Mahjong Kitchen
items.description: Mahjong Kitchen is a new concept ofmahjong gamewhere you can buy recipes and complete the order of the customers. This game will completely immerse you in the atmosphere of a pleasant cafe. Figure out the recipes and discover more new dishes!

items.title: Mahjong Magic Islands
items.description: Mahjong Magic Islands is a puzzle game where ancient cities are in desperate need of your magical assistance to restore their waning natural beauty. Join forces with mythical creatures scattered across these mystical islands as you embark on a captivating adventure to save these lands from darkness and bring back their former glory. Are you ready to embark on a mystical journey filled with magic, adventure, and ancient mysteries in the Mahjong Magic Islands?

items.title: Mahjong Monster Arena
items.description: Mahjong Monster Arena is a uniquemahjong gamewhere you must create monsters by matching 3 mahjong tiles. Evolve your monsters and win challenging battles against enemies and bosses!

items.title: Mahjong Pirate Plunder Journey
items.description: Mahjong Pirate Plunder Journey is a Mahjong game to match pairs of pirate-themed tiles.

items.title: Mahjong Shanghai
items.description: Mahjong Shanghai is a free Mahjong game where you match the tiles until there are none remaining. There are two game modes in this classic game, one for kids and one for adults!

items.title: Mahjong Sweet Connection
items.description: Mahjong Sweet Connection is a connecting Mahjong game with a gravitational element.

items.title: Mahjong Titans
items.description: Mahjong Titans is an iconic Mahjong game where you continually match two tiles to remove them from the board until there are none left. When you clear all the tiles, the level is complete!

items.title: Mahjong Tower
items.description: Mahjong Tower 2 is a puzzle game in which you play different variations of the solitaire version ofmahjong. You are able to choose from different layouts, and the challenge and strategy for each are a little different, even if they all have the exact same rules.

items.title: Mahjong Unlimited
items.description: Mahjong Unlimited is a classic oriental puzzle game that brings the timeless charm of Mahjong to your fingertips. Whether you're a seasoned player or new to the game, Mahjong Unlimited offers a perfect blend of relaxation and challenge with its infinitely generated levels and customizable features!

items.title: Mahjongg Solitaire
items.description: Mahjongg Solitaire is an onlinemahjong puzzle boardgame that features traditional rules and modern visuals. There are no shuffles, and the game is timed, but the game's pace is relaxed.

items.title: Marble Run
items.description: Marble Run is a building sim where you create your own marble run using a range of tools. Use an array of track pieces to build a marble run from top to bottom, then watch the marble roll through your creation for your own enjoyment.

items.title: Master Qwan's Mahjong
items.description: Master Qwan's Mahjong is a puzzle game in which you play amahjongvariation of Solitaire. You are matching pairs of tiles that have the same face, but both tiles need to have an open space to their right or left side. Some tiles will be stacked, so any tile on their side that is lower than their stack will not be considered as part of that rule. You should keep doing this until the board is cleared of all the tiles. If you run out of moves, you can select to shuffle the board, but it will cost you a bit of your score.

items.title: Masters of Context
items.description: Masters of Context is a cooperative word game experience for lovers of puzzles, trivia, and language nuances. Beyond just knowing words, it challenges players to understand them in various situations and cultural contexts. An ideal blend of education and entertainment, perfect for game nights or enhancing language and critical thinking skills in a classroom setting.

items.title: Match Arena
items.description: Match Arena is a superb match-three puzzle game in which you can play multiplayer match-three mayhem with other players worldwide! During each match, you must accomplish a specific goal to win. Goals include having a higher number of total matches or having a higher score than your opponent. These goals change to keep the game fresh.

items.title: Match Masters
items.description: Match Masters is a fast-paced multiplayer match-3 game where strategy meets competition. Play live against other players on the same board, charge up unique boosters, and outsmart your opponent in turn-based battles. Join tournaments, unlock rewards, and climb the ranks to prove your puzzle skills!

items.title: Match the Color
items.description: Match the Color is a casual puzzle game where you arrange colored rings on a 3x3 grid. Arrange and stack vibrant colors in matching lines to clear rows. It’s a simple yet captivating game, making it ideal if you’re looking for a light challenge.

items.title: MatchVentures
items.description: MatchVentures is a captivating match-3 adventure game where you explore the dark dungeons of Cliffmont Castle. As you journey through vast levels, collect gems and jewels while overcoming various obstacles in a quest to rebuild the castle destroyed by the evil dragon master, Dragor. With the help of Finlea the Leprechaun and her band of dwarves, you’ll battle enemies, explore hidden caves, and solve intricate puzzles. Perfect for fans of match-3 and fantasy adventure games, MatchVentures invites you to fulfill an ancient legend and bring light back to the land. Explore at your own pace and uncover the mysteries within!

items.title: MATH EXPRESSions
items.description: MATH EXPRESSions is a WORDLE-inspired game, but instead of finding a word, you need to find a math equation. It's a perfect daily warm-up routine for your brain. On each try, you will get notified if the digit is correct, if the digit is present in the expression but in the wrong place, or if the digit is not present at all. Can you guess the Math Expression in 6 tries?

items.title: Math Push
items.description: Math Push is a puzzle game where you move blocks to solve math expressions. Clear the exit by solving the problem and moving on to the next level!

items.title: Maze Planet 3D
items.description: Maze Planet 3D is a fun and exciting puzzle game in which as the title suggests, you must try and guide a ball through a series of complicated 3D mazes. The mazes are beautifully rendered and are based in some amazing space landscapes – you can view each side of the 3D maze and you must guide the ball successfully through each panel to reach the end.

items.title: Memoji Puzzle
items.description: Memoji Puzzle is a fun puzzle game where you match strangers to specific phrases that describe their identities. As you progress, you'll connect people to attributes like profession, personality, or achievements. Simply tap the objects and make matches to complete each level. Can you figure out who’s who and rise to the challenge?

items.title: Merge Bistro
items.description: Merge Bistro is a delightful casual puzzle merge game where you can transform humble ingredients into culinary masterpieces. Start by harvesting crops like potatoes, sugarcane, and more, then use your fresh produce to cook mouthwatering meals that will leave your customers craving for more. As you progress, expand your farmland and kitchen, uncover new territories teeming with resources, and unlock unique chef characters to join your team. Every merge brings you closer to crafting the ultimate dining experience. With creativity and strategy, you’ll grow from a small-time farmer into the mastermind behind the town's largest culinary empire.

items.title: Merge Block 2048
items.description: Merge Block 2048 is an endless 2048 puzzle game where you can drag and move a cube around to merge it with the same numbered cube. The goal of the game is to collect the infinity cube by merging cubes. Try to make combos and collect points. Enjoy!

items.title: Merge Blocks 3D
items.description: Merge Blocks 3D is a 2048 game where you can rotate a platform and shoot blocks to merge them into a bigger one. Empty your head, relax, and immerse yourself in the world of ASMR physics puzzles. When the same numbered blocks are combined, it merges into a higher number block. A huge bonus will drop when you play high combos. Use items with amazing effects, such as magnets and bombs, to help you out. There are also various block themes you can collect! How high and bigger numbered blocks can you make? Try it right now!

items.title: Merge Cakes
items.description: Merge Cakes is a sweet combination game to combine different cakes to get new cake recipes.

items.title: Magic Kitchen: Merge Game
items.description: Magic Kitchen: Merge Game is a culinary delight for foodies and puzzle enthusiasts alike. Magic Kitchen: Merge Game invites you to build your own food empire by merging delectable ingredients and crafting mouthwatering dishes. From basic veggies to exotic cuisines, explore a world of flavor as you unlock new recipes and restaurant themes. With charming music and addictive gameplay, sharpen your culinary skills and embark on a delicious adventure today!

items.title: Merge the Numbers
items.description: Merge the Numbers is a logic game based on connecting numbers. Merge the numbers and reach the highest score!

items.title: Merge to Million
items.description: Merge to Million is a blocks-combining game with an objective to reach one million in number!

items.title: Merge World
items.description: Merge World is a soothing merge game that lets you shape a vibrant world to your liking. Combine materials to create larger structures and expand your domain with imaginative constructions. Friendly fairies lend their magic to help you design and develop your very own paradise. Relax as you strategize, merge, and watch your world come to life, one step at a time. This game is perfect for players who enjoy creative and peaceful gameplay.

items.title: Mergest Kingdom
items.description: Mergest Kingdom is a merge puzzle and match-3 game where you create your kingdom by combining items in threes. Match resources to unlock new items, complete quests, and grow your land. With countless objects to merge and challenges to tackle, you’ll progressively expand your realm and customize it as you see fit. Start building your kingdom now!

items.title: Mineblox - Guess the Recipe
items.description: Mineblox - Guess the Recipe is a crafty puzzle game that challenges your memory as you piece together recipes from a blocky world. Recreate everything from torches to enchanted tables using items in your inventory. Your goal is to craft a secret item—use logic and deduction with every attempt. If your guess is incorrect, each grid slot will light up with helpful clues:

items.title: Minesweeper Duel
items.description: Minesweeper Duel introduces a competitive twist to the classic puzzle game. Engage in intense one-on-one matches where players alternate opening cells, scoring points based on the value of the revealed cell. The goal is simple: earn the highest score or avoid detonating a mine, which results in an instant loss.

items.title: Mini Scientist
items.description: Mini Scientist is a point and click adventure that lets you play as a little dude who wants to go to space. There's a little problem though - his rocket needs one more part, the engine! You'll need to help him go through a guarded facility to find the part he needs so he can go to his dream trip to space.

items.title: Mirror Room Escape
items.description: Mirror Room Escape is a puzzle adventure where you must navigate a mysterious room filled with reflective illusions. Solve intricate challenges by deciphering clues hidden within the mirrors, and testing your wits and perception. Every step unveils secrets and unexpected twists as you race against time to unlock the path to freedom. Will you outsmart the reflections?

items.title: Monkey Go Happy
items.description: Monkey Go Happy is a multi-level game in which you need to help the sad monkey to solve various puzzles to make it happy again!

items.title: Monster Mahjong
items.description: Monster Mahjong is a combination of a mahjong puzzle game with a monster-fighting battle. Combine tiles to create monsters and merge monsters to become a legend!

items.title: Mysterious Elevator
items.description: Mysterious Elevator is a thrilling math and logic game that challenges your mind as you try to escape a mysterious skyscraper with 100 floors. Each floor is guarded by the Keeper of Numbers, a sarcastic master of mathematical riddles who won’t let you pass without solving his clever puzzles.

items.title: Mystery Forest - Match 3
items.description: Mystery Forest - Match 3 is a delightful puzzle game filled with thousands of levels, unique bonuses, and tricky obstacles. Swap forest berries and nuts to match three or more, triggering powerful effects and clearing challenges. Use strategic combinations to break obstacles and earn gold rewards. Enjoy a relaxing yet engaging journey through this enchanting forest adventure!

items.title: Mystic Square: Mystery Trail
items.description: Mystic Square: Mystery Trail is a captivating logic game that blends relaxation with brain training. If you're in the mood for a challenge, dive into the classic "15 puzzles" genre, reimagined with a mystical twist! In this game, players of all ages can enjoy the task of rebuilding a trail across a river. As you shift the puzzle pieces into place, you’ll not only solve the mystery but also enjoy the serene yet stimulating gameplay. Perfect for those who want to unwind while keeping their minds sharp!

items.title: Neil the Nail
items.description: Neil the Nail is a point and click puzzle game where you play as 2 unique characters trying to escape their fate - Neil the Nail, and Mr. Magnet. You'll be using creative solutions to keep yourself away from those formidable hammers who are set to do you in! Keep safe by using your quick thinking everywhere you go.

items.title: Neko Sliding: Cat Puzzle
items.description: Neko Sliding: Cat Puzzle is a delightful block puzzle game featuring playful cats. Slide the blocks to complete lines and unleash impressive combos. Each move requires strategy as you guide the cats into the perfect position. Easy to pick up but packed with brain-teasing challenges, it’s a fun and engaging experience for puzzle enthusiasts.

items.title: Ninja Painter
items.description: Ninja Painter is a puzzle game that lets you play as a little ninja with one job - to paint the marked walls with the correct color by jumping around the stage. Gather stars as you go through stages for an extra challenge, if you're willing.

items.title: Ninja Spell Match
items.description: Ninja Spell Match is a high-energy adventure that fuses clever tile-connecting puzzles with fierce ninja battles. Link tiles to build up devastating attacks and crush waves of enemies. Each of the 30 challenging stages tests your reflexes and strategy even further. Outsmart traps, defeat rival ninjas, and sharpen your instincts to claim victory!

items.title: Nonogram
items.description: Nonogram is a captivating logic game where you fill in spaces on a numerical grid to reveal an image. Think carefully to avoid hitting a cross, and fill in the correct squares to complete the picture.

items.title: Nonogram FRVR
items.description: If you love classic logic puzzle games such as Sudoku then you will adore Nonogram FRVR. This challenging game of logic will test your mental ability and tickle your brain. Each level consists of a tiled playing board - at the edge of each column and row there are a sequence of numbers - these numbers denote how many tiles should be lit. A single number represents an adjacent sequence of lit tiles i.e. a umber two would mean two tiles in that row or column have to be lit next to each other.

items.title: Noob's Farm Escape
items.description: Noob's Farm Escape is an exciting adventure game where you help a cute pig find freedom. Navigate obstacles and avoid traps, with each level presenting unique challenges. The game blends puzzle, action, and strategy, requiring quick reactions and thoughtful decisions. As you progress, tasks become tougher, promoting logical thinking and spatial imagination.

items.title: Nullify
