items.description: Nullify is a math puzzle game with the goal of clearing everything from the screen by merging numbers and math symbols. Improve your logic and math skills by completing unique handcrafted levels and infinite generated levels.

items.title: Number Line Match
items.description: Number Line Match is a puzzle game where you link identical numbers or numbers that add up to 10, forming connections vertically, horizontally, and diagonally to clear them. As you deplete moves, Lines are added, removable only when all their numbers vanish. Be cautious, for a Line on the top row ends the game. Strategic thinking and number pairing are your keys to success.

items.title: Number Masters
items.description: Number Masters is a math game where you can challenge yourself to beat everyone in the game. Answer the questions right and quickly so you can climb up the stairs to avoid the sea monster!

items.title: Seat Sorting Puzzle
items.description: Seat Sorting Puzzle is a puzzle game where you organize colorful bus seats to ensure a smooth departure. Swap seats to match colors in groups of three, then send the buses to the station in the right order. Plan carefully to avoid overcrowding, tackle tricky levels, and put your strategy skills to the test!

items.title: Nut Sort: Build the City
items.description: Nut Sort: Build the City is a strategic puzzle game where you organize nuts to bring order and unlock the city of your dreams. Each completed level earns resources to construct vibrant cities, parks, and homes. With thousands of puzzles, bonus challenges, and handy hints, this relaxing brain-boosting journey turns every match into progress toward your ultimate skyline.

items.title: Nuts and Bolts Brainteasers
items.description: Nuts and Bolts Brainteasers is a challenging game where you untwist nuts and bolts to solve intricate puzzles. Test your problem-solving skills as you twist, turn, and strategize through complex wood contraptions. Enjoy unlimited levels with no time limits, making it perfect for those who love intricate, hard puzzles and wooden materials.

items.title: Nuts and Bolts Thief Master
items.description: Nuts and Bolts Thief Master is a puzzle game where you step into the shoes of a cunning thief on a daring mission. Your objective is to crack open high-security vaults filled with riches by solving intricate nuts and bolts puzzles before the police catch you. Each level presents a new challenge where timing and wit are crucial. Successfully solve the puzzle in time, and the vault opens, allowing you to grab the loot and evade capture. Fail to decipher the puzzle, and the authorities apprehend you, resulting in a failed mission. With numerous levels and increasing difficulties, this game promises thrilling puzzles and strategic gameplay that will test your skills as a master thief.

items.title: Nuts & Bolts: Screw Glass Puzzle
items.description: Nuts & Bolts: Screw Glass Puzzle is a puzzle game where you match screws to their corresponding colored boxes. If no match is found, the screws go into a hole. Fill the hole and it's game over. Match three screws in a box to earn wrenches, which unlock new boxes. Click all the nails to win!

items.title: Nuts Puzzle: Sort By Color
items.description: Nuts Puzzle: Sort by Color is a classic puzzle game where you sort various colored nuts onto screws until they are all the same color.

items.title: Ocean Blast
items.description: Ocean Blast is a casual puzzle game where you create amazing chain reactions by connecting identical ocean creatures. Enjoy a splashtastic experience on a unique hexagonal board that offers both challenge and fun. Swipe the fish to trigger chain reactions and conquer all levels. Face off against bubblesome bosses in various levels. Discover how to eliminate coral, wake sleeping turtles, and free fish from nets. If you get stuck, use boosters like tridents, fishhooks, magic potions, and cross rockets to catch the needed fish before running out of moves. Get ready for a fantastic ocean blast experience!

items.title: Om Nom Connect Classic
items.description: Om Nom Connect Classic is a puzzle game to connect all the identical Om Nom and friend characters.

items.title: Onet Connect Classic
items.description: Onet Connect is a puzzle connect matching game inspired by mahjong gameplay. Your objective is simple—connect pairs of identical images to clear the board completely, but don’t take too long—there is a clock ticking your chances to win away. Plan your moves carefully, and if you find yourself stuck, use the hints button to keep the game going. Challenge your speed and strategy in this timeless puzzle adventure!

items.title: Onet World
items.description: Onet World is a cute Mahjong-style game where you must link identical animal tiles and clear the board.

items.title: Open 100 Doors
items.description: Open 100 Doors is apuzzle gamewhere you must find a way to find and open doors. There are a lot of tricky doors with interesting puzzles you must solve. Beautiful stories will be waiting for you!

items.title: Open House
items.description: Open House is a puzzle match-3 game where you're unexpectedly tasked with turning an abandoned residence into your dream home via one puzzle at a time. Each puzzle brings about new furnishings and upgrades to keep you hooked. You have options, so redesign rooms with your style choices, swap out furniture, and watch your estate transform from rags to riches.

items.title: Orange
items.description: Orange is a captivating puzzle game that challenges you to bring vibrant orange hues to every level. With 25 unique and thought-provoking puzzles, can you uncover the logic and master each stage to fill the screen with the mesmerizing color of orange? Test your problem-solving skills and immerse yourself in this colorful and addictive gameplay experience. Get ready to paint the world orange!

items.title: Orb.Farm
items.description: Orb.Farm is a puzzle-sandbox game to build a sealed personal aquatic ecosystem. If you like this kind of game, you should also checksandspiel, from the same developer.

items.title: Word Art - Color Book Puzzle
items.description: Word Art - Color Book Puzzle is a unique blend of word and picture puzzles, offering a relaxing yet challenging meta-puzzle experience. Solve creative word puzzles to unlock beautiful artwork and complete stunning artistic challenges.

items.title: Paint Room Escape
items.description: Paint Room Escape is a puzzle escape game where creativity is key to finding your way out of a room with four walls, a desk, a shelf, an air conditioner, a safe, and a locked door. The only way out is to problem-solve your way to freedom by solving riddles using colors, paints, and painting tools that can be found throughout the room. Each clue will lead to the next, until finally, your colorful journey leads you to an exit.

items.title: Paint the Flag
items.description: Paint the Flag is a quiz game that combines creativity and education. Dive into the rich world of flags from over 200 countries, testing your recognition skills and learning about global symbols. Embark on this colorful journey, enhancing your global awareness most entertainingly. Perfect for trivia enthusiasts and casual gamers alike!

items.title: Papa Cherry Saga
items.description: Papa Cherry Saga is a well-polished match-3 sweet matching with certain tasks to complete in each level.

items.title: Park Town
items.description: Park Town is a captivating match-3 puzzle game where you restore a neglected city park to its former beauty. Solve exciting puzzles, decorate to your heart’s content, and fill the park with adorable animals from across the globe. Team up with friends, tackle thrilling challenges, and bring life back to the park in your own unique way!

items.title: Parking Jam
items.description: Parking Jam is a challenging puzzle game where you untangle a crowded parking lot one car at a time. Use your logic and problem-solving skills to move vehicles in the correct order, clearing the way without causing chaos. With each level, tackle increasingly complex puzzles filled with more cars and tricky obstacles.

items.title: Parking Jam Escape
items.description: Parking Jam Escape is a puzzle game where you park each car correctly to make space for the main car to escape from the parking lot. Collect coins and unlock different cars!

items.title: Parking Panic
items.description: Parking Panic is a puzzle game to unblock the crowded parked car and make a way for the red car to escape.

items.title: Pavlov's Dog
items.description: Pavlov's Dog is an educational game about conditioned reflexes. The game is based on some of the scientific achievements of Ivan Pavlov, who was awarded the 1904 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine.

items.title: Piece of Cake: Merge and Bake
items.description: Piece of Cake: Merge and Bake is a puzzle casual game where you help Emily, the main character, breathe new life into her family’s rundown cafe while uncovering long-lost family secrets. Solve a variety of challenging puzzles, manage the cafe's operations, and craft creative item combinations to unlock new chapters of the story. As you progress, enjoy heartwarming moments and unexpected twists that keep you engaged at every turn.

items.title: Piles of Mahjong
items.description: Piles of Mahjong is an engaging and relaxing puzzle game that combines the classic elements of Mahjong with a match-three twist. As you progress through the levels, you’ll need to clear stacks of tiles by matching three identical ones, but be careful—strategic thinking is essential to avoid getting stuck!

items.title: Pin Away Puzzle - Tap It Out
items.description: Pin Away Puzzle – Tap It Out is a brain-teasing puzzle game that blends strategy with relaxation. Tap pins in the right order to clear each level, but watch out—some are blocked, requiring careful planning. With unique challenges, satisfying mechanics, and helpful tools to assist when needed, every move keeps your mind engaged and your stress at bay!

items.title: Pink (Bart Bonte)
items.description: Pink is another screen-filling puzzle game from Bart Bonte and the next episode aftergreenandblue. This time you need to make the screen pink in all 25 levels. Each level has its own logic.

items.title: Pipe Puzzle
items.description: Pipe Puzzle is a brilliant and creative puzzle game in which you must move and re-arrange a variety of pipes to create a single connection and flow of water. You are given a myriad of different shapes and sizes to work with.

items.title: Pipes: The Puzzle
items.description: Pipes: The Puzzle is a logic game where you connect pipes in order to supply the city with water. If you get stuck, take hints, they will help you! How many levels can you complete?

items.title: Pirates! - The Match-3
items.description: Pirates! - The Match-3 is an addictive and exciting match-3 adventure where you’ll swap and match gems on a journey with pirates through mysterious lands and seas. Dig for treasures, open chests, battle enemies, and complete various tasks at each level. Combine gems to create powerful ones, and then take it further by merging these new gems into even mightier combinations!

items.title: Pixel Sphere 3D
items.description: Pixel Puzzle 3D is a brain-puzzle game that challenges you to find pictures created with pixel art. In this addictive puzzle game, your task is to swipe the screen to rotate blocks and find the right angle to complete the pixel art painting.

items.title: Pixlock
items.description: Pixlock is a challenging puzzle game where every move matters. Strategically slide blocks to clear the path and guide the main block through the hole at the bottom. Careful thinking and precise planning are key. Only logic and skill will lead you to victory.

items.title: Plactions
items.description: Plactions is a puzzle platformer with consumable actions.  Jump, dash, toggle lasers, flip gravity, and teleport to navigate your way to the exit in each level.

items.title: Pocket Forest
items.description: Pocket Forest is a captivating puzzle game where you swipe to move tiles, combining resources in groups of three or more to upgrade your forest. Merge green, blue, and brown tiles to grow trees, hydrate plants, and create adorable fox families. Strategize your moves and unlock mystery eggs to collect charming forest animals, enhancing your thriving woodland ecosystem!

items.title: Poly Art
items.description: In Poly Art 3D, you have to recover the poly art. Just rotate the magic cloud until you will have the completed figure.

items.title: Pool 8
items.description: Pool 8 is a brain-teasing puzzle game based on a Pool board. Pot the balls in the correct order to move through a series of increasingly difficult challenges!

items.title: Pool Match Jam
items.description: Pool Match Jam is a lively puzzle-sorting game that puts you in charge of guiding swimmers to their perfect ride down a colorful water slide. Your mission is to strategically clear the grid by matching tubes with an active line of swimmers, creating the ideal path for them to jump onto a lifesaver and make their way down the water slide.

items.title: Pop-a-Word
items.description: Pop-a-Word is an exciting multiplayer online game that tests your vocabulary and creativity skills. Players must create as many words as possible using a set of 5 to 7 letters within a given time limit. The words must be valid English words with a minimum of 3 letters, and each letter can be used multiple times. The game can be played alone or with others, and the winner is determined by the player with the most points. Players can increase the difficulty by reducing the time limit or increasing the number of letters. Challenge your mind and improve your vocabulary while having fun with friends or family.

items.title: Pop Jewels
items.description: Pop Jewels is a captivating match-2 puzzle adventure where strategic thinking reigns supreme. Clear the board by matching same-colored gems across 1000+ levels, each packed with its own challenges. Harness potent power-ups to triumph over the trickiest stages and amass bonus points. Whether you fly solo or enjoy it with loved ones, Pop Jewels promises an enchanting, all-ages gaming experience. Explore its mesmerizing graphics and tranquil soundtrack on a gem-matching odyssey unlike any other.

items.title: Popit vs Spinner
items.description: Pop It vs Spinner is a collapse puzzle game where the objective is to remove all the bubbles by clicking at least 2 of the same color bubbles at once. You can use the spinner when there are no moves available.

items.title: Pouring Puzzle
items.description: Pouring Puzzle is a challenging color sorting game where you must quickly arrange the watercolors in the tubes until each tube is filled with water of the same color. Try to complete the puzzle before the time runs out, and try to finish it as fast as possible! Good luck!

items.title: Power Blocks
items.description: Power Blocks is a puzzle game in which you have to use the blocks of various shapes to fill up the playing field. The game features 60 levels for you to complete!

items.title: Pudding Monsters
items.description: Pudding Monsters is a casual but fun game developed by ZeptoLab in which you must attempt to place all the different pudding monsters together to form one giant pudding monsters!

items.title: Pull the Pin
items.description: Pull the Pin is a physics-based puzzle game where your goal is to guide every ball into the pipe by removing pins in the right order. Think it’s easy? Think again, some balls need to be colored before reaching the goal. With clever level design and brain-teasing twists, each stage challenges your timing, logic, and strategy.

items.title: Puppetman: Ragdoll Puzzle
items.description: Puppetman: Ragdoll Puzzle is a unique puzzle action ragdoll game where you help a ragdoll character reach the ground with the help of very precarious moves. Use your logic and creativity to help Poly stay safe and sound on the ground using various moves. Interact with objects in the level to influence the ragdoll and get into this brain-teasing experience!

items.title: Puppy Merge
items.description: Puppy Merge is a unique merge game where you must grab and combine identical puppies to create a new and bigger one. Puppies will fall automatically into the arena; what you must do is drag the puppies around and merge them into identical ones. Don't let the puppies fall outside the box, or the game will end. You can try to catch the puppy and bring it back to the arena if the puppy falls. Also, try to find and catch cats that will appear randomly in the game. Catch 5 cats and turn them into an extra bone. Use the bone to pause the game for 10 seconds and calmly connect the puppies.

items.title: Push Penguin
items.description: Push Penguin is an engaging puzzle logic game that challenges your wits and creativity. Your mission? Help the penguin reach the sea by solving intricate puzzles using a variety of tools and objects. Each level introduces new mechanics that will test your problem-solving skills and keep you entertained!

items.title: Push Push Cat
items.description: Push Push Cat is a puzzle game where you push and slide cats to rescue! Push the blocks and make a way to save the cute cats who have lost their homes. You can adopt cute homeless cats in various themes and customize them and shoot selfies. When you encounter a puzzle that is difficult to solve, you can use hints!

items.title: Push Sushi
items.description: Push Sushi is a puzzle game that challenges you to send out the sushi! At each level, your task is to guide the sushi to its destination by creating a path for it. Push and arrange the sushi to produce the delicious treats you desire. Simple to play, yet not so easy to succeed in extracting the sushi. Prepare for varying levels of difficulty and encounter intriguing situations as you progress. Get ready to embark on this sushi-pushing adventure filled with fun challenges!

items.title: Puzzle Lines and Knots 1
items.description: Puzzle Lines and Knots 1 is a straightforward yet engaging puzzle game with simple mechanics. Your task is to click on two hexagons to swap their positions, aiming to assemble a puzzle made of interconnected nodes. With 150 levels to conquer and various achievements to unlock, the game offers plenty of challenges and satisfaction. Test your logic and problem-solving skills as you navigate through increasingly complex puzzles!

items.title: Puzzle Balls
items.description: Puzzle Balls is a one-button truck-filling game. Guide the balls through the puzzle, fill up the truck to win.

items.title: Puzzle Play
items.description: Puzzle Play is a fun and challenging jigsaw game that will keep you entertained for hours. Solve hundreds of jigsaw puzzles with varying difficulty levels, each more satisfying than the last. With its addictive gameplay, you won't be able to resist the challenge of figuring out the right piece and slotting it into place. Get ready for endless hours of puzzle-solving fun!

items.title: Puzzle Survivor
items.description: Puzzle Survivor is a competitive puzzle game that puts your logic and strategy to the test. Solve word and number challenges across multiple game modes, compete in real-time or turn-based battles, and climb the leaderboards. Take on daily challenges, unlock achievements, and sharpen your mind in fast-paced, brain-training duels!

items.title: Puzzle: What a Twist!
items.description: Puzzle: What a Twist! is a simple and fun rotating puzzle game. Rotate each piece to fit it into place and reveal the full picture. It’s great for anyone who loves solving puzzles with a creative spin! Your goal is to assemble the complete image by rotating all the fragments so that they fit together perfectly. To do this, simply click on the piece of the picture that you want to rotate. Each click will rotate it 90 degrees clockwise.

items.title: Puzzle Wood Block
items.description: Puzzle Wood Block is a puzzle game where you strategically fit shapes into a 9x9 grid to fill every square. Clear the board by completing rows or columns, and aim for massive combos to boost your score. Test your skills, plan your moves, and keep the grid from filling up as you chase high-scoring streaks!

items.title: Pyramid Solitaire Ancient Egypt
items.description: Clear the pyramid of cards by pairing cards which add up to 13. This Ancient Egypt themed version of Pyramid Solitaire offers excellent and engaging gameplay.

items.title: Quizmania: Trivia Game
items.description: Quizmania: Trivia Game is a knowledge-based game where you answer questions by picking the correct option from four choices. Hints are available to help you through tricky questions, and as you play, a progress bar tracks your advancement. Filling the bar unlocks new clues, giving you an edge in future rounds. It’s a fun mix of trivia, strategy, and steady progression.

items.title: QuizzLand Trivia
items.description: QuizzLand is an interesting free trivia game with a progression-based play style. Answer all the questions correctly and beat all the levels!QuizzLand is an entertaining questions-and-answers game in which you get a myriad of questions that can’t be found anywhere else. Play the game, answer trivia questions, read informative explanations, and educate yourself with new knowledge!Just your brain and our quizzes. No need to wait for other players' replies as you can proceed through the stages right away. Earn coins for correct answers and spend them on hints for the most challenging questions.

items.title: Quoridor Online
items.description: Quoridor Online is a tabletop strategy game and is suitable for fans of chess, checkers, and corners. The game allows you to compete with other players online, and you can also play with a computer. The more strong players you defeat, the higher your rating will be.

items.title: Ranch Adventures
items.description: Ranch Adventures is a fun match-3 puzzle game where you line up delicious berries like cherries, blueberries, and blackberries. As a master gardener, you'll solve levels, earn rewards, and complete challenges. Use boosters and extra moves to help along the way. Get ready for an exciting and sweet adventure as you match your way through each level!

items.title: Red
items.description: Red is a fun and exciting puzzle game – the browser version of this popular title is finally here so get ready for some fun! The aim of this game is simple – you must attempt to turn the whole screen red – this might sound easy but as you progress the challenges become increasingly difficult and you must really strain your mind to think of a solution.

items.title: Redirect
items.description: Redirect is a puzzle logic game where your task is to guide a falling ball to its destination using clever planning and strategic thinking. Rotate arrows, lines, and triangles to influence their direction, triggering intricate chain reactions. Visualize the outcome, set your course, and hit go—can you master the art of motion and solve every path?

items.title: Resize Mahjong
items.description: Resize Mahjong is amahjong gamewith a cute animal theme. Find and match tiles with the same pictures of animals. Unlike regular mahjong, the game has tiles of different shapes and sizes. It is possible to combine tiles of the different sizes among themselves, the main thing that on them identical animals were represented.

items.title: Rise of the Blobs
items.description: Rise of the Blobs: Ultimate 3D Puzzle Action is a fast-paced and engaging puzzle game where you rotate a cylindrical platform to match falling fruit with blobs, triggering explosive chain reactions.

items.title: Robbie the Robot
items.description: Robbie the Robot is a puzzle adventure where you guide a robot across space platforms to gather stars and reach the finish. Strategically place directional arrows to steer him through challenging levels filled with shifting platforms, portals, and keycard-activated doors. Test your creativity with 100+ levels and even craft your own cosmic puzzles in the Level Editor.

items.title: ROBOTIK
items.description: ROBOTIK is a casual puzzle game that puts your strategic thinking to the test. Your objective is to guide your robot to the end of the map before its battery drains. Utilize objects wisely by placing them strategically on the map to ensure your robot's success. Efficiency is key, as you must reach the charger without delay. Place and remove objects by dragging and dropping or clicking, and manipulate their positions to navigate the robot effectively across the challenging terrain. Get ready to engage your mind in this intricate puzzle-solving adventure!

items.title: Robox
items.description: Robox is a puzzle platformer game where you control a robot to find the exit door. Help him to escape enemies and traps along the way. Jump, shoot the boxes using your teleportation gun, and try to reach the door. Good luck!

items.title: Roglide: Slide & Match Blocks
items.description: Roglide: Slide & Match Blocks is a roguelike Match-3 puzzle game where you slide entire rows or columns to form combos and battle clever bosses. Every match builds momentum, unlocking upgrades and evolving your strategy as challenges grow tougher. With dynamic levels, strategic depth, and multiple modes, you’ll keep coming back to test your skills and refine your approach.

items.title: Rolling In Gears
items.description: Rolling In Gears is an engaging puzzle physics platformer game where you control a ball navigating through a series of mechanical challenges. The game’s main mechanic revolves around rotating gears and moving platforms to guide the ball towards its target destination. Players need to carefully maneuver through the levels, using precision and timing to overcome obstacles and reach the end of each stage.

items.title: RollUp Tiles
items.description: RollUp Tiles is a puzzle game with simple and addictive gameplay. Simply roll up tiles into one tile and complete the levels! Try to complete as many levels as possible and get real pleasure!

items.title: Room Escape: Strange Case
items.description: Room Escape: Strange Case is a mystery puzzle game where you, the true detective, delve into the enigma of the elusive "Alchemist." Unravel the chilling tale of defiled graves, navigating through a unique graphic style and atmospheric puzzles. Encounter strange characters and escape clever traps in your quest to unveil the Alchemist's identity. Are you up for the challenge of this original and mysterious adventure? You can also watch the walkthrough forchapter 1,chapter 2, andchapter 3.

items.title: Rope Color Sort 3D
items.description: Rope Color Sort 3D is a puzzle game where you organize colored ropes between various spools. Sorting the colors becomes more complex as you progress through the levels. The satisfying colors and physics offer an enjoyable and relaxing experience. Keep sorting the same colors until they're all in the same spool, and have fun!

items.title: Rope Rescue
items.description: Rope Rescue is a puzzle game with simple controls but a challenging twist. Strategize to save everyone using ropes while dodging tricky traps and obstacles. Stay sharp to overcome each level and claim exciting rewards. With its easy-to-learn mechanics and increasingly complex challenges, this game will keep you hooked as you perfect your rescue skills!

items.title: Royal Square
items.description: Royal Square is a clever puzzle game that challenges you to merge matching numbers into larger tiles. Inspired by classics like 2048, it offers endless opportunities to test your strategy and focus. With smooth sliding controls, vibrant visuals, and intuitive gameplay, you’ll find yourself merging, planning, and aiming for higher scores in every round.

items.title: RSVP
items.description: RSVP is a card game to match the colors of your guest's cards to make them happy.

items.title: Russian Checkers Free
items.description: Russian Checkers Free is a strategic board game that lets you challenge both a powerful AI and real players. With 8 difficulty levels, interactive hints, and the ability to undo moves, you can refine your skills. Whether playing online, against the computer, or sharing the same screen, this game offers various modes and customization options for an engaging experience.

items.title: Ruya
items.description: Ruya is a serene puzzle game that invites you into dreamlike landscapes filled with vibrant colors and meditative challenges. Immerse yourself in Ruya's introspective journey, decorating her with flowers while solving minimalistic puzzles. The experience is enriched by mesmerizing auditory illusions, designed to relax your mind and provide a tranquil escape into a surreal and peaceful world.

items.title: Same Game
items.description: Same Game is a freepuzzle gamewhere you match two or more blocks of the same color to clear them. When you clear a section of the same color, the blocks below fall up to fill their place. When there are no moves left, it’s game over!

items.title: Same Game Fruit Collapse
items.description: Same Game Fruit Collapse is a fun and relaxing game you can play in your spare time. Remove tiles by clicking connecting tiles with the same image. Can you remove all of them?

items.title: Sandspiel
items.description: Sandspiel is acreative gamewhere you build unique environments from elements that react with each other. Use your imagination and see what fascinating reactions you can create in this fun pixelated game!

items.title: Sandtrix
items.description: Sandtrix is a Tetris game with a twist—the pieces transform into sand when they touch down. The objective is to align blocks of the same color until they form one continuous color from left to right. When you make a horizontal line of color, the pixels disappear, and you earn points.

items.title: Save the Capybara
items.description: Save the Capybara is a thrilling game where you wield your creativity to save the cutest Capybara from perilous bees. Draw and protect the Capybara for 5 seconds to triumph. Unleash your imagination and enjoy the rescue mission with Capybara.

items.title: Save The Worm: Draw Puzzle
items.description: Save The Worm: Draw Puzzle is a puzzle drawing game to help you train your brain effectively. Use your freehand drawing skills to help the worm go inside its cocoon so it can evolve.

items.title: Scandinavian Mahjong
items.description: Scandinavian Mahjong is a delightful twist on the classic game, set in a charming Scandinavian-inspired home reminiscent of IKEA. With 365 levels, each representing various objects or concepts, from horoscope signs to letters of the alphabet, immerse yourself in this cozy winter edition for hours of relaxing fun.

items.title: Scavenger Hunt - Multiplayer
items.description: Scavenger Hunt - Multiplayer is a thrilling 1v1 challenge where you race against opponents to find hidden objects in creative and unexpected locations. Craft your own hunts with personalized clues and tailor-made adventures. Test your observation skills, solve puzzles, and prove your sharp eye in this exciting blend of competition and discovery. Are you ready to conquer the hunt?

items.title: Screw Ball
items.description: Screw Ball is the ultimate challenge for your logic and puzzle-solving skills! Your goal is straightforward: drop the ball into the glass. But there's a catch multiple planks block the ball's path, each held in place by screws. It's up to you to figure out the correct order to unscrew the planks, clearing the way for the ball to fall perfectly into the glass. Can you master the sequence and achieve the perfect drop?

items.title: Screw Match Three
items.description: Screw Match Three is a puzzle game where your goal is to unscrew and match three of the same color screws to make them disappear. Clear the board by removing the screws in the right order. Test your logical thinking and unlock new levels as you solve each puzzle. Enjoy a mix of challenges, excitement, and satisfying wins. Get ready and dive into the world of screws and boards!

items.title: Screw Out: Bolts and Nuts
items.description: Screw Out: Bolts and Nuts is a classic puzzle logic game where your goal is to unscrew bolts from various shapes and sort them by color into the correct containers. Each level presents a new challenge that requires patience, logic, and careful planning to succeed. Be vigilant! The number of additional holes is limited, so you'll need to think a few steps ahead before making a move. Every action counts, and rushing in without a plan could leave you stuck! Once all the bolts are sorted correctly, you’ll complete the level and move on to even trickier puzzles. Can you master every challenge and become the ultimate bolt-sorting expert?

items.title: Secrets of Charmland
items.description: Charmland is a delightful adventure game where you join Emma and her friend Marshmellado in feeding adorable animals their favorite foods. Travel through enchanting lands filled with tasty treats as you help make the magical creatures of Charmland happy. Solve fun puzzles and embark on this exciting journey filled with charm and joy!"

items.title: Seek & Find - Hidden Object Game
items.description: Seek & Find - Hidden Object Game is a thrilling adventure that challenges you to spot cleverly hidden items in stunningly detailed scenes. Dive into an exciting scavenger hunt, exploring intricate maps and uncovering secrets. With its perfect blend of charm and challenge, this game will captivate and test your keen observational skills like never before!

items.title: Shadow Bullet
items.description: Shadow Bullet offers a unique blend of puzzle-solving challenges and precision shooting. You can enjoy the excitement of taking down shadow enemies while navigating through brain-engaging puzzles. With a focus on one-shot mastery, this game provides a thrilling and strategic gaming experience for those seeking a puzzle-shooting adventure!

items.title: Shape Crack
items.description: Shape Crack is a casual arcade game where you drop colorful shapes in a precise way. Make the same colored shapes touch each other so you can watch them collide, crack, and disappear! Go through the levels and achieve a high score. Start playing now and enjoy the colorful crack action!

items.title: Ship Mania
items.description: Ship Mania: Boat Parking Jam is a brain-teasing game where you guide boats into their proper spots without creating a traffic jam. Perfect for sharpening your problem-solving skills, it offers engaging challenges that are simple to start yet hard to master. With puzzles designed for everyone, it keeps you entertained and thinking at every turn.

items.title: Silent Dot
items.description: Silent Dot is a minimalist puzzle game where you move the dot in over 180 levels toward the triangle. Solve many fascinating puzzles, easy to pick up, hard to master. A game for everyone who likes a good puzzle. Can you find the optimal route for each level?

items.title: Simple Words
items.description: Simple Words is a casual word puzzle game where you build words to trigger satisfying explosions and topple towering stacks of letters. Each move brings a chain reaction of collapsing tiles and clever combos. With no timers or pressure, you’re free to think, create, and climb the daily leaderboard at your own relaxed pace.

items.title: Single Line: Drawing Puzzle
items.description: Single Line: Drawing Puzzle is a clever brain-teasing game where you must draw a single, unbroken line to complete intricate shapes. Every puzzle pushes you to think creatively and plan your path carefully. You can’t lift your finger or trace over a line twice—only precision and smart thinking will get you through each artistic challenge.

items.title: Single Stroke Line Draw
items.description: Single Stroke Draw Line is a puzzle game where you must draw in one line and connect all the dots without any route repetition. Give your brain an exercise and improve your IQ. This is a mind-challenging game with very simple rules. It starts with very easy levels and increases in difficulty as you progress in the game. You've got two game modes to choose from: Classic Mode for chill vibes and Timer Mode for those who love a good challenge. Take your pick and dive in!

items.title: Sketchy Towers
items.description: Sketchy Towers is a unique twist on the classic Tetris game where the goal is to stack blocks to build a towering structure without letting it topple. The challenge intensifies as you try to prevent your tower from collapsing. If 5 blocks fall off, it's game over! To climb the leaderboards, strategically match blocks of the same color for bonus points. Compete on your favorite map and see how high you can go!

items.title: Skydom
items.description: Skydom is a fun and puzzle match-3 game. The game features a more classical map progression while keeping unique features from othermatch-3 games.

items.title: Skydom: Reforged
items.description: Skydom: Reforged is an exciting match-3 game and is presented by the developers ofMatch ArenaandSkydom! Welcome - Skydom Reforged, a super-duper mod of classical Skydom with a fresh and unique look. Fun match-3 puzzle with truly exciting game modes. The game features a more classical map progression while introducing unique features and new experiences.

items.title: SmartFriends
items.description: SmartFriends is a fun and engaging puzzle game that gives your brain a daily workout by challenging your IQ in friendly competitions against your friends! Whether you're looking to sharpen your mind or enjoy some healthy rivalry, SmartFriends makes it easy to stay motivated while improving your cognitive skills.

items.title: Smileys: Family Tree emoji
items.description: Smileys: Family Tree Emoji is a puzzle logic game where you decipher and create bizarre emoji combinations. Complete family trees with missing cells by choosing the emoji that fits each gap. Analyze the parents and children for commonalities and differences to solve each level. Enjoy the unique challenge of filling the gaps in these whimsical family trees!

items.title: Smurfs Bubble Shooter Story
items.description: Smurfs Bubble Shooter Story is a fun, challenging game where you pop bubbles to rescue Smurfs and rebuild their village. Match three bubbles of the same color to progress through levels, earning rewards like Coins and Smurfberries to decorate your village. Pop bubbles and save the Smurfs from Gargamel's hands and restore the village.

items.title: Snake Fit
items.description: Snake Fit is a puzzle game where you move the snake across the room to fill it up completely. Collect cherries to grow your snake, push crates into the slots, and press the buttons to open the gates. Dozen different puzzles are awaiting. Can you finish the level without ever moving backward?

items.title: Snoring: Elephant Puzzle
items.description: Snoring: Elephant Puzzle is a delightful physics-based game where you help adorable animals stop the loud snoring of a sleepy elephant. Solve fun, logic-driven puzzles across vibrant environments. Wake the elephant with the help of zebra, owl, penguin, and more, all while enjoying charming graphics, catchy music, and immersive challenges that will keep you entertained.

items.title: European Football Quiz
items.description: Football & Quiz: Soccer Quiz is a game for football enthusiasts who want to test their knowledge while having fun. You get to guess the logos of famous football clubs, remember the years they were founded, and identify the winners of Champions Cups. The quiz covers a wide range of topics, from iconic teams and stadiums to historical trivia. With over 30 leagues to explore, this game is perfect for anyone who loves football and wants to learn more about the world's most popular sport. Test your skills and become a football trivia champion!

items.title: Social Solitaire
items.description: Social Solitaire is a free solitaire game featuring a relaxed and normal game mode. Using the points you earn in games, you can customize your deck and theme. Take a break and play solitaire!

items.title: Sokoban
items.description: Sokoban is a classic Japanese puzzle solving game in which you need to move all of the boxes into the correct locations. The boxes will be pushed in single directions by the character; meaning you can move them left, right, up or down. Think ahead before making your moves as you will quickly become stuck as the levels become more difficult.

items.title: Solitaire Definitive Edition
items.description: Solitaire Definitive Edition is an ultimate solitaire game, featuring 63 of the most popular solitaire games in one browser-based app. Additionally, it offers four exclusive solitaire games. Play seamlessly on all your devices, with features like auto-complete, auto-deal, game loss detection, and multi-level undo. Get ready for the definitive solitaire challenge!

items.title: Solitaire FRVR
items.description: Solitaire FRVR is a great HTML5 solitaire game developed by Chris Benjaminsen.

items.title: Solitaire Klondike
items.description: Have a good time to stack all the cards completely in this Solitaire Klondike game.

items.title: Solitaire Reverse
items.description: The reversed version of Solitaire. Have fun!

items.title: Solitaire: The Great Journey
items.description: Solitaire: The Great Journey is a relaxing card game that blends classic solitaire mechanics with an adventurous twist. Match cards one above or below your stack to clear the table and move forward. With every win, you unlock a new island to explore, turning each round into a step deeper into a vibrant, rewarding journey.

items.title: Solitr
items.description: Solitr is a puzzle card game, the online version of the classic solitaire game, ideal for endless hours of fun: the perfect way to unwind after a busy day!

items.title: Soo Match: Room Design
items.description: Soo Match Room Design is a game that blends puzzle-solving with room decoration. You solve puzzles to earn rewards and unlock stylish furniture, transforming your space into a beautifully designed dream room.

items.title: Sort n Hold
items.description: Sort n Hold is a unique puzzle-sorting game where you’re tasked with sorting various items onto shelves, but there's a twist: you must consider the weight of the objects and the strength of the shelves! With each level, the challenge increases as you race against time to organize items without overloading the shelves. With intuitive controls, immersive gameplay, and gravity-defying mechanics, this game offers a fresh take on the sorting genre. Drag the items, arrange the objects by weight, and sharpen your skills with every new level!

items.title: Sort Parking
items.description: Sort Parking is a puzzle game where you sort cars by type, ensuring every color car is parked in a row with cars of the same color to get to the next stage of the game. It is a classic sort-and-order game that involves skills like logic to advance to the next levels.

items.title: Spades
items.description: Have fun playing a classic internet Spades against 3 other opponents.

items.title: Speed
items.description: SPEED is one of the more classic card games that involves, well, speed. The goal of the game is to be the first player to discard all of the cards on your hand. You do this by choosing a card from your hand that is 1 step higher or lower than one of the 2 cards in the middle of the screen. This is where the title comes it - you won't be taking turns doing this. You'll need speed as the cards in the middle can only be used by the first player to discard their own cards there.

items.title: Spider FRVR
items.description: Spider FRVR is a type of Solitaire game from FRVR. You need to stack the cards on the board.

items.title: Spider Solitaire 2 Suits
items.description: Spider Solitaire 2 Suits is a challenging Solitaire game limited to two suits and two decks of cards. Move the cards around the tableau so they are in order by suit and number. Take more cards from the pile if you get stuck. See if you can win at this tricky game!

items.title: Spooky Tripeaks
items.description: Spooky Tripeaks is a Halloween variation of the Solitaire card game. You need to pass all 100 levels. Use jokers and other bonus cards to simplify the process. You can get the bonus cards by clicking on the ghosts and other spooky characters.

items.title: Spotti: Find the Differences
items.description: Spotti: Find the Differences is a fun and relaxing puzzle game where you compare pairs of images and spot the differences between them. Challenge your brain while enjoying stress-free gameplay at your own pace.

items.title: Spring Tiles Matching
items.description: Spring Tiles Matching is a colorful and engaging puzzle adventure where you tackle hundreds of challenging levels with vibrant graphics and strategic gameplay. With increasing difficulty, power-ups, and relaxing music, this game keeps you engaged as you match tiles and unlock rewards. Perfect for all ages, it’s a delightful way to test and grow your puzzle-solving skills!

items.title: Square Punki Long Hand
items.description: Square Punki Long Hand is a quirky puzzle game that lets you experience life with super-long arms. Stretch, grab, and solve creative challenges as you rescue characters, reach tricky spots, and pull off playful pranks. Each level brings unexpected twists and laugh-out-loud moments, making every move a test of clever thinking and humor.

items.title: Squarehead Hero
items.description: Squarehead Hero is a turn-based puzzle dungeon crawler where every step matters. You’ll guide a quirky square-headed adventurer across grid-based boards, battling monsters, collecting loot, and upgrading your gear. With varied enemies, magical items, and tactical movement, each dungeon challenges your planning and creativity. Outsmart foes, gather treasures, and prove your cleverness in this strategic quest.

items.title: STACK.it
items.description: STACK.it is a mesmerizing merging game where you swipe or use arrow keys to create stacks. Watch as smaller stacks leap onto larger ones, triggering explosive-size upgrades when they match. Can you reach the coveted 2048 piece or aim for a colossal 32K? Challenge yourself to orchestrate jaw-dropping 10-stack combos and aim for an astounding 15 merges in a single move. Prepare for an addictive, easy-to-learn, hard-to-master experience that'll keep you stacking for hours on end!

items.title: Stacktris 2048
items.description: Stacktris 2048 is a combination of the 2048 and Tetris games in 3D. Challenge everyone and score as many points as possible! This is an addictive matching cube merging game for those who love logic games with numbers. Build your winning strategy and score the maximum number of points.

items.title: Stickman Challenge
items.description: Stickman Challenge is a fun physics game where you place trampolines on a dotted grid, and watch stickmen bounce off them. The objective is to direct the stickmen to collect all the stars.

items.title: Sticky Fruits
items.description: Sticky Fruits is a fun arcade game where you must destroy as many fruits as possible and get the highest score. Burst delicious fruits with a simple click. Use upgrades like time boosts and explosive bombs for maximum fun. With vibrant visuals and strategic popping, this game is a delightful blend of matching and excitement. Blast your way to a best-ever score with Sticky Fruits!

items.title: Stone Puzzle Games
items.description: Stone Puzzle Game is a brain-teasing experience that blends three unique puzzle styles into one captivating game. Challenge yourself with “Stone Shoot” by merging number stones, connect colorful stones in “Stone Connect,” and test your math skills in “Stone Merge” by combining numbers to form higher values. Engage in a variety of challenges to train your mind and master each puzzle type!

items.title: Stupidity Test
items.description: Stupidity Test is a quiz game that lets you find out how stupid you really are! Answer some simple logical questions that may include colors, shapes, and simple math and see how well you do. You'll be shown your score at the end of the test or if you make a mistake, so put your thinking cap on before taking this test to get the best score possible.

items.title: Submachine 9: The Temple
items.description: The Temple is the ninth episode of the Submachine puzzle-game series where you explore a mysterious temple and reveal its hidden secrets. Collect the items, use them in the right place, and complete all the riddles.

items.title: Sudoku.game
items.description: Sudoku.game is the perfect place to play all things sudoku. This online version allows you to play the classic game as a novice or an expert as you complete sudoku puzzles of all different difficulties. You can set your difficulty level to one of four different levels to challenge you no matter your experience playing the game.

items.title: Sudoku Online
items.description: Sudoku Online is a logic puzzle game that challenges players with the placement of numbers. Originating from Japan, the word "Sudoku" means "single digit." The game has a rich history, gaining popularity in the 19th century through magazines and newspapers. It is renowned for its ability to develop key cognitive areas.

items.title: Sugar Heroes
items.description: Sugar Heroes is a puzzle match-3 adventure that plays as sweet as it sounds. Join a quirky crew of lovable characters, each with their own charm, as you dive into a world bursting with vibrant colors, tricky obstacles, and endless fun. Plan your moves carefully to outsmart puzzles and rack up those sweet victories. Whether you're competing in multiplayer tournaments, completing daily challenges for epic rewards, or exploring an ever-expanding map of fun-filled levels, there’s never a dull moment. With every match, you’ll uncover new mechanics, surprises, and sugary delights that keep you hooked.

items.title: Sugar, Sugar 2
items.description: Sugar, Sugar 2 is a strategic puzzle game where you draw lines to direct sugar into cups. Build bridges and slopes to catch the sugar and guide it to the cup.

items.title: Super Hexbee Merger
items.description: Super Hexbee Merger is a puzzle game that challenges you to link three hexes of different colors to collect points. Move the hexagon set from the bottom to the grid and connect it with other hexes of the same color to complete the target and unlock special "merger" hexagons. But be careful not to run out of space on the grid! Master the technique and get the hexes in the right position. Try your hand at this addictive puzzle game and see if you have what it takes to win!

items.title: Super Tic Tac Toe
items.description: Super Tic Tac Toe is a classic game to a new level. With a grid of 9 smaller boards, each move guides your opponent to a specific mini-board. Win a small board, and it's yours on the larger grid. But beware, closed boards, restrict play. Defeat your rival by claiming three mini-boards in a row, horizontally, vertically, or diagonally. Play solo against the CPU or challenge a friend on one device in 2-player mode.

items.title: Sushi Drop
items.description: Sushi Drop is a puzzle game where you must drop-and-merge the same sushi blocks to create more expensive and fancy sushi ordered by the customers. You can remove unwanted sushi using a bomb booster and also reshuffle the sushi using a blender booster. Try to merge multiple times in a row to get an awesome bonus. Collect coins to recruit a new chef for your sushi restaurant. How expensive and fancy sushi can you make?

items.title: Sushi Factory
items.description: Sushi Factory is a captivating puzzle game that puts your logic skills to the test. Place the sushi on top of the plate strategically to serve your guests and earn money. Solve challenging puzzles to unlock a variety of new sushi recipes and adorable sushi chef characters. Upgrade your restaurant's interior for a more delightful dining experience. Use helpful items to overcome challenges, and embark on missions to earn rewards. Explore the daily menu for additional surprises and prepare to be charmed by the irresistible cuteness of this sushi puzzle adventure while sharpening your mind along the way!

items.title: Bomb Defuse Online
items.description: Play with your friend and try to defuse the bomb!

items.title: Tangle Master
items.description: Tangle Master is a colorful puzzle game that tests your logic and timing as you work to untangle twisted ropes. You’ll need to plan every move wisely, because your chances are limited. Focus on the physics, avoid knots, and clear each level with sharp thinking and patience. Can you unravel every tricky tangle that comes your way?

items.title: Tap 3D Wood Block Away
items.description: Tap 3D Wood Block Away is a challenging puzzle game that tests your spatial reasoning and strategy. Rotate structures, tap wisely, and remove wooden blocks to reveal intricate 3D designs. With progressively complex levels and engaging mechanics, each move requires careful planning. Hone your problem-solving skills and enjoy a satisfying puzzle experience filled with clever challenges!

items.title: Tap Reveal
items.description: Tap Reveal is a casual puzzle game that puts your logic skills to the test. Tap away colorful blocks to gradually uncover hidden images beneath. Each puzzle is a unique brain teaser, crafted to challenge your reasoning and offer a deeply satisfying sense of progress. Whether you're looking to unwind or sharpen your mind, Tap Reveal provides an addictive blend of logic puzzles and relaxing gameplay. With its stress-relieving mechanics and endless variety, it’s a must-play for puzzle lovers of all ages.

items.title: Tasty Jewel Joy
items.description: Tasty Jewel Joy is a match-3 style puzzle game. Match 3 or more identical ingredients to collect them. Pay attention to the moves limit on each level and complete the task before the limit runs out. Do combos to score more points!

items.title: Tasty Match: Mahjong Pairs
items.description: Tasty Match: Mahjong Pairs is a colorful and addictive puzzle game where your goal is to connect pairs of identical tiles. Clear the entire mahjong tiles before the time runs out. Connect more distant tiles to get more stars. Win the game and collect the chest. Over time, new beautiful tiles will unlocked, and the level configurations will become more complicated.

items.title: Teleport Jumper
items.description: Teleport Jumper is a puzzle platformer game where you use a short-range teleport to bypass obstacles and reach the exit at each level. This clever puzzle game was made by Robert Alvarez, who also has several popular puzzle games likeChessformerandMath Push.

items.title: TenTrix
items.description: TenTrix is a fantastic puzzle game set on a 10x10 playing board. The objective is to fit all the pieces together in rows like Tetris, but the pieces don’t fall. Instead, you can match rows in any direction and place pieces where you want.

items.title: That's My Recipe
items.description: That's My Recipe is a flavorful puzzle game that puts you in the role of a MasterChef, solving dish-based logic challenges. Use clever hints to drag ingredients into their correct spots and complete each culinary masterpiece. With thoughtful gameplay and a dash of creativity, it’s a feast for puzzle and cooking fans alike.

items.title: The Box of Secrets
items.description: The Box of Secrets is an exciting puzzle game inspired by the escape game genres such as "Prison Escape" and "100 Doors". Solve riddles, look for items to find your way out to open boxes. Use your wits and wit to find the key to each secret box! Travel to different locations and find the way to open simple boxes, advanced cases, safes with combination locks, ancient boxes, and many others.

items.title: The Dumb Test
items.description: The Dumb Test is a puzzle game that pits your problem-solving skills against multiple trick questions. Put your thinking cap on and take the challenge to prove you're not dumb. Remember to stay calm as well, as some of these questions might make you rage if you don't think about it carefully.

items.title: The Final Riddle
items.description: The Final Riddle is a challenging puzzle game where you arrange blocks to solve intricate riddles. Use hints if you're stuck, but be mindful—every hint counts against your final score. With only one chance to complete the game, your score becomes a permanent record of your wit and strategy. It's a game of clever thinking and lasting results. And it also has a message!

items.title: The Frame: Pixel Art
items.description: The Frame: Pixel Art is a relaxing coloring game where you create detailed artwork, one pixel at a time. Whether you're an experienced artist or just looking for a peaceful hobby, this game offers a unique creative experience. Begin by selecting a level, then use the palette to choose your colors and carefully place each pixel on the canvas. Tools like fill color and level skip help you refine your designs. As you complete each piece, earn stars based on your accuracy and challenge yourself with increasingly complex designs. Share your pixel art masterpieces with friends and enjoy the soothing process of bringing your creations to life.

items.title: The Impossible Quiz
items.description: The Impossible Quiz is an online quiz game that is… Almost impossible. The questions are all difficult to answer and require lateral thinking. There are 110 questions to get through and you only have three lives, so make sure you’re ready to think creatively!

items.title: The Last Light of Lyra
items.description: The Last Light of Lyra is a serene cosmic puzzle adventure where you guide mining ships through a collapsing universe. Traverse fading planets, solve clever number-based puzzles using addition and subtraction, and restore harmony among the stars. With gentle storytelling and dreamlike visuals, it’s a peaceful, brain-teasing journey through a beautifully unraveling cosmos.

items.title: The Magician
items.description: The Magician is a point and click puzzle game that lets you learn the secrets of different magicians' tricks. It's pretty simple - you'll be first shown how the trick is seen by the audience. After that, you'll then try to recreate the trick, but this time showing how it's actually done (with secret gadgets, or extra steps). A magician never reveals their secrets, but this game is about to bust that rule wide open!

items.title: The Milk Quest
items.description: The Milk Quest is a point and click game where your entire goal is to get milk. You play as a little kitten with a thirst for milk, and you'll go through anything as long as you can get it. There'll be a lot of obstacles along the way, but nothing can stop you on your quest as long as you keep your thinking cap on!

items.title: The Rooms: Escape Challenge
items.description: The Rooms: Escape Challenge is a puzzle game where you find the keys and hidden items to solve riddles. How far can you escape the room?

items.title: The Visitor
items.description: The Visitor is a point-and-click game in which you become an alien parasite that needs to consume the living beings to grow and dominate the world. Solve the challenge in each scene and spread the terror!

items.title: Thief Puzzle
items.description: Thief Puzzle is a clever 2D puzzle logic game that puts your problem-solving and strategy to the test. You control a sneaky thief’s hand as it reaches for valuable treasures, but the path is filled with complex traps, laser security systems, and tricky obstacles. Do you have what it takes to outsmart each trap that comes your way?

items.title: Think to Escape 3
items.description: Think to Escape 3 is an escape game set on a sinking ship. There are 3 levels available that you need to finish to save yourself. Get out of the locked room, find any useful things, escape the sinking ship, and to survive from the sea!

items.title: Tic Tac Toe Online
items.description: Tic-Tac-Toe online is a classic puzzle board game of naughts and crosses that never goes out of style! Whether you’re looking to challenge your wits against other players worldwide, test your strategy against a cunning computer opponent, or enjoy a friendly match with someone right next to you in local multiplayer, this game has you covered. So, get ready to place your X's and O's, and see if you can outsmart your opponent!

items.title: Tile Dreams
items.description: Tile Dreams is a relaxing tile-matching game that challenges your mind with daily puzzles. Match tiles, clear the board, and sharpen your memory through engaging 3D puzzles. Whether you're a fan of Match 3, sudoku, ormahjong, you'll enjoy the endless fun and brain-boosting experience that Tile Dreams offers for all ages.

items.title: Tile Match 3 Puzzle: Mahjong
items.description: Tile Match: Mahjong is a relaxing and captivating puzzle game where the timeless charm of Mahjong meets modern gameplay twists. Match three identical tiles to clear the board and progress through hundreds of beautifully crafted levels. Each stage presents a fresh challenge, testing your strategy and puzzle-solving skills while keeping the experience soothing and stress-free. Enjoy daily challenges to keep your mind sharp, unlock rewards, and play at your own pace with no time limits. Whether you’re a seasoned Mahjong fan or new to tile-matching puzzles, Tile Match: Mahjong offers the perfect blend of relaxation and mental stimulation for players of all ages.

items.title: Timberland Arrange Puzzle Game
items.description: Timberland Arrange Puzzle Game is a logic puzzle game where you need to place three foxes, three owls, and three elephants on a 3x3 grid. Each animal must be in a specific spot, and they should be colored in three different colors. This game is suitable for both children and adults, offering a relaxing experience while enhancing your logical thinking. Arrange and color animals in this addictive game that blends classic Tag and Sudoku elements. Each level challenges you to solve puzzles by finding intersections between different hints, with the difficulty increasing as you progress. Enjoy the vibrant hand-drawn graphics, soothing nature sounds, and cheerful animal cries. With over 120 levels and a variety of mechanics, you'll encounter unexpected challenges that will test your skills. This game will sharpen your mind and provide a meditative escape, making it a perfect balance of fun and mental exercise.

items.title: Tower Swap
items.description: Tower Swap is a clever puzzle game combining match-3 mechanics with addictive tower defense gameplay. Stop the dragons from reaching your castle by building your defenses through tactical tile-matching decisions.

items.title: Traffic Parking
items.description: Traffic Parking is a challenging car puzzle game where you guide a vehicle home by navigating around obstacles like other cars and rocks. Strategize to clear paths and unlock tricks for tricky levels. With 45 levels, customizable car skins, and daily rewards, it’s designed to keep you engaged and entertained as you master each challenge.

items.title: Train Master
items.description: Train Master is an addicting and enjoyable puzzle game where you must collect your passengers! You will lose if you hit your train, so choose your route wisely!

items.title: Trap the Cat
items.description: An HTML5 remake of Circle the Cat, where the player has to try and catch the cat before it escapes. Now you can play as the cat or watch the game plays by itself!

items.title: Trap the Cat 2D
items.description: Trap the Cat is a logic puzzle game that offers a mix of strategy and puzzle-solving excitement! Your goal is to trap and prevent a clever cat from escaping a hexagon maze. There are 3 game modes in this game: Story mode, where you must beat each level that becomes more challenging as you go. Classic mode, which provides easy, medium, and hard difficulties, and you need to trap the cat until it can't move at all! User-Generated Levels mode, where in this mode, you can create your own puzzle and share it publicly! A mischievous cat awaits you. Let's play!

items.title: Trapped
items.description: Trapped is an escape game where you must solve the puzzle to finish the game. Follow the storyline and try to escape.

items.title: Tri Peaks Social
items.description: The fun and famous Tri-Peaks version of the Solitaire card game.

items.title: TriPeaks Solitaire
items.description: Tri Peaks Solitaire Classic is a classic solitaire game. Click on a card with a number which is one higher or one lower than the number on the face-up card on the bottom. Try to get rid of all the cards in this way. Enjoy!

items.title: Trim FRVR
items.description: Trim FRVR is a fun and challenging matching game in which you must try and match together a series of colored blocks to avoid the screen filling up. This game has similarities to Tetris but it uses more elements of match three gameplay as you must simply match together single colored blocks as opposed to pre-defined block shapes.

items.title: Triple Fruit
items.description: Triple Fruit is a puzzle match 3 game where your mission is to clear all the food by placing them onto the plate. Use your logic to arrange three matching food items on 1 plate, but you can't put a rock onto the plate. Use rotate and roll power-up wisely on your way to victory!

items.title: Trivia Crack
items.description: Trivia Crack is a fun quiz game where you can test your general knowledge and learn amazing facts about the world. Know more by playing the worldwide #1 hit trivia game. It’s showtime!

items.title: Tropical Merge
items.description: Dive into Tropical Merge, the ultimate merge game where you can create your tropical paradise! Immerse yourself in a vibrant world as you match and combine resources in three groups to craft exciting new items. Whether completing quests or exploring the lush landscape, every match brings you closer to transforming your island into a perfect tropical haven. With hundreds of objects to discover and merge, the possibilities are endless—start building your dream island today!

items.title: Tube Sort
items.description: Tube Sort is a puzzle game where you must sort colorful balls into jars using a flexible hose. Immerse yourself in a visually stunning environment where vibrant balls of various colors await your expert touch. Your task is simple yet satisfying: use a flexible hose to connect the jars and transfer the balls to their corresponding destinations. Unwind, relax, and let the vibrant colors and captivating gameplay make you feel refreshed and rejuvenated.

items.title: Tuggowar
items.description: Tuggowar is an immersive deckbuilding experience game with strategic twists reminiscent of RTS games. Unleash your tactical prowess as you craft unique strategies and combinations to outsmart your opponents. Whether disrupting their plans or rushing with tanks, every move counts. Challenge others in PvP or enjoy a laid-back session against AI opponents. Are you ready to dominate the battlefield?

items.title: Twirl
items.description: Twirl is a puzzle game where you need to fulfill your goals by placing blocks on the board until they get full horizontally or vertically to make the blocks disappear. The more you show your skills, the more stars you get for completing the level. Throughout the game, you will meet various levels that can captivate and challenge any player.

items.title: Twisted Blocks
items.description: Twisted Blocks is a clever puzzle challenge that puts your brain to the test as you guide colorful blocks to their matching doors. Each move demands sharp thinking and smart strategy to untangle complex layouts. With every puzzle, your logic skills grow stronger. Think ahead, clear the path, and master the twist!

items.title: Twisted Tangle
items.description: Twisted Tangle is a captivating puzzle game where your skills in untangling intricate knots are put to the ultimate test. Master the art of pin manipulation as you tackle fixed pins, octopus challenges, and the intricate dance of keys and locks. With fresh puzzles weekly, your strategic brilliance will determine if you conquer Hard, Epic, or Boss Levels!

items.title: Underwater Adventures: Match 3
items.description: Underwater Adventures: Match 3 is a delightful match-3 puzzle game set in an enchanting underwater world. Solve puzzles by matching colorful marine-themed tiles, uncover hidden treasures, and progress through hundreds of levels. Featuring unique mechanics, stunning underwater visuals, and engaging gameplay, this game is perfect for fans of casual puzzle games. Dive in and explore the depths while challenging your mind!

items.title: Four Colors
items.description: Four Colors lets you play the popular card game for free in your web browser. The aim of the game is to be the first player with no cards, similar to other Crazy Eights style card games. Play a game like UNO in multiplayer with 2, 3, or 4 players.

items.title: Unpuzzle: Tap Away Puzzle Game
items.description: Unpuzzle: Tap Away Puzzle Game is a brain-teaser game where you swipe blocks to solve intricate puzzles. Boasting over 1000 levels, each move tests your logic and critical thinking skills.

items.title: Unscrew Jam 3D
items.description: Unscrew Jam 3D is a puzzle logic game where you tap on three screws of the same color to match them. Some screws are hidden, so you'll need to tap them in the right order. Match all the screws to win! But be careful—if you fill the entire tray with screws, you lose. Are you ready for a challenge?

items.title: Valentine Mahjong
items.description: Valentine Mahjong is a Valentine-themedmahjong gameto clear all the tiles within the time limit.

items.title: War Mahjong
items.description: War Mahjong (Tiles of the Unexpected) is a mahjong-style tile-matching game with a war theme. Although it's not like typicalmahjong games, your objective is to clear the tiles by clicking on groups with the same image.

items.title: Water Jam
items.description: Water Jam is an addictive color-sorting puzzle game that challenges your strategy and problem-solving skills. Your task is simple: pour and sort colored water into the correct tubes, ensuring that each color matches perfectly. As you advance through levels, the puzzles become more complex, requiring you to think ahead and plan each move carefully. Navigate vibrant tubes, tap to pour, and use small storage cups to temporarily hold excess liquid, helping you clear tubes efficiently. With its stunning visuals, smooth controls, and progressively challenging levels, Water Jam offers a fresh take on color-sorting games that keep your mind sharp and entertained.

items.title: Wendy: Mansion Mystery
items.description: Wendy: Mansion Mystery is a spellbinding puzzle-adventure game where you play as Wendy, a quirky zombie girl with a sharp wit and an even sharper sense of curiosity. Inspired by the charm of Wednesday and the humor of Hotel Transylvania, this game blends mystery, magic, and brain-teasing puzzles into one unforgettable journey.

items.title: What is it?
items.description: What is it? is a delightful brain teaser that challenges you to uncover secret items while relaxing and having fun. Sharpen your observation skills, expand your vocabulary, and unlock stunning wallpapers as rewards. With over 100 designs to discover, this game offers a calming yet engaging experience that keeps you entertained and intrigued.

items.title: What's The Difference?
items.description: What's The Difference? is a casual Spot the Difference game where you must find differences in two similar images. Can you spot them before the online players can? Enjoy this photo hunt and puzzle-solving game. Be ready to find five differences online and prove your skills!

items.title: White Jigsaw
items.description: White Jigsaw is a puzzle game where you try to complete a jigsaw puzzle without a lot of clues. The pieces won't have any pictures on them, so the only clues you can use are the holes and bumps on the pieces. This makes it a little challenging, but also a lot more fun. You'll be able to unlock puzzles with more pieces as you solve each puzzle, so keep going to get even better challenges.

items.title: WODR
items.description: WODR is a fresh take on word games, featuring dynamic 3D letters that spill onto your screen. Your challenge is to snap the letters onto a string, shuffle them around, and strategize to solve crossword-style puzzles. With endless challenges, sleek letter beads, and satisfying physics, each round offers a unique brain teaser. Whether you're a seasoned word master or just starting out, WODR delivers easy-to-play, hard-to-master fun that will keep you coming back for more!

items.title: Wood Block Journey
items.description: Wood Block Journey is a woodblock puzzle tetris game fused with the essence of Sudoku. Clear rows, columns, and squares in Play Single mode for high scores. Complete unique missions in Journey mode. Enjoy beautiful graphics, soothing sounds, and stress-free gameplay. Solve 60+ engaging puzzles with realistic wood tiles. It's a free, no-registration gaming delight.

items.title: Wood Blocks
items.description: Wood Blocks is a fun puzzle strategy game where you must place different-shaped wooden blocks into the play area, similar to a 10x10 grid. You will put the blocks one by one into the play area, and they will drop onto one another using gravity.

items.title: Wood Blocks Jam
items.description: Wood Blocks Jam is a thoughtful puzzle game that challenges you to clear fields of tiles by clicking strategically. As you progress, you’ll solve physics-based problems, sort layered chips, and tackle clever riddles. It’s a great way to sharpen your logic and problem-solving skills while navigating satisfying, tile-clearing gameplay.

items.title: Wood Bolts & Nuts Screw: Pin Puzzle
items.description: Wood Bolts & Nuts Screw: Pin Puzzle is a logic game where you must strategically unlock screw holes in various products to guide metal plates into place in the correct sequence. This engaging gameplay experience challenges your spatial awareness and problem-solving skills as you work through intricate mazes filled with nuts, bolts, and plates.

items.title: Wood Screw: Bolts Puzzle
items.description: Wood Screw is a clever puzzle game where you twist and remove bolts to clear wooden boards in the right order. Each level challenges your logic and timing, turning simple mechanics into brain-teasing fun. Stay sharp, think ahead, and use every move wisely as the puzzles grow trickier with every turn you take.

items.title: Word Connect Multiplayer
items.description: Word Connect Multiplayer is a fast-paced word game where you and an opponent race to solve the same crossword. Earn points by quickly finding words and activating combo multipliers. Use hints, magnifiers, and skips to outsmart your opponent. With endless puzzles, every match challenges your vocabulary and speed. Test your skills and see who connects words the fastest!

items.title: Word Duel
items.description: Word Duel is a 1v1 multiplayer word battle game.

items.title: Word Sauce
items.description: Word Sauce is a word puzzle game filled with challenging levels that test your vocabulary and logic. You’ll connect letter chips to uncover hidden words, solving clever combinations one by one. With its simple mechanics and family-friendly design, it offers a fun and engaging way to exercise your brain while sharing the experience with others.

items.title: Word Scramble
items.description: Word Scramble is a classic word game where you unscramble letters to find words. Find one word after the next and see how many you can identify before the timer runs out!

items.title: Word Scramble - Family Tales
items.description: Word Scramble - Family Tales is a fun word puzzle game where you challenge your vocabulary while following a heartwarming family story. Solve engaging word searches to unlock cozy interiors and see the family's journey unfold. With vibrant graphics, creative challenges, and the joy of decorating, it's a great way to sharpen your mind and enjoy a captivating adventure.

items.title: Word Search
items.description: Word Search is exactly what you would expect – a word search game! If you love puzzles such as this, then you will love this simple but classic game. Word Search allows you to play a variety of different word search puzzles.

items.title: Daily Word Search
items.description: Word Search is a daily puzzle game for word enthusiasts and puzzle lovers alike. With three new word search puzzles every day, plus endless randomly generated ones, the fun never ends. Test your skills, expand your vocabulary, and embark on a daily adventure in the world of words. Get ready to dive in and enjoy the excitement!

items.title: Word Shift
items.description: Word Shift is a puzzle word game where you must connect letters and turn them into a specific word. You will get a clue and you will need to find words out of it. Discover new words and boost your vocabulary. Enjoy the satisfaction of solving puzzles in this word adventure. Play, learn, and find an enjoyable experience with this edutainment game.

items.title: Word String Puzzle
items.description: Word String Puzzle is a clever word game that challenges you to link words into compound forms or well-known phrases. You’ll stretch your vocabulary, sharpen your logic, and enjoy calm, focused gameplay. With helpful power-ups and smooth design, each puzzle invites you to think creatively and connect words in smart, satisfying ways.

items.title: Word Swipe
items.description: Word Swipe is a unique word puzzle game with the objective to solve Wordle puzzles by swiping the letters tiles. This game offers both fun and relaxing gameplay. Guess the word by using the tile colors to complete each level. With a vast collection of words of different lengths, don't limit yourself to just five-letter words. The game features addictive gameplay, numerous levels, and a relaxing atmosphere. If you are a fan of word games, including Scrabble and crosswords, Word Swipe is the perfect game for you.

items.title: Word Wipe
items.description: Word Wipe is a word search puzzle game where you connect letters to form words and clear them from the grid. Form words by combining letters, causing them to vanish and creating new letter combinations as others drop down.

items.title: Wording
items.description: Wording is a puzzle game where you'll challenge yourself to find as many words as possible before the clock runs out! With an incredible 74,000 levels to explore, this game offers endless opportunities to test and improve your vocabulary skills. Can you beat the average score and become a word-finding master? Dive in and find out!

items.title: Wordler
items.description: Wordler is a puzzle word game that puts your vocabulary and problem-solving skills to the ultimate test. With just six attempts to uncover a hidden five-letter word, every guess brings you closer to victory—or closer to defeat. Correct letters are highlighted the way, giving you clues towards a solution, and each of your six attempts feels like a high-stakes puzzle as you analyze clues; it's key to refine your strategy and race against the countdown. Perfect for word lovers and puzzle enthusiasts.

items.title: Wordmeister
items.description: Wordmeister is an English word game similar to Scrabble. Use the letters provided and create words on the board to score points.
