items.title: Words of Wonders
items.description: Words of Wonders is a crossword puzzle where you connect letters to reveal hidden words. Test your vocabulary and find all the words to progress and reach more challenging levels. Will you become a master wordsmith in this delightful word game?

items.title: Wordy Night
items.description: Wordy Night is a challenging puzzle game in which you must try to create words using the letter blocks available to you. The letter blocks will be locked together in pairs or sometimes, even more, place them within the play area to try and create all of the words possible.

items.title: Geography Quiz: Flags and Capitals
items.description: Geography Quiz: Flags and Capitals is an educational geography trivia quiz game that tests your geography knowledge! Explore Five Captivating Game Modes, which are:

items.title: WORM
items.description: WORM is a fun puzzle game where you guide a cheerful worm to its destination hole through strategic moves. Engage your problem-solving skills as you navigate obstacles and twists, unraveling each level's unique puzzle. Enjoy the whimsical journey of maneuvering your worm friend to success, one clever move at a time. Wormy Wonders promises a delightful brain-teasing experience for puzzle enthusiasts.

items.title: Xor
items.description: xor is a mind-bending, minimalist puzzle game. There are three flat figures (triangle, square and rhombus) that must be folded in a certain way to get another, more complex, figure.

items.title: Yahtzee Online
items.description: Test your dice skills with Yahtzee Online. Play a fun online Yahtzee game against up to 3 opponents. This classic Yahtzee game brings you all the fun of this traditional dice game in your web browser. It has a perfect blend of tactics, strategy, and luck to keep you entertained.

items.title: Yatzy
items.description: Yatzy is one of the popular dice games. You can play this game online for free!

items.title: Zoo Boom
items.description: Zoo Boom is a puzzle match-3 game with mission-based rounds to challenge you at every level. This fun animal-themed game is an addictive one-click game where your objective is to strategically clear boards of animal tiles without getting yourself stuck into a lack of matches. Get ready for some good old-fashioned match game fun.

items.title: 10 Bullets - HTML 5
items.description: In 10 Bullets, it's all about the right timing. Will you be patient enough to wait for the perfect spot? And trigger massive chain reactions that will blow the screen with massive explosions? You can play the sequel in10 More Bullets.

items.title: A Small Favor
items.description: A Small Favor is a point and click adventure game that lets you play as an alien bounty hunter. Business is booming and you've got plenty of favors to fulfill, mostly assassination jobs but that doesn't matter as long as it pays. To finish all of the favors given to you, you'll need a strong mind to solve all the puzzles and mysteries that surround your targets.

items.title: Airport Clash 3D
items.description: Airport Clash 3D is an episode of the Clash 3D shooter series, just likeSubway Clash RemasteredandSniper Clash 3D. Use your minigun and help your fellow raiders to nuke the enemy's base!

items.title: Apple Shooter
items.description: Apple Shooter is a shooting archery game, your objective is simple: complete each level by shooting all of the apples placed on your friend's head. This flash game is all about testing your aim, precision, and nerves as you take on the role of an archer with a bow and arrow.

items.title: Arsenal Online
items.description: Arsenal Online is a shooting game that thrusts you into intense shoot-em-up action. Engage in thrilling solo or co-op game modes, each offering unique objectives, from Sniper precision challenges to Time Attack kill frenzies. Unlock a vast arsenal of weapons and attachments, spanning pistols, SMGs, assault rifles, LMGs, and sniper rifles. Need target practice? Dive into the firing range for immediate access to all weapons and attachments. Gear up for explosive battles and strategic mayhem in Arsenal Online!

items.title: Attack of Duty
items.description: Attack of Duty is an arcade shooting game where your mission is to destroy all opponents. Drag to aim and shoot down enemies, intercepting incoming threats. Charge up your rockets and fire them at challenging foes. Defend the land, sea, and skies as you battle to protect your territory. Engage in intense combat and prove your skills in this shooting game!

items.title: Battle Area
items.description: Control an elite soldier and take out all the enemies that have captured the Mars mine in this cool FPS game.

items.title: Block Contra: Clutch Strike
items.description: Block Contra: Clutch Strike is a shooting game fusion of Counter-Strike's intensity and Block Strike's thrilling combat. Climb the ranks and challenge gaming greats like S1mple and Donk in adrenaline-pumping showdowns.

items.title: BuildNow GG
items.description: BuildNow GG is an online build-and-shoot game featuring various game modes, weapons, and maps. Build and battle your way to the top of the leaderboard and hone your skills in offline training mode.

items.title: Bullet Force
items.description: Bullet Force is an online multiplayer FPS game featuring fast-paced action. Battle against other players on tactical maps using a range of weapons at your disposal. Crate custom games and buy new perks to improve your character.

items.title: Bullet Fury 2
items.description: Bullet Fury 2 is an FPS game to eliminate all enemies that are guarding a laboratory and is a sequel to Bullet Fury.

items.title: Bulletstorm
items.description: Bulletstorm is a relentless FPS survival shooter set in a devastated world overrun by the undead. Dual-wield over 50 unique firearms, command a diverse team of heroes, and take on screen-flooding zombie hordes with explosive intensity. With roguelike upgrades, unpredictable loot, and massive boss battles, every fight is a chaotic push for humanity’s last stand.

items.title: Chicken CS
items.description: Chicken CS is a wild first-person shooter where you step into the feathers of a fearless chicken and dive into action-packed, hilarious battles! From teaming up in fast-paced competitions to climbing the ranks and becoming the ultimate chicken champion, this game takes classic FPS gameplay and gives it a quirky, feathery twist. With every shot, jump, and wall-climb, the chaos never stops. Show off your sharp shooting skills and rule the roost in the world of Chicken CS — let the feathered mayhem begin!

items.title: Command Strike FPS
items.description: Command Strike FPS is an action-packed game involving intense battles across multiple maps. Take part in thrilling commando missions, capture flags, and dominate your enemies in various offline game modes. Armed with powerful guns and pistols, it’s time to prove your skills and become the ultimate super soldier!

items.title: Dead Zed
items.description: Dead Zed is a zombie survival game where you must shoot down zombies and manage your group of survivors. Have you got what it takes to survive?

items.title: Dead Zed 2
items.description: Dead Zed 2 is the second instalment of the epic Dead Zed zombie apocalypse survival series (after the original Dead Zed, of course). You must use your skill, cunning and combat skills to survive against hordes of zombie in this strange and unforgiving world. Survive day by day and use your weapons to kill the flesh seeking zombies. As you kill zombies your rage bar steadily builds. Once this bar is full, you can enter rage mode and turn every shot from your weapon into a one-hit kill.

items.title: Death City Zombie Invasion
items.description: Death City: Zombie Invasion is a shooting horror game where you must fight off waves of zombies at every angle while completing task-driven quests. As the city falls into chaos, your mission is to uncover the cause of the apocalypse and fight to survive. Upgrade your weapons, buy new guns, and improve your skills to increase your chances. Play through different modes like sniper missions, survival challenges, and resource exploration. Dive into the intense horror of this post-apocalyptic world and battle to stay alive!

items.title: Destroy Base
items.description: Destroy Base is a shooting game where your mission is to eliminate the enemies defending their base. Rain down bullets from above on your enemies, shoot explosive barrels to blow up the buildings, and be careful not to kill the hostages!

items.title: Dino Hunting Jurassic World
items.description: Dino Hunting Jurassic World is an exhilarating dinosaur-hunting adventure where you step into a Jurassic world. Take on the role of a dino hunter, armed with the latest firearms and sniper rifles, and embark on a quest to protect the world from deadly dinosaurs. Navigate through various jungles and track down your prey while facing unique challenges and realistic sound effects that bring the experience to life.

items.title: Dogfight
items.description: Dogfight is a thrilling air combat game where you control a battle plane in intense aerial battles. Perform maneuvers like looping, rolling, and turning as you engage in dynamic dogfights. Experience the rush of real air battles and showcase your piloting skills.

items.title: Doomsday Shooter
items.description: Doomsday Shooter is an addictive FPS game that throws you into an apocalyptic world, where you must fend off hordes of sinister creepers with 11 different weapons at your disposal. Protect the pixel world from demons and avoid dangerous creatures like kamikazes, golems, spirits, and poisonous plants. Use your bazooka, axe, machine gun, or sniper rifle to take down your enemies and punish anything that moves. With fast dynamics and unique enemies, you'll be hooked on the pixelated style and addictive gameplay as you fight your way to the prince of darkness!

items.title: Drunken Duel 2
items.description: Drunken Duel 2 is the second episode of the ragdoll arena shooter game. This episode comes with a new arena, weapons, and conditions! There is a fierce struggle on the roof! Choose your orange or blue drunk side and start the fight! Sometimes the helicopter is involved in this fight. If you want, shoot it too and throw it at your opponent! The one who reaches 5 scores first, and wins the game. Come on, try to control the drunk stickman and win the game! Drunken Duel 2 has 1 Player and 2 Player modes!

items.title: Duck Hunt
items.description: Duck Hunt is a fantastic arcade game that takes inspiration from the original classic available on Nintendo game systems. You must shoot the moving ducks down with your mouse and see how many points you can score.

items.title: Elite Sniper
items.description: Elite Sniper browser game - show your shooting skills. Elite snipers perform the most dangerous missions. Test your eyesight and reaction, pull the trigger to give the enemy a fatal blow! Up to 20 mission levels and 6 different types of enemies in the game are very challenging. Are you ready?

items.title: Farm Clash 3D
items.description: Farm Clash 3D is a third-person shooter in which you and your teammates battle against the other team on a beautiful farm. The game features raging cowboys eliminating everything on their way with shrapnel. Have fun with this game!

items.title: Forward Assault Remix
items.description: Forward Assault Remix is an exhilarating first-person shooter game from the developers of Bullet Force. This game stands out with fantastic 3D graphics, competitive games, and a fully-fledged clan system. Lock and load for a highly competitive online FPS game in your web browser!

items.title: Fragen
items.description: Fragen is an intense shooting FPS game where you face adrenaline-filled battles on your own or in a team. Whether you choose free-for-all or team deathmatch, your goal is to survive and dominate. You will need to customize your arsenal, up your game plan, and outpace your rivals in every fight. It's non-stop action for the start.

items.title: Funny Shooter - Destroy All
items.description: Funny Shooter - Destroy All is a first-person shooter game where you kill all of these orange men of different sizes and abilities. There are many types of weapons you can choose to kill the enemies. . Avoid enemy grenades and pitchforks. Dodge blows from clubs, axes, and chainsaws. Destroy enemies with a grenade launcher and a bazooka. Shoot them with machine guns and pistols. Protect yourself from the invasion of enemies and destroy them all!

items.title: Funny Shooter 2
items.description: Funny Shooter 2 is a funFPS gamewhere you fight hordes of absurd enemies! Use various weapons to slay these bizarre beings and upgrade your weapons arsenal as you progress.

items.title: Grandfather Road Chase: Shooter
items.description: Grandfather Road Chase Realistic Shooter is an adrenaline-pumping shooting game that challenges you to escape relentless pursuits using various weapons acquired throughout the game.

items.title: Gun Fu: Stickman 2
items.description: Gun Fu: Stickman 2 is a high-speed shooting game where you dual-wield pistols as a relentless stickman hero. You’ll face wave after wave of enemies in an intense, reflex-driven challenge that keeps getting faster. Unlock powerful weapons, customize your look, and prove you’ve got the aim and speed to survive the chaos.

items.title: Gun Master
items.description: Gun Master is a 2D shooting game that tests your reflexes and judgment. Each level pits you against multiple opponents that you must out-shoot to continue. Line up your shots carefully and don't miss, it might be your only chance!

items.title: Gunblood
items.description: This town isn’t big enough for the two of us, so draw! If you have ever wanted to be a part of a western duel, then look no further than Gunblood! Choose from one of ten wild west characters and attempt to outshoot your opponents! Nine rounds of intense, reaction based duels await you in this visceral game! After every successful duel, you are met with another, more challenging opponent and your odds of survival greatly decrease! Can you win every duel and prove that you are the best shot in town?

items.title: Guns of Rage
items.description: Guns of Rage is a 2D side-scrolling shooter game with action-packed gameplay, exciting levels, and character progression. Survive challenging maps full of enemy soldiers and combat vehicles. Beat cunning bosses and complete missions of 3 difficulty levels for valuable rewards that you can use to upgrade your weapons, skills, and character. Use boosters before each stage to increase your chance of success. Master an arsenal of powerful ranged and melee weapons to overcome the opposing army.

items.title: Hazmob FPS: Online Shooter
items.description: Hazmob FPS: Online Shooter is a multiplayer shooting FPS game where every second counts! Play against other players across multiple game modes in non-stop combat. This first-person shooter game is ideal for those seeking a bit of thrill.

items.title: Hyperblox Shooting
items.description: Hyperblox Shooting is a high-energy multiplayer shooter where every elimination upgrades your gear in real time. You’ll start with simple weapons and earn stronger firepower as you rack up victories. Stay sharp, adapt quickly, and use your momentum to climb the ranks. Each round challenges your reflexes and rewards your tactical decisions on the battlefield.

items.title: Idle Zombie Wave: Survivors
items.description: Idle Zombie Wave: Survivors is an intense idle survival strategy game where the undead are rising and only your leadership can turn the tide. As the world collapses under relentless zombie invasions, you must build and command a team of fearless survivors to hold the line. This defense game experience blends with tactical decisions, and chaotic zombie mayhem.

items.title: Iron Legion
items.description: Iron Legion is a fierce action game that puts you in command of powerful modern tanks. You’ll charge into explosive battles where strategy and precision decide victory. Customize your combat vehicle, outsmart rivals, and prove your skill on the battlefield. Every clash tests your courage as you rise toward becoming a true legend of armored warfare.

items.title: Jungle Deer Hunting
items.description: Jungle Deer Hunting is a first person shooter game that transports players to an African safari wildlife expedition, casting them within range of a variety of animals ready for the hunt. The objective is simple — shoot down a targeted number of animals throughout a series of landscapes, in some cases, using precision sniper skills. Not to worry, game developers have added targets on many of the animals, making distance shooting slightly more attainable.

items.title: Kirka.io
items.description: Kirka.io is an online FPS game with a voxelated art style. You can play teams, solo or parkour mode in a range of battle locations. Once you’ve picked a game, you can customize your weapons loadout to suit your playing style.

items.title: Knock Em All
items.description: Knock Em All is a simple action game where you take down waves of dummy targets with precise shots. Each level challenges you to knock them off the platform and send them tumbling into the abyss. With a realistic physics system and dynamic visuals, every hit feels satisfying. Can you clear every stage with perfect accuracy?

items.title: Laser Tanks
items.description: Laser Tanks is a fast-paced top-down shooter where you command powerful laser tanks to battle alien monsters across varied landscapes. Blast through waves of wild creatures using an arsenal of weapons, pilot advanced tanks, and dive into Dungeon Survivor Mode for endless action-packed challenges in this relentless alien showdown.

items.title: Lethal Sniper 3D: Army Soldier
items.description: In Lethal Sniper 3D, you become an elite sniper. Your job is to eliminate stationed enemies based on certain conditions. Can you advance further and become the one legendary sniper?

items.title: Mad GunS - Battle Royale
items.description: Mad GunS - Battle Royale is a wacky royal battle where chaos rules and anything can be a weapon. Arm yourself with bananas, handbags, or even hamster guns as you take on zombies, giant turkeys, and wild octopuses in outrageous online modes. Explore unique maps, craft your own levels, and fight to save Mr. Cat in this explosive pixel showdown.

items.title: Merge Rush Z
items.description: Merge Rush Z is a zombie shooter where you strategically merge powerful guns to lead a lethal girl squad against waves of the undead. Face diverse challenges as you confront zombies of varying sizes, speeds, and abilities, including formidable bosses. Engage in intense firing action, utilizing a mix of weapons, deadly items, and tactical wit to survive the relentless Zombie Outbreak. Tap, bang, and blast your way through the thrilling apocalypse!

items.title: Metal Guns Fury
items.description: Control the mightiest soldier and engage other enemies in a fast-paced shooting.

items.title: Mine Shooter: Save Your World
items.description: Mine Shooter: Save Your World is an FPS game where an army of enemies attacks the world of Minecraft. Use machine guns and pistols in your arsenal. Crush enemies with a shotgun. Blow them up with a grenade launcher and a bazooka. Destroy creepers before they explode. Dodge golems and endermen.

items.title: Miner's Fury!
items.description: Miner’s Fury is a frantic cave survival challenge where falling rocks are your greatest threat—and your ticket to power. Blast or freeze through waves of stone using upgradable turrets and your own evolving strength. Collect coins, complete missions, and stay sharp—those mystery rocks might just change everything. Can you outlast the fury underground?

items.title: Moon Clash Heroes
items.description: Moon Clash Heroes is a futuristic third-person shooter game with robot soldiers and other high-tech weapons, such as a Tesla-type lighting gun and strike bot. This game is part of the series, you can check out the other games, such asAirport Clash 3DandNinja Clash Heroesamong others.

items.title: Muscle Gun.IO
items.description: Muscle Gun.IO is a multiplayer shooting FPS game where you get over 55 customizable weapons, each with its own unique upgrades, so you can outgun your opponents and dominate the battlefield. Use your weapons and might to fight battles with other players. The more you win, the more you earn, so you can boost not only your gameplay but your stats as well. With intuitive controls and fast-paced maps, you can create custom matches or dive into modes like Team Deathmatch, Capture the Flag, and more.

items.title: Ninja Clash Heroes
items.description: Ninja Clash Heroes is a 3D shooter with a Japanese ninja theme. In this Clash 3D installment, you can choose from a range of heroes to fight the battle!

items.title: NOOB: Zombie Shooting
items.description: NOOB: Zombie Shooting is an action-packed arcade shooter where you help Nubik battle a horde of zombies in a cave. Upgrade your weapons, boost ammo, and unlock 'Butcher Mode' for invincibility. Collect zombie heads for rewards and survive waves of enemies with fun music setting the tone for the fight!

items.title: Online Robot Royale
items.description: Online Robot Royale is a high-speed shooting game where you enter 15-player elimination rounds with only one life to spare. Customize your robot's look before the match, then dive into intense, quick-fire battles where precision and agility rule. Track your stats, climb the leaderboards, and prove you’ve got what it takes to be the last robot standing.

items.title: Pilot Royale: Battlegrounds
items.description: Pilot Royale: Battlegrounds is a battle royale game where you can destroy all of the other airplanes in the arena to earn points. Prepare for an exhilarating airborne adventure as you become the ultimate pilot. Engage in intense battles and showcase your superior skills. With stunning 3D graphics and intuitive controls, blast through enemies with precision and speed. Customize your arsenal with unique fighter planes, weapons, and pilots, each equipped with special abilities. Upgrade your gear and strategize your defense to outmaneuver rival planes. Join or lead crews, participate in global crew wars, and claim incredible rewards. Experience thrilling air battles and prove yourself as the top pilot!

items.title: Pixel Combat: Zombies Strike
items.description: Pixel Combat: Zombies Strike is a thrilling pixel-style defense game where you hold the line inside a zombie-infested house. Armed with powerful weapons and hidden secrets, you must survive wave after wave, uncover secret rooms, and work toward building a time machine. Every location challenges your skills as you fight to secure humanity’s last hope for salvation.

items.title: Rift of Hell: Demons War
items.description: Rift of Hell: Demons War is an adrenaline-pumping FPS game where you battle through the depths of hell, facing relentless hordes of demons in hellish catacombs. Armed with various powerful weapons and an endless supply of ammo, your mission is to destroy every fiend in your way. As you descend closer to the citadel, you’ll collect gold from fallen enemies, which boosts your strength, speed, and firepower. You'll grow stronger with each step, upgrading your arsenal and armor to take on even deadlier creatures. Can you survive and conquer the demonic onslaught?

items.title: Rocket Clash 3D
items.description: Rocket Clash 3D is an amazing third-person shooter with awesome graphics and fun gameplay. In this title, you lead a force of resistance troopers who are trying to win back control of a secret missile base.

items.title: Serious Head
items.description: Serious Head is a shooting game where you must aggressively kill monsters to open a portal to another dimension and escape long-term imprisonment. With the fate of the universe in your hands, use your super abilities to kill, blow up, and trap hordes of monsters. Defeat all the bosses and save humanity!

items.title: Serious Head 2
items.description: Serious Head 2 is a third-person shooter game where you prepare for battle by rebuilding your base and upgrading your weapons. Gather your partners to aid you in putting up a strong resistance. Defend your base with strategic planning and relentless action in this thrilling sequel!

items.title: SkillWarz
items.description: SkillWarz is a fast-paced first-person shooter offering advanced movement mechanics and diverse game modes like Deathmatch, Gun Game, and Skull Hunt. Navigate through dynamic day and night maps featuring bounce pads, teleports, and battle pickups. Unlock unique classes, customize your gear, and challenge others or practice against bots in action-packed matches tailored to your style.

items.title: Sniper Attack 3D: Shooting War
items.description: Sniper Attack 3D: Shooting War is a shooting game where you shoot and kill all the enemy soldiers before they shoot you. Shoot choppers, vehicles, ammunition depots, or gas tankers to explode them and kill all the enemies nearby. Earn extra points by shooting the chest prize, but as soon as you shoot it, the enemy soldier will notice you and start shooting at you. Enemy soldiers will sometimes be wearing armored helmets and vests, which will be more difficult to kill. You will only have a limited amount of bullets, so, don't waste your them. Find effective methods to kill your enemies using as less bullets as possible. Let's commit to the action!

items.title: Sniper Clash 3D
items.description: Sniper Clash 3D is shooting game in the Clash 3D series. In this game, you control a character with a deadly sniper. Your mission is to capture the enemy team's flag and bring it back to your base. Use a tactical approach and dominate the battlefield!

items.title: Sniper Mission
items.description: Sniper Mission is a sniper game where you take on the role of a skilled sniper. Defend your nation against enemy forces, get ready to take on the world's deadliest foes, and show your true sniper skills!

items.title: Sniper Shot: Bullet Time
items.description: Sniper Shot: Bullet Time is a thrilling shooting sniper game that puts a powerful sniper rifle in your hands, challenging you to eliminate your enemies with precision and style. Line up your shot, and pull the trigger. Witness the intense, slow-motion bullet animation as it makes an impact. With each shot, you can experiment by targeting different parts of the enemy’s body, adding a layer of strategy to every kill.

items.title: Squirrel with a Gun!
items.description: Squirrel With a Gun! is a quirky arcade shooter where you take on the role of a checkered squirrel armed with awesome weaponry and acrobatic moves. Battle against nut-headed enemies, dodging in slow-motion parkour while you snatch up their precious nuts. Navigate exciting levels filled with hilarious enemies and outrageous challenges to earn rewards. Unleash the squirrel’s unique arsenal, perfect your aim, and help him become the ultimate nut-capturing champion!

items.title: Stickman and Guns
items.description: Stickman and Guns is a high-speed multiplayer platform shooter where you leap across rooftops, grab wild weapons, and outgun opponents in intense PvP arenas. Every second demands quick reflexes and sharper aim. You’ll face real players in fast, chaotic battles—so stay agile, think fast, and fight your way to the top.

items.title: Stickman Prison: Counter Assault
items.description: There is chaos in the prison complex. Choose your side, and lead your team to victory in this stickman shooting game.

items.title: Stickman Zombie 3D
items.description: You are a lonely stickman. Shoot and eliminate zombies and other stickman enemies!

items.title: Subway Clash 2
items.description: Subway Clash 2 is a 3Dthird-person shootergame with a soviet theme. Fight intense battles in a derelict subway using a variety of weapons and tactics. This game is the second installment afterSubway Clash.

items.title: Subway Clash Remastered
items.description: Subway Clash Remastered is a simple and fun third-person shooter game. It is the remastered version of Subway Clash 3D. Lead your team of elite Marines to victory against the reds by taking down as many as you can!

items.title: Team Fluffy Online
items.description: Team Fluffy Online is a fast-paced multiplayer shooter where cute but deadly animals battle it out in wild arenas! Choose from a roster of furry characters, each with unique abilities, and arm yourself with a shotgun, pistol, or bat to take down the opposing team. Inspired by genre classics like Team Fortress, but with a playful twist, this game combines tactical team play with chaotic action.

items.title: Time Shooter
items.description: Time Shooter is anFPS gamewhere time only moves when you move. When you are inactive, the world slows down almost to a stop, like inSUPERHOT. You can look around and plan your further actions. Dodge bullets in slow motion and crush all the enemies without taking damage! Check outTime Shooter 2for the sequel.

items.title: Time Shooter 2
items.description: Time Shooter 2 is a first-person shooter where time stands still until you move. Plan your shots and moves carefully. Dodge enemy fire in epic slo-mo combat and make your way around the map using time to your advantage.

items.title: Time Shooter 3: SWAT
items.description: Time Shooter 3: SWAT is a shooting FPS game where your movement affects time. It is the sequel toTime Shooter 2and takes inspiration from the game SuperHot. Dodge enemy attacks and skillfully take down enemies using time as your ultimate weapon.

items.title: Toilets Worms Shooter
items.description: Toilets Worms Shooter is an FPS game where you kill mutated toilet worm monsters until none are left. Each enemy is unique and requires a different approach to be destroyed. Buy new weapons or upgrade existing ones to make it easier for you to kill all the monsters. Get ready for this exciting and unpredictable action game!

items.title: Vegas Clash 3D
items.description: Vegas Clash 3D is a 3D third-person shooter set at a Las Vegas casino. Rob the casino like a true rock' n’ roll legend while exchanging plenty of bullets with officers looking to chase you down.

items.title: Vortex 9
items.description: Vortex 9 is a fast-paced shooter packed with stylish heroes, wild weapons, and chaotic battles. Choose from eight quirky characters like Mr. Goodboy or Jess Purrfect, and unleash insane firepower with unconventional guns and melee weapons. Dive into thrilling modes like Team Battle and Capture Point across stunning maps. Team up with friends and dominate the battlefield!

items.title: Warfare Area
items.description: In Warfare Area, you take a role as a solo soldier that needs to wipe out all the enemy soldiers in the facility.

items.title: Warzone Armor
items.description: Warzone Armor is a multiplayer shooting action game where two teams fight to the death. Your mission is to drive into enemy territory, destroy their units, and earn points for your team. The team with the highest score at the end of the match claims victory. With fast-paced action and strategic gameplay, Warzone Armor delivers intense vehicular combat like never before!

items.title: Western Shooter: Battle Gun Duel
items.description: Western Shooter: Battle Gun Duel is a thrilling Wild West adventure where you, as the Sheriff, must outshoot criminals in tense standoffs. Upgrade your revolver and sharpen your reflexes as you hunt down outlaws in eerie ghost towns. Every duel tests your speed and accuracy, making each victory a hard-earned badge of honor.

items.title: Wild Hunter 3D
items.description: Wild Hunter 3D is an action-packed hunting simulation game that takes you on an immersive adventure into the wilderness. Your mission is to track and hunt various wild animals, including bears, crocodiles, deer, buffalo, and wolves. With 100 challenging levels set across three distinct game worlds such as dense forests, icy tundras, and arid deserts, you'll experience a variety of environments that test your skills and strategy.

items.title: Winter Clash 3D
items.description: Winter Clash 3D is a Christmas-themed shooting game in the Clash 3D series. You’re fighting on Santa’s team against a gang of disobedient elves. Rack up as many kills as you can to make it to the top of the leaderboard.

items.title: You vs 100 Skibidi Toilets
items.description: You vs 100 Skibidi Toilets is a shooting game where you become a legendary Cameraman on an epic adventure to annihilate a horde of 100 Skibidi Toilets! Armed with a deadly arsenal, you'll face relentless battles against the invading foes. Earn coins to unlock powerful weapons and customize your appearance, exuding style on the battlefield. Beware, the Skibidi Toilets won't relent; they'll attack from all angles, testing your weapon skills and reaction speed. Will you emerge victorious, destroying all Skibidi Toilets and earning the title of a true hero? Unleash the Cameraman within, take on the horde, and showcase your prowess in this action-packed shooting game!

items.title: Zeppelin Assault
items.description: Zeppelin Assault is a wave-based survival game with roguelite elements placed just above the trenches of the western front during World War I. The battlefield evolves as the days pass. Zeppelin will automatically be upgraded as you gain experience by taking down the opposing planes. Be warned, each wave brings more planes with more experience of their own! Choose which force you wish to play as, Central Powers, Allied Powers, or both!

items.title: Zombie Clash 3D: Halloween
items.description: Zombie Clash 3D is a Halloween themed third-person shooting game. Fight against a team of zombies with guns at a creepy old circus!

items.title: Zombie Hunter
items.description: Zombie Hunter is an FPS game where you have to kill all the zombies to survive in the post-apocalypse wasteland. Shoot the undead and save humanity in this zombie survival game! Grab your firearm, aim at every walking dead, and kill zombies to prevent the end of the world.

items.title: Zombie Hunters Online
items.description: Zombie Hunters Online is a shooting horror zombie survival game where you team up with other players to take on the undead. Arm yourself with an arsenal of powerful weapons and pick up game-changing buffs scattered across the map to strengthen your chances of survival. This is a multiplayer game where you work together to strategize to fend off hordes of zombies to stay alive as it gets more and more challenging.

items.title: Zombie Outbreak Arena
items.description: Zombie Outbreak Arena is an endless zombie survival game. Get points as you shoot down zombies and use them to upgrade your character to make him stronger.

items.title: Zombie World
items.description: Zombie World is an intense shooter game where your survival depends on eliminating hordes of zombies. As chaos reigns and security becomes a distant memory, test your courage and skills to shoot down the undead. Engage in a relentless battle and discover how far you will push yourself to stay alive in a gripping zombie apocalypse.

items.title: ZombieCraft
items.description: ZombieCraft is a third-person shooting game where you must survive the zombie wave. This game features intense zombie shooting in a vast blocky world. You are the only person alive, and your mission is to use different types of weapons to shoot all incoming zombies.

items.title: Zomblox
items.description: Zomblox is a pixel-packed FPS where meme madness meets zombie survival in a school under siege. Battle through classrooms, pools, and secret vents as you face off against undead classmates—and the zombified teacher herself. Complete missions, uncover hidden secrets, grab wild weapon skins, and rescue your friends in this chaotic, meme-fueled shooter.

items.title: A Small World Cup
items.description: A Small World Cup is a fun mini-soccer sports game where you control a rag doll and slam it against the arena to make the ball score a goal. You can choose between competitions like the World Cup, Europe Clubs, Cup America, etc. Pick your favorite team, and make your way through the tournament. Get ready to slam your character and score your way to the finals!

items.title: Bad Soccer Manager
items.description: Bad Soccer Manager is a 2D sports game in which you are in charge as a soccer manager with various responsibilities to help raise your team's position to the top!

items.title: Bicycle Kick Champ
items.description: Bicycle Kick Champ is an arcade game where you have one purpose - bicycle kick the ball into the goal! Time your shots perfectly to make sure they aren't blocked and aim to get the highest score as you keep hitting those passes into the net.

items.title: CarBall.io
items.description: CarBall.io is an adrenaline-packed fusion of soccer and high-speed sports driving game reminiscent of Rocket League. Rev up your engines and dive into intense matches to dominate the leagues. Unlock, purchase, and upgrade your cars to reign supreme in this thrilling automotive showdown. Gear up and become the ultimate champion of CarBall.io!

items.title: CG FC 25
items.description: CG FC 25 is a dynamic soccer simulation game that lets you lead your favorite teams to victory. With intuitive joystick controls, sprint and kick features, and realistic 3D stadiums, you'll immerse yourself in intense matches. Choose from Quick Match or Tournament modes, customize your player, and experience the thrill of football in a vibrant, HD arena.

items.title: Drop Kick: World Cup
items.description: Drop Kick: World Cup 2018 is an awesome soccer game that will help you prepare for the upcoming football world cup in Russia! Instead of playing a full 90 minutes of football, you can instead take part in a cool penalty shootout tournament with other teams from around the world!

items.title: Fiveheads Soccer
items.description: Fiveheads Soccer is an exhilarating sports soccer game that invites players to select their favorite nation from the 'FiveHeads' roster and showcase their skills on the pitch. Boasting 32 world-class teams and 64 unique players, this game offers an immersive World Cup experience. Players can engage in challenging matches in 1 vs. 1 or 2 vs. 2 modes, turning the arena into their playground. Whether playing solo or teaming up with friends, players can dive into the thrill of soccer, showcasing their skills on the virtual pitch. With no fouls and no limits, it's time to kick off the ultimate soccer showdown!

items.title: Foot Battle Ball
items.description: Foot Battle Ball is a strategic soccer challenge where you face up to seven defenders at once. With limited kicks per round, every move counts. Outsmart your opponents with precision and quick reflexes to secure victory. Featuring a fresh twist on classic football, this game offers intuitive one-finger gameplay and fast-paced action. Can you outplay them all?

items.title: Foot Chinko
items.description: Welcome to Foot Chinko. Harold Hothead will narrate your epic progression in all of the 94 matches of this soccer game. Which trophies from the trophy case can you conquer?

items.title: Foot Chinko: Russia 2018
items.description: Foot Chinko: Russia 2018 is the virtual version of the family favorite soccer game – Foot Chinko! This is the 2018 world cup version and you get to play with your favorite nations. If you have never played foot chinko before, firstly where have you been! Secondly you are in for a treat!

items.title: Free Kick Classic (3D Free Kick)
items.description: Free Kick Classic (3D Free Kick) is an immersive sports soccer game that puts your precision and skill to the ultimate test. Step up to the pitch as you take on the challenge of firing free kicks from a variety of positions, each one more difficult than the last. With stunning 3D graphics and lifelike physics, every shot feels realistic, giving you the thrill of being in a high-stakes match. Your goal is to perfectly execute your free kicks with just three attempts, but as you advance, the obstacles and defensive walls become increasingly difficult to overcome. The pressure mounts with each shot, and only the sharpest players will rise to the occasion.

items.title: Free Kick Underground
items.description: Free Kick Underground is a simple arcade sports game where you must aim and power your kick to score a goal in 1 kick. Try to collect coins on each level to unlock customizable outfits, but don't forget that your main goal is to kick the ball into the goalpost. Try to complete all 60 levels available. The game might look simple, but it will be challenging as you go. Good luck!

items.title: International Super Animal Soccer
items.description: International Super Animal Soccer is a sports game for you, a soccer lover! The animal kingdom is excited about the world cup, so they decided to make their own tournament! Dribble, pass, shoot, and explode your adversaries in this cute world cup inspired soccer game! Challenge your friends in a fun and quick exhibition match! The game is playable as a single-player or local competitive multiplayer. Be the next International Super Animal World Cup winner!

items.title: Kick Soccer Hero
items.description: Kick Soccer Hero is a fast-paced sports-inspired game that will have you taking shots, dodging defenders, and scoring epic goals with style. You’ll master wild kicks, clever passes, and intense penalty moments in action-packed matches. Every flick counts, so show off your skills and become the soccer hero your team needs.

items.title: King of Street Soccer
items.description: King of Street Soccer is a fast-paced one-tap platformer where your timing is everything. Run, jump, and dodge through challenging levels packed with obstacles and tricky enemies, all while chasing the perfect goal shot. Travel from Brazil to Japan in story mode, unlock trophies, and prove you’ve got what it takes to join the elite.

items.title: Mini-Caps: Soccer
items.description: Mini-Caps: Soccer is a sports game perfect for playing with a friend. Prepare for endless laughter and unforgettable moments with ragdoll physics and funny characters. Challenge your friends in this minimalistic, fun game with unique locations, and balls featuring various modifiers. Enjoy 20 single player levels, a 2-player mode, convenient controls, and charming minimalistic graphics. Get ready for a comedic adventure on the football field!

items.title: Mini Car Ball
items.description: Mini Car Ball is a high-energy 2D top-down sports car soccer game where agility and strategy collide in thrilling 1v1 matches. Command a nimble vehicle, using precise driving and clever maneuvers to outplay your rival and score spectacular goals. You can play by yourself or with your friend locally. Mini Car Ball delivers intense soccer action with a unique twist, perfect for solo challenges and exciting 2-players fun!

items.title: Pegball FRVR
items.description: Pegball FRVR is a 1 player soccer arcade game to control the peg figures and win the match!

items.title: Penalty Kick Wiz
items.description: Penalty Kick Wiz is a penalty shooter arcade game to kick the soccer ball and shoot to the scoring goal. Become a master of penalty shooters!

items.title: Penalty Rivals
items.description: Penalty Rivals is a sports penalty soccer game where you face off against rivals in a high-stakes penalty shootout league. Your shooting and goalkeeping skills will be put to the ultimate test in this game. Can you climb your way to the top of the leaderboard and claim victory?

items.title: Penalty Shooters
items.description: Penalty Shooters is a mouse-only soccer penalty game where you have to alternate between the role of a striker (to take penalties) and goalkeeper (to stop penalties).

items.title: Penalty Shooters 2
items.description: Penalty Shooters 2 is a soccer game where you shoot penalties in a fantasy league of your choice. You must alternate between the shooter and the goalkeeper in intense penalty shootouts. Win the match to continue in the league and take your shot at becoming the champion.

items.title: Penalty Shooters 3
items.description: Penalty Shooters 3 is a sports soccer game that gives you all the excitement of those final shots into just one game! You get to be both the shooter and the goalkeeper, so you can both nail the perfect shot and make the game-changing save. The game offers two dynamic modes: Tier Mode, where you’ll climb through six increasingly challenging tiers, and the prestigious World Cup, where you’ll compete in iconic arenas to prove if you're ready for the big leagues. Personalize your team with unique jerseys and unlock over 250 teams. With adaptive AI that becomes more skilled as you advance, power-ups to enhance your performance, and achievements to unlock, every match feels like a nail-biting finale.

items.title: Penalty Shootout: Multi League
items.description: Participate in different fantasy leagues and prove your penalty skills! After picking a league, you can freely choose a favorite team. In the game, you take turns as a penalty kicker and as a goalkeeper. When playing as a kicker, there are 3 moving indicators to adjust the ball's direction, height, and speed. While player as the keeper, you just need to click the target indicator on time. Can you write soccer history in Penalty Shootout: Multi League?

items.title: PSG Soccer Freestyle
items.description: PSG Soccer Freestyle is a sports soccer game to unleash your freestyle tricks. Take on the challenge of showcasing your best moves alongside more than 10 official PSG Stars. Play for the highest scores as you enjoy the thrill of this official PSG game. Join Messi, Mbappé, Neymar, and other PSG Stars on the field and immerse yourself in an essential gaming experience for soccer and sports fans. Get ready to dominate with Paris Saint-Germain!

items.title: Ragdoll Soccer 2 Players
items.description: Ragdoll Soccer: 2 Players is a sports soccer game that delivers the ultimate blend of soccer and chaos, where wobbly ragdoll physics takes over the field for hilarious and unpredictable gameplay! Step into the shoes (or, more accurately, the floppy limbs) of a stickman player and take on the challenge solo or face off against a friend in intense local multiplayer. With a variety of modes like Championship, Penalty Shootout, and single-player, there's never a dull moment.

items.title: Rooney On The Rampage
items.description: Rooney on the Rampage is an arcade game that lets you play as Wayne Rooney. He was thrown a red card, and he isn't too happy about that, so he goes on a rampage, with anyone in the way just a target for his headbutt. The key to this game is to time your headbutts perfectly to keep your momentum going.

items.title: Santa vs Skritch
items.description: Santa Vs Skritch is a sports game where holiday cheers battle the notorious party pooper Skritch. Engage in an epic match, competing for presents, outscoring your opponent, and beating the clock. Challenge friends or the AI to decide the triumph between merriment and mischief. Who will emerge victorious in this yuletide showdown? Only you can determine the outcome!

items.title: Scoring Champion
items.description: Scoring Champion is a dynamic sports game where you take on multiple disciplines like soccer, basketball, American football, and more. Your objective is to score with precision and power, hitting targets at each level. Earn coins for every successful shot and use them to upgrade your skills, equipment, and boost your earnings as you aim to become the ultimate champion!

items.title: Soccer Arena X
items.description: Soccer Arena X is an explosive arcade football showdown where you tackle leagues, face rivals, and unleash chaotic power-ups. Play solo in Career Mode to conquer 15 leagues or challenge a friend in intense 2-player duels. Freeze opponents, strike with lightning, and upgrade crazy bonuses to rule the pitch and become a true arena legend.

items.title: Soccer Bros
items.description: Soccer Bros is a fast-paced soccer game that delivers the ultimate adrenaline rush with its one-on-one soccer battles! Choose from a diverse lineup of quirky and dynamic characters, each bringing their unique flair to the field.

items.title: Soccer Dash
items.description: Soccer Dash is a casual soccer game where you play as the ball. Aim and control the soccer ball around obstacles and other players trying to obstruct you until the end. The game will go into a slow-motion state when you choose the direction of the kick, so take your time.

items.title: Soccer Duel
items.description: Soccer Duel is an exciting arcade game in the style of table soccer. You can play in a single-player mode or play with your friend on the same device or over the network.

items.title: European Football Quiz
items.description: Football & Quiz: Soccer Quiz is a game for football enthusiasts who want to test their knowledge while having fun. You get to guess the logos of famous football clubs, remember the years they were founded, and identify the winners of Champions Cups. The quiz covers a wide range of topics, from iconic teams and stadiums to historical trivia. With over 30 leagues to explore, this game is perfect for anyone who loves football and wants to learn more about the world's most popular sport. Test your skills and become a football trivia champion!

items.title: Soccer Legends 2021
items.description: Soccer Legends 2021 is a sports soccertwo-playergame and the newest installment in the widely popular Soccer Legends series by MadPuffers, bringing the excitement of fast-paced soccer action to the next level. Packed with fresh updates, this game introduces a variety of new players and teams, each with their own unique skills and playing styles. Whether you’re a seasoned fan of the series or a newcomer, Soccer Legends 2021 offers a dynamic and entertaining experience that combines arcade-style gameplay with competitive strategy. Play solo against AI or challenge your friend to a 1-on-1 match!

items.title: Soccer Masters: Euro 2020
items.description: Soccer Masters Euro 2020 is a fun sports game where you can play as your favorite soccer team and compete against other teams in challenging soccer matches, solo or with friends. Show your best ball-kicking moves! The gameplay is simple, and the graphics and sound effects give the game a great atmosphere.

items.title: Soccer Merge
items.description: Soccer Merge is a fun and casual football game where you combine strategy and skill to build the ultimate team. The goal of the game is to earn money by winning competitions, attract the best players to your side, and create your ideal football team. Prove you're the best athlete and coach by passing challenges, scoring more goals than your opponents, and assembling the strongest squad. Compete in exciting online tournaments against players worldwide, testing your tactics and reflexes. As a coach, buy new players, upgrade them, and unlock special football attributes in the unique merge gameplay. With an in-depth development system, multiple tactical schemes, and regular championships with valuable prizes, Soccer Merge offers endless football action and strategic fun!

items.title: Soccer Random
items.description: Soccer Random is a two-player pixel-art soccer game with limited controls but unlimited randomness. Players hop and kick on the pitch with just one click, trying to score a goal with limited movement. You can choose a one-player game against the computer or two-player with a friend as your opponent.

items.title: Sports Minibattles
items.description: Sports Mini Battles is a brilliant collection of sports-based games. You can either play against an AI computer opponent or your friend using split controls. There are four different sports games to play. During each game, you must try and beat your opponent in an intense sports match.

items.title: Soccer Heads
items.description: Soccer Heads is a funtwo-playersoccer game featuring famous UK football teams. Play solo against the computer or two-player with a friend. There are various extras and power-ups!

items.title: Stormy Kicker
items.description: Stormy Kicker is a one-buttonpenaltykicking game. Who's the best football striker in the world? You could be the one if you take your team to the World cup title.

items.title: Street Freekick 3D
items.description: Show your best penalty kicking skill and control the ball directly into the goal net!

items.title: Tracesoccer
items.description: Tracesoccer is a modern adaptation of the classic pen-and-paper strategy game, also known as paper soccer or paper hockey. It blends strategic planning with the thrill of competition in a turn-based format, offering exciting gameplay for both casual players and competitive strategists. Whether you’re playing against friends, AI, or online opponents, the challenge is to outmaneuver your rival to score the winning goal!

items.title: Unmatched Ego
items.description: Unmatched Ego is a fast-paced 3v3 third-person soccer showdown where skill and style rule the pitch. Compete online or train offline, mastering sharp dribbles, slick tackles, and curved shots. Customize your soccer legend with special looks and celebrations, and prove your mastery in high-energy matches that demand precision and flair.

items.title: 100 Meters Race
items.description: 100 Meters Race is a fantastic game of athletics and running! You must compete in the fastest race on earth – the 100m sprint! You are running against other opponents and must try to outpace them and win in record time.

items.title: 3D Bowling
items.description: 3D Bowling is a sports bowling game where you can practice your bowling skill on your own or against an opponent. The visuals of this game are so familiar, you will feel like you're wearing rented bowling shoes and about to order a pretzel and soda.

items.title: 8 Ball Billiards Classic
items.description: 8-Ball Billiards is a free online pool game in our sports category, ideal for one or two players. You can play solo against AI or challenge other players in two-player mode. The game is easy for anyone to play, so pick up a cue and line up your first shot.

items.title: 8 Ball Pool Billiards Multiplayer
items.description: 8 Ball Pool Billiards Multiplayer is a competitive sports pool game that lets you test your skills in exhilarating 2-player matches against friends or go head-to-head with players from around the world. Perfect your game by competing against expert bots to sharpen your strategies and techniques. Whether you’re aiming to outwit a friend or conquer global rivals, every shot counts in your quest to become the ultimate billiards champion.

items.title: A Small World Cup
items.description: A Small World Cup is a fun mini-soccer sports game where you control a rag doll and slam it against the arena to make the ball score a goal. You can choose between competitions like the World Cup, Europe Clubs, Cup America, etc. Pick your favorite team, and make your way through the tournament. Get ready to slam your character and score your way to the finals!

items.title: Air Hockey Cup
items.description: Air Hockey Cup is an addictive sports title that plays like a classic table hockey game where your aim is key, and mastering your puck control can make or break your game.

items.title: Archery Master
items.description: Archery Master is a 3D sports game that delivers a realistic archery experience, amazing animation, and simple controls. Shoot an arrow at the target to pass the level. Will you be the best archer or bowman?

items.title: Archery World Tour
items.description: Archery World Tour is a fantastic 3D archery game with realistic graphics and fun archery gameplay. Test your archery skills and prove that you have what it takes to wield a bow and arrow!

items.title: Athletic Runners: Idle Clicker
items.description: Athletic Runner is a dynamic training and racing game where you coach a team of eager runners to victory. Build their strength through targeted training, then test their skills in thrilling races for the grand prize. With smooth gameplay, a vibrant toony style and engaging levels, your leadership will turn them into champions.

items.title: Bad Soccer Manager
items.description: Bad Soccer Manager is a 2D sports game in which you are in charge as a soccer manager with various responsibilities to help raise your team's position to the top!

items.title: Base Jump Wing Suit Flying
items.description: Base Jump Wing Suit Flying is a thrilling sports game that lets you unleash your wings and experience the exhilaration of flying like never before! Take part in epic extreme sports adventures as you use your wingsuit to jump and soar through breathtaking environments. Challenge yourself to beat your high scores and fly as far as you can. With simple one-touch controls, navigate through the skies and earn money to unlock upgrades for even more impressive results. Get ready for the ultimate arcade flight experience in Base Jump Wing Suit Flying!

items.title: Baseball Pro
items.description: Baseball Pro is a sports game to become a pro baseballer and hit all the incoming ball to get high scores!

items.title: Basket Battle
items.description: Basket Battle is a dynamic sports basketball game where you aim to outscore your opponent by skillfully throwing the ball into the basket. Challenge your reflexes as you intercept your rival's shots and maintain control over the game: master timing and precision to dominate the court and secure victory in intense matches.

items.title: Basket Champs
items.description: Basket Champs is a fun basketball game! Pick your favorite team and compete in the tournament by scoring more points than your opponents.

items.title: Basket Monsterz
items.description: Basket Monsterz is an awesome basketball shooting game with fun cartoon monster characters! You can play as a wide range of monsters including Satan and Bigfoot. Get in the game and see if you can win.

items.title: Basket Random
items.description: Basket Random is a chaotic 2-player arcade sports game with unpredictable physics. Bounce and battle for the ball across wild courts, with each dunk launching you to the next level!

items.title: Basket Slam Dunk 2
items.description: Just likeTap Tap Shots, in Basket Slam Dunk 2, you need to successfully dunk the basketball into the ring. The physics element makes the game more challenging!

items.title: Basket Swooshes Plus
items.description: Basket Swooshes Plus is a sports basketball game where you must be the first to score 11 points to win. Get ready to step onto the virtual court and shoot some hoops in the competitive basketball match. Test your shooting skills and win the competition!

items.title: Basketball Clash
items.description: Basketball Clash is the ultimate basketball game that brings together players from around the globe, providing endless entertainment. Showcase your talent and rise among the top 100 basketball shooters worldwide. Prepare for exhilarating competitions where your agility, logic, and strategic thinking will determine your triumph. Prove your skills and dominate the court!

items.title: Basketball FRVR
items.description: Basketball FRVR is a great new basketball game that you can play on any device. This Basketball Hoop Shooter is simple to learn but a lot of fun. There is no time limit in the game, but the moving basket is a challenge even for experienced players! This means that you can play Basketball FRVR for as long as you want. There are bonus points if you don't hit the rim. The game is made by Chris Benjaminsen. Have fun!

items.title: Basketball League
items.description: Basketball League is an arcade basketball sports game where you must aim and shoot to score. If you want relaxing gameplay, you can try the Free Throw mode. If you want to challenge yourself, you can play the Timed Practice mode. If you want to show your skill and prove yourself to others, play the Online mode so everybody will know how talented you are!

items.title: Basketball Legends 2020
items.description: Basketball Legends 2020 is the popular sequel toBasketball Stars 2019. This two-player basketball game lets you play as iconic basketball players like Luka Doncic, James Harden, and LeBron James in bobblehead form!

items.title: Basketball Orbit
items.description: Basketball Orbit is an exhilarating sports basketball simulation game in our sports category, where you aim to launch basketballs to unbelievable heights, even beyond Earth’s atmosphere! Take on thrilling one-shot basketball challenges, conquer tricky levels, and perfect your shooting technique. Compete to become the ultimate basketball legend in this fun and unique basketball adventure!

items.title: Basketball Serial Shooter
items.description: Basketball Serial Shooter is an arcade basketball game where you must throw the ball into the basket before the time runs out. Try to make as many points as you can on each play. Good luck!

items.title: Basketball Skills
items.description: Basketball Skills is the basketball arcade game in which you must try to score baskets in all the different game modes available. You can play either arcade, time attack, and distance mode. Arcade mode gives you 10 balls to use; you must continue to score baskets although it becomes harder each time you score.

items.title: Basketball Stars
items.description: Basketball Stars is a 2-player basketball game by Madpuffers where you hit the court as legends like LeBron James, Stephen Curry, and James Harden. Play solo, team up with a friend or challenge them in fast-paced hoops action!

items.title: Basketball Superstars
items.description: Basketball Superstars is a dynamic basketball experience where you create and train your ultimate player. Customize your gear, enhance your skills, and face intense rivals in fast-paced matches. Whether you are outsmarting opponents or perfecting your strategy, each game delivers action and excitement as you strive to dominate the court and showcase your prowess.

items.title: BasketBros
items.description: BasketBros is a fast-paced basketball game that offers both online and offline gameplay. Choose a player, customize your style, and compete in single-player and multiplayer games.

items.title: Billiards
items.description: Billiards is a sports game where you can play 2 types of billiards game which is 8 ball or straight pool. You can play by yourself, with 2 players, or with the computer.

items.title: Billiards Pool 8
items.description: Pool 8 is a famous billiard variety. The goal of the game is to score all the balls of one group (either “striped” or “solid”), and at the end to score the ball with the number 8. Whoever does this, they become the winner of the game.

items.title: Blast Billiards
items.description: Blast Billiards is a sports game where you clear bombs in 100 seconds by putting them in the holes with a billiard stick.

items.title: Blast Billiards 4
items.description: Blast Billiards 4: The Bombs Are Back in Town is the fourth episode of the famous classic Blast Billiards series. Clear all the bomb balls before the time expires in 15 exciting levels!

items.title: Bowlin' Go FRVR
items.description: Bowlin' Go FRVR is a bowling game that is relatively simple - you just keep throwing your ball to drop those bowling pins. Each pin you drop becomes a point added to your total score, but the moment your ball hits nothing, then it's game over. You can also gain coins and bonuses if one of them pops up in the playing field - just hit them with your ball to gain their effect. Just make sure to have pins to hit before aiming though so you don't waste the throw.

items.title: Bowling Champion
items.description: Bowling Champion is a sports bowling game where you can test your accuracy skill. Choose between 2 game modes, which are Cup Game mode, where you must beat your opponent to win the game, and Trickshot Challenge mode, where you must drop all the bowling pins in a tricky situation. Choose your favorite cute animal character, master your throw, and experience the fun of sending pins flying. Aim for the perfect strike and be the ultimate bowling champion!

items.title: Bowman
items.description: Bowman is an archery game where you and an opponent take shots at each other. You win when you’ve hit the opponent fatally. It can take a few arrows. Bowman can be played against the computer or via local multiplayer.

items.title: Boxing 3D
items.description: Boxing 3D is a straightforward yet true-to-form boxing experience that packs a punch with powerful 3D visuals. Step into the ring and unleash your skills using intuitive controls designed for nonstop action. Feel every hit, dodge, and knockout as you climb your way to victory in this sleek, no-frills boxing showdown.

items.title: Boxing Random
items.description: Boxing Random is a fun 2-player sports action ragdoll physics boxing game that throws unpredictable twists into every round! Each match comes with its own unique challenges, from shifting arenas to unexpected power-ups, keeping you on your toes. The goal is simple: be the first to land 5 points and claim victory. But with constantly changing features, you’ll need quick reflexes and precision to outsmart your opponent and land the perfect punch. Adapt, strike with as much accuracy as possible, and when in doubt, just enjoy the chaos!

items.title: Boxing Stars
items.description: Boxing Stars is a 2D fighting game featuring several characters and tournaments to fight in. Choose your fighter and punch, dodge, and block your way to the championship. Upgrade your stats with the money you earn.

items.title: CarBall.io
items.description: CarBall.io is an adrenaline-packed fusion of soccer and high-speed sports driving game reminiscent of Rocket League. Rev up your engines and dive into intense matches to dominate the leagues. Unlock, purchase, and upgrade your cars to reign supreme in this thrilling automotive showdown. Gear up and become the ultimate champion of CarBall.io!

items.title: CG FC 25
items.description: CG FC 25 is a dynamic soccer simulation game that lets you lead your favorite teams to victory. With intuitive joystick controls, sprint and kick features, and realistic 3D stadiums, you'll immerse yourself in intense matches. Choose from Quick Match or Tournament modes, customize your player, and experience the thrill of football in a vibrant, HD arena.

items.title: Cornhole League
items.description: Cornhole League is a thrilling twist on the classic backyard game where you aim, toss, and score your way to victory. Compete in intense matches, join tournaments, and showcase your flair with customizable boards and bags. Explore stunning venues, from cozy backyards to grand stadiums. Perfect your toss and rise to cornhole greatness!

items.title: Crazy Flips 3D
items.description: Crazy Flips 3D is an awesome sports game to do perfect flips, such as frontflips, backflips, and gainer tricks from high cliffs.

items.title: Cricket FRVR
items.description: Become a cricket master and hit all the incoming balls successfully in this one-button cricket game.

items.title: Cricket Superstar League
items.description: Cricket Superstar League is a fun 3D cricket game. Pick your favorite team and win all the matches.

items.title: Cricket World Cup
items.description: Pick your favorite world cup cricket team and hit all the incoming balls to get as many scores as you can.

items.title: Darts Club
items.description: Darts Club is a competitive game where you can sharpen your dart-throwing skills and customize your equipment. Unlock new dart parts like barrels and shafts, upgrade them to boost performance, and climb the ranks in thrilling matches. Master your throws to dominate opponents, unlock new venues, and aim for the ultimate title of Worldwide Dart Champion!

items.title: Drop Kick: World Cup
items.description: Drop Kick: World Cup 2018 is an awesome soccer game that will help you prepare for the upcoming football world cup in Russia! Instead of playing a full 90 minutes of football, you can instead take part in a cool penalty shootout tournament with other teams from around the world!

items.title: Drunken Boxing
items.description: Drunken Boxing is a fun sports action ragdoll boxing game that delivers an unpredictable twist on traditional sports gaming. See the chaos that happens when two boxers play when they are a little tipsy in the ring. With its whimsical physics and outrageous character movements, you'll discover that landing a solid punch is far more challenging than it appears—after all, your inebriated state keeps you stumbling and swaying.

items.title: Epic Basketball
items.description: Epic Basketball is an entertaining arcade-style basketball game with crazy characters.

items.title: ESPN Arcade Baseball
items.description:
Time for some baseball fun! ESPN Arcade Baseball has 2 different modes: Precision Hitter and Bottom of the Ninth. In Precision Hitter the goal is to score as many points as you can in 10 pitches. To score points you need to land the ball as close to the center of the target as possible. In Bottom of the Ninth, your team is 2 runs down. Your job is to come back and win with only 3 outs left!
    This game was produced by ESPN Arcade.

items.title: Field Goal FRVR
items.description: Field Goal FRVR is an arcade game to kick the balls and score field goals!

items.title: Fiveheads Soccer
items.description: Fiveheads Soccer is an exhilarating sports soccer game that invites players to select their favorite nation from the 'FiveHeads' roster and showcase their skills on the pitch. Boasting 32 world-class teams and 64 unique players, this game offers an immersive World Cup experience. Players can engage in challenging matches in 1 vs. 1 or 2 vs. 2 modes, turning the arena into their playground. Whether playing solo or teaming up with friends, players can dive into the thrill of soccer, showcasing their skills on the virtual pitch. With no fouls and no limits, it's time to kick off the ultimate soccer showdown!

items.title: Foot Battle Ball
items.description: Foot Battle Ball is a strategic soccer challenge where you face up to seven defenders at once. With limited kicks per round, every move counts. Outsmart your opponents with precision and quick reflexes to secure victory. Featuring a fresh twist on classic football, this game offers intuitive one-finger gameplay and fast-paced action. Can you outplay them all?

items.title: Foot Chinko
items.description: Welcome to Foot Chinko. Harold Hothead will narrate your epic progression in all of the 94 matches of this soccer game. Which trophies from the trophy case can you conquer?

items.title: Free Kick Classic (3D Free Kick)
items.description: Free Kick Classic (3D Free Kick) is an immersive sports soccer game that puts your precision and skill to the ultimate test. Step up to the pitch as you take on the challenge of firing free kicks from a variety of positions, each one more difficult than the last. With stunning 3D graphics and lifelike physics, every shot feels realistic, giving you the thrill of being in a high-stakes match. Your goal is to perfectly execute your free kicks with just three attempts, but as you advance, the obstacles and defensive walls become increasingly difficult to overcome. The pressure mounts with each shot, and only the sharpest players will rise to the occasion.

items.title: Free Kick Underground
items.description: Free Kick Underground is a simple arcade sports game where you must aim and power your kick to score a goal in 1 kick. Try to collect coins on each level to unlock customizable outfits, but don't forget that your main goal is to kick the ball into the goalpost. Try to complete all 60 levels available. The game might look simple, but it will be challenging as you go. Good luck!

items.title: Funny Ragdoll Wrestlers
items.description: Funny Ragdoll Wrestlers is a super fun Ragdoll fighting game. The game is either played as a single player or two players. That's why what about calling a friend for two-player gaming before starting the game? In each fight, the one who scores 5 wins the game.

items.title: Golf Adventures! 2
items.description: Golf Adventures! 2 is a delightful 2D pixel art minigolf with charming visuals and engaging gameplay, this sequel promises to take you on a journey through 108 levels across 5 uniquely themed packs, each presenting new and exciting challenges! Support the developer by joining theirDiscord.

items.title: Golf Mania
items.description: Golf Mania is a fast-paced multiplayer golf game where precision meets strategy. You’ll aim, adjust, and strike across playful courses filled with clever shortcuts and tricky obstacles. Go head-to-head with others in real-time and think fast to beat the competition. Every shot counts—can you find the smartest path to victory?

items.title: Golf Orbit
items.description: Golf Orbit is an exciting golf simulator game within our sports category where you aim to launch golf balls to incredible heights, even reaching Mars. Have fun in one-shot golf battles, complete challenging levels, and master the art of the perfect shot. Compete to become the golf king in this entertaining and unique golfing adventure.

items.title: Grow in the Hole
items.description: Grow in the Hole is a fantastic Golf game with a range of fun levels. Each level features a range of different obstacles that you must bypass. The main difference with this game is that each time you miss a shot, your golf ball grows in size!

items.title: Hill Climb on Moto Bike
items.description: Hill Climb on Moto Bike is a physics balance game where you must drive your bike through steep and extreme terrain until you reach the finish. Practice and improve your skills and upgrade your motorcycle to make it perform better. Be the bike race baron and win all challenges!

items.title: Hoop World 3D
items.description: Hoop World 3D is a flip-and-dunk game that brings basketball to a whole new dimension! Get your timing right or you'll fall short of the net and fall flat on your face.

items.title: Horse Racing Derby Quest
items.description: Become a horse jockey and win the intense derby races against other jockeys.

items.title: Hotfoot Baseball
items.description: Hotfoot Baseball is a lively sports game featuring cartoony players and easy one-click controls. Swing, run, and score as you make quick decisions to outplay your opponents. Choose your favorite baseball nation and aim for the championship. With simplified rules and fast-paced action, this game brings the thrill of baseball to everyone!

items.title: International Super Animal Soccer
items.description: International Super Animal Soccer is a sports game for you, a soccer lover! The animal kingdom is excited about the world cup, so they decided to make their own tournament! Dribble, pass, shoot, and explode your adversaries in this cute world cup inspired soccer game! Challenge your friends in a fun and quick exhibition match! The game is playable as a single-player or local competitive multiplayer. Be the next International Super Animal World Cup winner!

items.title: Jump Up 3D
items.description: Jump Up 3D is a sports basketball game where you shoot to get that slam dunk, but the one hitch is you're doing it by jumping on a trampoline. Not your ordinary basketball game, this one promises and delivers the excitement! Take aim, bounce on the trampoline, and score baskets before your opponent. With intuitive controls and addictive gameplay, it tests your precision and unleashes your inner dunk master. Be the court champion in this fast-paced! How far can you go in this unlimited playground of basketball action?

items.title: Jump Up 3D: Mini Basketball
items.description: Jump Up 3D: Mini Basketball is a trampoline basketball game where you control the action. With simple controls, anyone can enjoy aiming for that perfect shot. The vibrant graphics and lively animations make each game session a blast. Challenge yourself to beat your high score or compete with friends for bragging rights. It's time to bounce, shoot, and score big in Jump Up 3D: Mini Basketball!

items.title: Kick Soccer Hero
items.description: Kick Soccer Hero is a fast-paced sports-inspired game that will have you taking shots, dodging defenders, and scoring epic goals with style. You’ll master wild kicks, clever passes, and intense penalty moments in action-packed matches. Every flick counts, so show off your skills and become the soccer hero your team needs.

items.title: King of Street Soccer
items.description: King of Street Soccer is a fast-paced one-tap platformer where your timing is everything. Run, jump, and dodge through challenging levels packed with obstacles and tricky enemies, all while chasing the perfect goal shot. Travel from Brazil to Japan in story mode, unlock trophies, and prove you’ve got what it takes to join the elite.

items.title: Mafia Billiard Tricks
items.description: Mafia Billiard Tricks is a billiard arcade game in which you can play the challenging game of billiards. You are not only playing for fun though however; you opponents are part of the infamous mafia. You must earn their respect by beating each crew member at the game of billiards.

items.title: Mini-Caps: Soccer
items.description: Mini-Caps: Soccer is a sports game perfect for playing with a friend. Prepare for endless laughter and unforgettable moments with ragdoll physics and funny characters. Challenge your friends in this minimalistic, fun game with unique locations, and balls featuring various modifiers. Enjoy 20 single player levels, a 2-player mode, convenient controls, and charming minimalistic graphics. Get ready for a comedic adventure on the football field!

items.title: Mini Car Ball
items.description: Mini Car Ball is a high-energy 2D top-down sports car soccer game where agility and strategy collide in thrilling 1v1 matches. Command a nimble vehicle, using precise driving and clever maneuvers to outplay your rival and score spectacular goals. You can play by yourself or with your friend locally. Mini Car Ball delivers intense soccer action with a unique twist, perfect for solo challenges and exciting 2-players fun!

items.title: Mini Golf Club
items.description: Mini Golf Club is a realistic 3D mini golf simulator with fun gameplay and hundreds of challenging levels.

items.title: Mini Putt
items.description: Mini Putt is everyone’s favorite crazygolf gamefrom theFlashera. Tackle various mini-golf courses and check out your final score at the end. Compare the final results with your friends to decide who is the Mini Putt champion.

items.title: MMA Manager 2
items.description: MMA Manager 2 is a dynamic sports management simulation where you take charge of building an MMA empire. Hire top-tier trainers, equip your gyms with cutting-edge gear, and plan strategic fight plans. Scout talented fighters, recruit rising stars and guide them to championship glory. Every decision shapes your path to becoming the ultimate MMA manager.

items.title: Penalty Rivals
items.description: Penalty Rivals is a sports penalty soccer game where you face off against rivals in a high-stakes penalty shootout league. Your shooting and goalkeeping skills will be put to the ultimate test in this game. Can you climb your way to the top of the leaderboard and claim victory?

items.title: Penalty Shooters
