items.description: Penalty Shooters is a mouse-only soccer penalty game where you have to alternate between the role of a striker (to take penalties) and goalkeeper (to stop penalties).

items.title: Penalty Shooters 2
items.description: Penalty Shooters 2 is a soccer game where you shoot penalties in a fantasy league of your choice. You must alternate between the shooter and the goalkeeper in intense penalty shootouts. Win the match to continue in the league and take your shot at becoming the champion.

items.title: Penalty Shooters 3
items.description: Penalty Shooters 3 is a sports soccer game that gives you all the excitement of those final shots into just one game! You get to be both the shooter and the goalkeeper, so you can both nail the perfect shot and make the game-changing save. The game offers two dynamic modes: Tier Mode, where you’ll climb through six increasingly challenging tiers, and the prestigious World Cup, where you’ll compete in iconic arenas to prove if you're ready for the big leagues. Personalize your team with unique jerseys and unlock over 250 teams. With adaptive AI that becomes more skilled as you advance, power-ups to enhance your performance, and achievements to unlock, every match feels like a nail-biting finale.

items.title: Penalty Shootout: Multi League
items.description: Participate in different fantasy leagues and prove your penalty skills! After picking a league, you can freely choose a favorite team. In the game, you take turns as a penalty kicker and as a goalkeeper. When playing as a kicker, there are 3 moving indicators to adjust the ball's direction, height, and speed. While player as the keeper, you just need to click the target indicator on time. Can you write soccer history in Penalty Shootout: Multi League?

items.title: Pool Club
items.description: Pocket all stripe and solid balls before the clock runs out. Each pocketed ball adds 50 points and 5 seconds. The cue ball deducts 20 points. Have fun!

items.title: Pool Hustlers
items.description: Pool Hustlers is a pool game where you must try your best to sink as many balls as possible against the ticking clock. Get ready for a fast-paced, precision-focused pool game set in a lively 80s billiards hall. This classic game will bring an adrenaline rush to your usual pool experience, taking you back to an era when pool tables were the battlegrounds for skilled hustlers. Get ready and show your best pool skills!

items.title: Pool Rush FRVR
items.description: Pool Rush FRVR is a pool game that doesn't follow conventional pool rules. The only goal in this game is to shoot as many balls as you can into the side pockets. You'll have a limited number of shots (indicated by the number on your cue ball), and once it turns to 0, you'll lose a ball. If you don't have an extra ball, it's game over (you get extra balls by making sure all balls on a table are shot into pockets).

items.title: Power Badminton
items.description: Power Badminton is an exhilarating game where you'll face off against skilled opponents in intense badminton matches. Utilize strategic shots, activate power-ups, and outmaneuver your rival on the court. With realistic animations and diverse stadiums, every game is a thrilling challenge. Train in practice mode, then dominate with your racket skills and cunning tactics!

items.title: Pro Bowling 3D
items.description: Become a professional bowler and show your best skill in this fun bowling game.

items.title: PSG Soccer Freestyle
items.description: PSG Soccer Freestyle is a sports soccer game to unleash your freestyle tricks. Take on the challenge of showcasing your best moves alongside more than 10 official PSG Stars. Play for the highest scores as you enjoy the thrill of this official PSG game. Join Messi, Mbappé, Neymar, and other PSG Stars on the field and immerse yourself in an essential gaming experience for soccer and sports fans. Get ready to dominate with Paris Saint-Germain!

items.title: Punchers
items.description: Punchers is a 3D boxing sports action game with ragdoll physics. Use move keys to dodge enemy punches and hit back with random punch combinations. You can play against another player or AI.

items.title: QB Legend
items.description: QB Legend is a fast-paced sports football game where you take control as the star quarterback. Lead your team through the season and playoffs, making strategic plays to claim the championship title. With full games and opponent simulation, every match challenges your skills and decision-making on the field. New, from the maker of 2 Minute Football -- a whole new way to play, now with full games and opponent simulation!

items.title: Ragdoll Soccer 2 Players
items.description: Ragdoll Soccer: 2 Players is a sports soccer game that delivers the ultimate blend of soccer and chaos, where wobbly ragdoll physics takes over the field for hilarious and unpredictable gameplay! Step into the shoes (or, more accurately, the floppy limbs) of a stickman player and take on the challenge solo or face off against a friend in intense local multiplayer. With a variety of modes like Championship, Penalty Shootout, and single-player, there's never a dull moment.

items.title: Real Fishing Simulator
items.description: Real Fishing Simulator is a simulation fishing game where you can travel along various rivers and lakes to catch some fish. Catch the mighty Dnieper, the mysterious Baikal, or even go to the most exotic reservoirs in the world! Sell the fish to get money and buy a new fishing rod for your fishing journey.

items.title: Rogue Dunk
items.description: Rogue Dunk is a thrilling 2D basketball game that combines fast-paced action with rogue-like strategy. Each game offers new skills to unlock and challenges to face, making every match feel fresh and exciting. Test your skills, adapt your strategy, and push your score higher as you take on this unique blend of sports and adventure.

items.title: Royal Pool
items.description: Embark on an exhilarating journey into the world of billiards with Royal Pool, where endless fun and excitement await players of all skill levels. With its extensive level selection, diverse table designs, realistic ball physics, Royal Pool offers an immersive and addictive gameplay experience that will keep you coming back for more. Are you ready to conquer the world of billiards and become the ultimate master?

items.title: Santa vs Skritch
items.description: Santa Vs Skritch is a sports game where holiday cheers battle the notorious party pooper Skritch. Engage in an epic match, competing for presents, outscoring your opponent, and beating the clock. Challenge friends or the AI to decide the triumph between merriment and mischief. Who will emerge victorious in this yuletide showdown? Only you can determine the outcome!

items.title: Soccer Arena X
items.description: Soccer Arena X is an explosive arcade football showdown where you tackle leagues, face rivals, and unleash chaotic power-ups. Play solo in Career Mode to conquer 15 leagues or challenge a friend in intense 2-player duels. Freeze opponents, strike with lightning, and upgrade crazy bonuses to rule the pitch and become a true arena legend.

items.title: Soccer Bros
items.description: Soccer Bros is a fast-paced soccer game that delivers the ultimate adrenaline rush with its one-on-one soccer battles! Choose from a diverse lineup of quirky and dynamic characters, each bringing their unique flair to the field.

items.title: Soccer Duel
items.description: Soccer Duel is an exciting arcade game in the style of table soccer. You can play in a single-player mode or play with your friend on the same device or over the network.

items.title: Soccer Legends 2021
items.description: Soccer Legends 2021 is a sports soccertwo-playergame and the newest installment in the widely popular Soccer Legends series by MadPuffers, bringing the excitement of fast-paced soccer action to the next level. Packed with fresh updates, this game introduces a variety of new players and teams, each with their own unique skills and playing styles. Whether you’re a seasoned fan of the series or a newcomer, Soccer Legends 2021 offers a dynamic and entertaining experience that combines arcade-style gameplay with competitive strategy. Play solo against AI or challenge your friend to a 1-on-1 match!

items.title: Soccer Masters: Euro 2020
items.description: Soccer Masters Euro 2020 is a fun sports game where you can play as your favorite soccer team and compete against other teams in challenging soccer matches, solo or with friends. Show your best ball-kicking moves! The gameplay is simple, and the graphics and sound effects give the game a great atmosphere.

items.title: Soccer Random
items.description: Soccer Random is a two-player pixel-art soccer game with limited controls but unlimited randomness. Players hop and kick on the pitch with just one click, trying to score a goal with limited movement. You can choose a one-player game against the computer or two-player with a friend as your opponent.

items.title: Spark Chess
items.description: SparkChess is a fun and engaging 3D multiplayer chess game. If you love board games and chess then you will enjoy this online title. To start with, you can play against an AI computer opponent to get used to the game mechanics and controls. The controls to be fair are simple – all you have to do is use the left click mouse button to select and move your chess pieces.

items.title: The Speedy Golf
items.description: The Speedy Golf is a mouse-only golf game. Aim carefully and get fantastic scores.

items.title: Sports Minibattles
items.description: Sports Mini Battles is a brilliant collection of sports-based games. You can either play against an AI computer opponent or your friend using split controls. There are four different sports games to play. During each game, you must try and beat your opponent in an intense sports match.

items.title: Soccer Heads
items.description: Soccer Heads is a funtwo-playersoccer game featuring famous UK football teams. Play solo against the computer or two-player with a friend. There are various extras and power-ups!

items.title: Sports Hero
items.description: Get ready to compete in the Rio Olympics in Sports Hero. Choose your country, pick a discipline (unlock new ones as you achieve good results), and get ready to start battling. Have fun! Don't forget to try the mobile app if you like this game.

items.title: Stickman Beach Volleyball
items.description: This is a fun stickman beach volleyball game! Smash the ball perfectly and win the matches.

items.title: Stickman Tennis 3D
items.description: Control your stickman player and compete in various challenging tennis competitions!

items.title: Stormy Kicker
items.description: Stormy Kicker is a one-buttonpenaltykicking game. Who's the best football striker in the world? You could be the one if you take your team to the World cup title.

items.title: Street Ball Jam
items.description: Street Ball Jam is an entertaining one-touch basketball game to score as many balls as you can.

items.title: Street Freekick 3D
items.description: Show your best penalty kicking skill and control the ball directly into the goal net!

items.title: Table Tennis World Tour
items.description: Table Tennis World Tour is a thrilling sports game where you play table tennis against various opponents. Choose your country and step into the global arena, where you'll face off against a diverse array of opponents from around the world. Each match is a high-stakes showdown as you compete to rise through the ranks and become the ultimate table tennis champion.

items.title: Tap-Tap Shots
items.description: Tap-Tap Shots is an addictive sports game in which you continuously tap to make your basketball jump. It is an endless basketball practice where you aim to get your ball in the net in one shot. The goal is to keep playing until you can't anymore, so you may want to cancel all plans for the evening. Perfectly time your taps to score before the clock runs out, and keep going as long as you can!

items.title: Tennis Masters
items.description: Tennis Masters is a competitive 1-on-1 tennis game in which you can play against a computer or a friend in 2 player mode. Collect different power-ups and funny transformations. Have fun!

items.title: Unmatched Ego
items.description: Unmatched Ego is a fast-paced 3v3 third-person soccer showdown where skill and style rule the pitch. Compete online or train offline, mastering sharp dribbles, slick tackles, and curved shots. Customize your soccer legend with special looks and celebrations, and prove your mastery in high-energy matches that demand precision and flair.

items.title: Volley Random
items.description: Volley Random is a fun two-player sports volleyball game where the simple controls meet chaotic and wacky physics. This one-click button game lets you jump, spike, and scramble your way to victory, all with a few clicks. Keep alert because each move is pretty much unpredictable. Face off against your opponent in a series of random levels that keep you guessing. Voley Random is easy to play but tough to master, so keep playing!

items.title: Wrestle Bros
items.description: Wrestle Bros is a pro wrestling sports action game where you can body slam your way to victory in the championships as your favorite character. Unleash a flurry of wrestling moves on your opponents, from aerial assaults to bone-crushing body slams. Get ready to dominate the ring and claim the championship, bro!

items.title: Age Of Arms
items.description: Age of Arms is a strategic defense game where you battle through different eras. Set your weapons in the enemy’s path, defeat foes, and evolve into stronger warriors in each age. With every victory, upgrade your arsenal and keep advancing to become the ultimate warrior of history’s greatest battles.

items.title: Alchemy Puzzle
items.description: Alchemy Puzzle is a creative puzzle game where you combine simple items to craft clever solutions and complete each level. You’ll face lighthearted challenges that test your thinking and bring a smile as quirky characters and real-world logic mix in surprising ways. Let your imagination lead as you solve delightful fusion-filled puzzles.

items.title: Arcade Rope
items.description: Arcade Rope is a fun casual game where you play as a stickman with a rope tied around your waist, swinging from structure to structure to demolish them. Demolish obstacles, collect resources, and perform acrobatic feats as you navigate the island. Earn wood resources with each successful swing to exchange for money. Upgrade your rope's length and capacity to overcome challenging levels. Arcade Rope combines precision, strategy, and resource management for an exciting and thrilling gameplay experience. Swing, collect, and conquer the island in this captivating stickman adventure!

items.title: Archer Ragdoll Masters
items.description: Archer Ragdoll Masters is a stickman archery action game with ragdoll physics. Line up your arrow and shoot your enemies down one by one. Pick up power-ups and equip new items to your stick archer to own the enemy with greater precision and power.

items.title: Archers Battle
items.description: Archers Battle is an .io-style third-person shooter game, packed with stickmen, horses, bows, and arrows! Battle against players from around the world, collect diamonds, and rise to the top of the leaderboard! Jump into the Archers Battle arena, unleash your inner marksman, and prove your skill in this chaotic stickman showdown!

items.title: AutoRPG Arena
items.description: AutoRPG Arena is a turn-based auto-battler RPG where every choice influences the fight. Collect powerful items, upgrade your heroes, and strategize to dominate the battlefield. With each battle, you refine your tactics and strengthen your team, ensuring no two encounters are the same. Victory depends on how well you adapt and optimize your squad.

items.title: Bed Wars
items.description: Bed Wars is an action-packed casual defense game that immerses you in epic gladiatorial battles with your squad of stickmen. Your journey starts solo, and you aim to protect your base territory while defeating enemies and collecting points along the way.

items.title: Bomb Roll
items.description: Bomb Roll is an arcade game where you must throw a bomb at your enemies so they are not blocking your way. Collect the coins and blow up buildings by also throwing the bomb at them. Hit the enemies and watch them fly!

items.title: Bone Breaker Tycoon
items.description: Bone Breaker Tycoon is an arcade game where you throw crowds of cartoon people (not real people) off mountains and earn cash for all the injuries they suffer on the way down. Use cash to hire more crowd members, increase insurance payouts, buy enhancements and gain access to bigger and better mountains. You can even customize your crowd by naming and coloring each person in your crowd.

items.title: Break Free
items.description: Break Free is a casual game that puts your stealth and timing to the test as you escape from one guarded cell after another. Strike when the guards aren’t looking, dodge traps and dogs, and collect coins with each successful breakout. Use your earnings to upgrade your escape artist and take on even trickier challenges.

items.title: Bridge Race
items.description: Bridge Race is a competitive casual collect building game where you gather blocks to construct your bridge while outsmarting rivals. Stay alert as other players may try to steal your progress, adding an exciting twist to the challenge. Strategize and race to complete your bridge first in this thrilling test of skill and speed!

items.title: Build And Run
items.description: Run, build, and conquer! Construct missing parts of the level while running, using ramps, slopes, and horizontal builds. Arm yourself with knives, guns, and TNT to defeat enemies and clear obstacles. Enjoy Level Mode or Endless Mode, and spend earned coins in the shop to customize your character with stylish hats and shoes.

items.title: Stickman Crowd Fight
items.description: Cartoon Crowd Clash is an arcade game to build warriors and run through the city smashing the gates to increase the size of your crowd. Use power-ups to speed your run and collect coins to buy new skins and earn extra cash even when not playing!

items.title: Castle Keeper
items.description: Castle Keeper is a defense game where you fight the enemy and protect the castle. Use your archer skills to shoot at the troops and throw ladders or fire barrels to do more damage. Upgrade your character, unlock new abilities, and become stronger!

items.title: Clash of Warriors
items.description: Clash of Warriors is a tower defense game where strategy is key. Command and control an army of fighters from three warrior classes of each era. Your mission is to defeat enemy hordes and destroy their base. With each victory, upgrade and strengthen your army, unlock new eras, and engage in epic battles!

items.title: Count Masters: Stickman Games
items.description: Count Masters: Stickman Games is a fast-paced running game where you gather a growing army of stickmen to clash against rival crowds. Navigate through obstacles, choose the best paths to multiply your numbers, and lead your team to victory. Battle fierce opponents, defeat the King-stickman, and claim the castle in an action-packed race filled with strategy and excitement!

items.title: Crazy Office: Slap and Smash!
items.description: Crazy Office: Slap and Smash! is a slapstick beat-em-up that turns a dull office into a hilarious battlefield. You’ll throw chairs, swing golf clubs, and cause ragdoll mayhem as you fight your way past coworkers and unhinged bosses. Rise through the floors, unleash chaos, and deliver your final smackdown to the CEO in true cubicle-conquering style.

items.title: Crowd Lumberjack Stickman
items.description: Crowd of Lumberjacks Stickman is a casual game where you must grab an ax and start working! Gather as many lazy lumberjacks into your team as possible and start building houses and buildings on the island! Control the crowd and cut trees. Build an amazing city and explore the island. Start the game solo and gather a horde of lumberjacks as you progress through the levels. Become an energetic mob of lumberjacks on the island. Only the strongest and most assembled team can cut down a large forest and build a city. Unite all lumberjacks on the island and improve their skills. The stronger and faster lumberjacks, the more work they have on the island.

items.title: Defend Your Castle
items.description: Defend your castle is a brilliant stickman defense game brought to you by XGenStudios who are also responsible for Stick Arena Dimensions. You own a castle and must defend it from attacking soldiers – you must pick up a soldier and drop them from the sky or throw them through the air to kill them. You must move quickly, click carefully and keep throwing your enemies away!

items.title: Dino Defense
items.description: Dino Defense is a casual game where you survive, make money, recruit workers, and build a bigger base to defeat the dinosaurs and survive. Let's drive these dinosaurs back to extinction to ensure our survival in this hostile world.

items.title: Draw Bridge Puzzle
items.description: Draw Bridge Puzzle is a clever puzzle game where you drag to create a path and guide bikes safely to the finish line. Sketch a single, sturdy bridge over gaps and avoid collisions with other vehicles on each level. With ragdoll physics, brain-teasing challenges, and endless fun, you’ll test your creativity and strategy to keep every ride safe and smooth.

items.title: Draw Line
items.description: Draw Line is an addicting puzzle game where you need to draw a path for your hero to reach the castle. It may seem easy at first, but watch out for upcoming obstacles. You can pass the level if your hero still holds the bar and touches the castle's flag, even if you touch obstacles. You can try again if you want a perfect pass with three stars! Drawing speed is also important, so plan well!

items.title: Dungeon Master - Cult & Craft
items.description: Dungeon Master – Cult & Craft is a darkly captivating 3D dungeon management simulator where you reign as the master of an underground empire. Convert simple stickmen into loyal followers, mine precious resources, and grow a powerful cult beneath the surface. Keep faith high or risk losing control of your dominion. The goal of the game is to manage the dungeon, develop your Cult, and maintain power over your followers.

items.title: Elite Sniper
items.description: Elite Sniper browser game - show your shooting skills. Elite snipers perform the most dangerous missions. Test your eyesight and reaction, pull the trigger to give the enemy a fatal blow! Up to 20 mission levels and 6 different types of enemies in the game are very challenging. Are you ready?

items.title: Escaping the Prison
items.description: Escaping the Prison is a wildly unique adventure puzzle game in which you aim to escape from prison! After being thrown in a prison cell, you must use anything and everything at your disposal to escape: teleporters, anti-gravity equipment, toilet plungers—nothing is off limits in your attempt to escape! But be careful because one wrong move or a split-second hesitation could send you right back to your cell—or worse!

items.title: Fancy Pants Adventures World 4: Part 1
items.description: Fancy Pants Adventures World 4: Part 1 invites you to embark on an exhilarating platforming journey like no other. Join the Fancy Pants character in a wild and free-running adventure filled with buttery smooth platforming mechanics. Experience the thrill of precise jumps, slick slides, and stylish moves as you navigate through vibrant and imaginative levels. With the precision of a fountain pen, conquer challenging obstacles and enemies with finesse. Get ready for a fast-paced and visually stunning platform game that will test your skills and keep you entertained for hours. Prepare to embark on an epic platforming adventure and unleash your fancy pants prowess!

items.title: Fancy Pants Adventures World 4: Part 2
items.description: The second episode ofThe Fancy Pants Adventures World 4: Part 1. Your journey continues!

items.title: Farm Land
items.description: Farm Land is a casual farming game where you manage an island farm and purchase expansions with your earnings. Harvest the crops from your land, sell goods to the marketplace, and build a friendly little farming community!

items.title: Fleeing the Complex
items.description: Fleeing the Complex is an amazing stick-figure escape adventure game. You are trapped inside a small prison cell, and you must escape not just your cell but the whole prison! If you fail, death is awaiting you... The highly secured prison is guarded by some strong stick soldiers. You must make good and fast decisions to make it out alive. Good luck!

items.title: Foot Battle Ball
items.description: Foot Battle Ball is a strategic soccer challenge where you face up to seven defenders at once. With limited kicks per round, every move counts. Outsmart your opponents with precision and quick reflexes to secure victory. Featuring a fresh twist on classic football, this game offers intuitive one-finger gameplay and fast-paced action. Can you outplay them all?

items.title: Giant Rush!
items.description: Giant Rush is an action-packed hyper casual fight game filled with giants and monsters. Jump on board, run through the obstacle track, merge blobs, grow stronger, and battle against giant monsters in fight games to the death!

items.title: Giant Rush Arena
items.description: Giant Rush Arena is a fun casual game where you can be a giant and destroy the city and your enemies. Become bigger as you destroy things such as houses, public buildings, transport, and even people. Don't let the other giants become bigger than you or they will become a serious threat to you. Win the game by being the last giant in the arena!

items.title: Go Kart Racing 3D
items.description: Go Kart Racing 3D is an exhilarating kart racing game featuring over 15 thrilling tracks. Challenge AI opponents, customize your cars, and upgrade your character's abilities. Earn rewards, unlock new levels, and get ready for an adrenaline-fueled ride!

items.title: Gods Playing Field
items.description: God's Playing Field is a point and click game that' played exactly as it sounds. You're a god that's probably bored of your day job, and now it's time to destroy everything! You'll have different tools available to you as you destroy more things, so there's only one way to play this - destroy anything that moves.

items.title: Grab and Run
items.description: Grab and Run is a funny casual game where you must grab the most expensive things and carry them to the truck. Your time is limited, so choose what to take wisely. Use boosts and traps to slow down your opponents. Earn money to customize your hero.

items.title: Gravity Crowd
items.description: Gravity Crowd is a thrilling platformer where you guide a stickman that transforms into a growing crowd. Flip gravity with a tap to dodge tricky obstacles, navigate challenging paths, and strategically pass through gates. Every decision shapes the size of your crowd, keeping you on your toes in this fast-paced, dynamic adventure!

items.title: Gun Fu: Stickman 2
items.description: Gun Fu: Stickman 2 is a high-speed shooting game where you dual-wield pistols as a relentless stickman hero. You’ll face wave after wave of enemies in an intense, reflex-driven challenge that keeps getting faster. Unlock powerful weapons, customize your look, and prove you’ve got the aim and speed to survive the chaos.

items.title: Hand Over Hand
items.description: Hand Over Hand is a casual climbing game featuring amusing ragdoll mechanics. Your goal is straightforward: reach the red flag to progress through each level. Collect stars along the way to unlock a variety of clothing and grooming items from the shop, adding a fun customization element to your climbing adventure!

items.title: Hide and Build a Bridge!
items.description: Hide and Build a Bridge is a thrilling game where your objective is to gather blocks and construct a bridge to reach the portal. Strategize with other players to collect materials while evading the seeker who can destroy your progress. Use stealth, teamwork, and quick thinking to succeed in this exciting race to the finish!

items.title: Hook King Runner
items.description: Hook King Runner is a physics-based runner where you tap, swing, and time your jumps to master wild obstacle courses. Use ropes and hooks with precision to dodge traps, collect coins, and outmaneuver enemies. With ragdoll physics and varied levels, your agility and timing are the keys to conquering every thrilling challenge that awaits.

items.title: Human Mech
items.description: Human Mech is a game where you reconstruct wrecked buildings by earning trophies in mech battles. Combine stickmen to design powerful mechs, upgrading stats to enhance strength and speed. Join battles, earn rewards, and conquer arenas to become an unstoppable force in your journey to rebuild and dominate.

items.title: Hyper Knight
items.description: Hyper Knight is an exciting and action-packed gaming experience where players can immerse themselves in a post-apocalyptic world filled with battles and danger. The game's features, including equipment upgrades, magical abilities, and companion recruitment, provide depth and strategic elements to keep players engaged. The endless adventure aspect ensures that players will always have new challenges to face, and epic boss battles add an extra layer of intensity. So, don your armor, grab your sword, and embark on this epic quest in "Hyper Knight" to become humanity's hero in its darkest hour.

items.title: Idle Business Tycoon 3D
items.description: Idle Business Tycoon 3D is a casual simulation game where you can collect money from trees, farms, and your business. Use the money to buy new lands, build and manage profitable companies, and be richer than ever! Start with a small step and evolve into a tycoon!

items.title: Infiltrating the Airship
items.description: Infiltrating the Airship is an adventure game that continues Puffballs United's string of popular games from this genre (other titles includeBreaking the Bank,Fleeing the Complex, andEscaping the Prison) and presents a new scenario for you to tackle.

items.title: Jailbreak: Hide or Attack!
items.description: Jailbreak: Hide or Shoot! is a casual escape game that combines the intensity of a shooter, the strategy of hide and seek, and mind-bending puzzles. Dive into a world of prison romance and challenge your wits and reflexes across numerous unique levels. With straightforward controls, this game offers addictive gameplay to help you unwind. Are you tough enough to make a prison break? Find out now!

items.title: Jelly Restaurant
items.description: Jelly Restaurant combines simple casual arcade gameplay with a restaurant management game. Enjoy the satisfactory jelly movement. Fit the bottom color of the jelly with the surface color to make the jelly grow bigger. Pay attention to any obstacles and sharp knives. The bigger jelly you get, the more jellies you can produce. Manage your restaurant by hiring helpers, expanding your restaurant, and serving colorful jellies to your customers. Have a great business!

items.title: Johnny Rocketfingers
items.description: Johnny Rocketfingers is a point and click adventure game that gives you control over Johnny Rocketfingers, the most "suppish" guy around. In this game, you help out a mom trying to find her daughter. Use anything around you that you deem necessary to finish your objective in each area you're thrown in.

items.title: Kick Loser
items.description: Kick Loser is a creative ragdoll puzzle game where your goal is simple: cause maximum chaos to the stickman hero using clever strategy and a mix of wild objects. Drag, aim, and launch with precision as you bounce him through hilarious, unpredictable impacts. With physics-based fun and endless ways to experiment every level is a new opportunity for destruction.

items.title: Knight of Chess
items.description: Knight of Chess is a battle game where you can place your army strategically to defeat your enemy. Instead of usual chess pieces, there are many selections of units with unique characteristics you can choose from, such as tank, warrior, marksman, mage, assassin, etc. Synergies will help increase the strength of your army. Become king on the epic chessboard battle!

items.title: Knock and Run: 100 Doors Escape
items.description: Knock and Run: 100 Doors Escape is a fast-paced, casual arcade game where you race through hotel corridors, ringing doorbells and pulling off hilarious pranks. But be careful: residents react unpredictably, and trouble is always around the corner. Outsmart everyone, stay on the move, and see if you can become the ultimate trickster without getting caught!

items.title: Loot Challenge
items.description: Loot Challenge is a casual arcade game that challenges you to collect as many balls as possible and put them in the shredder for cash. Use the cash to upgrade yourself. Clear each level's platforms to progress to the next and continue the ball-collecting adventure.

items.title: Mad Stick
items.description: Mad Stick is an arcade stickmen battle it out to prove their superiority in epic showdowns of stunts, weapons, and physics. Customize your stickman hero, enhance their abilities, and master new techniques to annihilate the enemy army and emerge victorious in the ultimate stickman brawl!

items.title: Mafia Business Empire: Stickman Escape
items.description: Mafia Business Empire: Stickman Escape 3D is a casual game where you will become a real thief. Get into the banks, museums, and other rich places. Steal everything you see and then get away from the security guard and CCTV. Upgrade your character to increase skills and unlock new skins to make your hero unique. Open new locations to steal as much money as you can and be the most skillful thief in this game!

items.title: Magic Tower: Cards War
items.description: Magic Tower: Cards War is a strategic battle game where you must protect the princess so she doesn't get killed by the enemies. Get a deck of fighters and place them in the correct position to win. Combine two of the same units and get a mega-unit! There are also buffers or bonuses to strengthen your troops. Use your tactical skills because each decision gets you closer to victory. Will you successfully protect the princess?

items.title: Man Runner 2048
items.description: Man Runner 2048 is a casual arcade game where your objective is to run and merge men till you reach 2048. Your goal is to get the highest score on each round, because at the end of the level, you will get a chance to shoot a giant monster. The higher your score, the more power you gain.

items.title: Merge and Fight
items.description: Merge and Fight is a casual merge game where you buy warriors and merge them to create a powerful army. Engage in intense battles, conquering enemies, castles, and structures to win the battle.

items.title: Mind Controller
items.description: Control your enemy's mind in Mind Controller. Use the controller to dictate the behavior of your enemy and kill all your foes to complete the level. Find creative ways to kill them all!

items.title: Muscle Shift
items.description: Muscle Shift is an exciting racing game that enables you to switch your superpower to overcome obstacles. With super-sized muscular hands, you can smash through any barriers obstructing your path. Alternatively, you can inflate your leg muscles to achieve faster speeds and gain an edge over your competitors. Transform into a ball shape to bounce and accelerate when falling down. Compete against others to showcase your superior muscle shape and leave them in your dust. Get ready to rush and assert your dominance in the ultimate showdown of muscular prowess!

items.title: My Crystal Underwater
items.description: My Crystal Underwater is a delightful casual game where you can dive into the depths of the sea and gather precious crystals. Explore the beautiful underwater world, collect gold, and be the wealthiest diver!

items.title: My Island
items.description: My Island is a casual simulation game where you gotta survive on the island all by yourself. The good news is, you've got a pickaxe and axe stashed in your bag to snag resources. Upgrade your tools to speed up your resource hunt. Explore new areas and find a boat so you can sail to a new island.

items.title: No Pain No Gain - Ragdoll Sandbox
items.description: No Pain No Gain - Ragdoll Sandbox is a chaotic and hilarious game where pain equals profit. Create wild obstacle courses filled with saw blades, springs, bombs, and more. The more your ragdoll crashes, tumbles, and smashes into these traps, the more coins you earn. Strategize and embrace the madness—each choice leads to unique and entertaining outcomes.

items.title: Office Fight
items.description: Office Fight is a casual action game where you must beat everyone in the office. Use your powerful baseball bat to hit the enemies! Get other weapons such as baguette, frying pan, and else! You can throw your enemies in any different direction you want! Show who's boss in the office!

items.title: Outlets Rush
items.description: Outlets Rush is a time-management casual arcade game where you become the master of your own shopping empire. Build and expand various stores, manage staff, and make strategic decisions to keep customers happy. Enjoy watching your mini outlets grow into massive retail hubs as you effortlessly manage operations and maximize profits! Dive into the excitement of creating your ultimate shopping destination!

items.title: Pool Match Jam
items.description: Pool Match Jam is a lively puzzle-sorting game that puts you in charge of guiding swimmers to their perfect ride down a colorful water slide. Your mission is to strategically clear the grid by matching tubes with an active line of swimmers, creating the ideal path for them to jump onto a lifesaver and make their way down the water slide.

items.title: Prison Break: Architect Tycoon
items.description: Prison Break: Architect Tycoon is an action game in which you are the main prison guard tasked with securing the prison. Your job is to ensure that no prisoners can escape or, worse, kill you, leading to a game over. You start with an empty prison and transform it into a secure facility. Build inmate cells, reinforce doors, install surveillance cameras, and recruit additional guards. Improve your warden to handle a larger population of prisoners efficiently. Each facility offers unique challenges, providing a captivating experience for players of all ages.

items.title: Rag Doll
items.description: Rag Doll is an arcade physics game to drag the ragdoll and do whatever you like with it!

items.title: Ragdoll Archers
items.description: Ragdoll Archers is an archery game featuring bow and arrow-equipped stickmen with ragdoll physics. Fire arrows at a range of opponents while earning points to upgrade your abilities and ammunition. Play two-player PvP against your friend or team up with them to defeat a range of foes!

items.title: Ragdoll Soccer 2 Players
items.description: Ragdoll Soccer: 2 Players is a sports soccer game that delivers the ultimate blend of soccer and chaos, where wobbly ragdoll physics takes over the field for hilarious and unpredictable gameplay! Step into the shoes (or, more accurately, the floppy limbs) of a stickman player and take on the challenge solo or face off against a friend in intense local multiplayer. With a variety of modes like Championship, Penalty Shootout, and single-player, there's never a dull moment.

items.title: Ragdoll Throw Challenge
items.description: Ragdoll Throw Challenge is a physics-based casual game where you control a wobbly character, help them grab weapons, and fling them at your enemies for ultimate chaos and fun! The gameplay is simple, but movements can be complex and challenging to master.

items.title: Red Stickman vs Monster School
items.description: Red Stickman vs Monster School is an action game where you play as a stickman who has to fight various monsters and zombies. Beat them all and participate in the Monster School challenge together with the Red Stickman. Check out ourstickman gamesfor more!

items.title: Red Stickman vs Monster School 2
items.description: Red Stickman vs Monster School 2 is a platformer shooting game where you battle mobs with bullets. Now the stickman is armed with a pistol, machine gun, uzi, rocket launcher, laser gun, RPG, and much more! Shoot through your undead foes and reach the end in this action-packed stickman adventure! Check out ourstickman gamesfor more.

items.title: Reply Run
items.description: Reply Run is a fun and engaging game where you swipe left and right to collect the right words and reply to text messages. Test your skills in composing the perfect responses while you navigate through the game. Can you master the art of texting on the run?

items.title: Rescue Throw
items.description: Rescue Throw is an arcade game in which you must throw the patient to the ambulance. Aim in the right direction, avoid any obstacles, and collect coins as you throw the stickman. Can you rescue the patient?

items.title: Riot Assassin
items.description: Riot Assassin is a casual assassin game where you complete various missions to earn money. Retrieve the assassination contract from the guild dungeon, search for your target on the streets, and take them down! Use your rewards to buy and upgrade your equipment. Get ready, assassin!

items.title: Sculpture Collector
items.description: Sculpture Collector is a clicker game where every tap reveals a path to hidden treasures buried in stone. Chip away to unearth rare, beautiful sculptures and add them to your growing collection. With each new find, you get closer to becoming the ultimate collector. Start tapping and discover the ancient wonders waiting for you!

items.title: Shadow Bullet
items.description: Shadow Bullet offers a unique blend of puzzle-solving challenges and precision shooting. You can enjoy the excitement of taking down shadow enemies while navigating through brain-engaging puzzles. With a focus on one-shot mastery, this game provides a thrilling and strategic gaming experience for those seeking a puzzle-shooting adventure!

items.title: Ship Mania
items.description: Ship Mania: Boat Parking Jam is a brain-teasing game where you guide boats into their proper spots without creating a traffic jam. Perfect for sharpening your problem-solving skills, it offers engaging challenges that are simple to start yet hard to master. With puzzles designed for everyone, it keeps you entertained and thinking at every turn.

items.title: Shot Blaster
items.description: Shot Blaster is an arcade game to create your custom gun and shot all the stickmen who are running toward you. Kill them all to complete the level!

items.title: Slap and Run
items.description: Slap and Run is a fast-paced arcade game where your goal is simple—slap as many unsuspecting pedestrians as you can and outrun the chaos that follows. Dodge obstacles, weave through streets, and stay just ahead of the growing mob. Every slap adds to the madness, so keep moving if you want to stay in the game!

items.title: Slap Castle
items.description: Slap Castle is a funny arcade game to slap all the enemies and the king to conquer the kingdom!

items.title: Slasher
items.description: Slasher is a stickman action game where you slash down your opponents. Get money to buy random items and merge them to make a better weapon and head armor. Let the stickman deathmatch begin!

items.title: Splatmans
items.description: Splatmans is a casual 2-player shooting game where two stickmen duke it out in a colorful arena. Your goal in this third-person shooter game is to cover as much ground as possible before time runs out. Battle it out with the computer or play against a friend in a competitive match filled with colorful chaos. With unique paint types, diverse game modes, and rapid-fire action, Splatmans delivers an exciting and highly competitive experience that will keep you and your friends on your toes!

items.title: State Wars: Conquer Them All
items.description: State Wars: Conquer Them All is a casual battle game where you merge troops and send them to war with other nation-states. Build an army of super soldiers and obliterate enemy territories to claim more land for your people and win the war!

items.title: Stealing the Diamond
items.description: Stealing The Diamond is another in a series of amazing stick figure adventure games. In Stealing The Diamond, you guessed it; you try to steal a diamond! An extremely large diamond at that! You have choices to make in your quest for theft! Will you rush in and risk everything or try to sneak your way to your prize? Whatever you decide, be careful as one wrong move will leave you without a diamond and maybe even less! Do you have what it takes to pull off the diamond heist and make it out alive? If you like this game, make sure to also try outFleeing the Complex, the last game in the Henry Stickmin series!

items.title: Stick Crush
items.description: Stick Crush is an exhilarating casual physics game that tests your reactions and skills! Start by revving your car, crashing into obstacles, and launching your stick character into the sky. Once airborne, navigate challenges, dodge obstacles, and take down enemies with precise maneuvers.

items.title: Stick Epic Fighter
items.description: Stick Epic Fighter is an action-packed, arcade physics-based fighting game where you are in control of a stick fighter to battle enemies in a dynamic, geometric world. Your mission is to evolve your character into an unstoppable force by unlocking powerful upgrades, mastering epic combos, and unleashing devastating fatalities that will destroy your foes. Conquer waves of enemies with precision and skill as you dominate each battle. Only after crushing every opponent will you unlock the portal to the next level, where even more significant challenges await. Sharpen your reflexes, perfect your strategies, and prove you have what it takes.

items.title: Stick Fighter vs Zombies
items.description: Stick Fighter vs Zombies is an action-packed 2D platformer where you control a red stickman battling endless waves of zombies in a blocky world reminiscent of Minecraft. Get ready for epic fights as you face off against zombies, skeleton archers, withers, and even Noob in this thrilling survival game! This fast-paced combat will keep you on your toes as you protect your stickman friends from the zombie apocalypse.

items.title: Stick Figure Penalty 2
items.description: Stick Figure Penalty 2 is an animation killing game with 15 ways to kill the prisoner. Prepare yourself to see the bloody animation from this game.

items.title: Stick Ragdoll Battle Simulator
items.description: Stick Ragdoll Battle Simulator is an action-packed strategy game that throws you into chaotic stickman warfare powered by wild ragdoll physics. Assemble your army, plan your formations, and unleash battles where strategy meets slapstick mayhem. Every clash is unpredictable, every victory satisfying—can you outwit the madness and lead your stick forces to triumph?

items.title: Stickman and Guns
items.description: Stickman and Guns is a high-speed multiplayer platform shooter where you leap across rooftops, grab wild weapons, and outgun opponents in intense PvP arenas. Every second demands quick reflexes and sharper aim. You’ll face real players in fast, chaotic battles—so stay agile, think fast, and fight your way to the top.

items.title: Stickman Annihilation 2
items.description: Stickman Annihilation 2 is an action-packed ragdoll physicsstickman gamemade by Sergey Mezkhahov. Drive an assortment of vehicles through people, fire, walls, and enjoy the slow-motion spectacle. Rack up gold coins from causing damage and use them to purchase new vehicles and levels!

items.title: Stickman Archero Fight
items.description: Stickman Archero Fight is a stickman action arcade game where you take control of a skilled stickman warrior and battle through waves of enemies using a variety of powerful weapons. As you progress, you'll move through different portals, each leading to new stages filled with increasingly tough opponents. Upgrade your stickman’s abilities, equip stronger weapons, and unlock special skills to become an unstoppable fighting machine. The fast-paced combat, strategic weapon choices, and thrilling challenges keep you on your toes as you fight to conquer every level and rise to the top of the leaderboard!

items.title: Stickman Army: Team Battle
items.description: Stickman Army Team Battle is a cool stickman fighter game in which you must fight against another stickman army and try to eliminate the enemy team's leader. Your actions are slightly random as each turn you have to spin a slot machine - depending on what the slots land on will depend on what attacks and damage you do.

items.title: Stickman Army: The Defenders
items.description: The green army is fighting the red army in an epic battle... Defend the White House at all costs and become victorious!

items.title: Stickman Army: The Resistance
items.description: Stickman Army: The Resistance is a cool fighting defense game in which you must control two stickmen soldiers and try to survive for as long as possible. Each stickman character covers one side of their defensive tower and you must switch between both defenders to prevent your position from being overrun. You start with basic weapons and defenses and you must unlock new equipment as you progress.

items.title: Stickman Beach Volleyball
items.description: This is a fun stickman beach volleyball game! Smash the ball perfectly and win the matches.

items.title: Stickman Bow
items.description: Stickman Bow is a fun and straightforward archery game where you guide a stickman with a bow and arrow to hit targets across challenging levels.

items.title: Stickman Bullet Warriors
items.description: Stickman Bullet Warriors is a stickman shooting game to take down the other stickman enemies. Try to use as few bullets as possible to get a perfect score.

items.title: Stickman Challenge
items.description: Stickman Challenge is a fun physics game where you place trampolines on a dotted grid, and watch stickmen bounce off them. The objective is to direct the stickmen to collect all the stars.

items.title: Stickman Clash
items.description: Stickman Clash is a thrilling action battle game where you battle as stickman warriors armed with an array of exciting weapons. Engage in fast-paced combat, outsmart opponents, and showcase your skills in dynamic arenas. The game's captivating action and challenging mechanics keep you hooked as you strive to become the ultimate stickman champion!

items.title: Stickman Clicker
items.description: Stickman Clicker is a clicker game where you help a stickman become a billionaire. Tap to earn money, invest in upgrades, and unlock stylish accessories. Customize your stickman and achieve milestones by unlocking various achievements. How wealthy can you get?

items.title: Stickman Destruction 3 Heroes
items.description: Stickman Destruction 3 Heroes is a ragdoll physics action game. Crash the stickman into obstacles, send him tumbling down staircases and through walls into oblivious bystanders. Cause as much destruction as possible to earn the most gold!

items.title: Stickman: Dinosaur Arena
items.description: Stickman: Dinosaur Arena is a casual game where you lead a squad of powerful dinosaurs into battle. Strengthen your team, unlock new species, and upgrade your current lineup to dominate the battlefield. Push your limits and rise through the ranks to become the ultimate Dino Commander!

items.title: Stickman Fighting: Super War
items.description: Stickman Fighting: Super War is a ragdollphysics gamewhere you fight with other stickman warriors and be the supreme hero. Choose your weapon and attack enemies in this epic stickman battleground!

items.title: Stickman Epic
items.description: Stickman Epic is a fast-paced action arcade game that puts your fearless stickman hero on a mission to eliminate hordes of relentless zombies. In this adrenaline-charged adventure, your objective is to battle through waves of enemies while upgrading your character to become stronger and more resilient to even more difficult challenges along the way to victory.

items.title: Stickman Escape School
items.description: Stickman Escape School is a fun adventure game where you need to find a way to escape from school. You are a student who doesn't exactly like to study and decides to cut class and ditch your boring teacher's class. There are a lot of different items you could use to escape from school, but if you choose the wrong one, you can be caught and forced to study for pretty much your entire life. The risks are steep, but the rewards are plenty—you get to skip school! Try to choose the right items so you can escape successfully!

items.title: Stickman Fighter: Mega Brawl
items.description: Stickman Fighter: Mega Brawl is a stickman battle game in which you must survive from the enemies by attacking them at the right moment.

items.title: Stickman Fighting 3D
items.description: It is time to fight. Choose your favorite stickman and perform awesome combos to take the opponents down!

items.title: Stickman History Battle
items.description: Stickman History Battle is a battle game where you can fight through different eras (the primitive, Vikings and knights, modern times, and the future) together with the stickman heroes. Build your great kingdom of Stickmen and fight against enemy civilizations. May the strongest win!

items.title: Stickman King
items.description: Stickman King is an action-packed arcade adventure where you guide a brave stickman through four distinct biomes. Face relentless enemies and defeat powerful bosses to prove your strength. Each battle tests your skill and agility as you strive to claim the title of King of Stickmen. Do you have what it takes to reign supreme?

items.title: Stickman Kombat 2D
items.description: Stickman Kombat 2D is an action-packed fighting game where you battle unique characters, each with their own moves, styles, and special attacks. Fight your way through challenging towers, defeating enemies to unlock new fighters and test your skills. The game delivers thrilling effects, including camera shakes, flashes, zooms, animations, and powerful special moves, that make every fight feel intense. With deep mechanics such as stamina management, combo chains, juggling airborne foes, and mastering blocks and breakers, Stickman Kombat 2D challenges you to take control of the fight, or lose it.

items.title: Stickman Miners Wars
items.description: Stickman Miners Wars is a defense game where the bad guys take your kingdom, and as a king, it is your job to get it back! Recruit different armies like warriors, archers, wizards, and miners to help you out. Command them to attack the enemy's towers and castle. Collect gold and mine resources to make your kingdom stronger. Defend your towers and castle from bad guys and take over theirs! Can you save the kingdom?

items.title: Stickman Parkour Master
items.description: Stickman Parkour Master is an action parkour game where you help the stickman jump over obstacles, climb ledges, and get to the portal! There are many cool skins available that you can collect. Upgrade your desktop display in the main menu to make it look more fun! Run through many biomes, perform tricks along your way, and conquer all the levels.

items.title: Stickman Prison: Counter Assault
items.description: There is chaos in the prison complex. Choose your side, and lead your team to victory in this stickman shooting game.

items.title: Stickman Project
items.description: Stickman Project is a 2D physics-based action battle game where you take on your opponents by unleashing mutant chaos. You’ll battle through dynamic levels using fluid combat and fast reflexes. Choose between endless more or level-based missions and test how long you can survive in this intense, stick-figure showdown. Made by Neron's Brother, Creators of Supreme Duelist.

items.title: Stickman Skate: 360 Epic City
items.description: Stickman Skate: 360 Epic City is a fun stickman skateboarding game to try to collect all the coins and complete the levels successfully.

items.title: Stickman Sword Fighting 3D
items.description: You are a stickman warrior with a mission to cleanse hordes of enemies in different stages of history.

items.title: Stickman Tennis 3D
items.description: Control your stickman player and compete in various challenging tennis competitions!

items.title: Stickman That One Level
items.description: Stickman That One Level is a casual game with puzzle elements where you need to escape a trap-filled prison. Find the key and open 100 doors to make your escape!

items.title: Stickman Tower Defense Idle 3D
items.description: Stickman Tower Defense Idle 3D is the perfect fusion of strategy, action, and idle mechanics that delivers an endlessly engaging experience. Build your defenses, deploy powerful heroes, and protect your castle from relentless stickman invaders in this visually immersive 3D tower defense game.

items.title: Stickman vs Villager: Save the Girl
items.description: Stickman vs Villager: Save the Girl is an exhilarating adventure game set in a captivating cube world. Take on the role of Stickman as you embark on a perilous journey to rescue a girl from the clutches of an evil villager.

items.title: Stickman WW2
items.description: Stickman WW2 is a war strategy game with to fight for any country in World War 2! Assemble the most powerful army of stickmen from machine guns, flamethrowers, cannons, and tanks. Take command of an army, conquer the world, and achieve great victories! Let the strongest stickman armies win the war in this funstickman game!

items.title: Stickman Zombie 3D
items.description: You are a lonely stickman. Shoot and eliminate zombies and other stickman enemies!

items.title: Stickman Zombie Annihilation
items.description: Stickman Zombie Annihilation is a vehicle driving game to reach the goal areas and kill stickman zombies along the way!

items.title: Stickman Zombie Escape
items.description: Stickman Zombie Escape is a casual platform game where you must pass level after level to get out of the dungeon. Be careful since there are a lot of zombies and traps around. Use your parkour skills and jump on the blocks. Destroy and avoid everything that gets in your way. Stickman has been waiting for freedom, get out soon!

items.title: Stickman Zombie vs Stickman Hero
items.description: Stickman Zombie vs Stickman Hero is an action platform game where you can play both as a hero and a zombie boss. When you play as a stickman hero, shoot all the zombies and gather other stickmen to be your allies. When you play as a zombie boss, you need to chase the stickman hero and make all his allies to be zombies. Good luck!

items.title: Super Thrower
items.description: Get ready for an arcade-packed adventure in Super Thrower, an adventure game where precision meets chaos! You’ll navigate levels by launching objects at enemies with a powerful throw that’ll leave them flying to their demise. With every toss, you’ll need sharp strategy and aim to conquer the level, and if you’re not quick enough, it could be game over. Amp up your gameplay by unlocking skins that let you take on the battlefield in serious style. Whether you're flinging with finesse or unleashing pure mayhem, Super Thrower will have you hooked!

items.title: Swop Shoot
items.description: Swop Shoot is a shooting game where you control these 2 stickmen as a single unit. The blue stickman can only kill the blue enemies, and the red stickman can only kill the red enemies. Once you reach the end of the stage, you will merge and become the purple stickman to kill the boss.

items.title: Tall.io
items.description: Tall.io is a thrilling and addictive game where you fight to be the tallest stickman in the arena! Collect bricks of your color to grow taller while dodging obstacles and other stickmen that are taller than you. Run through gates and smash trees to gain more height. Progress by conquering each arena!

items.title: The Spear Stickman
items.description: The Spear Stickman is a fun and fast-paced stick game of brutal spear throwing combat. You control a stickman armed only with a spear - you must kill the other stickmen who appear at random on different platforms and attempt to kill you. Using your mouse you must adjust the angle of your shot and aim quickly to take down your foe!

items.title: Thief Puzzle
items.description: Thief Puzzle is a clever 2D puzzle logic game that puts your problem-solving and strategy to the test. You control a sneaky thief’s hand as it reaches for valuable treasures, but the path is filled with complex traps, laser security systems, and tricky obstacles. Do you have what it takes to outsmart each trap that comes your way?

items.title: Through the Wall
items.description: Through the Wall is a creative puzzle game where strategy meets humor. Guide your stick figure through moving walls by striking the perfect poses to fit each opening. Every level introduces fresh challenges that test your timing, precision, and problem-solving skills, making for a fun and uniquely entertaining experience.

items.title: Tile Craft 3D
items.description: Tile Craft 3D is a fun coloring game where you stack tiles to create beautiful artwork. Match the numbers on the floor design to complete each masterpiece! Collect coins to upgrade your skills and hire helpers to speed up the painting process. As you lay down tiles, pick up coins and upgrade your abilities at the Upgrade Center. Reach level 5 to hire helpers and become a master tile crafter!

items.title: Treasure Champion: Chest Capture
items.description: Treasure Champion: Chest Capture is an action-packed team game where stickmen compete to seize treasure! Your mission is to capture the chest at the center of the field and work with your team to bring it back to base while dodging traps and outsmarting opponents. Every successfully delivered chest earns points, and the intense gameplay keeps you on edge until the very last second.

items.title: Turbo Dismounting
items.description: The stickman is here once again for an experiment in Turbo Dismounting. This time, you need to do as much damage as possible to the stickman before he lands permanently. Earn money to spend on more maps and vehicles. See how many damage points you can rack up!

items.title: Water Pool Heroes.io
items.description: Water Pool Heroes.io is an addictive arcade game where you swim around in a pool filled with rubber ducks. Collect rubber ducks and power-ups to grow bigger, and take down the other stickmen using your tail. Watch out for the tails of your opponents, though, as they can knock you out too!

items.title: Weapons and Ragdolls
items.description: Weapons and Ragdolls is an action-packed game featuring stickman characters and realistic physics. Use a wide range of weapons, from explosives to swords and firearms, while upgrading your arsenal to take on tougher challenges. Face diverse enemies, utilize slow-motion dodging, and enjoy randomly generated battles with increasing difficulty. Each fight offers a chance to refine your combat skills and try different strategies. Get ready for endless action and excitement!

items.title: Weapons Ragdoll Arena
items.description: Weapons Ragdoll Arena is an action ragdoll game that throws you into an arcade battle where weapons fly in over-the-top ragdoll showdowns and every item packs unpredictable impact. Outsmart your rivals and survive the chaos as you climb your way to become the ultimate throwing champion!

items.title: Web Slinging Race
items.description: Web Slinging Race is a casualone-button gamewhere you can show off your super spider abilities. The better you are at swinging, the faster you go. Save people by stopping the train from falling off the cliff using your web. Master the web-swinging and get your crown!

2048 is a single-player sliding tile puzzle game developed by Gabriele Cirulli. Merge tiles with the same power of 2 to get the total sum. The goal is to keep merging tiles this way until you reach 2048!

items.title: Battle Chess
items.description: Battle Chess is an engaging puzzle game that requires strategic thinking to outwit your opponent. Solve amazing puzzles and merge your knights while preventing your enemy from doing the same. Experience exciting knight battles that will keep you on your toes. Plan your attacks carefully to defeat your adversary. The enemy's chess moves will mirror your own, so, be careful and think ahead before you move.

items.title: Black
items.description: Black is another color-based puzzle game for you! Can you make the screen black in all 25 levels? Each level has its own logic. You can also get the FREE mobile version with 50 levels (including new levels that are more suitable for mobile play).

items.title: Blue
items.description: After Yellow,Red, andBlack, now you got Blue, another puzzle game for you! Can you make the screen blue in all 25 levels? Each level has its own challenge.

items.title: Chessformer
items.description: Chessformer is a challenging puzzle arcade game where your movements are confined to the chess piece you're given. Use your chess pieces' unique abilities to navigate through each stage and reach the king.

items.title: Crimson Room
items.description: Crimson Room is an escape room game originally developed in Flash. It was one of the first of its kind. Toshimitsu Takagi developed the game in 2004 and helped to popularize the escape room genre. To play the game, simply point and click. See if you can escape the Crimson Room!

items.title: Green
items.description: Green is a challenging puzzle game made byBart Bonte. Like his previous games,blackandblue, you must turn the whole screen a single color by solving the puzzle. This time the color is green. Have fun!

items.title: Growmi
items.description: Growmi is a platformer puzzle game where you solve puzzles to regain power. Your character has a limited set of moves that increase over time as you clear more areas of the game. Show the world how smart your Growmi is and complete the game!

items.title: Lava and Aqua
items.description: Lava and Aqua is a puzzle game where you need to reach the exit without touching the lava on each level. The lava will flow every time you move, so think before you step. Good luck!

items.title: Math Push
items.description: Math Push is a puzzle game where you move blocks to solve math expressions. Clear the exit by solving the problem and moving on to the next level!

items.title: Orange
items.description: Orange is a captivating puzzle game that challenges you to bring vibrant orange hues to every level. With 25 unique and thought-provoking puzzles, can you uncover the logic and master each stage to fill the screen with the mesmerizing color of orange? Test your problem-solving skills and immerse yourself in this colorful and addictive gameplay experience. Get ready to paint the world orange!

items.title: Pink (Bart Bonte)
items.description: Pink is another screen-filling puzzle game from Bart Bonte and the next episode aftergreenandblue. This time you need to make the screen pink in all 25 levels. Each level has its own logic.

items.title: Red
items.description: Red is a fun and exciting puzzle game – the browser version of this popular title is finally here so get ready for some fun! The aim of this game is simple – you must attempt to turn the whole screen red – this might sound easy but as you progress the challenges become increasingly difficult and you must really strain your mind to think of a solution.

items.title: Robbie the Robot
items.description: Robbie the Robot is a puzzle adventure where you guide a robot across space platforms to gather stars and reach the finish. Strategically place directional arrows to steer him through challenging levels filled with shifting platforms, portals, and keycard-activated doors. Test your creativity with 100+ levels and even craft your own cosmic puzzles in the Level Editor.

items.title: SSSPICY!
items.description: SSSPICY! is an arcade game to help the hungry snake eat all the spicy pepper!

items.title: Age Of Arms
items.description: Age of Arms is a strategic defense game where you battle through different eras. Set your weapons in the enemy’s path, defeat foes, and evolve into stronger warriors in each age. With every victory, upgrade your arsenal and keep advancing to become the ultimate warrior of history’s greatest battles.

items.title: Age of Tanks Warriors: TD War
items.description: Age of Tanks Warriors: TD War is an action tower defense battle game where you fight your opponent throughout the ages, starting from the Stone Age, making your way all the way to modern marvels. Your main task is strategically dominating the battlefield to constantly upgrade your army and conquer enemies in an epic 1v1 battle. Lead your army to victory in this strategic game and show your earned skills to the modern world.

items.title: Animal Royal
items.description: Animal Royal is a strategic versus game where you command a team of wild animals in fast-paced battles. Each creature has unique strengths and tactics, and your goal is to outwit opponents while defending your meat and stealing theirs. Think fast, act smart, and fight to claim your place as ruler of the animal kingdom.

items.title: AOD - Art Of Defense
items.description: AOD - Art of Defence is a casual tower defense game set in a post-apocalyptic world. As Commander of the A.O.D squad, you lead the charge against Mr. Ivil's ruthless thugs, determined to find the lost Inola project. With stunning isometric graphics, build your technological kingdoms and thwart the enemy's destructive ambitions. Will you save mankind or succumb to darkness?

items.title: Asteroid Breaker
items.description: Asteroid Breaker is an idle defense game where your auto-firing turret takes on relentless waves of asteroids. Take control manually for precision shots, earn XP to unlock roguelite-style upgrades, and grow stronger with every wave. Use your earnings to advance a permanent skill tree and build a turret so powerful, no asteroid stands a chance.

items.title: Bloons Tower Defense 3
items.description: Bloons Tower Defense 3 is a tower defense game where you can place monkeys, pineapple bombs, needles, etc., to pop the balloons. Unlock new tracks and choose between 3 difficulty modes to achieve that total bloon popping satisfaction.

items.title: Bloons Tower Defense 4
items.description: Bloons Tower Defense 4, aka BTD 4, is a classic tower defense game initially released in Flash. Defend the path by avoiding Bloons from reaching the end.

items.title: Bloons Tower Defense 4 Expansion
items.description: Bloons Tower Defense 4 Expansion is a fun endless tower defense game. Strategically place your monkey towers along the path to pop all the balloons and defend your territory. With new maps, towers, and upgrades, test your skills and find the best strategies to stop the relentless balloon invasion. Unlock powerful special abilities and unleash devastating attacks to overcome the toughest waves. Can you conquer the expanded challenges and emerge as the ultimate bloons-popping champion?

items.title: Cannon Clash
items.description: Cannon Clash is an action-packed island battle where you command a mighty cannon against rival pirates and enemy ships. Fire with precision, upgrade your arsenal, and defend your base in explosive showdowns. Outsmart and outshoot opponents to dominate the seas—because in this clash, only the sharpest aim survives.

items.title: Cavern: From the Fog
items.description: Cavern: From the Fog is a tower-defense and mining game at once. You will play as a dwarf who needs to defend his cave. Gather resources to build turrets and upgrade them. Kill all the goblins that want to attack your base. Get some money and use it to upgrade your base, weapon, lantern, etc. Ensure the survival of your clan!

items.title: Clash of Ages
items.description: Clash of Ages is a strategic battle game where you lead your army from the Stone Age to the Modern Era. Begin with primitive tactics, conquer enemies, and earn coins to unlock advanced technologies. Progress through different eras, mastering new strategies and weapons to achieve ultimate victory in this epic clash.

items.title: Clash of Skulls
items.description: Clash of Skulls is a tower defense game to prevent enemies from destroying your base by deploying various types of skulls army. Level up your army to increase your damage. Start planning your attacks to take over your enemy's territory. Hire skeleton warriors with blades, spears, scythes, explosives, battering rams, and much more!

items.title: Clash of Warriors
items.description: Clash of Warriors is a tower defense game where strategy is key. Command and control an army of fighters from three warrior classes of each era. Your mission is to defeat enemy hordes and destroy their base. With each victory, upgrade and strengthen your army, unlock new eras, and engage in epic battles!

items.title: Clone2048
items.description: Clone2048 is a 2048 merge game with some action in it. In the year 2048, Dr. Wong is investigating a Wuberan planet that has been infected with a mysterious virus. Place all of Dr. Wong's clone soldiers in the right spot to make the soldiers merge into stronger soldiers to beat all the zombies on the planet.

items.title: Craft and Battle
items.description: Craft and Battle is a strategic battle game where you command an army, build a base, and gather resources to outmaneuver your enemies. Recruit specialized units, exchange prisoners for valuable assets, and capture the enemy general to weaken their forces. Every battle tests your tactics as you fight across diverse maps against an unpredictable enemy army.

items.title: Crown & Cannon
items.description: Crown & Cannon is a fast-paced 2D strategy game that challenges you to expand territory, command powerful weapons, and face off against dynamic AI on fully destructible terrain. With upgradeable units and tactical combat at its core, every battle demands sharp planning and bold moves as you carve your path to victory across shifting battlefields.

items.title: Cubic Frontier: Zombie Robby
items.description: Cubic Frontier: Zombie Robby is an engaging casual defense game where you become humanity's last hope against an apocalyptic horde of zombies! Build your fortress, train soldiers, and fight waves of terrifying undead, including massive Zombie Titans. With strategic gameplay and exciting features, this game challenges you to defend humanity at all costs.

items.title: Cursed Treasure
items.description: Cursed Treasure Game - epic tower defense! This is the first episode of Cursed Treasure. Place towers strategically and don't let the looters steal your gems! The main aim of the game is to build towers and keep your gems safe from the invading armies. This is an addictive tower defense game that has a great selection of good heroes and tower types.

items.title: Cursed Treasure 1.5
items.description: Cursed Treasure 1.5 is atower defense gamewhere you protect a stash of cursed jewels for an evil overlord. Stop the heroes from getting in and taking the corrupt gems by building defense towers and using magic.

items.title: Cursed Treasure 2
items.description: Cursed Treasure 2 is an action game, the long-awaited sequel toCursed Treasure, featuring improved gameplay and more levels! Defend your gems against enemies, champions, and bosses by building your towers strategically.

items.title: Cursed Treasure Level Pack
items.description: Level pack edition of the multi-races tower defense,Cursed Treasure. Protect your precious gems from being stolen.

items.title: Day D Tower Rush
items.description: Day D Tower Rush is a tower defense game where you must build towers to attack the dinosaur! Meet a combination between the power of technology and ancient creatures in this game. Set up your strategy to defeat the dinosaurs.

items.title: Defenders of the Realm: An Epic War
items.description: Defenders of the Realm: An Epic War is a tower defense game to not let your enemies surpass your base. Try to put your troop, which has different skills, in the right place to win the war.

items.title: Desktop Tower Defense
items.description: Desktop Tower Defense is a classic tower defense game originally released in 2007 as a Flash game. It is made by Paul Preece and has been played 100s of millions of times. It's available here in HTML5 so that you can easily play it in your modern web browser.

items.title: Dice Roll: Protect the Relic
items.description: Dice Roll: Protect the Relic is a tower defense game that combines strategic dice-rolling with magical combat. You’ll defend an ancient relic from enemy waves by rolling dice with unique powers like fireballs, ice barriers, and healing spells. Each roll activates different abilities, making every move crucial to your survival.

items.title: Endless Siege
items.description: Endless Siege is a tower defense game where you survive endless waves of enemies. Deploy various defense towers in strategic locations to repel the attacking enemies. Level up the towers and upgrade them to more powerful units. See how many waves you can survive before being overrun by a horde of warring beasts! Anuto TD inspired this game.

items.title: Endless Siege 2
items.description: Endless Siege 2 takes tower defense strategy to the next level with a fresh twist: towers now come from a deck of cards! Just like the first version, face off against waves of invaders on a new map every day. Place your defenses, purchase upgrades, and survive as long as you can for the highest score. The card deck element adds an extra layer of surprise and strategy. Come back daily for new challenges!

items.title: Epic Empire: Tower Defense
items.description: Epic Empire: Tower Defense is a thrilling strategy game where you command powerful heroes and towers to protect your kingdom from waves of evil forces. Embark on an epic adventure through vibrant worlds, from frozen kingdom, soaring magical kingdoms, dark underground tunnels, and enchanted florists. Face unique challenges worldwide as you battle to reclaim territories overrun by enemies.

items.title: Falling Fruits
items.description: Falling Fruits is an incremental clicker game where you destroy falling fruit using attack towers. Earn cash from splattering the fruit to buy various upgrades and new towers.

items.title: Flag Defender!
items.description: Flag Defender! is a defense game that puts you in charge of protecting the flag against relentless enemy invasions. Utilize your unique skills and deploy helpful allies to fend off waves of increasingly powerful foes. After each victorious wave, enhance your skills through upgrades to prepare yourself for the upcoming challenges. Get ready to defend the flag and prove your strategic prowess!

items.title: Fortress of the Wizard
