items.description: Fortress of the Wizard is a magical defense adventure where you become a mighty sorcerer guarding your stronghold from relentless demon hordes. Harness an arsenal of devastating spells—fireballs, icy waves, swirling tornadoes, meteors, and more—to crush the invasion. Every battle tests your timing, strategy, and mastery of the arcane arts as you fight to protect your realm.

items.title: Frontline Defense
items.description: Frontline Defense is a tower defense game where you must strategically position towers along the enemy's path to defend your territory. As with other tower defense games, your objective is to build and strategically position towers to annihilate waves of incoming enemies. By employing effective tower placement and utilizing unique abilities you can successfully defend your territory and emerge victorious. Prepare for an exciting challenge as you navigate through various levels and devise strategies to defeat your adversaries!

items.title: Rage Fruits Tower Defense
items.description: Rage Fruits Tower Defense is an innovative and humorous tower defense game with a unique blend of mechanics and quirky visuals. Combines backpack synthesis, roguelike elements, and tower defense, creating an engaging and fresh gameplay experience.

items.title: Goblin Punk Tower Defense
items.description: Goblin Punk Tower Defense is a fast-paced strategy game where you battle waves of mischievous goblins. Use futuristic towers to fend off relentless enemies, strategically placing and upgrading defenses to alter their paths. Each wave grows stronger, pushing your tactical skills to the limit. Build the ultimate defense and see how long you can survive the invasion!

items.title: Guardians of the Kingdom
items.description: Guardians of the Kingdom is an action-packed fantasy game that takes you on an epic journey to defend the realm from the dragon army of eternity. Strategically deploy your heroes in this Tower Defense adventure, showcasing your tactical brilliance to claim victory. Upgrade your heroes to bolster their strength and face waves of relentless enemies. Unite identical heroes to enhance their powers, and wield the power to control the battlefield. Prepare for an immersive and thrilling battle to safeguard the Kingdom!

items.title: Herochero: Enemy Slayer
items.description: Herochero: Enemy Slayer is a thrilling RPG tower defense game where you, as the hero, defend your realm from waves of enemies. Strategically manage tower placement while supplying them with unique ammo types like fire and ice to keep the defense strong. Actively control your hero to repel invaders and protect your base!

items.title: Idle Medieval Tower Defense
items.description: Idle Medieval Tower Defense is a casual strategy game where you defend, upgrade, and survive the Onslaught! Step into a world of knights, magic, and endless waves of enemies — the ultimate blend of tower defense strategy and idle progression! Are you ready to stand tall against the darkness and craft your ultimate medieval defense?

items.title: Iron Towers Alliance
items.description: Iron Towers Alliance is a thrilling action defense PvP strategy game where you build and defend your tower against players worldwide. Fortify your structure, install powerful weapons, and lead your squad in battles. Team up for assaults, climb the rankings and earn rewards. Unlock achievements, collect parts, and upgrade your units to dominate the battlefield!

items.title: Kingdom Rush
items.description: Kingdom Rush is a superb castle defense game and one of the most popular and challenging available! This title features weird and wonderful enemies such as orcs, trolls, wizards and monster – each enemy is highly detailed and has a cool animation. You own realm is defended by warriors and mages – these mighty combatants defend your castle and city from their mighty towers.

items.title: Kiomet
items.description: Kiomet is an immersive, real-time Io strategy game that challenges you to grow and defend your kingdom in a dynamic, ever-changing world. Expand your realm by strategically capturing new territories, all while defending against rival players and unpredictable threats. Rally your forces to claim vital lands, strengthen your holdings with upgrades, and skillfully plan your conquests to rise to the top of the leaderboard. With every decision you make, you’ll inch closer to ultimate domination.

items.title: Limited Defense
items.description: Limited Defense is a strategic tower defense game where you command bandits, archers, and explosive towers to hold back relentless waves of enemies. Face off against mischievous Green Slimes, fearsome Orcs, and towering bosses like the Boss King Slime. Upgrade your defenses, unlock legendary warriors, and test your tactical skills in intense, fast-paced battles!

items.title: Magic Merge: Tower Defense 3D
items.description: Magic Merge: Tower Defense 3D is a captivating casual tower defense game. Your kingdom is under threat from an evil army, and you must protect it. Expand your castle, unlock powerful towers, engage in strategic merges, and upgrade your defenses to thwart dragons, trolls, goblins, and other dangerous enemies. In this magical world, you have the opportunity to hire formidable units such as swordsmen and archers to aid in the defense of your castle. Prepare for an epic battle where your decision-making skills and strategic prowess will determine the fate of your kingdom.

items.title: Merge Cannon: Chicken Defense
items.description: Merge Cannon: Chicken Defense is an action defense and merge game where you protect your castle against an army of chickens. Can you hold back continuous waves of chickens while maintaining defenses?

items.title: Nature Strikes Back
items.description: Nature Strikes Back is a casual tower defense game that combines the engaging mechanics of merging guardians with the mission to defend nature. Players embark on a cute and fun journey where they merge various guardians strategically to thwart incoming threats and protect the environment!

items.title: Noob Tower Defense
items.description: Noob Tower defense is an action game where you build towers and traps for zombie monsters. Get coins after killing zombies and upgrade heroes to take revenge!

items.title: Onslaught 2
items.description: Onslaught 2 is a tower defense game to keep attackers away from the base, Area 51. Build your weapons, upgrade your defenses and use earnings to buy upgrades.

items.title: Raid Heroes: Total War
items.description: Raid Heroes: Total War is a thrilling blend of RPG, strategy, and tactical battles where you lead a squad of heroes to protect your kingdom from the Dark Lord’s forces. Strengthen your castle, forge powerful artifacts, and face off against rivals in intense PvP clashes. Unleash your tactical skills and become a legendary leader!

items.title: Random Cards: Tower Defense
items.description: Random Cards: Tower Defense is a tower defense game where you must use your strategy to decide which cards you will use for the battle. Each card has its own strength and its own power. Keep in mind that in order to win, you will need to calculate all the actions. Play out different tower defense scenarios, make wise decisions, and improve your cards.

items.title: REDLINE: Idle Front
items.description: REDLINE: Idle Front is a sleek idle-clicker hybrid where you build and upgrade five high-tech turrets to crush endless waves of enemies. Strategically deploy machine guns, shotguns, snipers, missile launchers, and lasers to handle bosses every five waves. Tap to overclock your turrets for extra firepower and plan upgrades to master this clean, minimalist turret defense challenge.

items.title: Snake Shooter: Tower Battle
items.description: Snake Shooter: Tower Battle is a fast-paced casual defense game where you use precise archery skills to take on a massive creeping dragon. Aim, shoot, and upgrade your bow to fend off relentless attacks. Unlock powerful abilities like fire arrows and multi-shot to strengthen your defenses. With vibrant visuals and nonstop action, every battle tests your strategy and reflexes.

items.title: Space Hex: War Merge Shooter
items.description: Space Hex: War Merge Shooter is a strategic space shooter where every hex on your ship shapes the outcome of battle. Merge special galaxy weapons to boost firepower, gain extra lives, or create shields. Equip your ship wisely, and fine-tune your tactics as you face relentless waves of enemies in this immersive space fight simulator.

items.title: Space Swarm
items.description: Space Swarm is a challenging arcade game that tests your survival skills. You're the only hope for the last space station against the ruthless alien invasion. Upgrade your defenses and match the enemy's strength. Can you protect the station and save humanity?

items.title: Spirit Guardians
items.description: Spirit Guardians is a tower defense game where you summon elemental spirits and strategically place them to defend your base from waves of enemies. Master the three spirit elements, fire, water, and plant, to build the ultimate defense.

items.title: Stickman Tower Defense Idle 3D
items.description: Stickman Tower Defense Idle 3D is the perfect fusion of strategy, action, and idle mechanics that delivers an endlessly engaging experience. Build your defenses, deploy powerful heroes, and protect your castle from relentless stickman invaders in this visually immersive 3D tower defense game.

items.title: Super Number Defense
items.description: Super Number Defense is a tower defense game where you can put your calculation skills to the test! Strategically defeat waves of enemies by harnessing the power of math. Choose your turrets wisely, as their strength and effectiveness depend on your ability to solve simple math problems. Allocate your resources wisely to maximize your defense capabilities. With its innovative blend of tower defense and math gameplay, this game offers a thrilling and educational gaming experience. Can you protect your base? It's time to unleash the power of numbers!

items.title: TimeWarriors
items.description: Time Warriors is a strategy game where you lead your army through history, from the Stone Age to futuristic battles. Upgrade your troops, build powerful bases, and use unique units and tactics to defeat your enemies. Master every era, outsmart your opponents, and rise to become the ultimate commander in this epic war game.

items.title: Tower Defense
items.description: Tower Defense is a casual game where strategic prowess is put to the test as you build walls, erect towers, and expand your kingdom to defend against relentless hordes of enemies. As the ruler of your realm, you must harness your resources wisely, fortify your defenses, and lead your forces to victory against the encroaching threat. Are you ready to rise to the challenge and safeguard your kingdom from destruction?

items.title: Tower Defense - Alien Invasion
items.description: Tower Defense Alien Invasion is a strategy-packed defense game where you protect Earth from relentless extraterrestrial threats. Place and upgrade towers with unique abilities, build smart formations, and adapt your tactics to withstand tougher waves. Every battle tests your planning and resource management as you fight to hold the line and save humanity from invasion.

items.title: Tower Defense Clash
items.description: Tower Defense Clash is a casual tower defense game where you protect a castle from the persistent attack of outsiders. Place your turrets, upgrade them, and keep the horde away from the castle. Progress through the unique levels. It's all about thinking ahead!

items.title: Tower Defense.io
items.description: Tower Defense.io is a strategic tower defense game where you protect your cave from relentless waves of enemies. Place and upgrade towers like Archers and Flame Towers to fend off unique creeps. Uncover new territories, defeat bosses, and unlock resources as you progress. Can you withstand the assault and become the ultimate defender?

items.title: Tower Swap
items.description: Tower Swap is a clever puzzle game combining match-3 mechanics with addictive tower defense gameplay. Stop the dragons from reaching your castle by building your defenses through tactical tile-matching decisions.

items.title: Tower vs Goblins
items.description: Tower vs Goblins is a thrilling tower defense game where you defend your base against relentless goblin invasions. Strategically build and upgrade your fortress with powerful weapons like ballistae and magic crystals. Explore a medieval world filled with epic battles, unique challenges, and dangerous foes as you outwit enemies and safeguard your stronghold!

items.title: TowerWatch - PVP Battle
items.description: TowerWatch - PVP Battle is a tower defense game to fight the horde and other players using guns, traps, and magic. Battle and defend your tower in PVE & PVP Battles. Earn XP to upgrade your heroes & traps. Earn Battle Pass XP to win amazing skins, props, and rewards. Defend the Tower and defeat the evil forces!

items.title: Trap Craft
items.description: Trap Craft is a defense game where there is a hacker who is ready to fulfill any desire of a Princess, Noob, Pro, Herobrine, and the rest if they want to play a game that the hacker prepared. The game is to protect the portal from the zombies' attack. Each character has its own ending, so find out all of them! Set traps and fight against the zombies, survive, and also get yourself a pet for your company.

items.title: Trojan War
items.description: Trojan War is a tower defense game where you find yourself in the midst of a war and must defend yourself against relentless enemies. Assemble your army and strategically position towers to counter the enemy's attacks. Upgrade your weapons and towers as you progress through each level to strengthen your defenses. Employ strategic thinking and skillful tactics to effectively attack your enemies and avoid defeat. Prepare yourself for the challenges ahead and strive for victory in this intense war!

items.title: Village of Heroes: Roguelike TD
items.description: Village of Heroes: Roguelike TD is a roguelike tower defense game that blends strategic gameplay with thrilling adventure. Assemble a team of legendary heroes to defend your village from relentless monster invasions. Choose from various heroes, each with unique abilities and roles. Place your heroes wisely and manage your resources to survive against the odds. Build and upgrade your village to unlock new heroes and enhance your defenses. Enjoy the unpredictable and ever-changing challenges that make each run unique. Experience the strategic depth of placing and upgrading your heroes to fend off relentless enemies. Have fun on an unforgettable adventure! Defend your village, recruit legendary heroes, and conquer the monstrous hordes today!

items.title: Warrior Clash
items.description: Warrior Clash is a thrilling war strategy game where only the strongest prevail. Take command of fearless warriors, train elite units, and engage in high-stakes battles. Outsmart your opponents with clever tactics and assert your dominance on the battlefield. Every decision you make shapes your journey in this epic challenge of strength and strategy!

items.title: We Not Survive
items.description: We not survive is an idle tower defense game that challenges players to stay alive in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by zombies. As a survivor, you must defend your base from waves of terrifying monsters using a range of weapons and facilities that can be upgraded. The game's main currency is petroleum, which can be extracted and used to upgrade your base's weapons, projectiles, and health regeneration capabilities. As you progress through the game, you can unlock surprising unique powers and facilities that help you to defend yourself better against the increasingly challenging waves of enemies! So, are you ready to take on the zombie apocalypse and stay alive?

items.title: Wild Castle TD: Grow Empire
items.description: Wild Castle TD: Grow Empire is an excellent combination of tower and castle defense game! Build your defenses and use an excellent strategy to survive the monsters' onslaught.

items.title: World Z Defense - Zombie Defense
items.description: World Z Defense - Zombie Defense is a thrilling action defense game where players must fight against hordes of zombies trying to overrun the world. In this post-apocalyptic scenario, your mission is to defend cities across the globe by strategically placing soldiers with different weapons, each offering unique stats like damage, shooting speed, and reload speed.
